content.cn: 管理员，看样子你恢复得不错！
content.en: Endmin, you seem to be doing pretty well for your recovery!

content.cn: 好的，探索任务就交给我吧。
content.en: Alright. Just leave the exploration mission to me.

content.cn: 明白了，包在我身上！
content.en: Got it. Sounds like my type of job!

content.cn: 佩丽卡监督让我转告你，终末地决定重启“密境行者”计划了。
content.en: Supervisor Perlica wants me to forward this message to you: Endfield is restarting our "Delver of the Cryptic" project!

content.cn: 这项计划的具体内容是什么？
content.en: Got any deets about this project?

content.cn: 这项计划听上去很……神秘？
content.en: This project sounds pretty ... cryptic?

content.cn: 这可是管理员过去制订的计划哦！旨在广泛探索碎片化的小型协议空间——
content.en: You came up with this project in the past, Endmin! The objective is to explore various fragmented mini Protocol Spaces —

content.cn: 它们变化多端，充满谜团。除了你，没有其他人能胜任这项探索任务了。
content.en: They're ever-changing and filled with mysteries. You're the only one capable of taking up this exploration mission.

content.cn: 接下来就拜托你啦，管理员！
content.en: We're counting on you, Endmin!

content.cn: 期待你带回来的新数据！
content.en: Looking forward to the new data you find!

content.cn: 管理员，工人之家的工团成员们向我们提出申请，有个叫卡莉的小朋友想见管理员一面。
content.en: Endmin, UWST crew mates from the Worker Dorms sent us a request. There's a girl named Carly who really wants to meet you.

content.cn: 这个小朋友想见我一面？
content.en: A girl wants to meet me?

content.cn: 据说她一个人跑去野外很多次。
content.en: They told me she ran off into the wilderness a couple of times.

content.cn: 最近一次被找到后，她就一直要见你，暂不清楚原因。
content.en: After finding Carly in her most recent escapade, she kept talking about how she wanted to meet the Endmin. Nobody knows why, though.

content.cn: 如果你现在有时间，请前往工人之家一趟，了解下情况吧。
content.en: If you have time, please visit the Worker Dorms and see what's going on.

content.cn: 管理员！
content.en: Endmin!

content.cn: 我也收到了佩丽卡的求援信号嘛，抵达这里后发现大家需要帮助。
content.en: Perlica's distress signal reached me as well. I found everyone here in need of aid.

content.cn: 洁尔佩塔很关心大家嘛。
content.en: And you have a heart of gold, Gil.

content.cn: 你会一直待在这里吗？
content.en: Will you be staying here?

content.cn: 这里需要我。我想要多为大家做一些事。
content.en: I'm needed here. These people deserve every effort I can make.

content.cn: 一定有很多需要你的地方。
content.en: I'm sure your help is very much needed.

content.cn: 嗯……管理员也还在附近吗？
content.en: Yeah ... so I was wondering if you're around, Endmin.

content.cn: 还没走。
content.en: I'm around.

content.cn: [图片]（和枢纽区基地病友的合影）
content.en: [Image] (Photo taken with the Hub Base patients)

content.cn: 如果有空的话——我是说，有空哦，我知道你很忙……
content.en: And I also wonder if you got time. Like, actual spare time. You're always so busy.

content.cn: 有空。
content.en: I do.

content.cn: 那就请管理员来枢纽区基地看看吧，有可能的话，也帮我一个小忙……
content.en: Rly? Oh pls come to the Hub Base. I need your help. Nothing serious, tho...

content.cn: 先别拒绝我，我有礼物哦！
content.en: Pls say YES. I got sth nice for you!

content.cn: 好，把坐标发过来吧。
content.en: Sure. Send me the coordinates.

content.cn: [定位信息]
content.en: [Positioning data]

content.cn: [图片]（枢纽区高点风景照）
content.en: [Image]

content.cn: [图片]（一盘好吃的）
content.en: [Image]

content.cn: 日子过得很不错啊！
content.en: Enjoying yourself?

content.cn: 嗯，所以想要和管理员多多分享！
content.en: Yeah. And I wanna share the happy moments with you!

content.cn: 你怎么来四号谷地了？
content.en: What brings you to Valley IV?

content.cn: 管理员，还在谷地是吧？正好正好，净水设备已经跑起来了，快来和我们喝两杯！
content.en: Endmin? Still in the Valley? Great. The water purifier is working. Care for a glass of clean water?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_016">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_016">

content.cn: 管理员，我把那些日记交给了罗普。
content.en: Endmin, I've handed over those diaries to Ropp.

content.cn: 这个是？
content.en: What's this?

content.cn: 好像是卡莉偶然拍下来的。
content.en: I think it was captured by Carly by chance.

content.cn: 她很高兴地拿给我看……说这是她最满意的作品。
content.en: She showed it to me with a glow in her eyes, declaring it her finest work.

content.cn: 那孩子，好像真的有摄影的天赋呢。
content.en: Oh Carly, it seems like she truly has a gift for photography.

content.cn: 但他还是决定出发寻找她……可能此刻已经离开四号谷地了。
content.en: But he still set off to find her... He might have already left Valley IV by now.

content.cn: 我想，是因为他也不想放下那些美好的回忆吧。
content.en: I suppose... it's because he can't bring himself to let go of those beautiful memories, either.

content.cn: 不管怎么说，我希望他们会有好的结果。
content.en: In any case, I hope the story ends well for them.

content.cn: 也希望，回忆的双方彼此不再相忘。
content.en: And also, may neither side of these memories ever forget the other.

content.cn: 还有另外一件事……
content.en: Also...

content.cn: 怎么了？
content.en: What is it?

content.cn: 卡莉……发给了我这个。
content.en: Carly ... sent me this.

content.cn: 管理员，你现在感觉如何？还好吗？
content.en: Endmin, how are you feeling now? Are you alright?

content.cn: 经历过最近发生的事情之后，是否……想起来了些什么？
content.en: After all that's happened recently ... have any of your memories returned to you?

content.cn: 好像并没有。
content.en: Not really.

content.cn: 没有好转吗……
M3曾嘱咐过我，在你刚苏醒后的这段时间里，要及时检查你的状况，尤其是关于记忆。
content.en: M3 reminded me to monitor your condition closely during this initial post-awakening period ... particularly regarding your memory.

content.cn: 有空回帝江号一趟吧，我在静滞核心等你。
content.en: Return to Dijiang when you have time. I'll be waiting at the Stasis Core.

content.cn: 嘿，管理员！又打扰您了……不是什么大事，有个寄给伊冯的包裹送到工团的物流分拣处了。
content.en: Hey, Endmin! Sorry to bother you again... It's nothing major. There's a package for Yvonne that ended up at the UWST logistics sorting center.

content.cn: 但这次这个东西……怎么说呢，有点特殊。我想了下，可能得请您去取来给伊冯。
content.en: But this thing ... well, it's a bit special. After some thought, I think I'll need you to pick it up and deliver it to Yvonne.

content.cn: 伊冯那孩子，大概只有管理员您亲自出马才劝得动。
content.en: I'm afraid you're the only one that can get through to Yvonne, Endmin.

content.cn: 结束之后，我请您去吃羽兽烤串！
content.en: I'll treat you to fowl skewers after this!

content.cn: 包裹有什么特征吗？
content.en: What does it look like?

content.cn: 哦！差点忘了！收件名是“超级迭代人”。
content.en: Right! The receiver is named... "Super Iterator"

content.cn: 管理员……
content.en: Endmin...

content.cn: 那个……您现在忙吗？
content.en: As of now...

content.cn: 怎么了？遇到什么麻烦了？
content.en: Ask away. Are you in trouble?

content.cn: 就是，有件要紧事找您！
content.en: Um, it's something urgent!

content.cn: 等您来矿区营地这边再详细说吧。
content.en: I'll fill you in on the details once you get to the Mining Camp.

content.cn: 我知道了，这就过来。
content.en: I got it.

content.cn: 管理员，工程中心发现帝江号上有一处异常，需要你的关注。
content.en: Endmin, the Engineering Division found an anomaly aboard Dijiang. We need you to take a look at it.

content.cn: 异常地点就在静滞核心附近，相关研究人员阿奎多已就位，请尽快前去确认。
content.en: The anomaly is near the Stasis Core. Aquito, the scientist in charge, is already there. We should talk to her quickly to verify what's going on.

content.cn: 管理员，枢纽区基地刚刚进一步恢复了与帝江号的联系。
content.en: Endministrator, contact between the Hub Base and Dijiang has been further restored.

content.cn: 我们已经完成精准长距离协议传送的准备工作，基地需要您协助进行最后的校准。
content.en: Preparation for precise long-distance tele-protocol is complete. The base requires your assistance for the final calibration.

content.cn: 也就是说，我们可以返回帝江号了？
content.en: Can we head back to Dijiang now?

content.cn: 是的，如果方便，请尽快来中控塔一趟。
content.en: Absolutely. And please make your way to the Control Tower as soon as you can.

content.cn: 收得到吗？管理员？
content.en: Endmin? Getting my msg?

content.cn: 谷地内讯号初步恢复，虽然还不稳定，但我们可以通过Baker沟通了。
content.en: Baker is back in the Valley!

content.cn: 我在原型机里找到了一些有趣的信息，您应该会感兴趣的。
content.en: Got smth nice from the Proto.

content.cn: 请尽快过来吧！就在我们第一次见面的老地方！
content.en: Meet me where we 1st met!

content.cn: 正在追踪，暂时安全。
content.en: I'm safe. Scouting rn.

content.cn: 有情况会报告，有需要留言。
content.en: Keep u synced. Lmk if u need.

content.cn: 管理员，清障工作已经基本完成了。
content.en: Endministrator, the clearing work has been done.

content.cn: 秦主管正在前往集成核心区域进行最后的确认工作。
content.en: Director Qin is on her way to the Core AIC Area for some final checks.

content.cn: 看来情况有所好转。我们可以准备下一步行动了。
content.en: Things are looking up. We can start preparing for our next step.

content.cn: 请快来集成核心区域吧，我一会儿就到。
content.en: Please head to the Core AIC Area. I'll join you shortly.

content.cn: 了解，我们走吧。
content.en: Got it. Let's go.

content.cn: 管理员，你有空吗？
content.en: Endministrator, do you have time?

content.cn: 有空，建设情况都还好吗？
content.en: Hi, I got time. How's work?

content.cn: 这边还好，但是维拉遇到麻烦了！
content.en: We're fine here, but Vera's in trouble!

content.cn: 对不起，我详细解释一下。维拉主要负责基建前站附近的生态种植区工作，我刚收到她的报告……
content.en: Sorry, let me explain in detail. Vera mainly handles the Eco-Farm near the Infra-Station. I just got this report from her...

content.cn: 种植区被裂地者洗劫一空！我已经增派了人手来避免类似的情况再次发生……可是我现在盯着建设情况，去不了现场……
content.en: The Eco-Farm was ransacked by Landbreakers! I've already sent more personnel to prevent this from happening again ... but I'm tied up overseeing construction and can't get to the site.

content.cn: 我现在就过去看看。
content.en: I'll head over right now.

content.cn: 实在是太感谢你了，管理员！
content.en: Thank you so much, Endministrator!

content.cn: 管理员，刚刚我收到一位名叫田悯的农业天师发来的求助消息。
content.en: Endmin, I just received a distress message from a Nongye Tianshi named Tian Min.

content.cn: 管理员，你可以去武陵的实验作物试点区，田悯说他最近都会在那里待着。
content.en: Endmin, you can proceed to Wuling's Agricultural Test Site. Tian Min mentioned he will be stationed there for the foreseeable future.

content.cn: 我明白了。之后会过去看看的。
content.en: I see. I will head over to assess the situation later.

content.cn: 他说他们现在遇到了一些难题，希望能得到终末地的帮助。
content.en: He mentioned they are currently facing some difficulties and hope to receive assistance from Endfield.

content.cn: 是什么难题？能具体说说吗？
content.en: What kind of difficulties? Do you mind elaborating?

content.cn: 说是和作物种植有关……
content.en: He said it's related to crop cultivation...

content.cn: 我记得管理员之前也有过种植的经验，应该没问题的。
content.en: I recall you having prior experience with cultivation. It should be manageable.

content.cn: 那他现在在哪里？
content.en: Where is he now?

content.cn: 怎样才能找到他？
content.en: How do we locate him?

content.cn: 管理员，我们的天师在复合式农场遇到了一些小麻烦。
content.en: Endministrator, our Tianshi has run into some minor issues at the farm complex.

content.cn: 没关系。归根结底，是武陵想解和清波寨的结，我只想借用一点各位带来的好势头。
content.en: That's fine. In the end, Wuling aims to reconcile with Qingbo Stockade. I only wish to leverage the favorable winds your presence has brought.

content.cn: 先不论汤汤，清波寨里有些人对外来者依然还有敌意。
content.en: Not just talking about Tangtang. Some in Qingbo Stockade still hold hostility toward outsiders.

content.cn: 我有点担心，你的想法不一定真能顺利传到寨子里。
content.en: I'm a bit concerned your message might not truly get through to the Stockade.

content.cn: 所以才需要更积极地做些工作，不是吗？
content.en: That's exactly why we need to be more proactive, isn't it?

content.cn: 终末地能赢得汤汤的信任，在我们之间形成平衡，已经是近年难遇的机会。
content.en: Endfield earning Tangtang's trust and creating this balance between us is a rare opportunity in recent years.

content.cn: 不管是否会遇到阻力，武陵都需要先展露自己的诚意才行。
content.en: Regardless of any resistance, Wuling must first demonstrate its sincerity.

content.cn: 我明白你的想法了，我们先去看看情况。
content.en: I get your point. We'll go assess the situation first.

content.cn: 那就拜托你了。洪波天师应该还在现场，武陵欠你一个人情。
content.en: Then I'll leave it to you. Tianshi Hong Bo should still be on-site. Wuling owes you one.

content.cn: 现场情况复杂，如果方便的话，还望你出面帮忙解围。
content.en: The situation on-site is complicated. If it's convenient, we'd appreciate your help to resolve it.

content.cn: 复合式农场……你派人到天王坪的据点了？
content.en: The farm complex ... you sent people to the Sky King Flats outpost?

content.cn: 开设据点时，佩丽卡监督知会过我，就留了点心。
content.en: Supervisor Perlica informed me when setting up the outpost, so I kept an eye on it.

content.cn: 机会实在难得，没有及时告知，希望你不要介意。
content.en: It was a rare opportunity. I apologize for not informing you sooner. I hope you don't mind.

content.cn: 我们也才在那里开始建设不久，会不会稍微着急了一些？
content.en: We've only just started construction there. Isn't this moving a bit too fast?

content.cn: 终末地需要一些时间来获得寨民的认可，不一定能帮得周全。
content.en: Endfield needs time to earn the Stockaders' trust. We may not be able to help that much.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_013">其他天师？我看他们和大伙儿聊了半天呢。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_013">Other Tianshi? I saw them chatting away with everyone.

content.cn: 天师们还特意检查过呢，最后还是去一边看我们忙活了。
content.en: The Tianshi even inspected it themselves. They eventually just stepped back and watched us work.

content.cn: 难道这副样子数据也能合格……
content.en: How could this mess possibly pass inspection...

content.cn: 不行，我得每天都去盯着！
content.en: No way. I have to go keep an eye on things every day!

content.cn: 我们的图纸是不是丢了？！
content.en: Wait, where are our blueprints?!

content.cn: 嗯？我昨天还看见寨子里的人拿着它在施工啊？
content.en: Huh? I saw our Stockaders using it for construction just yesterday!

content.cn: 有图纸怎么还建成那形状了？我以为你们在修自己的亭子呢！
content.en: You guys had the blueprints? Then why'd it end up looking like that? I thought you were building your own pavilion!

content.cn: 而且都是从哪儿弄的料，地板上还有个门把手！
content.en: And where did you even get the materials? There's a literal doorknob on the floor!

content.cn: 河佬他们说，图纸上的做法太费料，正好我们修屋子还剩了些好木头，就换了换设计。
content.en: He Lao and the others said the blueprint method wasted too much material. Since we had some good lumber left from building the houses, they just ... adjusted the design.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">

content.cn: 这是能随便换的吗？其他天师没拦你们？
content.en: You can't just "adjust" that! Didn't the other Tianshi try to stop you?

content.cn: ……原来他们那会儿是在拦人？
content.en: ...So that's what they were trying to do?

content.cn: 管理员，你到选剑局了？有没有了解到装备精锻相关的东西。
content.en: Endmin, have you been to Hongshan Swordmancers? Did you learn anything about gear artificing?

content.cn: 通过图像对比，以及对扫描数据的分析，当前地区的装备模板箱位置已经同步至管理员你的终端。
content.en: Through image comparison and scan analysis, the locations of the crates in your current area have been synced to your terminal.

content.cn: 其他地区需要等到后续扫描分析完成后才能同步。
content.en: Once scans of other regions are complete, additional crate locations will be updated.

content.cn: 如果你现在有时间，可以根据终端上的位置信息前往回收。
content.en: If you have time now, you can head to the marked locations on your terminal to recover them.

content.cn: 刚学习完。不过，我听连天师说终末地还有一个和装备相关的项目？
content.en: I just mastered gear artificing, but I heard from Tianshi Lian there's another gear-related project at Endfield?

content.cn: 是的，这次联系管理员，也是为了同步这个项目的情况。
content.en: Yes. That's actually why I'm contacting you now.

content.cn: 出于战略考量，终末地同各大组织合作，将一些带有“装备制造模板”的装置投放到了各种区域。
content.en: For strategic purposes, Endfield has partnered with major organizations to deploy devices containing gear templates across various regions.

content.cn: 这些装置一经投放，便会根据所在环境进行自主模拟，并调整“装备制造模板”的数据，进行更有效的迭代后，最终形成“装备模板箱”。
content.en: Once deployed, these devices simulate their surrounding environment and automatically refine the template data. After multiple iterations, they ultimately form what we call a Gear Template Crate.

content.cn: 那我们该如何回收这些装备模板箱？
content.en: How do I recover these Gear Template Crates?

content.cn: 研发中心目前确认了一批已完成迭代的装备模板箱，并更新了帝江号上的传感器模块。
content.en: The R&D Center has confirmed a batch of fully-iterated crates and has updated the sensor module aboard Dijang.

content.cn: 管理员，帝江号已经完成了建造更多舱室的准备。
content.en: Endmin, Dijiang has finished preparing the construction of additional cabins.

content.cn: 它在等待您的进一步唤醒，请择时返回。
content.en: It awaits your awakening. Please schedule your return.

content.cn: 太好了，我这就准备出发。
content.en: Good. I'll sort out my things and head back straight away.

content.cn: 我会在舰桥的总控中枢等待您。
content.en: I shall wait for you by the Control Nexus at the Bridge.

content.cn: 上一次修复升级好像还没过去多久，看来最近相关工作挺顺利的？
content.en: Not long has passed since our last upgrade. I guess work has been pretty smooth so far.

content.cn: 近期的故障发生频率确实有所降低，或许您的归来让帝江号更加安定了。
content.en: Recently, the frequency of malfunctions has indeed decreased. Perhaps your return has stabilized Dijiang.

content.cn: 不管是什么原因，至少是件好事。
content.en: Well, I don't know why, but sounds like good news to me.

content.cn: 那么，我会在总控中枢等待您。
content.en: In any case, I'll wait for you at the Control Nexus.

content.cn: 管理员，告诉你一个好消息！终末地研发中心开发的“集成管家”终于正式投入使用啦！
content.en: Endmin! I got great news for you! The AIC Steward developed by the Endfield R&D Center is finally officially in use!

content.cn: “集成管家”？那是什么？
content.en: "AIC Steward"? What's that?

content.cn: 集成管家是扩张管理系统的辅助机器人，负责扩张和维护集成核心区域的可用场地。
content.en: The AIC Steward is a support bot for the expansion management system, responsible for expanding and maintaining available space in the Core AIC Area.

content.cn: 如果管理员觉得放置设备的空间不够用了，可以直接去找它升级。
content.en: If you feel there's not enough space, you can go directly to it for an upgrade.

content.cn: 另外，你还能用它给集成核心区域设置仓库存取线，进一步提高生产效率！
content.en: Plus, you can use it to set up Depot Buses in the Core AIC Area, further boosting production efficiency!

content.cn: 太好了，那我在哪里可以找到它呢？
content.en: Great! Where can I find it?

content.cn: 目前有个集成管家就在枢纽区的集成核心区域附近，应该很容易发现的！
content.en: There's currently an AIC Steward near the Hub's Core AIC Area. It should be easy to spot!

content.cn: 太棒了，管理员，这下枢纽区集成核心区域的扩建就完成了。
content.en: Excellent, Endmin! The expansion of the Hub's Core AIC Area is now complete.

content.cn: 之后还能继续对集成核心区域进行扩建吗？
content.en: Can I continue expanding the Core AIC Area in the future?

content.cn: 当然可以！除此之外，各据点的集成核心区域也能用这种方式扩展。
content.en: You sure can! You can also expand Core AIC Areas for other outposts using the same method.

content.cn: 未来如果还想扩建，管理员只要准备好调度券，再来找“集成管家”就好啦。
content.en: If you want to work on expansions in the future, just come to the AIC Steward with Stock Bills.

content.cn: 管理员，我们的物资调度员刚刚与基地恢复了联系。
content.en: Endmin, our stock redistributor just got back in touch with the Hub Base.

content.cn: 作为重要的后勤支持人员，她能为我们在四号谷地的行动提供许多方面的支持。
content.en: As a key logistics support officer, she can provide multi-faceted support for our operations in Valley IV.

content.cn: 她已经在工人之家待命。如果您现在有时间，我建议您尽快与她商议接下来的行动计划。
content.en: She's already on standby at the Worker Dorms. If you have time now, I recommend discussing the next steps with her as soon as possible.

content.cn: 救急。
content.en: SOS!

content.cn: 快来帮忙。
content.en: I need your help.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_003">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_003">

content.cn: 什么情况？
content.en: What's the situation?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_032">索斯？？？
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_032"> Soth???

content.cn: 看来现在的情况不太正常。
content.en: I think there's a situation at the Camp.

content.cn: 我们直接去暂居处找他吧。
content.en: Let's head to the Camp and talk to him.

content.cn: 昨天卡贾捡到几个毒蘑菇，要是没有罗曼教的那几个窍门，他肯定已经吃了。
content.en: Karja foraged some toxic shrooms. If he hadn't learned Roman's tricks, he probably would've eaten them.

content.cn: 有几位这些话，我也算放心一些<image="sns_emoji_005">。
content.en: Your words of confidence are making me feel better <image="sns_emoji_005">.

content.cn: 下次记得喊我，上次还没听过瘾呢。
content.en: Toast me when you're teaching again. Your lessons are really interesting!

content.cn: 这可不能乱来，太危险了。
content.en: Don't mess with that. Way too dangerous!

content.cn: 罗曼师傅都可以去当老师啦，开个谷地动植物辨识班啥的。
content.en: You should be an instructor and teach an actual class for identifying Valley IV plants and animals.

content.cn: 那可不行，我连学名都认不全，跟专家们差远啦。
content.en: Probably not. I don't know the scientific names of many species. I'm nowhere near the experts.

content.cn: 您不必妄自菲薄，专家也会遇到不曾研究过的问题。
content.en: Now you're just being humble, Mr. Roman. Even experts would come across things they don't understand.

content.cn: 研究的本质是尊重事实，细心总结，而不是身份地位上的讲究。
content.en: The aim of research is to respect the truth and pay meticulous attention to details. It is not a competition to see who has the best academic titles.

content.cn: 理论终要服务现实，实用就是知识最大的价值。
content.en: Theory must be capable of explaining reality. Practicality is the greatest virtue of knowledge.

content.cn: 我其实挺好奇一件事儿，但不知道问各位合不合适。
content.en: I'm curious about something and wonder if it's alright to ask.

content.cn: 原来是这样，总觉得有点遗憾……
content.en: Oh. Sounds like a shame, really...

content.cn: 不是抱怨！各位已经非常厉害了！
content.en: I'm not complaining! What you did for us at this place is completely amazing!

content.cn: 当然，终末地的目标就是引领开拓的步伐，创造更加广阔的宜居空间。
content.en: Of course. Endfield's purpose is to lead the way in expansion, creating more space where life can truly thrive.

content.cn: 总有一天，这颗星球会变成我们真正的家园。
content.en: One day, this planet will become a home we all belong to.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_013">问嘛，别见外！
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_013"> Ask away. Don't be shy!

content.cn: 终末地工业随时都能拿出这么多设备，到哪儿都能用。
content.en: You Endfielders can build facilities anytime and they work anywhere.

content.cn: 还有那个集成工业系统，真是厉害的技术。
content.en: And you got that incredible AIC Factory tech.

content.cn: 那当然，这可是我们的招牌！
content.en: Of course. It's the best tech of Endfield.

content.cn: 既然有这样的技术，各位为什么不立刻将集成工业系统推广到整个文明环带呢？
content.en: Since you got such awesome tech, why not roll out the AIC across the entire Civilization Band right away?

content.cn: 嗯，这个嘛……<image="sns_emoji_023">
content.en: Ah... Well, yeah...<image="sns_emoji_023">

content.cn: 再厉害的人也没法凭空变出产品来。现在连电网的供电桩和中继器都要人工安装，还差得远呢。
content.en: You can't create products out of nothing. The electric pylons and relay towers of our power grid must be deployed manually. We still have a long way to go.

content.cn: 技术背后永远离不开人的支持，这也是我们积极与联盟工团合作的原因。
content.en: Technology cannot exist without technical support. This is why we're actively working with the UWST.

content.cn: 至少我们有所准备，算是不幸中的万幸。
content.en: We got really lucky. At least the camp is prepared.

content.cn: 他们赶了很远的路，差点就因为侵蚀灾害全交待在路上。
content.en: After barely surviving the Blight during their long journey, they finally arrive.

content.cn: 你们有什么打算？
content.en: What are your plans?

content.cn: 尽全力帮助他们，就像各位曾经帮助我们那样。
content.en: Do our best to help them, just like what you've done for us.

content.cn: 既然他们的家已经回不去了，我们就帮他们建设新的家。
content.en: Their home has been destroyed. We'll help them build a new one.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_005">说得好！
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_005"> Well said!

content.cn: 实在不好意思，因为吸纳了新的居民，将来可能还会麻烦大家。
content.en: Now that we got more people joining us, we probably will keep calling you in the future.

content.cn: 能力之内，义不容辞。
content.en: And we shall do whatever we can to help.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_001">阿吉在卡贾肩上拍的，她非说要给各位也看看。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_001"> Ginny took this photo while sitting on Karja's shoulder. She wants to show this to everyone.

content.cn: 拍得真好看，看来阿吉非常喜欢现在的暂居处啊。
content.en: That's a great photo. I believe Ginny really loves her camp.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_038">索斯先生，我早些时候看到你们那边好像忙得热火朝天的，有啥事儿吗？
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_038">Mr. Soth, I saw you busy with a lot of stuff back then. Is something going on?

content.cn: 有一批难民从别的地方过来，我们在腾地方安置他们。
content.en: A band of nomads arrived at the camp. We're trying to make room for them.

content.cn: 他们手上有些想交换的东西，大家清点了一早上，分类放进公用仓库了。
content.en: They offered things to trade. We made a count, sorted them out, and kept them in the camp depot.

content.cn: 哇，这么熟练？
content.en: Wow. You sound like an experienced elder.

content.cn: 称不上熟练，好在各位帮忙，这里储备充足，我们才应付得过来。
content.en: I'm not that experienced. We couldn't have managed it without your help and the solid supplies here.

content.cn: 安德烈，我们在难民暂居处安置了一位叫斯托布的乌萨斯工人。
content.en: Andre, we've secured an Ursus worker called Staub at the refugee camp.

content.cn: 他想在据点搭把手，还特意让我们联系你。
content.en: He wants to help out at the outpost, and asked us to put in a word.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_022">斯托布？谢天谢地，听起来他没什么事。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_022">Staub's alive? Best news all week!

content.cn: 我明白他的想法，请各位帮忙带点紫晶零件来集成核心区域吧。
content.en: I get him. Please bring some Amethyst Parts to the Core AIC Area.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_035">你要紫晶零件做什么？
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_035">Amethyst Parts? What for?

content.cn: 到时候您就知道了！
content.en: You'll find out soon!

content.cn: 管理员，卡贾托人留言，他想邀请你当面进行商谈。
content.en: Endmin, Karja had someone drop a message. He wants to have a face-to-face discussion about an important business.

content.cn: 不过，他似乎希望你单独前往……而且也没在应急通信群里直接问，我不明白为什么要这么做。
content.en: But he also asked you to come alone. I don't know why he didn't ask for help in the Rapid Response Group.

content.cn: 总之情况就是这样，交给你判断啦。
content.en: That is the sitch. It's your call, Endmin.

content.cn: 管理员，有一条信息需要您的关注。
content.en: Endmin, there is a message that requires your attention.

content.cn: 我们正在对帝江号进行升级，分配修复作业中产生的资源冗余。
content.en: We are performing upgrades to Dijiang and allocating excess resources from the repair process.

content.cn: 如果您能协助我们完成总控中枢的升级，将会有效推进工程进度，因此前来打扰。
content.en: Allow me to explain this transgression. If you can help upgrade the Control Nexus, we will achieve significant progress in our work.

content.cn: 我明白了，的确是件好事。
content.en: Got it. Sounds pretty incredible to me.

content.cn: 升级？有新功能吗？
content.en: Upgrade? Do they offer new features?

content.cn: 不止如此，相信此次升级不会辜负您的期待。
content.en: More than just new features. I have faith that you will not be disappointed in this upgrade.

content.cn: 仅凭文字传达不便，不介意的话，我可以当面向您介绍相关细节。
content.en: Conversing via a texting platform is inconvenient. If I may, I offer to provide you with the various details, in person.

content.cn: 那么，请选择合适的时间返回帝江号，我会在总控中枢等待您。
content.en: In any case, please return to Dijiang at an appropriate time. I shall wait for you at the Control Nexus.

content.cn: 管理员，您在吗？
content.en: Endmin, you there?

content.cn: 碾骨氏族的袭击已经结束，但超域裂隙留下的损伤难以修复。
content.en: While the Bonekrushers' assault has been repelled, the damage from the Æther rift remains.

content.cn: 如今整个四号谷地的生态已经被严重破坏，动植物群落数量急剧减少。
content.en: Valley IV's ecosystem now lies in ruins, flora and fauna populations collapsing at catastrophic rates.

content.cn: 四号谷地是我们的家，我们不想放弃这里。管理员，可以请您助我们一臂之力吗？
content.en: Valley IV is our home, we won't abandon it. Endmin, will you stand with us?

content.cn: 义不容辞。
content.en: It's my duty to help.

content.cn: 希望我能帮到你们。
content.en: Hope I can really support you.

content.cn: 那太好了！我们已经订好了一个计划。我还有一些想法，等当面再跟您商量吧。
content.en: Excellent! We've got a project plan. I also have some ideas to discuss with you in person.

content.cn: 我把会面地点发送给您了，就在供能高地。
content.en: I've sent you the location, it's at the Power Plateau.

content.cn: 前辈，大型地质探针的建造工作已经开始推进了。
content.en: Professor, the construction of the large geological probe is now underway.

content.cn: 我也认为你们能做好，要有信心。
content.en: I believe you'll do great too. So stay confident!

content.cn: 管理员……
content.en: Endmin...

content.cn: 既然管理员都这么说了……
content.en: Well, since the Endmin has put it that way...

content.cn: 我们会尽力而为的！之后得多麻烦你们了！
content.en: We'll do our best! And thanks in advance for all your help!

content.cn: 当然没问题。
content.en: Sure, no problem.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_021">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_021">

content.cn: 现在两位负责人正忙得团团转呢。
content.en: The two leads can hardly catch a break.

content.cn: 我还是……有点惊讶，这么重要的工作，克劳老师竟然交给我们……
content.en: I'm still ... a little surprised. I never thought Professor Crowe would entrust us with such a critical task.

content.cn: 一定是出了什么岔子，我再去找克劳老师谈谈。
content.en: There's gotta be some mistake. I'll go talk to Professor Crowe again.

content.cn: 克劳先生不会在这么严肃的问题上出错的，他这么做一定有自己的考虑。
content.en: Mr. Crowe wouldn't slip up on something this serious. He must have his reasons.

content.cn: 对啊，你们别想那么多，放手去做就是了。
content.en: Totally! Don't overthink it — just go for it!

content.cn: 可是……
content.en: But...

content.cn: 我相信克劳的判断，你们没问题的。
content.en: I have faith in Crowe's choice. You're up to it.

content.cn: 前辈，最近怎么样？
content.en: How have you been, Endmin?

content.cn: 如果有空的话，可以来一趟供能高地的重建指挥部吗？
content.en: Would you be able to come by the Reconstruction HQ at the Power Plateau?

content.cn: 现在的局面有些……混乱？毕竟谁也没有猜到克劳先生的任命人选会是那两个人。
content.en: Things have gotten... complicated. After all, no one expected Crowe to appoint those two of all people.

content.cn: 我觉得可能需要前辈来解决眼前的难题……
content.en: Your help is definitely needed...

content.cn: 好的，我这就来。
content.en: Sure. Heading over right now.

content.cn: 那，我在重建指挥部等你。
content.en: Great! I'll be at the Reconstruction HQ.

content.cn: 克劳 邀请 你、佩丽卡、陈千语、艾尔黛拉加入群聊
content.en: Crowe has added you, Perlica, Chen Qianyu, and Ardelia to the group chat

content.cn: 所以这次是个机会？
content.en: So ... this might be their chance?

content.cn: 嗯，我想他们还会碰到不少问题。这也算是提前给各位打个预防针。
content.en: Yeah, I think they've still got quite a few issues ahead. Consider this an early heads-up.

content.cn: 让你们费心了。
content.en: Thanks for taking care of that.

content.cn: 管理员，那两个毛头小子又给你们添麻烦了吗？
content.en: Endmin, those two kids giving you a headache again?

content.cn: 都是小事。
content.en: No big deal.

content.cn: 不用放在心上，已经解决了。
content.en: No worries. It's been resolved.

content.cn: 如果他们惹了什么祸，不用客气，替我好好地教育一下他们。
content.en: If they stir up any trouble, don't go easy on them — teach them a lesson on my behalf.

content.cn: 没那么严重，他俩只是工作上有些分歧。
content.en: Nothing major! they just had a little disagreement about work.

content.cn: 这两个人从以前开始就这样了，我有预想到这种情况，当时也犹豫过，要不要把这项工作交给他们。
content.en: Same old story with those two. I kind of expected this might happen — and I did hesitate when giving them this task.

content.cn: 他们的能力可以胜任，只是……心性还沉不下来。
content.en: They've got the skills to handle the work — it's just ... they haven't really learned to steady themselves yet.

content.cn: 管理员，抱歉在百忙之中打扰您。
content.en: Hey Endmin, so sorry to bother you.

content.cn: 但……当前重建指挥部遇到了棘手的问题。
content.en: But... The Reconstruction HQ is in a tricky situation.

content.cn: 这里需要您的帮助……非常感谢。
content.en: We need your help... Thank you so much in advance!

content.cn: 我这就来。
content.en: Heading over right now.

content.cn: 这次真是太危险了，如果没有终末地的各位，我们真不知道该如何收场。
content.en: That was way too close. If it weren't for the Endfielders, we'd be screwed right now.

content.cn: 现在不是吵架的时候，冷静。
content.en: This isn't the time for arguing. Calm down.

content.cn: 管理员说得对，现在重要的是重建工作，不是在这儿追责。
content.en: The Endmin's right. What matters now is rebuilding, not pointing fingers.

content.cn: 没错。那接下来就交给你善后了，让他们停下来吧。
content.en: Right. It's in your hands, Chen. Calm them down.

content.cn: 欸？我？呃……我觉得现在重要的是重建工作！
content.en: Huh? Me? Well... I'd say what matters most right now is the reconstruction!

content.cn: @邓恩 @克莱维尔 好啦，吵架就到此为止吧，重建指挥部又碰到问题了，还需要你们俩来解决呢。
content.en: @Dean @Clavell Okay, enough arguing. The Reconstruction HQ's run into another problem, and needs you guys.

content.cn: 我们这就来！
content.en: We'll be right there!

content.cn: 稍等，马上赶过去！
content.en: Just a sec, heading over now!

content.cn: 没想到那里还有天使……
content.en: Didn't expect to see Aggeloi there...

content.cn: 真有你们的，当时情况都这么紧急了，你们还顾得上吵架。
content.en: Unbelievable! You were still arguing right in the middle of an emergency.

content.cn: 如果他还这么干，那这架是免不了的。
content.en: If he keeps this up, an argument will just be inevitable.

content.cn: 你这么多年真是一点变化都没有，你不思考下前因后果吗？
content.en: You are still the same after so many years. Don't you ever think about the consequences?

content.cn: 我说得很清楚，危险的工作就该交给我来！
content.en: I've said it already — leave the dangerous tasks to me!

content.cn: 那你倒是做好啊！
content.en: Then you'd better pull it off.

content.cn: 停一下！停一下！我真不该提起这茬！
content.en: Wait, wait! I really shouldn't have brought this up!

content.cn: 管理员，我们的大型地质探针很快就要建造完成了。
content.en: Endmin, we're almost done with the geological probe!

content.cn: 多亏了终末地的帮助，重建指挥部的所有人都想向你们表示感激。
content.en: It's all thanks to the Endfielders. We'd like to thank you all together.

content.cn: 如果不忙的话，要不要抽空来指挥部一趟？我们只剩下最后的调试工作了。
content.en: Would you like to swing by some time? All there's left is some coordinating.

content.cn: 那两个不争气的小崽子也想见见你们。
content.en: Our "dynamic duo" wants to see you too.

content.cn: 地质探针终于启动了！我们真的做到了！
content.en: The geological probe is finally active! We pulled it off!

content.cn: 我们也要去做源石发电站的就职准备了，那边也还有不少工作等着我们。
content.en: Time for us to get ready for our positions at the Originium Power Plant. A lot of work's still waiting for us there.

content.cn: 还有分工的事要讨论……我感觉有的人又想要大包大揽了。
content.en: There's also the matter of splitting up work… Feels like someone's trying to hog it all again.

content.cn: 你这话说得有些针对啊？
content.en: That sounded kinda personal, huh?

content.cn: 有吗？还是说你有什么想法？
content.en: Did it? Or are you the one reading into it?

content.cn: 你等一下，我现在来找你好好聊聊这个话题。
content.en: Wait there, I'm coming right over so we can talk this through.

content.cn: 随时奉陪。
content.en: Whenever you're ready.

content.cn: 看来，真正的“重建工作”，路还长着呢。
content.en: Looks like the true work of reconstruction still has a long way to go.

content.cn: 太不容易了，有了地质探针，许多研究工作都可以开始了。
content.en: What a tough journey — but now that we have the geological probe, tons of research can begin.

content.cn: 大家都辛苦了，看到探针顺利运作，我也可以放心了。
content.en: Great work, everyone! Seeing the probe run smoothly is such a relief.

content.cn: 欸？你要走了吗？
content.en: Huh? You're leaving already?

content.cn: 嗯，探针的建设结束了，我要回终末地了。
content.en: Yeah, the probe's construction is finished, so I'm heading back to Endfield.

content.cn: 这段时间真是多亏各位帮忙了。
content.en: Really appreciate all your help these past days.

content.cn: 也是靠你们自己。
content.en: It was your hard work as well.

content.cn: 以后别再吵架了。
content.en: Let's not argue anymore, okay?

content.cn: 瞭望塔终于建好了……这下我们也能安心不少。
content.en: The watch tower is finally complete... Now we can rest a little easier.

content.cn: 我是觉得吧，先别想那么多！把想做的事都做了，再去考虑别的也来得及！
content.en: Exactly! What I think is, don't overcomplicate it for now! Just focus on what needs doing. There'll be time to worry about the rest later!

content.cn: 我明白了，谢谢各位的开导！我还是……先按计划把需要完成的事做完吧。
content.en: I understand now. Thank you all for your guidance! I should ... focus on completing the tasks at hand as planned first.

content.cn: 这就对了嘛！诺夫曼，你这甭管三七二十一老想着怪自己的习惯，可得改改。
content.en: Now that's more like it! Noffman, you've gotta break that habit of blaming yourself no matter what.

content.cn: 嗯，我会的。只是作为一名负责人，我总觉得自己还有太多不足……
content.en: Yeah, I will. It's just that as the person in charge, I always feel like I'm still falling short in so many ways...

content.cn: 一点点去克服就好，我们都会帮你的。
content.en: Just take it one step at a time. We'll all be here to help you through it.

content.cn: 是啊，别一个人扛着了，你现在可不是一个人。
content.en: Right, no need to shoulder it all alone. You're not by yourself in this anymore.

content.cn: 嗯，我会继续努力的！接下来，也请各位继续助我一臂之力吧。
content.en: Yeah, I'll keep pushing forward! From here on out, I'll still need all of you to lend me your strength.

content.cn: 要是拉梅尔德他们还在，肯定会很高兴吧……都怪我……
content.en: Had Rameld and the others lived to see this ... they would have been overjoyed. This is all my fault...

content.cn: 别说这种丧气话嘛，诺夫曼！这救援不是都跟上了吗？
content.en: Enough of that defeatist talk, Noffman! Didn't the rescue efforts pull through in the end?

content.cn: 咱们老说“万事开头难”，这打头的难关都给拿下了，往后保准顺利着呢！
content.en: We always say "the first step is the hardest." Well, we've cleared that toughest hurdle now. Smooth sailing from here on out, I reckon!

content.cn: 你说的我也知道……就是心里总过不了自己那关。
content.en: I know you're right... It's just that I can't seem to forgive myself, deep down.

content.cn: 多往好处想想，说不定他们很快就有消息了。
content.en: Try to stay hopeful. They might send word any day now.

content.cn: 多相信点自己，你是救援的负责人，也是最该有信心的那个人。
content.en: Have more faith in yourself. You're leading this rescue. You're the one who needs to believe the most.

content.cn: 嗯，自怨自艾终究是没法解决问题的。
content.en: Yeah. Wallowing in self-pity will not solve anything after all.

content.cn: 终末地的各位，你们在忙吗？
content.en: Yo, Endfielders! You all busy?

content.cn: 嗯，到时候就在那里会合吧。
content.en: Okay, let's meet up there soon.

content.cn: 潘叔？出啥事了？
content.en: Uncle Pan? What's going on?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_009">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_009">

content.cn: 诺夫曼带人出去搜救，到现在还没回来，怕是碰上麻烦了。
content.en: Noffman and his crew went out on an SAR mission, and they're still not back... Guess they've hit a snag.

content.cn: 怎么了？他又带人出去了？
content.en: What happened? He's out with a crew again?

content.cn: 和失踪的那三个工友有关。他一听说可能有线索，立马就跟着去了。
content.en: It's about the three missing workers. As soon as he got word of a clue, he was off like a shot.

content.cn: 您把大概位置发过来，我们这就出发。
content.en: Could you send us the general location? We'll set out right away.

content.cn: 对了，大潘先生，临时食堂的菜谱你想好了吗？
content.en: By the way, Mr. Da Pan, have you figured out the menu for the improvised canteen?

content.cn: 没问题，这可难不倒我！包在我身上就是！
content.en: Easy-peasy! Consider it handled.

content.cn: 干脆做个转盘，把你的拿手菜都写上去，转到哪道就放哪道进菜单。
content.en: Let's put all your best dishes on a spin wheel and let it decide.

content.cn: 转盘选菜？有意思！我这就找个纸板来！
content.en: A spin wheel for dishes? Sounds fun! I'll get some cardboard!

content.cn: 竟然还能这样？这下我都有点好奇最后的菜单了。
content.en: You can do that? Now I'm curious about the final menu too.

content.cn: 那菜谱的事就这么定了，要用的食材我都会提前备好的。
content.en: Then the menu's settled. I'll prep all the ingredients ahead of time.

content.cn: 等食堂筹备完了，大家记得来尝尝大潘先生的手艺。
content.en: Once the canteen's ready, everyone better come try Mr. Da Pan's cooking.

content.cn: 没问题，到时候我们肯定来。
content.en: No problem. We'll be there for sure.

content.cn: 是啊！这哪能少得了我们！
content.en: Totally! No way we'd miss out on that!

content.cn: 这么难得的机会，我们不会错过的。
content.en: We're not gonna miss a chance like this.

content.cn: 唉，我不就在为这事儿犯愁嘛。你们几个，要是有啥爱吃的，也给我说说呗？
content.en: Sigh, ain't that what I've been stuck on? If there's anything you guys love to eat, just let me know!

content.cn: 确实，我也想来尝尝地道的宏山菜。
content.en: Yeah, I wanna try some local Hongshan dishes too.

content.cn: 这方面我没有太多的偏好，可以问问大家的想法。
content.en: I don't really have a favorite. Let's see what the others think.

content.cn: 我想想……只要是宏山菜，我都没问题！不然干脆上几道你的拿手菜呗？
content.en: Lemme see... I'm cool with anything from Hongshan! Or hey, why not make a few of your best dishes?

content.cn: 嘿，你这说的，我的拿手菜可多了！什么回锅兽肉、醋溜白菜、爆炒腰花……
content.en: Ha, you serious? I got more best dishes than you can count — twice-cooked fillet, vinegared cabbage, stir-fried pork kidneys...

content.cn: 真要全写上去，包你们一个月吃的都不重样！
content.en: If I list 'em all, you won't repeat a dish for a whole month!

content.cn: 一个月不重样也挺好的？
content.en: No repeating dishes sounds pretty good to me.

content.cn: 确实是个好办法，工人们也会期待每天能吃到什么菜吧？
content.en: That's a solid plan. The crew must wonder what's for dinner each day, don't they?

content.cn: 大潘师傅，诺夫曼呢？新一批补给物资到了，我等着他签收。
content.en: Master Da Pan, do you know where Noffman is? The new batch of supplies just arrived, and I'm holding for his sign-off.

content.cn: 这些裂地者真是够烦人的，让我逮到了，非得好好教训下他们。
content.en: These Landbreakers are such a pain! I'll teach 'em real good if they ever run into me!

content.cn: 我有些担心避难点现在的情况。我们还是先去那儿看看吧。
content.en: I'm a little concerned about the current state of the refuge point. Let's go take a look first.

content.cn: 我是真不想总麻烦你们。
content.en: Honestly, I don't wanna keep bothering you guys.

content.cn: 但说实话……只要你们露面，士气准保能提一截。
content.en: But I gotta say... Morale always jumps a notch when you're around!

content.cn: 别客气，这是我们该做的。
content.en: Glad to help. It's what we're here for.

content.cn: 好，我们这就出发。
content.en: Okay, we're on our way!

content.cn: 我签就行，您稍等一会儿，我这就过来。
content.en: I'll sign it. Give me a sec. I'll be right there.

content.cn: 避难点刚被裂地者袭击过，他怎么不在岗位上待着？
content.en: The refuge point just got attacked by Landbreakers. Why isn't he at his post?

content.cn: 我也正找他呢。大战刚过，避难点里乱糟糟的，估计是给什么急事绊住了。
content.en: I'm looking for him too. The refuge point's still a mess after the battle. He's probably tied up with something urgent.

content.cn: 避难点被裂地者袭击了？
content.en: The refuge point got attacked by Landbreakers?

content.cn: 什么时候的事？有没有人受伤？
content.en: When did it happen? Is anyone hurt?

content.cn: 别担心，管理员。就是些小毛贼，事发突然，但我们察觉得也快，没出大岔子。
content.en: Don't worry, Endmin. Just a bunch of blightsuckers. It was sudden, but we reacted fast. So nothing got outta hand.

content.cn: 不过这次来的应该只是斥候，他们怕不是还有后招。
content.en: That said, they were probably just scouts. Bet there's more to come.

content.cn: @{player} 管理员，你也来劝劝大潘先生吧，我怎么说他都不肯听……
content.en: Endministrator @{player}, could you try talking to Mr. Da Pan? He wouldn't listen to me...

content.cn: 注意饮食当然是对的，可大潘先生，你也不能带着伤还不好好休息吧……
content.en: Eating well definitely helps. But Mr. Da Pan, you can't just ignore rest when you're still recovering!

content.cn: 不就是给大家多炒了几个菜嘛！我又没累着什么，哪儿用歇那么久。
content.en: Come on, it was just a few extra dishes! I'm not even tired. No need to make me rest forever.

content.cn: 我知道大潘先生是好心，但你也不能一天从早忙到晚啊……
content.en: I know you're doing it for everyone, Mr. Da Pan. But you can't be on your feet all day!

content.cn: 当厨子可不就是从早忙到晚……
content.en: Ain't every chef on their feet all day?

content.cn: 我觉得应该劳逸结合，厨子也得休息好了才能做好菜。
content.en: Rest and work should go together. A tired chef can't cook their best.

content.cn: 大潘，你还是先把伤养好吧，不然不仅诺夫曼担心你，我们也会担心的。
content.en: Da Pan, you really should take care of that injury first. Otherwise, Noffman won't be the only one worried — we will be too.

content.cn: 这……唉，既然管理员您都这么说了……好吧，那我回去休息就是了……
content.en: Well ... since you say so, Endmin... Alright, alright, I'll go take a break.

content.cn: 不过有啥事可别瞒着我！有事我肯定得上的，知道了吗？
content.en: Just don't keep me in the dark! You better tell me if anything's up, okay?

content.cn: 知道了，大潘先生，你快去休息吧。
content.en: Okay, Mr. Da Pan. Now please go get some rest.

content.cn: 唉，诺夫曼小兄弟，你怎么还真找上管理员了！我没事儿！
content.en: Hey Noffman, my boy, you didn't have to bother Endmin with this! I'm all good!

content.cn: 可是……你的伤……
content.en: But ... your injuries...

content.cn: 大潘怎么了？
content.en: What happened to Da Pan?

content.cn: 管理员，你肯定记得吧？之前为了拆施术单元下来，大潘先生受了些伤……
content.en: Remember, Endministrator? Mr. Da Pan got injured when dismantling the Arts Unit...

content.cn: 嗯，我记得，他当时还说“回去吃两顿好的就能养回来”。
content.en: Yeah, I remember. He said, "Two good meals and I'll be good as new."

content.cn: 没错没错！管理员也这么说了吧！诺夫曼你就别瞎操心了。
content.en: Yes, exactly! See? The Endmin agrees too! Noffman, stop fussing already.

content.cn: 管理员，四号谷地应急委员会刚刚同步了一份情况说明。
content.en: Endministrator, Valley IV Emergency Committee just synced a situation report.

content.cn: 当前避难工作已基本完成，他们对终末地在建设、供给和安全方面的支持表示感谢。
content.en: Evacuation operations are now largely complete. They extend their gratitude to Endfield for its support in construction, supplies, and security.

content.cn: 与此同时，应急委员会也对失踪人员的下落表示持续关注，并将为搜救提供更多远程支援。
content.en: Meanwhile, the Emergency Committee continues to express concern regarding the whereabouts of the missing personnel and will provide additional remote support for search and rescue efforts.

content.cn: 目前，基建前站的信号接收器已投入使用。相关负责人正在尝试通过信号接收器搜寻失踪工人的设备信号。
content.en: The signal receiver at the Infra-Station is now operational. Relevant personnel are attempting to trace the missing workers' equipment signals through the device.

content.cn: 建议有空时前往现场，了解最新进展。
content.en: Visiting the site when available to assess the latest developments is recommended.

content.cn: 最近，终末地也在努力帮忙搜寻各类失踪人员。如果在四号谷地发现了什么线索，可以上传至档案库，技术部门会帮忙分析的。
content.en: Lately, Endfield has also been actively assisting in the search for various missing personnel. If any clues are discovered in Valley IV, they can be uploaded to the archives. The technical department will assist with analysis.

content.cn: 好的，我会留意。
content.en: Okay. I'll keep an eye out.

content.cn: 管理员，你们觉得作为一个生活据点，基建前站还有什么欠缺的地方吗？
content.en: Endministrator, do you think there are any deficiencies remaining at the Infra-Station as a residential outpost?

content.cn: 增加一些用于引导的指示牌？方便大家去想去的地方。
content.en: Add some guide signs? To help people find their way.

content.cn: 有道理！之前也有新来的工友说，头一次来好不容易才找到了洗手间的位置……
content.en: Makes sense! New workers did mention how hard it was to find the restrooms when they first arrived...

content.cn: 放一个留言板？方便基建前站的大家表达自己的感受。
content.en: Put up a message board? To let everyone at the Infra-Station share their thoughts.

content.cn: 好主意！这样一来，我也更容易了解工友们的需求与建议。
content.en: Good idea! This way, it'll be easier for me to understand everyone's needs and suggestions.

content.cn: 这么说起来，这里好像还缺一个关键的地标？
content.en: Now that you mention it, it does seem like this place is missing a key landmark?

content.cn: 这……你们觉得什么最能代表基建前站？
content.en: Hmm... What do you think best represents the Infra-Station?

content.cn: 瞭望塔。应该没有比它更合适的了。
content.en: The watch tower. Nothing could be more fitting.

content.cn: 我也觉得！第一个想到的就是它了！
content.en: I agree! It was the first thing that came to my mind too!

content.cn: 大潘先生离开前，特地嘱咐我要继续好好地建设这里。
content.en: Mr. Da Pan specifically asked me to continue developing this place properly before he left.

content.cn: 嗯，它最具有代表性。
content.en: Yeah, it's an icon.

content.cn: 确实，瞭望塔也见证了我们一步步建设基建前站的经过……
content.en: Indeed, the watch tower has witnessed every step of our efforts to build this Infra-Station...

content.cn: 我们能扛过那么多难关，除了靠终末地的帮助，也多亏了它。
content.en: We've overcome so many hardships ... not just with Endfield's help, but thanks to it as well.

content.cn: 嗯，以后就把瞭望塔设为我们基建前站的代表建筑吧……
content.en: Yeah, let's designate the watch tower as the representative structure of our Infra-Station from now on.

content.cn: 谢谢大家！我知道该怎么做了！
content.en: Thanks everyone! I know what to do now!

content.cn: 我想了很长时间，但又没什么头绪……觉得不如来问问大家的意见。
content.en: I've been pondering for a long time, but I'm still stuck ... figured I might as well ask for everyone's input.

content.cn: 诺夫曼，这就对咯！
content.en: That's right, Noffman!

content.cn: 有什么拿不准的，别老一个人闷着，多来问问大家。
content.en: Don't sit on your doubts alone. Bring them to the team. We've got your back.

content.cn: 各位有什么想法也尽管提！
content.en: People, feel free to share your thoughts too!

content.cn: 我倒觉得没什么缺的？就是每回路过食堂，都有点想念潘叔的手艺……
content.en: I actually don't think we're missing anything? It's just ... every time I pass by the canteen, I kinda miss Uncle Pan's cooking...

content.cn: 欠缺之处吗……或许可以从提升便利性的方面考虑。管理员觉得呢？
content.en: Shortcomings ... perhaps we could focus on improving convenience. What do you think, Endmin?

content.cn: 管理员，太感谢你了！研究资料的情况如何？
content.en: Endmin, I truly appreciate you helping me out! How goes the data files search?

content.cn: 全都找到了。
content.en: Found them all.

content.cn: 正在发送文件
content.en: Sending files

content.cn: 文件已发送
content.en: Files sent

content.cn: 我收到了！稍等，我检查下……
content.en: I got them! Hold on, I gotta check them...

content.cn: 嗯，没有问题！所有的资料都在这里了，谢谢你！
content.en: No problem at all! You found all the data files. Thank you!

content.cn: 管理员，太感谢你了！研究资料的情况如何？
content.en: Endmin, I truly appreciate you helping me out! How goes the data files search?

content.cn: 哈珀一直沉迷于研究，但我必须说……他有点走火入魔了。他的资料就让他自己保管吧，希望他不会有事。
content.en: Hmm. Harper's really committed to his project. In fact, I can even say he's obsessed about the entire thing. Just let him hold on to it, I guess. I hope he'll be alright.

content.cn: 其他的资料我都收到了，万分感谢！
content.en: I also received all the other files. Thank you!

content.cn: 我找到了大多数研究资料，但有一份没收回。
content.en: I found most of the files, but I'm still missing one of them.

content.cn: 正在发送文件
content.en: Sending files

content.cn: 文件已发送
content.en: Files sent

content.cn: 我看了一下，哈珀那边的资料没有回收？出了什么状况吗？
content.en: I took a look. Harper's files are still missing. What happened?

content.cn: 我遇到他了，但他好像没法儿把他的资料给我。
content.en: I ran into him, but I don't think he could give me his files.

content.cn: 啊？他还在里面吗？
content.en: What? He's still in there?

content.cn: 管理员，先前被封锁的山顶区域已经初步清扫完毕。
content.en: Endmin, remember the sealed away hilltops? We've basically cleared the area.

content.cn: 我这里实在是人手不足，如果管理员有空闲，请帮忙去看看情况。
content.en: And I really need all the help I can get. I'm wondering if you can check out that place when you got the time.

content.cn: sns_image_001_mountaintop
content.en: sns_image_001_mountaintop

content.cn: 管理员，S.O.W.刚刚完成了一份分析报告。
content.en: Endmin, SOW has just finished an analysis report.

content.cn: 是关于你和瑟斯顿发现的裂地者遇袭事件的，狼卫干员也响应了他们的协作邀请。
content.en: It's about the Landbreaker attack incident you and Thurston discovered. Operator Wulfgard has also accepted their collaboration request.

content.cn: 相关信息已经录入情报档案库，随时可以查看。
content.en: The relevant intel's been logged in the archive, ready for viewing anytime.

content.cn: 管理员，S.O.W.希望给你发送一条提醒。
content.en: Endmin, SOW wants to send you a reminder.

content.cn: “关于四号谷地裂地者遇袭事件的报告，其中仍有未确认的要素。”
content.en: "The report on the Landbreaker attack in Valley IV still has unconfirmed elements."

content.cn: “我们确认到您已经接收了报告，建议您与瑟斯顿干员商讨进一步的处理计划。”
content.en: "We confirm you've received the report. We recommend discussing further action plans with Operator Thurston."

content.cn: 以上就是全部内容。如果需要重新确认报告，随时可以进入情报档案库查看。
content.en: That's all for now. If you need to review the report again, the archive is always available.

content.cn: 管理员，好消息！
content.en: Endministrator, great news!

content.cn: 池子里的水被抽干了！快来看看吧！
content.en: The pond's all drained! Come check it out!

content.cn: 对了，你有射流无人机吗？
content.en: Oh right, you got a jet drone?

content.cn: 也许里面有些机关用得上它，别忘了加水！
content.en: Might be useful for some mechanisms inside. Don't forget to add water!

content.cn: 管理员，我有一件急事需要求助！一批援助工团的物资在路上滞留了。
content.en: Endmin! I got an emergency that only you can help with! A batch of supplies for the UWST got delayed during transit.

content.cn: 滞留？这是怎么回事？
content.en: Delayed? What's the situation?

content.cn: 应该是运输机器人出了故障，就是那种像三脚架的小机器人。能拜托你去现场查看一下吗？
content.en: I think the logistics robots malfunctioned. They look like tripods. Can you check the site for me?

content.cn: 没问题，如果故障不严重，我会顺手修理一下。
content.en: Okay. And I'll try fixing them if they're not totaled.

content.cn: 那最好不过了！
content.en: That will definitely make my day!

content.cn: 谢谢你，管理员，这批货太重要了。最近四号谷地不太平，运输机器人经常出故障。以后可能要多麻烦你了。
content.en: Thank you, Endmin. These supplies are really important. Valley IV is in a mess and the logistics robots keep breaking down. We'll likely need your help again.

content.cn: 没关系，举手之劳。
content.en: Sure thing. Bot fixing isn't that hard.

content.cn: 再次感谢，管理员！
content.en: You've really been a huge help, Endmin!

content.cn: 管理员，集成工业系统可以量产工业爆炸物了，就是我们之前用来摧毁巢雕的那种。
content.en: Endmin, the AIC Factory can now mass produce Industrial Explosives. They use the same explosive materials we previously used to destroy the denstacks.

content.cn: 去谷地通道收集一些酮化灌木作为原材料，使用最新的封装机就能生产了。
content.en: Go to the Valley Pass, collect some Aketine as raw materials, and use the latest Packaging Unit to make the bombs.

content.cn: 这可真是个好消息。
content.en: Sounds like terrific news to me.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_011">以后像是这种挡路的碎岩我们都能用它清理了。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_011">The explosives will let us clear out road-blocking rubble like this.

content.cn: 生产完工业爆炸物就来四号谷地的集成核心区域找我吧，我们检验一下生产质量！
content.en: Once you finish making the Industrial Explosives, come find me at the Core AIC Area in Valley IV. We got some serious quality testing to do!

content.cn: 黑面煞，听大当家说，你好像很有本事……能不能帮我个忙？
content.en: Darkmask! Chief told me how skillful you are... Care to help me out?

content.cn: 我知道了。交给我吧，我去帮你找药材。
content.en: Got it. Leave that to me. I'll get you the herbs.

content.cn: 够义气！我这就把常去的几个采药点给你标一下，总之先替寨子里的兄弟姊妹谢谢你了。
content.en: Couldn't ask for a better answer! I'll mark my usual gathering spots for you. And thanks a lot for helping. The Stockade Fam really needs it.

content.cn: 你先说说是什么忙？
content.en: Okay, I need to know what you need help with.

content.cn: 唉，寨子里的大家不是老要去打那些水花子吗？回来了多少会落点伤。一来二去，我备的伤药总不够用。
content.en: Well, the Stockade Fam is always trying to cull the blighted splatters, but plenty of people got hurt in the process. I hardly have enough treatment salves to treat the wounded.

content.cn: 我就想着，要是有个帮手能替我时不时找些药材回来，我就用不着花时间采药，可以把精力全花在制药上了……伤药的量也能有个保障。
content.en: So I was thinking about getting an assistant herb gatherer. That'll save me time going around the place looking for herbs. I can then focus on preparing the salves ... and make sure there's enough for everyone.

content.cn: 所以我就是你看中的“帮手”？
content.en: I guess you want me as your "assistant".

content.cn: 嘿嘿，被你说对了。毕竟我想要的那些药材一大半都长在犄角旮旯，没点本事的人可找不到。
content.en: Heheh. You got that right. The herbs I need often grow at really weird places. You need real skills to find and gather them.

content.cn: 请问，您就是终末地的管理员吗？我叫沐奚，是材料研究所的一名天师学徒，您可能见过我的老师，他姓葛……
content.en: Hi. Are you the Endministrator of Endfield Industries? I'm Mu Xi, a Tianshi disciple from the Institute of Materials Science. You probably met my mentor, Tianshi Ge...

content.cn: 太好了！管理员，您只需要找到它们，然后在现场放置一个定位信标，之后我再通知组员去回收数据就可以了。
content.en: You will? Awesome! Endmin, you just need to find the experimental sky poles and place locating beacons next to them. I'll then inform my team members and to perform data gathering.

content.cn: 情况我都了解了，不过你们的定位系统也该更新一下了。
content.en: Okay. I think I understand. But I guess you should try updating your positioning system.

content.cn: 我也这么觉得！等项目结束了我就给老师提申请……
content.en: I totally agree! I'll submit an update application to my mentor once this project is over...

content.cn: 总之，这回只能先麻烦您了，实在不好意思。
content.en: But we can only count on you for now. Sorry about this.

content.cn: 嗯，我就是。你是葛一朴天师的学生？找我有什么事？
content.en: Yeah, I'm the Endmin. You're a disciple of Tianshi Ge Yipu? Are you in need of help?

content.cn: 对……这个，其实和我负责的一个研究项目有关。
content.en: Yeah... Well, it's actually related to my research project.

content.cn: 为了收集新型抗侵蚀涂料在不同环境下的状态数据，我和我的组员在整个武陵地区投放了很多实验用天桩。
content.en: My team has deployed plenty of experimental sky poles throughout Wuling so we can gather performance data of novel Blight-resistant coatings in different environments.

content.cn: 可现在用来定位它们的系统却出了严重故障，必须想办法重新进行人工定位，不然我们这一年的功夫就白费了……
content.en: But the system responsible for monitoring their positions is completely down. We need to manually position them or our work for this entire academic year is over...

content.cn: 原来因为根本找不到合适的人选，我都想放弃了……但老师跟我说，也许可以拜托您帮忙，所以我就……
content.en: I was about to give up cos we couldn't find anyone who can do this. But my mentor told me that I can try asking you for help, so I... welp...

content.cn: 我可以试试看，具体需要我做什么？
content.en: I can try to help with this. What should I do, exactly?

content.cn: 你就是队长说的终末地的管理员吧。你好，我是武陵城的巡卫，名叫卢南，有件棘手的事想请你帮忙……
content.en: You're the Endministrator of Endfield Industries that my captain told me about, right? I'm Wuling City Watchguard Lu Nan. There's a tricky problem I might need your help with...

content.cn: 什么棘手的事？
content.en: What is this tricky problem of yours?

content.cn: 原本我们受上级指派，帮天师们回收武陵地区的环境监测样本，主要是土壤采样。
content.en: The higher ups ordered us to help the Tianshi recover environment monitoring samples in Wuling. Just mud and dirt, you know.

content.cn: 但不知是不是受了侵蚀潮的影响，运输环境监测样本的Delta型多功能机器人一大半都发生了故障。
content.en: But over half of the Delta general purpose robots transporting the environment monitoring samples broke down. I don't know if we could blame the Blight Tide for that.

content.cn: 现场维修最好由专业人士负责，但有这方面经验的同僚一时又腾不出手……队长就把你推给我了。
content.en: We need a professional to conduct the field repairs, but our only colleague who's good at this is busy at the moment... And that's how you ended up being recommended by the Captain.

content.cn: 明白了，我会去看看的。如果故障不严重，可以帮你们修一下。
content.en: Got it. I'll take a look, and try to repair the robots if they're not too badly damaged.

content.cn: 太谢谢了！队长推荐的人果然靠谱，那就辛苦你了，管理员。
content.en: Oh, thank you so much! I knew the Captain would only recommend the best people there is! I'm totally counting on you, Endmin.

content.cn: 管理员，你好啊！
content.en: Greetings, Endmin!

content.cn: 太好了！那就交给你了，管理员！
content.en: Greatly appreciated, Endmin!

content.cn: 我有件事想请你帮忙，是关于那种像三脚架的机器人。
content.en: I got a favor to ask. It's about those tripod robots.

content.cn: 我有印象，这种机器人还挺常见的。
content.en: I think I saw them before. Those robots are pretty common.

content.cn: 没错。我们在四号谷地大量投放了这种机器人，主要用于运输工作。
content.en: Yes. We have deployed a rather large fleet of them in Valley IV to help with delivering goods and cargo.

content.cn: 不过，有一部分在这次事件中严重受损，以至于无法对它们进行精准定位。但我们需要把它们回收。
content.en: But some were severely damaged in this incident, making precise tracking impossible. These poor units are beyond repair and must be salvaged.

content.cn: 你能帮我找到这些机器人吗？协议同步器会标记出它们的大致位置。你只需找到它们，在现场放置定位信标，之后会有维修人员去回收。
content.en: Can you help look for these robots for me? Your Protosync can give you their approximate locations. All you need to do is find them and place a positioning beacon on site, then the Repair Crew will handle the rest.

content.cn: 好的，我会留意的。
content.en: No problem. I'll look out for those robots.

content.cn: 管理员，菲奥娜刚刚把机器人的坐标发给我了，我会联系维修人员前往现场回收它们的。
content.en: Endmin, Fiona just sent me the coordinates. I'll notify the Repair Crew to salvage those robots.

content.cn: 最近要同步进行的工作太多了。之后我们会想办法给这些机器人添加更稳定的定位系统。
content.en: There's too much on our plate at the moment. When things settle down, we'll try to outfit the robots with improved positioning devices.

content.cn: 但在此之前，恐怕还要经常麻烦你。
content.en: I might need your help a few more times before we get our bots upgraded.

content.cn: 嗯，交给我吧。
content.en: No worries. You can count on me.

content.cn: 管理员，我收到了来自各处的工作进展报告。非常感谢您对大家的帮助。
content.en: Endmin, I've received progress reports from all teams. Thank you for supporting everyone.

content.cn: 当您认为时间充裕时，请来中控塔一趟。
content.en: When you have time, please drop by the Control Tower.

content.cn: 祝顺利。
content.en: All the best.

content.cn: 管理员！关于工团炸药丢失的事我都知道了！事态果然和我想象中一样严重！
content.en: Endmin! I got to the bottom of the missing UWST explosives! And it's just as bad as I thought!

content.cn: 对了！我这里还有一些新线索！之前我拿这事儿问了在宏科院当研究员的朋友，他刚发给了我两份珍贵的文献！都是关于裂地者的！
content.en: But I picked up a new clue! I asked a researcher friend at the HAS, and he just sent me 2 valuable research papers on the LB!

content.cn: 里面就有他们那个“无色印记”的事！说不定能从中找到什么头绪呢！总之你先看看！我发你终端了！
content.en: Both mentioned those invisible glyphs of theirs! Perhaps you'll find something! I've sent it to your terminal. Check it out!

content.cn: 怎么样，管理员？看完了吗？我说得没错吧！裂地者用的这种标记果然有特殊的含义！
content.en: How's the reading, Endmin? Turns out I'm right! The LB glyphs actually mean something, right?

content.cn: 可能和他们藏匿的东西有关……
content.en: The glyphs are probably related to their hidden stash...

content.cn: 似乎是被他们拿来做标记的……
content.en: The glyphs seem to be used to mark certain things...

content.cn: 我也这么觉得！就去附近的一个山洞调查了一下！
content.en: I totally agree! I guess we should investigate the nearby cave!

content.cn: 欸？这个是？
content.en: Wait! What's this?

content.cn: 管理员，等等再联系！我先去&dqe
content.en: ttyl, Endmin! I'm heading to&dqe

content.cn: [乔斯特]已离线
content.en: [Jouster] is offline

content.cn: 管理员，转接一项特别事务给你。
content.en: Endmin, I'm transferring a special task for you.

content.cn: 终末地工业获得了环塔商会一些公司的交易请求，对方对我们的滑索很感兴趣。
content.en: Endfield has recently received a few trading requests from a number of TGCC companies. They seem interested in our ziplines.

content.cn: 然而，我们在接洽方面遭遇了一些阻碍。如果有时间，秦工程师希望你能抽空帮帮相关部门。
content.en: But we've run into some hurdles while trying to make contact. If you're available, Director Qin hopes you could assist the department.

content.cn: 你可以在枢纽区基地寻找物流主管莎曼了解具体情况。
content.en: Go talk to the Logistics Director Salman at the Hub Base for the details.

content.cn: 救命！
content.en: HELP!

content.cn: 我
content.en: I

content.cn: 菲奥娜刚才找我了。出什么事了？
content.en: Fiona called me. What's going on?

content.cn: 这里有点状况，菲奥娜在帮忙处理。
content.en: There's a situation here. Fiona's on it.

content.cn: 我们需要找一个人，她应该是因为这个来联络的你。
content.en: We're looking for someone, and she might've contacted you about this.

content.cn: 稍等，菲奥娜给我位置信息了。
content.en: Hold on, Fiona just sent over the location.

content.cn: 已共享，我们直接在那里会合。
content.en: Shared it. Let's meet there.

content.cn: 我和哈特曼会面完毕了。
content.en: I've concluded my meeting with Hartmann.

content.cn: 得出结论了吗？我们可以在建档后将信息同步给各个部门！
content.en: How did it go? Can we make the decision? Once we make a file, we'll start notifying the other divisions.

content.cn: 他是个认真负责的好人，尽管遇袭也不忘本业。
content.en: He's a dedicated worker and a kind soul. He upheld his duties even though he was attacked.

content.cn: 他办事似乎有一些不靠谱的地方，比如遗忘合同。
content.en: He's a little careless when conducting his business. For example, he forgot to bring his contract.

content.cn: 目前得到的信息较少，还需要进一步了解。
content.en: I don't know enough about him. We need to learn more.

content.cn: 您好，鄙人是埃里克松商贸的业务员。
content.en: Greetings, I'm an agent of Erikssohn Trading House.

content.cn: 先前已经与贵司对合作诸事宜进行过沟通。若贵方有意合作，在此提议双方于枢纽区基地附近便于行车的位置会面，并进行签约程序。
content.en: Following our earlier discussions on cooperation, if you are interested, I'd propose a meeting near the Hub Base at a location convenient for vehicles, to proceed with the contract signing.

content.cn: 随信附上建议地点，顺祝商祺。
content.en: Attached is the suggested location. With best regards for your business.

content.cn: 管理员，我们和埃里克松商贸相关的事情有进展吗？
content.en: Endmin, how are things going with Erikssohn Trading House?

content.cn: 陈，我们和管理员一起过去一趟吧。
content.en: Chen, let's go there together with the Endmin.

content.cn: 来了来了！
content.en: Coming!

content.cn: 埃里克松商贸又派了一个新业务员来接洽。
content.en: Erikssohn Trading House sent a new agent for the talks.

content.cn: 对方已经给出了签约的地点，但总觉得有哪里不对。
content.en: They've given us a spot for the signing, but something feels off.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_023">哈特曼突然不干了？
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_023">Hartmann's not handling it anymore?

content.cn: 的确有些蹊跷。
content.en: That's kinda strange.

content.cn: 提醒，之前袭击哈特曼的绝对不是裂地者。
content.en: Just a heads-up: Hartmann was not attacked by Landbreakers.

content.cn: 目前只有这些情报。别的你们定吧。
content.en: That's all the intel for now. You can make your decisions about the rest.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_038">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_038">

content.cn: 克莱韦思环塔贸易公司听起来不像是会跑路的样子，也许合作有望。
content.en: Clavis TGCC Trading won't be shutting down any time soon and a partnership might be possible.

content.cn: 但这个员工的动机和身份仍然值得我们再调查一番。
content.en: But we need a better look at the motives and identity of their agent.

content.cn: 对了，还有一个刚巧路过的人，叫作汉斯。他自称是门德斯工业的人。
content.en: We also met a passerby named Hans. He claims to be an employee of Mendez Manufacturing.

content.cn: 这个公司也曾经参与过我们的竞价流程，还是留意一下吧。
content.en: This company actually took part in the bidding process. We should keep our eyes on this Hans.

content.cn: 他是个热心的人，很为我们考虑。
content.en: The man seems eager to help and quite considerate of our situation.

content.cn: 不会无缘无故出现一个刚好知道内情的人，小心一点准没错。
content.en: A random passerby who just happens to know the details? Ludicrous. Better be careful.

content.cn: 今天冒出来一个叫亚历山大的人。
content.en: A man named Aleksandr appeared today.

content.cn: 也许他是热心，也许他是有意，总之，需要再观察一下他的表现。
content.en: The man seems helpful but he might have other things in mind. We must keep our eyes on him.

content.cn: 管理员，您与哈特曼进一步接触了吗？有需要更新的信息吗？
content.en: Endministrator, did you manage to meet with Hartmann again? Do we have an update on this agent?

content.cn: 他承诺会用公司的资源全力支持产品的推广，这对我们有好处。
content.en: He swears that his company will devote all their resources in promoting the contracted product. That works in our favor.

content.cn: 他的公司也许没办法持续平稳地开展合作，对我们来说是一个风险。
content.en: His company might be unable to establish a stable and long-term partnership with us. That's a risk on our side.

content.cn: 尽管态度良好，但公司的情况确实不乐观，还需要观察。
content.en: The agent is pretty friendly, but his company's not doing too well. We'll have to keep an eye on it.

content.cn: 他声称自己是埃里克松商贸的真正销售代表，但被揭穿后承认自己是克莱韦思的员工。
content.en: He claimed to be the actual agent of Erikssohn. But when we saw through his act, he admitted to being an employee of Clavis.

content.cn: 还有这种乌龙？那我们给他建一个新档吧。
content.en: That sounds ridiculous! I guess we'll have to create a new file about this man.

content.cn: 虽然使用了一些有争议的手段，但在商言商，他背后的公司名头是很响亮。
content.en: Though some of his tactics were questionable, from a business perspective, he represents a big name.

content.cn: 这人从头到脚都透露着一股矛盾和奇怪，不值得信任。
content.en: This guy gives off mixed signals and weird vibes from head to toe. Not trustworthy at all.

content.cn: 你 邀请 亚历山大、哈特曼、汉斯加入群聊
content.en: You have added Aleksandr, Hartmann, and Hans to the group chat

content.cn: 各位，有空吗？我们内部商讨后，对这次合作的对象有了初步结论。
content.en: Hi, I hope everyone is free to chat right now. We had an internal discussion and arrived at a preliminary conclusion on our partner for the zipline venture.

content.cn: 管理员，您说！
content.en: Go ahead, Endmin!

content.cn: 我们约个地方，当面聊吧。
content.en: Let's meet up somewhere and talk in person.

content.cn: 管理员，该做最终决定了，我们再回顾一次这三人的档案吧。
content.en: Endministrator, it's time to make our final decision. Let's review the files of these 3 agents.

content.cn: 关于亚历山大——
content.en: About Aleksandr—

content.cn: 亚历山大已经失去了太多，不难理解他为什么要铤而走险参与作恶。
content.en: Given everything he's lost, it's no surprise Alexander went off the rails.

content.cn: 这个结果对他来说也算不上好，秉公办事吧。
content.en: This outcome didn't go his way. But we'll let justice take its course.

content.cn: 是个可怜人，但这不是他干扰其他人生意的理由。
content.en: I do feel for him, but that's no excuse for disrupting other people's business.

content.cn: 那样只会制造更多悲剧，该让他停下来了。
content.en: All he's doing is causing more pain. We have to stop him.

content.cn: 关于汉斯——
content.en: About Hans—

content.cn: 不管有什么借口，汉斯和他所属公司的行为都已经完全越界了。
content.en: No matter the excuse, Hans and his company have completely crossed the line.

content.cn: 整理资料转交监管机构吧，他们应该得到惩罚。
content.en: Collect the evidence and report them. They deserve what's coming.

content.cn: 关于哈特曼——
content.en: About Hartmann—

content.cn: 是个手段灵活的人，但他的手段会给更多人带来不幸。
content.en: He's a man of clever tricks, but all he ever brings is misfortune.

content.cn: 留意汉斯的行动，不能就这样放他走。
content.en: Keep an eye on Hans. We can't just let him get away.

content.cn: 知道了，我这边要花些时间完善三个人的档案。
content.en: Got it. I'll need some time to complete the files of these 3 agents.

content.cn: 管理员决定好和哪家公司签约了吗？我们可以在老地方见面。
content.en: Which of these companies are we going to work with? Let's meet at the usual place.

content.cn: 哈特曼被牵扯进这桩麻烦里，一路遭了不少罪。
content.en: Hartmann's been through a lot since he got wrapped up in all this.

content.cn: 但他的为人确实还不错，他是可以信任的。
content.en: Still, he's a solid guy and definitely someone you can trust.

content.cn: 被折腾了那么久，他似乎不太有动力继续跟进这桩业务了。
content.en: He's been worn down by all that's happened, and not really up for this contract anymore.

content.cn: 虽然很遗憾，但这不是一个适合再勉强谈下去的状态。
content.en: It's a shame, but there's no point pushing things forward.

content.cn: 要想在真正的生意场上关照好自己和商务伙伴，他还需要再积累一些经验。
content.en: He still needs more experience to truly hold his own and support his partners in the real business world.

content.cn: 这桩生意对现在的哈特曼还太早了。
content.en: This deal is a bit out of his depth.

content.cn: 管理员，下一次来枢纽区基地的时候，若时间允许，我希望能向您汇报一下重建工作的进展。
content.en: Endmin, I'd like to brief you on the rebuilding progress during your next visit to the Hub Base, if time allows.

content.cn: 很多情况在文字报告里容易失真，实地确认是最有效的。
content.en: Written reports don't always tell the whole story — being onsite gives you the clearest view.

content.cn: 您随时可以联系我。若暂无回应，可能是在会议中，我会尽快确认留言。
content.en: Please feel free to contact me. If there's no response, I might be in a meeting, but I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

content.cn: 管理员，如果你现在有时间，请前往谷地通道一趟。干员弧光发出援助请求，初步判断可能与前段时间裂地者袭击四号谷地相关。
content.en: Endmin, urgent deployment required at Valley Pass. Operator Arclight reports possible Landbreaker remnants at Valley IV.

content.cn: 弧光是一位游人，目前也是终末地的一名干员。裂地者的袭击发生后，她一直在一线协助救援和转移平民。
content.en: Once a Songseeker, now an Endfield operator — Arclight's been pulling survivors from Landbreaker-wrecked zones since day one.

content.cn: 消息我也同步给了佩丽卡监督和陈千语干员，她们会和你一同前往。
content.en: I've notified Perlica and Chen Qianyu. They'll be tagging along.

content.cn: 我们找到了这个……
content.en: We found these...

content.cn: 是你们丢的那些炸药吗？
content.en: Are these the explosives you lost?

content.cn: 是我们丢失的那些炸药！管理员你在哪里找到的？！
content.en: Our missing explosives! Where did you find them, Endmin?!

content.cn: 在一个裂地者的山洞。
content.en: In an LB cave.

content.cn: 等下把坐标同步给你。
content.en: I'll send you the coordinates.

content.cn: 谢谢！真是帮了大忙了！
content.en: Thanks a million! You're a lifesaver!

content.cn: 还好那些裂地者还没用上它们……我这就派人过去把这些炸药带走！
content.en: Thank goodness the LBs didn't use them... I'll send a crew to pick up the explosives!

content.cn: 管理员！我这边刚刚收到了一条未加密的求援讯号！
content.en: Endmin! I just received an unencrypted SOS signal!

content.cn: 把坐标发给我吧。
content.en: Send me the coordinates.

content.cn: 明白啦！那我这就把位置同步给你！
content.en: Got it! I'll sync the coordinates to you.

content.cn: 还有！考虑到那边的情况还不明，我也联系下陈千语，让她和管理员你一起行动吧！
content.en: And since the situation is uncertain, I'll notify Chen Qianyu and ask her to join your team, Endmin!

content.cn: 这样管理员你的安全才有保障嘛！我之后也好跟佩丽卡报告。
content.en: This will guarantee your safety and I can give Perlica a peace of mind.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_037">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_037">

content.cn: “M31135请求援助！M31135请求援助！[干扰杂音]区域受灾害影响，道路阻断严重，需要工程技术人员支援！”
content.en: M31135 requesting support! M31135 requesting support! Sector has been hit by a disaster. The roads are out. We need engineering and technical support!

content.cn: 我也把这条抄送给了工团的工作人员，但他们似乎也很为难，大概抽不出更多的人手过去了……
content.en: I've forwarded this to the UWST as well, but I don't think they have enough people to put together a crew...

content.cn: 信号来源在哪儿？
content.en: Where did this signal come from?

content.cn: 能确认发讯者的位置吗？
content.en: Do we have the sender's location?

content.cn: 虽然接收的时候受到了很强的干扰，但还是基本可以确定信源位置的！就在枢纽区基地的东南侧！
content.en: The message underwent strong interference when it was sent but we can approximate the sender's location! It's southeast of the Hub Base.

content.cn: 根据工团的说法，那个区域只有一座老采石场，讯号极有可能就是从那里发出的。
content.en: The UWST told us about an old quarry in that area. The signal probably came from that place.

content.cn: 管理员，你们那边现在的情况如何？还顺利吗？
content.en: Endmin, what is your situation? Are you doing alright?

content.cn: 不算太坏。
content.en: We're doing okay.

content.cn: 挺顺利的。
content.en: We're doing great.

content.cn: 刚经过这里。
content.en: We just passed this place.

content.cn: 哦？我看看。
content.en: Oh? Let me see.

content.cn: 这应该是大门附近那块儿地，再往前走一点就要到联络区了。
content.en: That's pretty close to the gate. Keep going and you'll reach the destination, the Listening Post.

content.cn: 呼，太好了，比我想象中还快不少。祝你们之后也能这么顺利！早点拿到图纸早点回来，终末地的朋友。
content.en: Phew. Wonderful. We're progressing faster than I thought. Hope the rest of the trip is just as successful. Grab the schematics and return to this place quickly, my Endfielder friends.

content.cn: 管理员，有空吗？
content.en: Got a moment, Endmin?

content.cn: 唔，具体有点复杂……管理员，还是见面说吧。
content.en: Deets are ... kinda complicated. I'll tell you in person, Endmin.

content.cn: 明白了，待会儿见。
content.en: Alright. See you later.

content.cn: 怎么了？
content.en: Wassup?

content.cn: 目前不算忙。
content.en: I do.

content.cn: 方便的话，能来我们哨站一趟吗？
content.en: Great. Can you visit our camp?

content.cn: 遇到了一点意外状况，希望可以得到终末地的协助。
content.en: We ran into an unexpected sitch and kinda need some Endfield support right now.

content.cn: 什么事？
content.en: What is it?

content.cn: 具体说说？
content.en: Got deets for me?

content.cn: 管理员，刚刚我收到那位记者女士的档案啦！
content.en: Endmin, I just received the file on that VIP journalist!

content.cn: 稍等片刻！我马上就发给你！
content.en: Hold on a sec! Toasting the file over to you right now!

content.cn: 收到。
content.en: Got it.

content.cn: 管理员，抱歉，我想我必须告诉你一个不幸的消息……
content.en: Apologies, Endmin. I have really, really terrible news for you...

content.cn: 就在几个小时前，那位琼斯女士从工团收容她的地方溜走了……
content.en: Ms. Jones slipped out of UWST shelter just a few hours ago...

content.cn: 真是“无妄之灾”。这下又要再多麻烦你一阵子了。
content.en: A terrible tragedy. Guess I'll have to bother you a bit longer.

content.cn: 是我的荣幸呢。
content.en: Oh, that will be my honor.

content.cn: 现在或许是我们的不幸，但未来说不定就是她的不幸了……
content.en: We might look unlucky right now, but who knows? Tragedy might strike our slippery guest...

content.cn: 那我希望，我们能再幸运一点，别让后面这种情况成真了。
content.en: I prefer to be luckier than that. I really don't want anything happening to the VIP.

content.cn: 总之管理员，你先来这边一趟吧。我把坐标发给你。
content.en: Just come by the camp, Endmin. I'm sending you the coordinates.

content.cn: 管理员，收到了吗？这就是琼斯女士发过来的那张照片。
content.en: Endmin, did you receive the photograph that Ms. Jones sent us?

content.cn: 你觉得呢？
content.en: What do you think?

content.cn: 我也很喜欢这个结局。
content.en: I like this ending too.

content.cn: 不枉我们忙活这一场了。
content.en: It was a troublesome job but it worked out for everyone.

content.cn: 看到了吗，管理员？是那位琼斯女士写的报道，我刚刚看到了电子版。
content.en: Endmin, did you receive the report written by Ms. Jones? I just read the digital version.

content.cn: 看了，感觉意外地正经。
content.en: I did. It's very formal. Took me by surprise.

content.cn: 嗯，居然这么快就发表了。
content.en: Yes I did. Couldn't believe she published it so quickly.

content.cn: 是啊，虽然部分描述很有商会媒体特色——总是会在一些地方避重就轻，不过整体来说还挺客观的？
content.en: Yes. Some parts of the article are typical TGCC media prose — you know, downplaying the juicy stuff. But our Ms. Jones remained pretty fair and objective.

content.cn: 看来她确实像她说的那样，写了篇好报道。
content.en: Turns out she really did write a solid piece, just like she said.

content.cn: 嗯，是个不错的大团圆结局呢。
content.en: Mhm, that's a pretty sweet happy ending.

content.cn: 比我上次看的那部救援片的结局好多了。
content.en: It's a far better ending than that disaster flick I watched a while back.

content.cn: 我刚接到消息，矿区营地又出了点状况。
content.en: I just received reports of a situation at the Mining Camp.

content.cn: 有一批从终末地发往那里的药物丢失了。这批药是给工团伤员救急用的。现在药品短缺的情况很严重，我们要想办法解决。
content.en: We sent them a batch of medical supplies to treat injured UWST crew mates but they were lost during delivery. The site is very low on meds. We must take care of this.

content.cn: 好，我们先去看看情况。
content.en: Okay. We should investigate.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_016">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_016">

content.cn: 管理员……最近你能来越医生的诊所一趟吗？
content.en: Endmin, are you able to come over to Surgeon Yue's clinic some time?

content.cn: 詹娜奶奶她前天突然晕倒了……一直都没有醒过来……我现在很担心她会不会突然就……
content.en: Grandma Jenner... she collapsed two days ago. Still hasn't woken up. I'm... I'm scared she might just... fade away...

content.cn: 一直以来，她最在乎、最放心不下的就是源石大树的事……我就想，要是真的到了那个时候……她一定希望能再见你一面的……
content.en: All this time... what weighed heaviest on her mind was the Great Originium Oak. If... if the worst comes... she'd want to see you one last time.

content.cn: 我明白你的意思……这就过来。
content.en: I understand. I'll be there in a moment.

content.cn: 越医生的诊所对吗？我等下就到。
content.en: Surgeon Yue's clinic? I'll be there in a moment.

content.cn: 管理员，不好了！詹娜奶奶她又不见了！我和越医生正在到处找她……
content.en: Oh no, Endmin! Granny Jenner's gone missing again! Surgeon Yue and I are searching all over...

content.cn: 总之，你能来矿区营地一趟吗？我在营地的大门这边等你！
content.en: Anyway, could you come by the Mining Camp? I'll be waiting out front at the camp gate!

content.cn: 你好，管理员。
content.en: Greetings, Endministrator.

content.cn: 抱歉在这个时候打扰你。我想请你和终末地的各位来源石发电站这边一趟。
content.en: Sorry to bother you at this time. I'd like to ask you and my Endfielder friends to come over to the Originium Power Plant.

content.cn: 克劳老师委托我全权调查四号谷地袭击事件中工团内部的失职行为。现在我遇到了一些问题，希望你们能提供协助。
content.en: Professor Crowe commissioned me to investigate acts of professional negligence within UWST during the Valley IV Incursion. I've run into some issues and would appreciate your help.

content.cn: 这件事有些敏感，只能和你们当面说。消息我也发给了佩丽卡监督和陈千语干员，我会在监控室等你们，拜托了，一定要来！
content.en: This is a bit sensitive, so I can only explain it face to face. I've also notified Supervisor Perlica and Operator Chen Qianyu. I'll be in the monitoring room — please, make sure you come!

content.cn: 管理员……出事了。
content.en: Endministrator ... we've got a situation.

content.cn: 工人们要求惩治叛徒。气氛很紧张，我正尽力安抚人群，保护三位嫌疑人免受冲击。
content.en: The workers are calling for justice against the traitors. Tension is running high. I'm doing my best to calm the crowd and protect the three suspects.

content.cn: 肖娜也没有站在我这边，她的情绪也很激动，现在这里就我一个人拖着。
content.en: Shawna's not on my side either. She's all fired up. I'm the only one holding this together now.

content.cn: 你先稳住她，我们马上过去！
content.en: Keep her steady for now. We're heading over!

content.cn: 拜托了！请尽快！
content.en: Okay! Please come quickly!

content.cn: 管理员，我们能再见一面吗？
content.en: Endmin, can we meet again?

content.cn: 还有些话，我想当面和你说。我在破碎边界等你。
content.en: There's still something I need to tell you in person. I'll be at the Shattered Fringe.

content.cn: 好，我马上过去。
content.en: I'll head over right now.

content.cn: 等我。
content.en: Wait there. I'm heading over.

content.cn: 管理员，我们刚收到一条来自工团的求助消息——
content.en: Endmin, we just received a help request from the UWST.

content.cn: 明白了，我这就去。
content.en: Got it. I'm on my way.

content.cn: 他们在供能高地投放的大量运输机器人都出现了神秘故障，全都原因不明地聚集到了同一处地点。
content.en: A large number of logistics robots they deployed across the Power Plateau suddenly malfunctioned, clustering in one place for no apparent reason.

content.cn: 现在整个高地的物流都受到了不小的影响……
content.en: Now the entire region's logistics are disrupted...

content.cn: 只是工团如今忙于重建工作，实在抽不出人手，所以想请求我们来帮忙调查下，看能不能找到故障根源。
content.en: Since the UWST is tied up with reconstruction and short on hands, they're asking us to investigate the malfunctions and see what's causing the problem.

content.cn: 这事听起来有点离奇……还有更多情报吗？
content.en: This doesn't sound quite right... Do we have more intel?

content.cn: 没有其他信息了吗？
content.en: That's all the info we've got?

content.cn: 这个……他们在供能高地这边的物流负责人目前就在源石发电站，管理员，你可以找他问问看？
content.en: Well... The Logistics Monitor of the Power Plateau is at the Originium Power Plant right now. Perhaps you could check in with him, Endmin.

content.cn: 管理员，有个忙想请你们帮
content.en: Endmin, could you do me a favor?

content.cn: [定位信息]
content.en: [Positioning data]

content.cn: 我有个部下在清波寨北边执勤，麻烦你们去管管他
content.en: One of my men is stationed north of Qingbo Stockade. Could you go check on him?

content.cn: 他胆子太小了
content.en: He's kinda jumpy.

content.cn: 他碰到什么麻烦事了吗？
content.en: Did he run into any trouble?

content.cn: 最近迷踪林不太平，有人失踪。李惴在查
content.en: Things have been uneasy in Stragglers Grove lately. People have gone missing, and Li Zhui's looking into it.

content.cn: 他一直在说些神神鬼鬼的话。实在不行，揍他一顿
content.en: He's been muttering all sorts of strange things. Rough him up if you have to.

content.cn: ……我们视情况而定。
content.en: We'll see how things go...

content.cn: 之前那个武陵的丫头又回来了
content.en: That girl from Wuling is back.

content.cn: 她抓到小吴了吗？
content.en: Did she manage to catch Woolsey?

content.cn: 她一路追小吴，我们一路追她。她怎么样了？
content.en: She's been running after Woolsey, and we've been tailing her. How is she doing now?

content.cn: 我不懂武陵人啊
content.en: Uh, I don't really get Wuling folks.

content.cn: 不过我觉着这丫头挺好的，笨笨的，但有股劲儿
content.en: But I think she's quite something. She's a mess, but a tough mess.

content.cn: 你们懂她就你们来
content.en: You handle her if you get her.

content.cn: 管理员，工农生产单位正在举行驮兽科学饲养交流会，有空的话一定要来！
content.en: Endmin, the industrial and agricultural production unit is holding a Burdenbeast Care Workshop. You should drop by if you can!

content.cn: 那个……
content.en: Hmm...

content.cn: 如果您来的话，可不可以给我饲养的驮兽投一票！
content.en: And if you do come, could you vote for my burdenbeast?

content.cn: 名字叫作莎莎，非常可爱。
content.en: Her name is Shasha. She's super cute.

content.cn: 管理员，我们在调查碾骨氏族的营地时，发现了些有趣的东西。
content.en: Endmin, when we investigated the Bonekrushers' camp, we discovered something very interesting.

content.cn: 除去源石虫分泌物精粹，和发酵重红柱状菌菌盖这些还能勉强描述成“理论上存在食用可能”外，一些植物根茎的胶状提取物实在……
content.en: Besides things I can somewhat accept, like Originium Slug secretions, there are fermented Ruby Bolete caps, and gelatinous extracts from various plant roots...

content.cn: 至少从现场残留的原材料来看，我很钦佩他们的想象力。
content.en: Judging from the raw materials left behind, I have to admire their imagination.

content.cn: 那些处理后味道复杂、口感独特的东西，能让人受到极大的感观冲击。
content.en: These processed materials have complex flavors and unique textures. I must say, they deliver a striking impact, both to the palate and to the eye...

content.cn: 不过我还在研究，他们到底用了什么手法来处理部分材料的毒素……
content.en: I'm still investigating the methods they used to neutralize the toxins in some of these ingredients...

content.cn: 怎么了，管理员？
