content.en: What is it, Endmin?

content.cn: 你知道的细节也太多了！你不会已经尝过了吧？！
content.en: You know a little too much! Don't tell me ... you already tried some?

content.cn: 感觉你说起来头头是道！你不会已经尝过了吧？！
content.en: You talk like you've tried it. Don't tell me ... you already tried some?

content.cn: 裂地者会记录各种处理“可食用材料”的方法，有些成品感觉很奇妙。
content.en: Apparently, the Landbreakers keep records of how they process "edible materials," and their final products are quite something.

content.cn: 抱歉，实在没忍住。
content.en: Guilty as charged. I could not help myself.

content.cn: 我带了些原料回帝江号做改良。想试试我的成品吗？
content.en: I brought some of the materials back aboard Dijiang, refined them, and ran trials. Would you care to sample the results?

content.cn: 一切都是在实验室环境里完成的，医疗干员也在旁边全程监督我处理食材。
content.en: Everything was carried out under strict lab conditions, with medical oversight the entire time.

content.cn: 放心，陈已经尝过了！勇敢迈出第一步后，连她都赞不绝口。
content.en: Chen already tried it. She could not stop praising it after her first bite.

content.cn: 我……有点害怕。
content.en: I'm ... scared.

content.cn: 是害怕我的手艺，还是害怕改良后的食物？
content.en: Scared of my cooking, or scared of the food itself?

content.cn: 不过管理员的反应也在我的预料之中……
content.en: Honestly, your reaction was about what I expected...

content.cn: 我会继续改良的，以后有机会再试试吧。
content.en: I shall continue refining it. When the time is right, you will have another chance.

content.cn: 那就挑战一下吧。
content.en: Alright then, I'll have to give it a try.

content.cn: 没有一点犹豫吗？
content.en: Not even a moment's hesitation?

content.cn: 谢谢你，管理员！
content.en: Thank you, Endmin!

content.cn: 那我抓紧再改良一下。
content.en: I shall hurry and refine it a little more.

content.cn: 等我。
content.en: Hold tight, okay?

content.cn: 就像是某种裂地者的创意食谱？
content.en: Are they like some kind of creative recipe?

content.cn: 和我们定义中的“食谱”可能……天差地别。
content.en: Hmm, I would not call it a "recipe"...

content.cn: 除去源石虫分泌物精粹这类我尚可接受的材料以外，还有发酵重红柱状菌菌盖、各类植物根茎的胶状提取物——
content.en: Besides things I can somewhat accept, like Originium Slug secretions, there are fermented Ruby Bolete caps, and gelatinous extracts from various plant roots...

content.cn: 更多细节……你还是不要知道了。
content.en: Maybe it is better you don't know the full details...

content.cn: “可食用材料”这个说法听着不太妙……
content.en: Edible materials... I wonder if they really are "edible"...

content.cn: 我已经尽可能用准确的词语去描绘了。
content.en: I will try to describe it as accurately as possible.

content.cn: 管理员，还记得之前和你提过，我一直在准备和老师的秘密比赛吗？
content.en: Endmin, do you recall my mentioning the private race I had been preparing for against my instructor?

content.cn: 无论如何，能赢Maze老师一次我很开心。
content.en: Anyway, winning even once against him makes me really happy.

content.cn: 虽然老师的法术造诣放眼整个环带都数一数二，但也不是没有弱点。
content.en: Even though Instructor Maze's Arts rank among the best in the Band, he is not without flaws.

content.cn: 那我更好奇你们的秘密比赛是什么了。
content.en: All right, now I have to know, what kind of race was it?

content.cn: 全地形竞速。我在他最引以为傲的项目上赢了他一次。<image="sns_emoji_011">
content.en: All-terrain racing. I cannot believe I actually beat him at his proudest event. <image="sns_emoji_011">

content.cn: 过程很惊险。
content.en: It was thrilling.

content.cn: 我两次取得领先都被他反超，还是靠最后一段路勉强压了他半秒。
content.en: I took the lead twice but he overtook me both times. I only managed to edge him out by half a second at the final stretch.

content.cn: 能想象一定发生了很多惊险刺激的事情。<image="sns_emoji_005">
content.en: I can imagine how intense that must have been. <image="sns_emoji_005">

content.cn: 刚刚终于出结果了。
content.en: The results have just been decided.

content.cn: 当然。
content.en: Absolutely.

content.cn: 这既是比赛，也是探索塔卫二大地的另一种途径。
content.en: I think it's more than a race. It's another way to explore Talos-II.

content.cn: 如果不是亲身体验，人类很难想象出从迁徙的兽群中飞驰而过，跨越高峰与云层的感受。
content.en: You have to experience it to get it. Racing past migrating herds, soaring over peaks and clouds...

content.cn: 那是一种源自本能的兴奋战栗，而我喜欢那种感觉。
content.en: It gives you an instinctive thrill, a shiver of excitement. I love it.

content.cn: 很难想象你是怎么爱上这项比赛的？
content.en: What got you into this?

content.cn: 这从不是单纯的比赛，管理员，这也是探索塔卫二大地的另一种途径。
content.en: It's more than a race. I think it's another way to explore Talos-II.

content.cn: 我喜欢从迁徙的兽群中飞驰而过，也享受跨越高峰和云层的宁静。
content.en: I love dashing past the herds, feeling the quiet above the peaks and clouds.

content.cn: 它允许我用另一种方式去了解塔卫二，我的故乡。
content.en: It's like seeing Talos-II, my homeland, in a whole new way.

content.cn: 如果你们还有下次比赛，可以带上我吗？我也想现场感受！
content.en: If you have another race ... can I come along? I want to watch in person!

content.cn: 如果你们还有下次比赛，可以带上我吗？我也想现场感受！
content.en: If you have another race ... can I come along? I want to watch in person!

content.cn: 一言为定。
content.en: No problem.

content.cn: 有特别想去的地方吗，管理员？
content.en: Any particular place you want to see, Endmin?

content.cn: 最好有点挑战性。
content.en: Preferably somewhere challenging.

content.cn: 塔卫二上合适的地方很多，有点难挑呀……
content.en: There are so many places on Talos-II, it's so hard to choose one...

content.cn: 慢慢来。
content.en: Take your time.

content.cn: 塔卫二还有很多我们没有踏足过的地方，我会等着你给我一个惊喜。
content.en: There are still many places we have not explored. I cannot wait to see what surprise you come up with.

content.cn: 也许可以试试塔卫二以外的其他星球，比如泰拉。
content.en: Maybe you can try somewhere outside of Talos-II, like Terra.

content.cn: 虽然知道是玩笑话，但我喜欢这个主意。
content.en: I know you are joking, but I love the idea.

content.cn: 和Maze？
content.en: Instructor Maze?

content.cn: 我从莱塔尼亚流传下来的典籍里，看到过很多有意思的地方。黑流树海、十二楼五城、静谧海面上绵延不断的航船……
content.en: In the ancient texts from Leithanien, I have read about many interesting places: the Black Flow, the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities, the endless ships on the calm sea...

content.cn: 感觉都是适合全地形竞速的好地方。
content.en: They all seem perfect for all-terrain racing.

content.cn: 只有一件事……
content.en: Just one thing...

content.cn: 到时候可别因为害怕而失约。
content.en: Do not bail on me out of fear when the time comes.

content.cn: 放心，别忘了地点可是我选的。<image="sns_emoji_005">
content.en: Don't worry. I was the one who picked the location. <image="sns_emoji_005">

content.cn: 对，而且是我赢了。虽然老师的法术造诣放眼整个环带都数一数二，但也不是没有弱点。
content.en: Yes, and I won. Even though Instructor Maze's Arts rank among the best in the Band, he is not without flaws.

content.cn: 所以结果如何？
content.en: How did it go?

content.cn: 当然是我赢了Maze老师。虽然老师的法术造诣放眼整个环带都数一数二，但也不是没有弱点。
content.en: I won, of course. Even though Instructor Maze's Arts rank among the best in the Band, he is not without flaws.

content.cn: 抱歉，我……不记得了。
content.en: I don't... Sorry.

content.cn: 没事的，管理员，当时我也只是顺口提起这件事。
content.en: It's alright, Endmin. I mentioned it casually a while back.

content.cn: 管理员，我有一些烦恼……
content.en: Endmin, I am dealing with a little problem...

content.cn: 好吧，那等你先说完。<image="sns_emoji_036">
content.en: Alright, go ahead and tell me. <image="sns_emoji_036">

content.cn: 其实也没那么复杂。
content.en: It is not that complicated.

content.cn: 一个叫娜薇儿的预备干员因为我的缘故，情绪非常低落……
content.en: A Reserve Operator named Navielle is really down because of me...

content.cn: 她甚至刚刚向我正式递交了离职申请。
content.en: She even just submitted her resignation.

content.cn: 娜薇儿？抱歉，我是不是忘了她是谁……
content.en: Navielle? Sorry, I don't think I know her...

content.cn: 别紧张，管理员。
content.en: Don't worry, Endmin.

content.cn: 她只是预备干员……你不记得很正常。她之前一直很想留在我身边学习。
content.en: She is a Reserve Operator... It is normal if you don't remember. She was always by my side and eager to learn.

content.cn: 这个名字我有印象。之前她是不是一直想申请留在你身边学习？
content.en: I saw this name before. Didn't she want to stay close and learn from you?

content.cn: 你果然记得她。
content.en: That's right.

content.cn: 总感觉你醒来之后，很快就把终末地每个人的资料都记住了。
content.en: It feels like after you woke up, you quickly memorized everyone in Endfield.

content.cn: 娜薇儿很坦诚地告诉我，她在我身边感到了无以复加的压力……
content.en: Navielle said she felt pressured when she was next to me...

content.cn: “你的光芒很温暖，会吸引很多像我这样渴望指引的人。”
content.en: "Your brilliance draws in those of us who are seeking guidance."

content.cn: “可我越是靠近你，越是想要成为像你一样的人，反倒越是会被你的光芒压得喘不过气。”
content.en: "But the nearer I get, and the more I strive to be like you, the more I feel crushed under the weight of your brilliance."

content.cn: 她对自己太苛刻了。
content.en: She's too hard on herself.

content.cn: 在能承受住恐怖的压力之前，她不该苛责自己不能变得像你。
content.en: She shouldn't blame herself for not being like you yet, not before she's ready to handle all that pressure.

content.cn: 你对自己太苛刻了。
content.en: You're being too hard on yourself.

content.cn: 这不是你的过错，你只是做到了你所能做到的最好。
content.en: It's not your fault. You are simply doing everything you can to the best of your ability.

content.cn: 我能帮上什么忙吗？
content.en: Anything I can do to help?

content.cn: 原来你会这么想呀……
content.en: So that's what you think...

content.cn: 我知道了。
content.en: I get it now.

content.cn: 但娜薇儿确实让我想起了我自己。
content.en: Navielle does remind me of myself.

content.cn: 你自己？
content.en: Yourself?

content.cn: 过去，我也一直追着一个人的脚步，努力让自己变得更像那个人。
content.en: In the past, I too was always chasing after someone, trying to become more like that person.

content.cn: 你们有相似的地方吗？<image="sns_emoji_003">
content.en: You two share similarities? <image="sns_emoji_003">

content.cn: 我和她一样，过去也一直希望让自己更像所仰慕的那个人。
content.en: Just like her, I always wanted to be more like that person I admired.

content.cn: ……那个人是我？
content.en: Let me guess, that person was me...?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_037">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_037">

content.cn: 对。
content.en: Yes.

content.cn: 在我的记忆里，管理员总是无所不能，哪怕只是待在你的身边也会觉得安心。
content.en: In my mind, you were always capable of anything. Just being near you made me feel at ease.

content.cn: 也许我的实力永远追不上你，但我清楚我擅长什么，也有信心在某些方面能做得像你一样好。
content.en: I may never match your strength, but I knew my own skills and had confidence that in some areas, I could do just as well as you.

content.cn: 可就算如此，在你醒来之前，我还是会忐忑于自己是否真的做得够好。
content.en: Still, even so, before you woke up, I would always worry if I was truly doing enough.

content.cn: 只是没想到……
content.en: I just ... did not expect ...

content.cn: 我自己都不记得自己应该是什么样……
content.en: You did not expect I'd lose my memories... I don't even recall what I'm supposed to be like...

content.cn: 就像命运的捉弄。
content.en: It's like fate playing tricks.

content.cn: 所以我很理解娜薇儿的烦恼，也清楚怎么做对她最好。
content.en: Which is why I understand Navielle's worries and know what's best for her.

content.cn: 我还没说完烦恼是什么呢……
content.en: I have not even explained what it is yet...

content.cn: 看来你已经想好了。
content.en: So you've made up your mind.

content.cn: 是的，我会同意她的离职申请。
content.en: Yes, I will approve her resignation.

content.cn: 但终末地也随时欢迎她回来。
content.en: But I will also tell her that Endfield will always welcome her back.

content.cn: 对了，关于你对自己的担忧……
content.en: By the way, about your concerns...

content.cn: 我不在乎没失忆的我会怎么看，但你现在做得很好。
content.en: I don't care what the previous version of me would think, but right now, I think you're doing very well.

content.cn: 比你所期望的还要好。
content.en: Far beyond your expectations.

content.cn: 我知道。
content.en: I know.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_018">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_018">

content.cn: 难得你会主动对我说这个。
content.en: You don't usually come to me about this.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_017">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_017">

content.cn: 因为可能只有管理员，才能帮我解答。
content.en: Because I think maybe only you can help me figure it out.

content.cn: 管理员，现在我们就是好友了！随时给我发消息啊！
content.en: Helllooooo Endmin! We're officially friends on Baker! Txt me when u hv time, okay?

content.cn: 抱歉，刚刚才看到消息。
content.en: Sorry, I just saw your messages now.

content.cn: 太好了！！我以为你……生气了……我这人说话心直口快，如果以后有得罪，万请见谅！
content.en: PHEWWW!! I thought u were upset T_T U knw I'm not good with words. If I ever upset u, plz tell me!!!

content.cn: 别慌，我只是两分钟没有回复而已吧。
content.en: Calm down, I was only away for 2 mins.

content.cn: 啊？
content.en: Wuttt...

content.cn: 才两分钟吗……可能是我从小习武，新陈代谢比较快，对时间流速的感觉不一样……
content.en: Seemed longer than 2 mins... Maybe cuz I study martial arts and hv a faster metabolism, so time feels faster for me...?

content.cn: 不过，能和管理员并肩作战，感觉还是很神奇！
content.en: Anyway I jst wanna say, fighting next to u feels magical!

content.cn: 之前没时间细说，但我真的超级激动！
content.en: No time to say it b4, but I'm beyond excited!

content.cn: 你不知道佩丽卡跟我说了多少关于你的事……
content.en: Also, Perly tld me sooooo much abt u...

content.cn: 你还记得怎么用baker吧？
content.en: U rmb how to use dis right?

content.cn: 她是怎么说我的？
content.en: What did she say about me?

content.cn: 嗯……我觉得这事儿你得亲自问她才行。但我保证，都很正面！！
content.en: Hmm... U might wanna ask her urself. But I PROMISE, everything she said was totally positive!!

content.cn: 重点是，真正跟你说上话的感觉完全不一样呢……
content.en: My point is, actually tlking to u feels so diff...

content.cn: 好像挺熟悉又有点儿陌生，好像认识了你一辈子又刚刚认识。
content.en: Hmm, how do I put it ... feels both familiar and strange. Like I've known u my whole life, but we just met...

content.cn: 管理员，请多指教啦！
content.en: Anyway, I'm SUPER pleased to knw u!

content.cn: 她告诉你我休眠的时候会打鼾了吗？
content.en: Did she mention I snored while in hibernation?

content.cn: 真的吗！管理员居然打了十年鼾吗……
content.en: HA? So u snored for like ... 10 yrs?

content.cn: 等一下……
content.en: Wait...

content.cn: 她怎么知道你休眠的时候会不会打鼾？
content.en: How would Perly know if u snored or not?

content.cn: 管理员？
content.en: Endmin?

content.cn: 我去问佩丽卡要录音，她说你在逗我玩儿？？？
content.en: I JST ASKED PERLY FOR RECORDINGS, AND SHE SAID U'RE MESSING WITH ME!?!?!?!

content.cn: 管理员，你得赔偿我一瓶，不对，两瓶辣椒老妈！！
content.en: Endmin, u owe me 1, no, 2 Mrs. Pepper!!!

content.cn: 说话算话！
content.en: U CAN'T SAY NO!

content.cn: 呃……我是不是说错话了……
content.en: Uh, d I say sth tht made you upset...?

content.cn: 我不是说你不会用的意思啦，我听说你这次醒来不记得从前的事了……
content.en: I'm not saying u dunno how to use it... I asked cuz I heard u woke up with 0 memories...

content.cn: 那个，发送消息的话，按屏幕上的“发送”……
content.en: Hmm, anyway, if u want to send anything, jst tap "Send"...

content.cn: 语音输入的话，也可以……
content.en: Btw, if u're too lazy to type, feel free to use speech to txt...

content.cn: 我刚才问了一下佩丽卡
content.en: So I jst tlked to Perly...

content.cn: 管理员，我感觉你从醒来开始就在忙活，有没有放松一下啊？
content.en: Endmin, d u hv time to relax? U've been busy running around since u woke up.

content.cn: 哼……我陈千语经得起考验！
content.en: Hmph! Master Chen can handle anything this world throws at her!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_011">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_011">

content.cn: 这次就不抢劫你的辣椒老妈了。管理员有什么想玩的，尽管告诉我，我可是行家里手！
content.en: I'll let u keep ur Mrs. Pepper this time. If u ever want to relax and enjoy life, shoot me a msg. I knw places!

content.cn: 在来终末地以前，我在好多好多地方打过工。
content.en: I worked many jobs b4 joining Endfield.

content.cn: 到处打工？我还以为只有大潘……
content.en: You worked many jobs? I thought only Da Pan did that...

content.cn: 对呀！看不出来吧？我其实也干过很多工作！
content.en: Hehe, I knw I look young, but I hv yrs of experience.

content.cn: 我很早就在外闯荡了。
content.en: I started my journey at a young age.

content.cn: 你离开家，是因为离家出走吗？
content.en: Did you just run away from home?

content.cn: 我猜你要说没空了。佩丽卡也是，明明超级担心你的身体，但还是拉着你干这干那。
content.en: I'm guessing u're gonna say "no time to relax". What's with Perly tho... She worries abt ur health but still drags u everywhere doing stuff.

content.cn: 那还真不是。感觉……是我在谈剑堂的师父一脚把我踹出师门的。
content.en: Nope. Uh... I think I got kicked out by my Shifu at Tanjian Hall.

content.cn: 师父把剑扔给我，说，我这里没有什么你能学的了！
content.en: Well, yeah... Shifu kinda just threw me a sword and said, "You've learned all I can teach. Later!" (not his exact words ofc

content.cn: 还说，要学的都在世界上，要把世界装进心里，装在剑上。
content.en: He also said the world holds all there is to learn, and that I shld bear it in my heart, and in my sword.

content.cn: 哎呀，扯远了，我本来是答应了佩丽卡，要带你去潇洒潇洒的。
content.en: Ah, I'm drifting off-topic. I told Pelica I'd take you out to relax a bit.

content.cn: 说漏嘴了……快，你还没说你喜欢玩什么！
content.en: Oops... Forget what I jst said. Tell me, any places u wanna explore?

content.cn: 一时没想法，你有什么推荐？
content.en: I can't think of anything right now. Do you have recommendations?

content.cn: 你问一个在奶茶店烧烤排档美食展会打过工且出生在宏山环形山以及在武陵城待过的还长了一张嘴的我？
content.en: U def asking the right girl! I've done shifts at milk tea shops, BBQ stalls, and food fests. Born in Hongshan Crater, lived in Wuling City, and my mouth is a black hole for food!

content.cn: 我看你们都一样，全是工作狂！
content.en: What can I say... Both of u r workaholics!

content.cn: 我虽然厨艺一般，但我很·会·吃！！！
content.en: I may not be a great chef, BUT I'M A REAL FOODIE!!!

content.cn: 四号谷地有一家地下烤吧口味超绝，是我去找胖大鸟送东西的时候他带我去的。
content.en: Valley IV has an underground grill that's to die for. I went to deliver sth to Big Owl and he took me there.

content.cn: 那里根本不对外营业，如果没有熟脸带路，多少金票都买不了！
content.en: It's not open to the public tho. No amount of T-Creds will get u in unless u've got someone to show you the way! *Wink*Wink*

content.cn: 如果你想吃更贵气的饭，我要推荐菈梵朵玛自由市那家伊比利亚餐厅，真不知道他们在海鲜饭里放了什么，超级好吃！
content.en: If u want sth more upscale, I'd rec dis Iberian restaurant in the free city of La Fantoma. No idea what's in their seafood paella, but it's sooooo good <333

content.cn: 嘿嘿，吃饭先不论，说个冷门的。你想听戏的话，我也有大把推荐。
content.en: Haha, enough food talk. I've got lots of Xiqu recs if u're interested.

content.cn: 戏？
content.en: Xiqu?

content.cn: 就是那种，人站在台上唱的戏！分类可多了，baker上写不下，改天我见面跟你说。
content.en: Yeah, it's that kind of opera where ppl sing on stage! There r so many types, I can't type them all out on Baker. I'll tell u more when we meet up.

content.cn: 原来你爱听这个，我还以为你只喜欢武侠电影。
content.en: I didn't know you were into this. I thought you only liked Wuxia movies.

content.cn: 没想到吧！我妈以前总在家里放，小时候我也听不懂，来了这儿以后有一天，突然从一个广播里听见……就一下爱得不得了。
content.en: Hehe! My mom always played it at home when I was a kid. Didn't really get it back then, but after moving here, I heard it on the radio one day and fell hard.

content.cn: 我最推荐的戏目是《玉门女将》，我听了可能有六十遍吧，会唱！而且每次听都有新感触……
content.en: My #1 fav is "Female Warrior at Yumen". I've listened to it like 60 times and can even sing it! Every listen feels new...

content.cn: 说到唱，如果管理员喜欢唱歌的话！
content.en: And hey, if u're into singing...

content.cn: 这些项目已经够我消化一阵子了……
content.en: Thanks, these are plenty to digest already... They should keep me entertained for a good while...

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_005">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_005">

content.cn: 等你抽空，咱们一站式包全！
content.en: KK. When u hv time, we can hit up all the fun at once!

content.cn: 你不是吗？
content.en: Are you not?

content.cn: 我吗？
content.en: Me?

content.cn: 我……当然也很努力的！
content.en: Uh... Ofc I work super hard too!

content.cn: 别紧张，逗你的。
content.en: Relax, I'm just teasing you.

content.cn: 管理员，想问你个问题……
content.en: Endmin, can I ask u sth...

content.cn: 别说，我琢磨了一会儿，有道理。小道奇教官说，武器也是会挑人的，不贴手的说明它没有选中你。
content.en: K, I thought about ur answer for a bit, and it kinda makes sense. Lil' Dodge said weapons can actually "choose" their user. If it doesn't feel right, it means it's not the one for you.

content.cn: 管理员果然有大智慧！！
content.en: U got some serious wisdom!

content.cn: 我会选帝江号。
content.en: I would pick Dijiang.

content.cn: 啊？还能这么回答？！
content.en: Wuut?! Ur answer's so...

content.cn: 也太赖皮了吧！
content.en: Sneaky!

content.cn: 要是能带着帝江号去比武，谁还敢上擂台来过招啊！这可是塔卫二最厉害的轨道飞行器！
content.en: If u took Dijiang to a duel, no one would wanna face u! C'mon, it's the toughest orbital vehicle in Talos-II!

content.cn: ……不对，管理员又在逗我玩了吧！！
content.en: Wait... R u teasing me again?!

content.cn: 你呢？你会选什么武器？
content.en: What weapon would you pick?

content.cn: 我最喜欢剑啦，百兵之君嘛！
content.en: Sword, duh. My fav and the true ruler of all weapons!

content.cn: 如果整个塔卫二的武器都任你选的话，你会选择什么？
content.en: If u could pick ANY weapon from Talos-II, what would it be?

content.cn: 最经典的，最酷的，最厉害的——主角用的！
content.en: It's classic, cool, and unbeatable. Hero's choice!

content.cn: 那么，为什么是双剑？
content.en: Why do you have two swords?

content.cn: 双剑就是双倍厉害呀！
content.en: Double the swords means double the badass!

content.cn: 仔细一想，其实我也不清楚……
content.en: Actually ... I dunno...

content.cn: 很久以前，我在谈剑堂学的都是单剑，和妈妈练的也是单剑。
content.en: I only had 1 sword back at Tanjian Hall, and my mom practiced with jst 1 sword too.

content.cn: 她们告诉我，用双剑的人意在剑上而不是法上，在术上而不是在道上。不是说双剑不好，只是年轻的习剑者容易误入歧途，练坏了手。
content.en: I've heard tht ppl who wield dual swords focus more on the blades than the art, more on technique than the deeper truth. Novice swordsmen risk picking up bad habits.

content.cn: 但某一天之后，其实就是我妈离开以后，我发现她留了一把剑给我。那是她最常用的一把剑，还吊着我给她的剑穗……
content.en: My mom left me a sword when she left, it was her go-to sword. It even had the tassel I made for her...

content.cn: 一个做事工工整整的人，怎么会把一把剑落在身后？
content.en: She's super meticulous, so there's no way she left her sword behind.

content.cn: 我一度很伤心，觉得她不要我了。
content.en: I was rlly upset for a while, thought she didn't want me anymore.

content.cn: 一定要认真回答哦。说出来不怕笑话，我只会对非常非常重要的人问出这个问题！
content.en: I want a serious answer. NGL, I only ask this of ppl who truly matter!

content.cn: 很久之后，我才在邮箱里发现她的语音留言。
content.en: After a long time, I found her voice msg in my Inbox.

content.cn: 她这人洒脱惯了，每次忘记邮箱密码就干脆重新注册一个账号，所以陌生邮箱都被归到垃圾邮件里了。
content.en: My mom's the carefree type. Every time she forgot her password, she'd jst get a new acct, so all her strange mails ended up in my junk folder.

content.cn: 听起来倒很像你的行事风格。
content.en: Like mother like daughter.

content.cn: 她跟我说，那是她放下的决心，希望我能有将其拾起的勇气。
content.en: She tld me tht leaving her fav sword behind was her way of showing trust, hoping I'd be brave enough to pick it up.

content.cn: 然后我就开始使双剑了！说实话，也没有很难，因为从小就练基本功，所以很快就掌握了个中技巧。
content.en: So yeah ... tht's when I got into dual swords! Honestly, it wasn't tht hard :P been doing basic training since I was little, so I picked it up pretty quick.

content.cn: 她跟我说，那是她放下的决心，希望我能有将其拾起的勇气。
content.en: She tld me tht leaving her fav sword behind was her way of showing trust, hoping I'd have the courage to pick it up.

content.cn: 然后我就开始使双剑了！说实话，也没有很难，因为从小就练基本功，所以很快就掌握了个中技巧。
content.en: So yeah ... tht's when I got into dual swords! Honestly, it wasn't tht hard :P been doing basic training since I was little, so I picked it up pretty quick.

content.cn: 因为……我们学武的人，大都把武器敬作生命的一部分。
content.en: Cuz ... for us martial artists, our weapons r part of who we r.

content.cn: 结果，你的选择是同时拿起两把剑。
content.en: So you chose to pick up two swords at once.

content.cn: 咦？什么意思？
content.en: Huh? Wut do u mean?

content.cn: “了解一个人的武器，就等于对那个人知根知底。”
content.en: You said, "To knw someone's weapon is to truly know them."

content.cn: 你选择把她的决心和自己的勇气都带上了吧。
content.en: You picked up her trust and your own courage.

content.cn: 新消息
content.en: New Message

content.cn: 说实话，刚才看到你的回复
content.en: Ngl, when I saw ur msg

content.cn: 嘿嘿，掉眼泪了。
content.en: I cried a lil T_T

content.cn: 抱歉，让你难过了吗？
content.en: Sorry, did I make you upset?

content.cn: 了解一个人的武器，就等于对那个人知根知底！
content.en: To knw someone's weapon is to truly know them!

content.cn: 没有没有，不是难过啦！只是，突然想起了很多事情……
content.en: No, no, it's not like I'm upset! I jst ... suddenly remembered a lot of things...

content.cn: 现在想起来，我妈也说过类似的话，但那时我还小，一直不解其意。
content.en: My mom said sth very similar back then, but I was too little to understand.

content.cn: 没有说你像我的妈妈的意思啊管理员！
content.en: Not saying ure like my mom or anything (>益<)

content.cn: 佩丽卡没说错，你会给人指引和信心！
content.en: Perly's right, u give ppl guidance and confidence!

content.cn: 现在，我感受到啦！
content.en: I totally feel it now (*^^*)

content.cn: 我会选趁手的那把。
content.en: I would pick the one that feels right in my hand.

content.cn: 啊？还能这么回答？！
content.en: Wuut?! Ur answer's so...

content.cn: 也太万金油了吧！
content.en: Generic!

content.cn: 荒野有自己的法则，很多人习惯了为活下去不择手段。我理解他们，但不打算纠正他们。
content.en: Out in the wildlands, survival's the only law. Most'll do whatever it takes. I don't judge ... but I don't play that game.

content.cn: 或许可以跟我谈谈你以前的经历？
content.en: Maybe you could tell me about your past?

content.cn: 之前发生过什么？能和我说说吗？
content.en: Did something happen before? Can you tell me?

content.cn: 塔罗斯底下，没有新事
content.en: Nothing's new underneath Talos.

content.cn: 有人会为了活命出卖多年的同伴，自然也有人会为了利益背弃诺言。
content.en: Folks'll sell out their own blood if the price is right.

content.cn: 但现在不一样了，你有了更多的同伴，不再是一个人。
content.en: Things are different now. You're not alone anymore. You've got allies.

content.cn: 你已经是终末地的一分子了，我们都是你可以信赖的同伴。
content.en: You are an Endfielder now. We're all allies you can count on.

content.cn: 要是你遇到了一个人解决不了的麻烦，无论是我还是其他人……都会想办法帮助你的。
content.en: If you ever run into trouble you can't handle alone, me, or anyone here, will find a way to help you.

content.cn: 狼卫，你该去休息一下了。都巡逻一晚上了。
content.en: Wulfgard, you should get some rest. You've been patrolling all night.

content.cn: ……我知道了
content.en: Alright.

content.cn: 多谢你的好意，管理员
content.en: Thnx, Endmin.

content.cn: 往后……要是真遇到了难以解决的麻烦，我会来找你的。
content.en: Next time I hit a wall, I'll come find you.

content.cn: 狼卫，以后别再一个人熬夜巡逻了。多注意点身体。
content.en: No more solo late-night patrols, alright? You need to take better care of yourself.

content.cn: 你是第一个发现这件事的人。管理员，难道这也是你源石技艺的一部分？
content.en: Endmin, u r the first to notice. This some Originium trick of urs?

content.cn: 不过不用担心，这种生活我早已习惯
content.en: Don't worry, I'm used to this life.

content.cn: 过去在荒野上，为了追上试图甩开我的目标，我可以五天五夜不睡。
content.en: Back in the wildlands, I'd go five straight days without sleep to run someone down.

content.cn: 为什么不找个搭档？好歹可以轮班。
content.en: Why not find a partner and take turns?

content.cn: 试过。但是……结果不好
content.en: Tried. Didn't work.

content.cn: 管理员，或许你可以替我解决这个麻烦
content.en: Endmin, got time to help me out?

content.cn: 还有那种特别闪亮的饰品，她收藏过很多，前几年我去耶尔什还给她带过一些。
content.en: And flashy jewelry. She's got plenty. I brought her some from Kjersch a while back.

content.cn: 有什么备选的礼物吗？我帮你挑挑？
content.en: Got any options in mind? I can help you pick.

content.cn: 我用之前任务的报酬从艾什柏环岛的地下黑市买了一些饰品
content.en: Used my last mission reward to grab some jewelry from Asphalt Roundabout's underground.

content.cn: 外加一柄镶嵌了四种水晶的古董匕首。
content.en: Plus an antique dagger with 4 different crystals.

content.cn: 还有其他选择吗？比如她喜欢的什么别的东西？
content.en: Any other options? Maybe something else she likes?

content.cn: 关于她的喜好，我能确定的只有这些。
content.en: Abt her tastes ... this is all I know.

content.cn: 她成长得太快，早将同龄人甩在了身后，哪怕是狼群中的同龄人
content.en: She's always been ahead of others her age, Pack or not.

content.cn: 9岁初次狩猎获胜，11岁带队击退了碾骨，13岁完成了第一个雇佣兵任务……
content.en: 9, first hunt. 11, led a team against the Bonekrushers. 13, first merc job...

content.cn: 她独自闯过了许多难关，而我大多时候都没能在场……更别提了解她如今的喜好了。
content.en: She's done it all alone. I wasn't there. So idk what she's into now...

content.cn: 简单来说就是，能帮我挑一份礼物吗？
content.en: I need to pick a gift.

content.cn: 但你依然以她为傲，不是吗？
content.en: Still ... you must be proud of her.

content.cn: 是的，她是整个狼群的骄傲。
content.en: Sì. She's the pride of the entire Pack.

content.cn: 只凭一个人反杀数十个碾骨，带着六七个伤员突破包围；腹背受敌时当机立断，抢先一步占据制高点……类似的事，她做过太多
content.en: Took out dozens of Bonekrushers solo, led six wounded through a siege, made split-second calls under fire, seized the high ground first... She's done it all.

content.cn: 她已经成为了真正的“狼珀”，卢皮诺家族最珍贵的宝物。
content.en: She's a true Wulfperl. Luppino's crown jewel.

content.cn: 我想我知道你该送什么“礼物”作为赔礼了……不是什么精致的刀具，也不是什么华丽的饰品。
content.en: I know the perfect gift for her, and it's neither delicate knives nor flashy jewels.

content.cn: 对洛茜来说，礼物或许没那么重要。
content.en: Maybe what Rossi really wants isn't a gift at all.

content.cn: 你真正该做的应该是——立刻去见她，陪她说说话。面对家人，你可以更坦诚点。
content.en: Look, you should just go talk to her in person. You can be more open with family.

content.cn: 我明白了。
content.en: Got it.

content.cn: 感谢你的建议，管理员。我需要一些时间……认真考虑一下。
content.en: Appreciate the advice, Endmin. Need some time to think it through.

content.cn: 送给谁的礼物？有什么要求吗？
content.en: Who's it for? Any specific requirements?

content.cn: 说说具体的要求？送的对象是？
content.en: Any specific requirements? Who's it for?

content.cn: 给洛茜的。没什么要求，能作为我太久没去看望她的赔礼就好。
content.en: Rossi. Nothing specific. Jst to make up for not visiting her in ages.

content.cn: 你好歹告诉我，她有什么喜欢的东西吧？
content.en: Is there anything she likes?

content.cn: 她喜欢精致一点的刀具，不好用也可以
content.en: Delicate knives. Don't even hv to work well.

content.cn: 听起来像是个追踪器。
content.en: Sounds like a tracker...

content.cn: 差不多。也有“群狼庇佑亲族”的意思
content.en: If u think so. It's also the Pack's way of protecting its family.

content.cn: 我其实不太信这个。但对于我与洛茜，你确实足够重要，与狼群亲族无异
content.en: I don't rlly buy it. But u count as family to Rossi and me.

content.cn: 至于庇佑……它做不到的，由我来做。
content.en: So, if tht thing can't protect u, I will.

content.cn: 现在你能告诉我了吗？为什么你不愿意待在狼群，而是坚持一个人行动？
content.en: Are you ready to tell me why you went solo instead of staying with the Pack?

content.cn: 为了洛茜，也为了氏族里的其他人……我必须亲自去找到一个答案
content.en: For Rossi, and for the clan. I must find the answer myself.

content.cn: 只有找到了它，狼群才能得到新的选择与出路
content.en: Only then can the Pack hv a way forward.

content.cn: 才能让当年那场让狼群遭到重创的悲剧……不再重演。
content.en: Only then can the tragedy tht once broke the Pack stay in the past.

content.cn: 狼卫，这个包裹是你寄给我的吗？
content.en: Wulfgard, did you send me this package?

content.cn: 你怎么看待狼群的未来？
content.en: What do you think about the Pack's future?

content.cn: 不重要。我只想让其他人意识到
content.en: Tht's not important. I jst want others to realize this.

content.cn: 狼群不做出改变，便无未来可谈。
content.en: If the Pack stays the same, then there's no future.

content.cn: 那现在你找到想要的答案了吗？
content.en: Have you found the answer you were looking for yet?

content.cn: 找到了，但不完全
content.en: Yes and no.

content.cn: 终末地的答案很真诚，也很了不起，但未必就完全适合狼群
content.en: Endfield's answer is honest, impressive even. But it won't fit the Pack entirely.

content.cn: 我也好，洛茜也好，还需要面对更多艰难的抉择。
content.en: Rossi and I still have tough calls ahead.

content.cn: 碾骨氏族仍是狼群的大敌，而“裂地者”身份给狼群留下的烙印也不可能被轻易去除。要做的事还有很多。
content.en: Bonekrushers are still our biggest threat, and it isn't easy to shake off the "Landbreakers" mark on the Pack. Work's far from done.

content.cn: 管理员，如果有可能，但愿有一天我能让你见证一个全新的“狼群”
content.en: Endmin, one day, I hope ull see a whole new Pack.

content.cn: 嗯。作为上次宝贵建议的回礼，也是洛茜的意思。
content.en: Yep. A return gift for your help last time, also Rossi's idea.

content.cn: 但愿……那一天不会太远。
content.en: Hope that day comes soon.

content.cn: 我很期待。
content.en: I'll be waiting.

content.cn: 我相信你。
content.en: I believe in you.

content.cn: 狼卫，今天我收到的这个包裹，难道是你的“回礼”？
content.en: Wulfgard, is this your way of saying thanks for my advice last time?

content.cn: 没错，管理员，你上次的建议是对的……我很少见到洛茜那么开心。
content.en: Right. Ur advice worked. I rarely see Rossi this happy.

content.cn: 如果我没看错，这好像是个护身符？
content.en: If I'm not mistaken, this looks like a talisman?

content.cn: 对，这是狼群……卢皮诺家族世代相传的一种护符，我和洛茜都有一个
content.en: Yes, it's a Luppino family talisman. Rossi and I each have one.

content.cn: 只要你戴着它，今后无论你去了哪里……我都能找到你。
content.en: Wear it, and I'll always be able to find u no matter where u go.

content.cn: 管理员，有需要我记住的歌谣吗
content.en: Endmin, is there any hanna you want me to remember?

content.cn: 裂兽群的族母会让刚结束哺乳期的幼崽们竞争食物，以筛选强壮的幼崽
content.en: The packmothers of manglerbeasts set their weaned young to compete for food, so that only the strongest may endure.

content.cn: 众生长地的歌谣里记载了这样的习性
content.en: Such practices are remembered in hannas of the Hannabit Circuit.

content.cn: 完成考验？什么考验？
content.en: What trial?

content.cn: 对新成员的考验，通过考验以证明能力，展现其为人的品质
content.en: For those who join anew, there is always a trial. Passing it proves one's strength and reveals their true characteristics.

content.cn: “裂兽族母”？
content.en: Packmothers of manglerbeasts?

content.cn: 她们是裂兽群的首领，一方面，她们会拼死保护族群的幼崽
content.en: The packmothers are leaders of manglerbeasts. They guard their kin with ferocity.

content.cn: 另一方面，族母也会给予幼崽考验，只有强壮健康的那些才不会被遗弃
content.en: Yet also demand trials of them, leaving only the hardy to endure.

content.cn: 原来如此……终末地并没有需要新干员学习的歌谣，但考验确实有一个。
content.en: I see. At Endfield, there are no hannas for new operators, but we do have a trial.

content.cn: 好的，管理员，我会像吹过的风一样，干净利落地完成考验
content.en: Then grant it to me, Endmin. I shall complete it swiftly, as the passing wind cuts clean through the plain.

content.cn: 去武库和大家认识一下，顺便熟悉熟悉那里的设备。
content.en: Go meet those at the Arsenal. Familiarize yourself with the devices while you're at it.

content.cn: 去熟悉一下终末地的武库吧。熟悉下那里的设备，顺便和大家认识一下。
content.en: Go check out the Arsenal and get to know everyone there. Familiarize yourself with the devices while you're at it.

content.cn: 没问题，不过为什么是武库
content.en: Understood. But why the Arsenal?

content.cn: 因为我相信你会喜欢那里。
content.en: I think you'll like it there.

content.cn: 明白了，我这就去
content.en: Understood. I will be on my way.

content.cn: 歌谣？要唱歌吗？
content.en: Are you going to sing it?

content.cn: 歌谣？什么歌谣？
content.en: What's a hanna?

content.cn: 奥里莎师者向徒从传授知识时，会让他们记住众生长地传唱的歌谣
content.en: When Aldertone Orisha passes down knowledge to the Echolings, they are required to remember hannas sung across the Hannabit Circuit.

content.cn: 我很期待管理员的歌谣，毕竟连最偏远的聚落都流传着你的故事
content.en: I look forward to hearing your hanna, Endmin, for even in the most remote settlements, your tales are told.

content.cn: 需要我完成什么考验吗？就像裂兽族母会考验自己的幼崽一样
content.en: Will you set me a trial, as the packmothers of manglerbeasts set for their young?

content.cn: 就像……裂兽一样？
content.en: Manglerbeasts have trials to complete...?

content.cn: 管理员，武库有好多个摆满了载具改造设备的房间
content.en: Endmin, the Arsenal has several rooms filled with tools for vehicle modification.

content.cn: 好啊，正好也想听听荒野上的故事。
content.en: I'd love to hear a story from the wildlands.

content.cn: 我曾借住在一个小型聚落，那里储备的物资不多，居民们过得都很拮据
content.en: I once stayed in a small settlement where life was constrained by scarcity.

content.cn: 刚入夜不久，聚落的一户居民找到了我，说是有一位母亲难产，需要帮助
content.en: Late at night, a household sought my assistance.

content.cn: 聚落的条件有限，母亲与胎儿都有生命危险
content.en: A mother struggled in childbirth, her life and the child's in peril.

content.cn: 我便接受了她家人的请求，带她前往临近的灰医生驻地
content.en: I agreed to help and guided her to a Dusthair Surgeon post nearby.

content.cn: 然后呢？
content.en: And then?

content.cn: 是不是到转折的地方了。
content.en: Are we reaching a plot twist?

content.cn: 荒野总是变换着面纱，让人无法看清它本来的面貌
content.en: As you may be aware, the wildlands wear many masks, concealing their true nature.

content.cn: 精湛的工艺、完好的设备……我到过各种聚落与集市，但这样的房间，从未遇见过
content.en: The craftsmanship is precise, the tools pristine. I've visited many settlements, yet I've never seen anything like this.

content.cn: 我并未预见那场风暴会向我们袭来
content.en: Thus, I did not foresee the storm that would strike us.

content.cn: 我如同被蒙住双眼的羽兽，在荒野中迷失了方向
content.en: Like a blind fowl, I lost my bearings amid the wildlands.

content.cn: 此起彼伏的雷鸣、大树倒地的巨响，还有远处洪水的奔腾
content.en: Thunder clashed, trees shattered, and the distant flood roared.

content.cn: 直到从风暴中，传来了不属于我座驾的引擎轰鸣
content.en: Then, a foreign engine's growl cut through the tempest.

content.cn: 是谁？
content.en: Who was it?

content.cn: 我无法透过风暴看清来人，他也没有向我们展露身份
content.en: I could not see them, nor did they reveal themselves.

content.cn: 我跟随着他座驾发出的灯光，再次向着风暴发起冲锋
content.en: I followed the light of their vehicle and pressed forward through the storm.

content.cn: 最终，我们迎着刀刃般的风，穿过裸露的岩石，来到了一位灰医生的驻地
content.en: We traversed sharp winds and bare rock, finally reaching a Dusthair Surgeon's post.

content.cn: 我和武库的其他干员相处得也很融洽，他们都对我改造的摩托车很感兴趣
content.en: I've also gotten along well with the other operators in the Arsenal. They're all curious about the motorcycle I've been modifying.

content.cn: 然后呢？
content.en: And then?

content.cn: 新生命降生，母亲与胎儿都脱离了危险，我们在灰医生的驻地里度过了那个夜晚
content.en: Life was renewed that night; both mother and child survived. We remained at the outpost until the storm passed.

content.cn: 等到风暴散去，我们只在驻地外找到一道驶向远方的车辙
content.en: When it cleared, only a trail of tire marks remained, fading toward the horizon.

content.cn: 好了，管理员，这就是故事的全部
content.en: That is the entirety of the tale, Endmin.

content.cn: 好神秘啊……会是另一位游人吗？
content.en: Fascinating... Could that person be another Songseeker?

content.cn: 在荒野上驰骋，会是另一位游人吗？
content.en: Riding through the wildlands... Could it be another Songseeker?

content.cn: 不一定，但不论是不是游人，他都帮助了需要帮助的人
content.en: Perhaps not. Yet whether Songseeker or not, they acted to help those in need.

content.cn: 尽力互助，也是我们在荒野上生存的法则之一
content.en: Assistance and solidarity are the currents that guide us through the wildlands.

content.cn: 管理员，我可以用武库的设备改造我的摩托车吗
content.en: Endmin, may I use those tools to work on my motorcycle?

content.cn: 当然可以。
content.en: Go ahead. Feel free to use them.

content.cn: 这也是安排这个考验的目的之一，以后你就可以在武库修理或改造你的摩托车了。
content.en: Sure. That's part of why we arranged this trial. Feel free to repair or upgrade your motorcycle in the Arsenal from now on.

content.cn: 谢谢你管理员，就像是在荒野游历时，收到了其他人赠送的礼物
content.en: Thank you, Endmin. It feels like receiving a gift from someone while traveling through the wildlands.

content.cn: 那我就用我游历中的一个小故事作为回赠
content.en: To return the favor, I will tell you a brief story from my travels.

content.cn: 管理员，在武库改装摩托车真是太方便了，很轻松就把摩托车拆成了零件
content.en: Endmin, working in the Arsenal makes modifying the motorcycle incredibly convenient. I was able to disassemble it into parts with ease.

content.cn: 改造摩托车也是一个道理，只有看到了摩托车澎湃的生命，感受着它的呼吸
content.en: A motorcycle only truly comes alive once you feel its pulse.

content.cn: 才能让摩托车在每一次的拆解与重塑，每一次的生长中，迎来蜕变与新生
content.en: Only then can each disassembly, each rebuild, bring about transformation and rebirth.

content.cn: 原来是这样。
content.en: I get it now.

content.cn: 所以把摩托车拆成零件后重组，才能让它“蜕变与新生”……
content.en: So taking the motorcycle apart and rebuilding it allows it to "transform and be reborn"...

content.cn: 在向谢苗他们传唱歌谣时，我还看到了佩丽卡监督
content.en: While passing down the hanna to Semyon and the others, I noticed Supervisor Perlica.

content.cn: 她就像第一次走进祖地的徒从一样站在人群里，听我传唱着歌谣
content.en: She stood among them like an Echoling stepping into the ancient land for the first time, listening to my hanna.

content.cn: 她的眼睛，就像是在树枝上歇息的羽兽，看到了天空中有另一只正在享受飞翔的羽兽
content.en: Her eyes were calm, like a fowlbeast resting on a branch, watching another soar in the sky.

content.cn: 后来怎么样了？
content.en: What happened afterwards?

content.cn: 歇息的羽兽……看到了飞翔的羽兽？
content.en: A fowlbeast resting on a branch ... watching another soar in the sky?

content.cn: 是的，羽兽在歇息时，看到同样热爱飞翔的羽兽，眼中会放出耀眼的光芒
content.en: That is correct. When a fowlbeast rests and sees another that shares its love for flight, its eyes shine with a dazzling light.

content.cn: 我看到歌谣在佩丽卡监督眼里闪烁着的火光，炽热得丝毫不亚于武库的干员们
content.en: I caught the very same light in Supervisor Perlica's eyes as she listened to the hanna, as intense as any of the operators in the Arsenal.

content.cn: 我刚打算邀请佩丽卡监督一起改装，但转头却发现她已经离开了，只能我自己演示
content.en: I had intended to invite her to modify the motorcycle with me, but she had already left. The demonstration was mine alone.

content.cn: 我突然又想起了第一次改装摩托车时，把传动链条固定得太紧……幸好崩裂的链条只是让引擎受损
content.en: It reminded me of the first time I worked on a motorcycle... I tightened the drive chain too much, and it snapped. Only the engine suffered.

content.cn: 真是坎坷的历程。
content.en: That sounds rough.

content.cn: 话说回来，管理员，试车的时候我从西北方吹来的风里，感受到了干燥的沙砾，这几天天气应该挺不错
content.en: Speaking of which, Endmin, when test-riding, I felt the dry grit in the northwest wind. The weather should be quite pleasant these days.

content.cn: 风在山顶呼啸，抬起手，银河流淌的细沙划破指尖
content.en: The wind howled atop the ridge. I lifted my hand, the stardust of the galaxy brushed my fingertips.

content.cn: 改装时要把摩托车拆成零件吗？
content.en: Why disassemble it into parts?

content.cn: 我仰望天空，拾起永恒的碎片，呼吸着百年前落下的星光
content.en: I looked up at the sky, collected the eternal fragments, and drew in the starlight that had descended long ago.

content.cn: 等那些麻烦都被解决后，我带你出去兜兜风吧，沿着山脊，在星空下驰骋，感受荒野
content.en: Endmin, once these troubles are behind us, I will take you for a ride along the ridge beneath the stars, feeling the wildlands and their quiet strength.

content.cn: 也顺便教教管理员怎么骑摩托车，让管理员也能感受到引擎轰鸣里生命的不屈
content.en: And I will teach you to ride, so you can feel the heartbeat of life in every roar of the engine.

content.cn: 没问题，一言为定。
content.en: It's a deal then.

content.cn: 好啊，正好体验一下游人旅途是什么样的！
content.en: It's a perfect opportunity to experience what a Songseeker's journey feels like!

content.cn: 为什么要把摩托车拆成零件？
content.en: Why take it apart?

content.cn: 因为我想把我第一次改装摩托车时获得的歌谣传唱给她们
content.en: I wish to pass down my first motorcycle modification experience to them through hanna.

content.cn: 刚才和谢苗聊了聊他们在武库的工作，让我想起了第一次改装摩托车时的样子
content.en: Just now, talking with Semyon about their work in the Arsenal reminded me of how I was the first time I modified a motorcycle.

content.cn: 传唱歌谣……所以是为了演示才把摩托车拆成零件的？
content.en: Hanna... So you disassembled the motorcycle just to share your experience with others?

content.cn: 正如刚学习奔跑的驮兽，只有在奔跑后才能感受到如风般的自由与狂野
content.en: Like a young burdenbeast discovering the freedom of its first run...

content.cn: 文件[训练室申请单_副本（256）]已接收
content.en: File [Training Cabin Application (256)] Accepted

content.cn: 不用太在意，后勤干员告诉过我，训练室没几天是完好的。
content.en: Don't worry about it. The logistics operators have told me the Training Cabin is rarely in perfect condition anyway.

content.cn: 不过我有点好奇了，你的日常训练量到底有多少？
content.en: Still, I'm curious, just how much do you train in a day?

content.cn: 长跑八十公里，大重量卧推四十组，对抗练习二到四小时——取决于和谁练习。
content.en: Eighty kilometers of endurance running. Forty sets of heavy bench press. Two to four hours of sparring, depending on the others' capabilities.

content.cn: 地面上会加倍，毕竟有更多开放空间，对练的搭档也更多。
content.en: When training on the surface, I double the workload. There is more space to maneuver, more opponents to work with.

content.cn: 难得没有作战任务，偶尔也多休息一下吧？
content.en: You could rest once in a while, especially when there're no combat missions.

content.cn: “训练时流汗，好过战场上流血”，我认为这个道理不管在哪里都适用。
content.en: I have always believed that it is better to shed sweat in training than blood in battle.

content.cn: 而且，每次都有不少人想和我一起训练。虽然没有特意做约定，但总觉得不去打个招呼有些对不住他们。
content.en: Besides, there are always individuals hoping to join my training sessions. Even if we have no standing arrangement, I consider it a matter of courtesy to show up.

content.cn: 没想到竟然已经变成传统了。他们把你当成教官了吗？
content.en: Didn't expect this to become a thing. Are you like their instructor now?

content.cn: 光听你说都能感觉到大家的热情，有点感动。
content.en: I might cry a little. I can feel everyone's passion and dedication through your words.

content.cn: 管理员，我规划了自己接下来一段时间的训练计划，这是训练室申请单，请查收。
content.en: Endmin, I have drawn up my training schedule and attached the Training Cabin Application to this message. Please take a look when you have time.

content.cn: 是吗？我不太清楚，最初只是有人想找我搭档，做些对抗训练。
content.en: Perhaps? Initially, it was only a single request for a sparring session.

content.cn: 但大家好像都不太跟得上我的节奏，练到一半就得换人。所以我建议他们多带些伙伴。
content.en: Most found my pace difficult to match, necessitating frequent substitutions. I advised them to bring additional operators.

content.cn: 结果他们好像有点激动，下次就多了好几位干员。再后来，就变成了现在这样。
content.en: They did, and the numbers have only grown since.

content.cn: 总觉得哪里不太对，大家有什么奇怪的表现吗？
content.en: Sounds like it's turning into something else... Have they been acting strangely?

content.cn: 应该没有吧？他们还会很热心地帮忙制订训练计划，强度很高，连我都要认真对待。
content.en: Not that I'm aware of. They are still eager to help plan training sessions, with high intensity that even I have to take seriously.

content.cn: 就算他们累得站不起来，只要我还没停下，这些人就会喊着“终末地的面子”“尝尝我们的新战术”之类的话重新加入训练。
content.en: No matter how exhausted they are, as long as I have not ceased, they will call out phrases such as "We must do this for Endfield" or "Taste our new tactics" and resume training.

content.cn: 每次我给他们加油，大家就能克服极限，坚持一整天，这是很了不起的精神。
content.en: Each time I offer encouragement, they surpass their limits and sustain their efforts all day. Such admirable determination.

content.cn: ……余烬，给你一个建议。
content.en: Ember, I have some advice for you...

content.cn: 请指示。
content.en: Go on.

content.cn: 下次去训练室，只要用眼神鼓励他们就好。
content.en: Next time in the Training Cabin, just encourage them through eye contact.

content.cn: 我似乎看到了很夸张的数字……你每天都要做这么高强度的训练吗？
content.en: Your schedule looks intense... Do you train at this intensity every day?

content.cn: 很惭愧，每天不完成基础锻炼，实在很难平静下来。
content.en: I must confess, without completing my daily regimen, I find it hard to settle my mind.

content.cn: 还好管理训练室的干员很好说话，只是每次都需要走额外申请，还有填写报损单。
content.en: Thankfully, the operator overseeing the Training Cabin is rather understanding. That said, my every visit still involves a special request form ... and the inevitable damage report form.

content.cn: 报损单？每次？
content.en: Every visit? Damage report form?

content.cn: ……实在不好意思。
content.en: I'm truly sorry...

content.cn: 他们原本并不认识，为了求生在同一个洞窟躲避天使。我们找到人之前，两人已经互相照顾，坚持了好几天。
content.en: They were strangers prior to the incident. To evade the Aggeloi, they took refuge together in the same cavern. By the time we reached them, they had already been caring for one another for several days.

content.cn: 救人的时候，新娘就在念叨这事，没想到他们真的会邀请我。
content.en: The bride talked about inviting me when I rescued them. I did not think they would actually follow through.

content.cn: 新人感激拯救了自己的人，似乎没什么问题？
content.en: Those two are grateful to the person who saved them. No issues there, I'd say.

content.cn: 是的。我并不怀疑他们的动机。问题出在我自己身上。
content.en: Right. I do not question their intentions. The matter that concerns me lies with myself.

content.cn: 我不知道怎样才能得体地参加一场婚礼……衣着和礼节方面我可以请教大家，但挑选礼物让我很苦恼。
content.en: I am uncertain what gift would be appropriate for a wedding... While I could consult others on attire and etiquette, the matter of the gift remains difficult.

content.cn: 看来你是缺少这方面的经验。铁誓军里类似的情况应该不多见吧？
content.en: Not many weddings happen in the Order of Steel Oath, huh?

content.cn: 陷阵旗队里，大家经常一起执行九死一生的任务，很少有人想过这方面的事。
content.en: Correct. Such events are rare among the Assault Banner. However, we frequently undertake life-threatening missions together.

content.cn: 我在要塞旗队的战友那边见过几次前线婚礼，大家都在想办法凑些至少不扫兴的礼物。但其实没多少新人真的在意这个。
content.en: I have attended a handful of frontline weddings. My Banner comrades tried to prepare gifts that would not diminish the event, though few newlyweds truly cared.

content.cn: 余烬，这两天休息的时候你好像经常走神，有什么心事吗？
content.en: Ember, you've been zoning out a lot during your breaks lately. Something bothering you?

content.cn: 毕竟其中几次婚礼只有一方出席，另一方到场的则是长官或亲人。说实话，不知道应该先庆祝还是先哀悼。
content.en: Some weddings were attended by only one newlywed, the other, having passed, standing in only through their commander or family. It was difficult to know whether to celebrate or mourn first.

content.cn: 抱歉，话题好像有点太沉重了。
content.en: Sorry, I shouldn't have asked.

content.cn: 没关系。萨索堡主曾说，他们愿意带着另一半的名字继续战斗下去，这本身就是忠诚的证明。
content.en: It is alright. Castellan Zasso once said that those who fight in their partner's name demonstrate loyalty itself.

content.cn: 我见证过的这几次，应该能算好事吧？
content.en: Therefore I believe the few weddings I have witnessed can be considered positive events, can't they?

content.cn: 当然是好事，你见证了这样跨越生死的关系，没有什么约定能比这更加坚固。
content.en: Of course they can. You've witnessed a love that transcends life and death. No oath could be stronger than that.

content.cn: 他们分享了彼此的命运，这是人与人之间相当崇高的一种认可，不是吗？
content.en: In entrusting their fates to one another, they formed a bond of remarkable nobility.

content.cn: 是的。管理员，我好像知道该怎么做了。
content.en: Thank you, Endmin. I think I know what to gift those two.

content.cn: 对那两位新人来说，最值得纪念的，一定就是他们约定彼此分享命运的契机。
content.en: For them, the most memorable moment is surely when they vowed to share their fates.

content.cn: 连您都注意到了？我不会辩解，确实如此。
content.en: I will not deny it. You are right, my thoughts have wandered.

content.cn: 等等，你想送的该不会是……
content.en: Hold on, are you thinking of giving them...

content.cn: 约定彼此分享命运的契机？
content.en: Something that reminds them of the moment they vowed to share their fates?

content.cn: 等等，你想送的该不会是……
content.en: Hold on, are you thinking of giving them...

content.cn: 嗯，当时现场有只“提利索隆”差点就攻破了路障。虽然那一只已经被解决了，但这种天使并不少见。
content.en: Correct. During the rescue, a Thrylissoron nearly breached the defenses. That one was dealt with, though Aggeloi like it are not uncommon.

content.cn: 我这就去弄份差不多的残骸来，当作纪念品和礼物送去。
content.en: I will obtain a similar remnant as a gift for them.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_032">倒也不用这么努力……
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_032">You really don't have to go that far...

content.cn: 但请放心，我一定不会让杂念影响到任务。
content.en: But rest assured, I will not allow personal matters to interfere with my mission performance.

content.cn: 每个人都会有心事，这很正常。
content.en: Everyone carries concerns from time to time. It's completely natural.

content.cn: 很少见你会表现得这么明显，应该是很重要的事吧？
content.en: It's unusual to see you like this. Must be something significant.

content.cn: 如果你需要帮助，随时都可以找我商量。
content.en: If you need help, I'm always here.

content.cn: 多谢。其实，我收到了一封婚礼的邀请函，是我在一次行动中遇到的两个年轻人发来的。
content.en: Gratitude. The matter concerns a wedding invitation I received from two young individuals I encountered during a mission.

content.cn: 很遗憾，搜索还得继续下去。说实话，我也松了一口气。
content.en: No, the search must go on. Truthfully, I am relieved for the moment.

content.cn: 如果“高塔”又一次在北方出现，而我还没有完成自己的任务，也许我就会错过这一次宝贵的机会。
content.en: If High Tower returns to the north before my mission is complete, I risk missing a crucial opportunity.

content.cn: 管理员，我和“高塔”终将再有一次交锋。希望那个时候，您能允许我……重返前线。这绝不仅仅是私人恩怨。
content.en: Endmin, I will face High Tower again eventually. When that time comes, I hope you will allow me ... to return to the front lines. This is far beyond a personal vendetta.

content.cn: 这是你应该完成的复仇，我当然不会阻拦。
content.en: This is your vengeance to see through. I won't stop you.

content.cn: 我明白，如果有什么能帮到你的，我们都会想办法。
content.en: I completely understand. When that time comes, we'll help however we can.

content.cn: 但是，如果真到了那个时候，小心行事，千万不要被仇恨冲昏了头脑。
content.en: But act with caution. Don't let hatred cloud your judgment.

content.cn: 最初开始“远征”时，我确实满怀愤怒，渴望尽快返回前线，与它决一死战。
content.en: When I began my Crusade, I was driven by anger, desperate to return to the front and settle the score.

content.cn: 说来惭愧，那时候我甚至希望和它同归于尽。但是，和战友们的亲属接触过之后，我放弃了那种想法。
content.en: I was ready to take it down, even if it cost me my life. But after interacting with the families of my comrades, I abandoned that thought.

content.cn: 是件好事。当时发生了什么？
content.en: That's good. What happened?

content.cn: 余烬，我看到终末地收到了来自铁誓军的一些资料，是给你的吗？
content.en: Ember, Endfield received these from the Order of Steel Oath, are they for you?

content.cn: 有一位战友的父亲只收下了骨灰，将战友的武器还给了我。
content.en: When Zhao perished, his father only accepted the urn and gave his weapon back to me.

content.cn: 他说，赵最后能落叶归根就已经足够。他们不清楚儿子是为什么而牺牲的，赵的武器应该留给知道该向谁挥舞的人。
content.en: His father said it was enough that Zhao could finally rest. His family did not know why he had fallen, but they believed Zhao's weapon should be wielded only by someone who understands its purpose.

content.cn: 那时我才真正意识到，堡主选择将我保下，也许就是因为只有我清楚他们为胜利做了什么牺牲。
content.en: That was when I realized why the Castellan spared me: I could understand the sacrifices they made for victory.

content.cn: 如果连我也为复仇而死，很多人眼中，“灰楔”陷阵旗队当初就永远只是侥幸逃出了一人，但事实绝不止如此。
content.en: If I died taking vengeance, many would think that the only survivor of assault banner Gray Wedge escaped through the machination of luck. But that was not the case.

content.cn: 这个故事应该在那支“灰楔”手上结束。
content.en: That story should have ended with the old Gray Wedge.

content.cn: 的确，只有你能将那把武器用在它应有的复仇上。
content.en: Indeed. Only you can wield that weapon for the vengeance it was meant for.

content.cn: 毕竟，你知道为它付出生命的是怎样出色的一群人。
content.en: After all, you know how outstanding those who made the sacrifices were.

content.cn: 所以，我会好好珍惜现在的生命，而不是和那些战争机器一样，最后变成没有意义的数字。
content.en: Right. I will value the life I have now, rather than end up like those meaningless war machines.

content.cn: 虽然我还没能迈过心里那道坎，还不能征募新兵，但已经发生的，就该好好结束。
content.en: Though I have yet to overcome the mental barrier and cannot enlist new recruits, I believe what has occurred must be properly resolved.

content.cn: 是的。大文献馆收集到了一些全新的特殊天使个体样本，就送来和我确认了。
content.en: Yes. The Grand Archives collected samples of previously unknown Aggeloi and sent them for my confirmation.

content.cn: 既然你这么说，我就放心了。
content.en: That's reassuring to know.

content.cn: 不过，我们不会袖手旁观的。到时候，你尽可以找我们一起见证你的复仇。
content.en: When the time comes, you can count on us to witness your vengeance. We'll help however we can.

content.cn: 明白，感激不尽！
content.en: Understood. Gratitude!

content.cn: 确认？需要确认什么呢？
content.en: Confirmation?

content.cn: 人力资源事务部的干员应该和您提过，我现在的“远征”源自一场只能算惨胜的战斗。
content.en: Operators from the Human Resources Division might have told you this. My current Crusade stems from a battle that was only a bitter victory.

content.cn: 当时，代号“高塔”的天使撕碎了我们的锋线，让形势急转直下。我们小队几乎赌上了一切，这才争取到将其击退的机会。
content.en: The Aggelos codenamed "High Tower" tore through our front line and left us on the brink. My squad risked everything to push them back.

content.cn: 从那之后，“高塔”就不曾出现过了。铁誓军没有充足的对照样本，只能把资料交给我逐一辨认。
content.en: They have not returned since then. With limited references, the Order of Steel Oath relied on me to identify High Tower within the samples they had gathered.

content.cn: 看来那就是造成悲剧的始作俑者。这一批资料里有它吗？
content.en: So they are the ones behind that tragedy. Did you identify one in the samples sent by the Oathkeepers?

content.cn: 如果方便的话，请回复此条消息，确认我们在彼此终端页面上的连接状态。
content.en: If it's convenient, please reply to this message to confirm our connection status on each other's terminal interface.

content.cn: 作为“表征”，机器人会在面对尚不熟悉的对象时替我处理复杂的社交状况。
content.en: As a "Representative," the bot handles complex social situations for me when I'm dealing with people I'm not yet familiar with.

content.cn: 请原谅这样的沟通方式。
content.en: Please forgive this method of communication.

content.cn: 它会帮我处理很多问题，因为我每天需要回复的消息实在太多了。
content.en: It helps me handle a lot of issues, because I get way too many messages to reply to every day.

content.cn: 但我会保证最高优先级对象的需求。现在开始对话进程由我本人接管了。
content.en: But I guarantee I prioritize the highest-level contacts. I'm taking over the conversation myself now.

content.cn: 你好像不是赛希？
content.en: You don't seem like Xaihi?

content.cn: 啊，抱歉！！是我内置的聊天机器人……
content.en: Ah, sorry!! It was my built-in chat bot...

content.cn: 作为“表征”，机器人会在面对尚不熟悉的对象时替我处理复杂的社交状况。
content.en: As a "Representative," the bot handles complex social situations for me when I'm dealing with people I'm not yet familiar with.

content.cn: 请原谅这样的沟通方式。
content.en: Please forgive this method of communication.

content.cn: 它会帮我处理很多问题，因为我每天需要回复的消息实在太多了。
content.en: It helps me handle a lot of issues, because I get way too many messages to reply to every day.

content.cn: 但我会保证最高优先级对象的需求。现在开始对话进程由我本人接管了。
content.en: But I guarantee I prioritize the highest-level contacts. I'm taking over the conversation myself now.

content.cn: 这是来自赛希的请求。
content.en: This is a request from Xaihi.

content.cn: 你每天都需要跟很多人对话吗？
content.en: Do you have to talk to a lot of people every day?

content.cn: 嗯……在我们对话期间，我的后台进程一共自动回复了62条待处理消息。
content.en: Yeah... While we've been talking, my background processes have automatically replied to 62 pending messages.

content.cn: 好忙好忙好忙好忙
content.en: So busy so busy so busy so busy

content.cn: 总感觉在聊天时的赛希很活泼呢。
content.en: Somehow, you seem really lively when we're chatting, Xaihi.

content.cn: 打字也很快。
content.en: And you type really fast.

content.cn: 藏在屏幕后面，对我来说确实更为舒适。
content.en: Hiding behind the screen is definitely more comfortable for me.

content.cn: 总感觉还是因为恐惧社交的缘故……
content.en: I can't help but feel it's still because you're afraid of socializing...

content.cn: 才不是，如果所有人的交流都将理性置于首位，那么交流对我而言就是最擅长的事。
content.en: That's not it. If everyone put rationality first in their communication, then interacting would be the thing I'm best at.

content.cn: 所以，你不擅长应对大家的情绪吗？
content.en: So, you're not good at handling people's emotions?

content.cn: 很擅
content.en: I'm very g

content.cn: 很擅长的。
content.en: I'm very good at it.

content.cn: 真的吗？
content.en: Really?

content.cn: [赛希]已离线
content.en: [Xaihi] is OFFLINE

content.cn: [赛希]已上线
content.en: [Xaihi] is online

content.cn: 赛希暂时离线，我是您的Baker内置智能助手，向您问好。
content.en: Xaihi is temporarily offline. I am your Baker built-in smart assistant, greetings.

content.cn: 若您日后有任何关于电子设备的问题，都请随时向赛希发信，真知会为您找到解答。
content.en: If you ever have any questions about electronic devices in the future, please feel free to message Xaihi anytime. Veritas will find the answers for you.

content.cn: 这是什么意思？
content.en: What does this mean?

content.cn: 不要假装自己是机器人啊。
content.en: Stop pretending to be a bot.

content.cn: 为什么您会立刻就发现……
content.en: How did you figure so fast...

content.cn: 因为你立马就承认了？
content.en: Because you admitted right away?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_031">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_031">

content.cn: 也许我还是需要请真正的聊天机器人出场……
content.en: Maybe I still need to let the actual chat bot handle this...

content.cn: 就不会有刚才这样不专业的交流发生了……
content.en: ... then an unprofessional exchange like the one we just had wouldn't have happened.

content.cn: 抱歉，是我的问题。聊天机器人，能否转告赛希干员，有时候不准确的表达才是人的可爱之处呢？
content.en: Sorry, that's on me. Hey chat bot, could you tell Operator Xaihi that sometimes it's the imperfect way we express things that makes us endearing?

content.cn: [赛希]输入中
content.en: [Xaihi] is typing...

content.cn: [赛希]停止输入
content.en: [Xaihi] has stopped typing

content.cn: 赛希已经收到了您的消息，将在短时间后回复，请稍事等待。
content.en: Xaihi has received your message and will reply shortly. Please wait a moment.

content.cn: [赛希]输入中
content.en: [Xaihi] is typing...

content.cn: 赛希已收到您的观点，正在评估可行性，请耐心等待后续报告。
content.en: Xaihi has received your viewpoint and is currently assessing its feasibility. Please wait patiently for a follow-up report.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 感谢真知，从此往后，我们便能随时在这终端的方寸之间找到彼此了。
content.en: Thanks to the Veritas, from now on we can find each other anytime within this small terminal space.

content.cn: 是赛希本人吗……？
content.en: Is this Xaihi herself...?

content.cn: 啊，抱歉！！是我内置的聊天机器人……
content.en: Ah, sorry!! It was my built-in chat bot...

content.cn: 管理员，您今天脑海中所涌现的第一个知识是什么？
content.en: Endmin, what was the first piece of knowledge that popped into your head today?

content.cn: 我管它叫作“塔罗斯眨眼”。我常常在想，那是否蕴藏着隐秘的启示。
content.en: I call it "Talos' blink." I often wonder if it holds some hidden revelation.

content.cn: 陈告诉我，塞梦珂上售卖的甜面包只要5金票。
content.en: Chen told me the sweet bread sold on Simonch only costs 5 T-Creds.

content.cn: 这么便宜吗？在修道院都要卖20金票呢……
content.en: It's that cheap? They sell it for 20 at the monastery...

content.cn: 虽然院长姆姆从来不让我们花钱买。
content.en: Although Abbess Mumu never lets us spend money on it.

content.cn: 塞什卡悬空城由巨兽的骸骨托举在空中。
content.en: The Seš'qa floating city is held aloft by the skeleton of a Feranmut.

content.cn: 这算是塔卫二萨卡兹们的常识了。
content.en: That's considered common knowledge for the Sarkaz on Talos-II.

content.cn: 我也常想着有朝一日可以实地造访一下那里。
content.en: I often think about visiting there in person someday.

content.cn: 我刚才向您发起提问，正是寂语修会的修士们，确认彼此是否安泰的一种传统。
content.en: When I asked you that question earlier, it was actually a tradition among the Brothers of the Cabal of Tranquility to check on each other's well-being.

content.cn: 当我们了解了对方心中涌出的知识，便能看到他们前方的路。
content.en: When we understand the knowledge that surfaces in someone's mind, we can see the path ahead of them.

content.cn: 所以……你看清了我前方的路吗？
content.en: So did you ... have a clear sight of what's ahead for me?

content.cn: 说实话，我……看不清。
content.en: To be honest, I ... can't see it clearly.

content.cn: 这也是我对您最好奇的一点。您是我遇见的第一个解不通的谜题。
content.en: That's also what makes me most curious about you. You're the first puzzle I've encountered that I can't solve.

content.cn: 请原谅，我怀着最大的敬意和诚恳向您说……我从未碰到过不能解出的谜题。
content.en: Please forgive me for saying this with the utmost respect and sincerity... I've never come across a puzzle I couldn't solve.

content.cn: 在我的眼中，万物都以逻辑和语言组成，就像一张巨大的针织的网。
content.en: In my eyes, everything is made of logic and language, like a giant knitted web.

content.cn: 除非，您在绳结中心……又或者，在绳结之外。
content.en: Unless you're at the very center of the knot ... or maybe, outside of it entirely.

content.cn: 我不该向您吐露这么多，打扰了，抱歉。
content.en: I shouldn't have told you all that. Sorry for bothering you.

content.cn: 那赛希今天的第一个知识，是什么？
content.en: Then what was the first piece of knowledge for Xaihi today?

content.cn: 我在帝江号上的工作主机一般需要一周时间才能通过总后勤办事处的采购流程换上新的组件……
content.en: It usually takes about a week for my work terminal on Dijiang to get new components through the CLO's procurement process...

content.cn: 现在是聊天机器人发消息，还是赛希本人？
content.en: Am I talking to the chat bot or Xaihi?

content.cn: 我在思考怎么通过重写系统结构提速这个过程。
content.en: I'm thinking about how to speed up the process by rewriting the system architecture.

content.cn: 好朴实的知识。
content.en: Such a simple but practical piece of knowledge.

content.cn: 一点也不！
content.en: Not at all!

content.cn: 不如，下次尝试着说“你好吗”就好。
content.en: How about next time, just try saying "How are you?"

content.cn: 抱歉，是我总是聚焦于应然的知识，而忽略了我们最朴素的习惯……
content.en: Sorry, I always focus on what knowledge should be and overlook our simplest habits...

content.cn: 只是想看到赛希因为事情过于简单直白反而手忙脚乱的样子……
content.en: I just wanted to see Xaihi get all flustered because things were too simple and straightforward...

content.cn: 您的需求对我来说太复杂了！
content.en: Your request is way too complicated for me!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_030">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_030">

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 是赛希啦……
content.en: It's Xaihi...

content.cn: 您还没有回答我的问题……
content.en: You still haven't answered my question...

content.cn: 在帝江号上可以看到塔罗斯的紫闪，五到十天会出现一次。
content.en: You can see the purple flash from Talos on Dijiang, it happens every five to ten days.

content.cn: 原来您也喜欢它……
content.en: So you like it too...

content.cn: 一段主机工作的白噪音
content.en: A segment of terminal white noise

content.cn: 我尝试绕过服务器将这段聊天记录删除，但是……
content.en: I tried to bypass the server to delete this chat log, but...

content.cn: 这样不太合适……
content.en: That's probably not appropriate...

content.cn: 我什么也没听到！我保证。
content.en: I didn't hear anything! I promise.

content.cn: 太好了，看来我的祈祷词也没有被听到……
content.en: Great, it seems my prayer wasn't heard either...

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 其实，我一直将这种嗡鸣视为对我在帝江号所作工作的祝福。
content.en: Actually, I've always considered that humming a blessing for the work I do on Dijiang.

content.cn: 祝福？
content.en: A blessing?

content.cn: 那些……“在运行中”的正常感，能够舒缓神经，让我非常安心。
content.en: That sense of things ... "running normally" is really soothing. It puts my mind at ease.

content.cn: 另一段主机工作的白噪音
content.en: Another segment of terminal white noise

content.cn: 好像水分子构成的海洋，不是吗？
content.en: It's like an ocean made of water molecules, isn't it?

content.cn: 我们在缓缓地往下沉，光洒在洋面上，细小的泡沫从我们的手指间浮起，流过。那种温暖……
content.en: As we slowly sink ... light spills across the ocean's surface, tiny bubbles floating up between our fingers, drifting past. That warmth...

content.cn: 所以，若是您也能共享到微茫的嗡鸣中的祝福，就是一件很好的事了。
content.en: So, if you could also share in the faint blessing within that hum, it would be a very good thing.

content.cn: 赛希也会有这么多愁善感的时候吗？
content.en: Does Xaihi also have such sentimental moments?

content.cn: 我只是常年待在这个舱室里，通过舱外影像，观察塔卫二的液态海……
content.en: It's just... I stay in this cabin all year, watching Talos-II's liquid ocean through the external feed...

content.cn: 在真知和嗡鸣的间隙，那些关于海的幻想总是会涌到我的眼前。
content.en: In the gaps between true knowledge and the humming, those fantasies about the ocean always flood upon my eyes.

content.cn: 让人平静。
content.en: It's so calming.

content.cn: 你一直待在里面，不出来走走吗？
content.en: Do you just stay in there all the time, without ever coming out?

content.cn: 实际上，我在这里反而能看到更多的东西呢。
content.en: Actually, I get to see a lot more from in here.

content.cn: 整个世界……由源石构成的历史，和它们可能的未来，都呈现在我的眼前。
content.en: The entire world ... the history built from Originium, and all its possible futures, are all laid out before my eyes.

content.cn: 只是……
content.en: But...

content.cn: 作为寂语修会的一员，探寻真知，援助迷途之人，似乎要耗尽我的一生，但我从来没有放弃这样的决心。
content.en: As a member of the Cabal of Tranquility, seeking Veritas and aiding those who are lost seems like it will take my entire life, but I've never given up on that resolve.

content.cn: 您能理解吗，管理员？
content.en: I'm not sure if you would understand, Endmin.

content.cn: 能。
content.en: I do.

content.cn: 果然呢。
content.en: I knew it.

content.cn: 我找到了一个和您有关的答案。
content.en: I found an answer related to you.

content.cn: 当我在帝江号的服务器中找到那些残片时，我常想……
content.en: When I find those fragments in Dijiang's servers, I often wonder...

content.cn: 到底是什么人才会挑战那些必然性中的可能，哪怕耗尽生命也在所不辞。
content.en: Just what kind of person would challenge the possibilities within inevitability, even if it costs them their life.

content.cn: 您不会觉得……孤独吗？
content.en: Don't you ever feel ... lonely?

content.cn: 也许我们都会从白噪音里获得陪伴。
content.en: Maybe we all find some companionship in the white noise.

content.cn: 但是有机会还是多出来走走吧。
content.en: But you should still try to come out more when you get the chance.

content.cn: 能和您一起吗？
content.en: Can I go with you?

content.cn: 我？
content.en: Me?

content.cn: 想看看塔卫二的那片海——
content.en: I want to see that ocean on Talos-II...

content.cn: 抱歉我说了很不符合逻辑的话！
content.en: Sorry, that was such an illogical thing for me to say!
...Sorry!!

content.cn: 果然还是需要请聊天机器人出场……
content.en: I really do need to let the chat bot handle this after all...

content.cn: 没问题。
content.en: Of course.

content.cn: 真的吗？
content.en: Really?

content.cn: 我有好多问题想要请教您。
content.en: I have so many questions for you.

content.cn: 比如协议源石的信息传递效率和内容完整性，又比如……
content.en: For example, the information transfer efficiency and content integrity of Protocol-Originium, and also...

content.cn: 我可能只会回答你早饭吃了什么以及晚饭要吃什么。
content.en: I'd probably only be able to tell you what I had for breakfast and what I'm having for dinner.

content.cn: 那就从这个问题开始吧。
content.en: Let's start there then.

content.cn: 我的手不小心撑在语音输入键上了
content.en: I accidentally pressed my hand against the voice input key

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 管理员……您好……您没有听到奇怪的声音吧？
content.en: Greetings... Endmin ... you didn't hear anything strange, did you?

content.cn: [赛希]已离线
content.en: [Xaihi] is OFFLINE

content.cn: [赛希]已上线
content.en: [Xaihi] is online

content.cn: 窗外天气真好，云就像小卡特斯一样跑来跑去。开拓区没有乌烟瘴气，星星都多了不少啊。
content.en: Hmm, pretty gorgeous out today! Clouds r darting around like little Cautuses. Now that the air's clear in the frontier, ya can actually see the stars proper!

content.cn: 年轻真好。我好久都没有给人写信的冲动了呢……
content.en: Ah, youth. Haven't felt the urge to scribble a letter to someone in years...

content.cn: 你不是正在写吗？
content.en: Aren't you doing that now?

content.cn: 哎？管理员？
content.en: Huh? Endmin?

content.cn: 我以为我在写一句话日记呢。
content.en: Thought this was my private journal...

content.cn: 啊呀，好像弄错了哦。
content.en: Whoops...

content.cn: 别骗我……你明明是故意的吧。
content.en: You did that on purpose, didn't you?

content.cn: 我是……故意的吗？管理员的头像很容易弄混呢！
content.en: Did I? Maybe. Ur dp's way too easy to tap on tho.

content.cn: 很抱歉，我只是在记录我的日常生活。
content.en: Sorry... I was just scribbling bits of my day.

content.cn: 新消息
content.en: New Message

content.cn: 还是说，你希望是我故意发错的？
content.en: Or ... maybe u were hoping I sent them on purpose?

content.cn: 我可没有许愿这种事……
content.en: I didn't wish for that...

content.cn: 可惜，我可以满足你的愿望哦。
content.en: Shame. Coulda made that wish come true for ya.

content.cn: 不过，能了解你的生活，也是好事。
content.en: Well, it's good to know more about you.

content.cn: 咦？你在关心我吗？
content.en: Oh, looks like someone actually cares abt me :P

content.cn: 也是，你本来就会关心每一个人……
content.en: Come to think of it, u prob care for everyone...

content.cn: 如果不把自己挤进你的眼睛里来，就很容易和其他人一样了呢。
content.en: Gotta stand out somehow, or I'll just blend in with everyone else.

content.cn: 所以，你还想听听别的事情吗？
content.en: So, wanna hear more?

content.cn: 今天的指甲油颜色还蛮好看的呢。新的指甲，敲在武器上，会有叮叮当当的声音。
content.en: Reckon this nail polish came up a treat. Love dat little clink-clank noises when my nails tap on my weapon.

content.cn: 当然，我很好奇，那天，你遇到野兽了吗？
content.en: Of course. Did you run into any beasts that night?

content.cn: 下次再告诉你。
content.en: Ah, that's a story for nxt time.

content.cn: 一次，只能说出一个秘密。
content.en: One secret at a time. I've gotta keep u curious, don't I?

content.cn: 这种声音，我一直觉得很迷人哦，就像是……美丽和暴力合二为一的感觉。
content.en: I've always found that sound kinda addictive ... like beauty and violence mashed together.

content.cn: 新消息
content.en: New Message

content.cn: 今天把车开到公路边上的废旧棚屋边过夜。如果荒原上的大风没有吹得太厉害，就只需要提防那些野兽了。
content.en: Pulled up nxt to an old shed by the highway to crash for the night. If the wind doesn't go nuts, all I've gotta worry abt r the beasts.

content.cn: 点起火的话，它们就不会靠近了。希望它们认识火光，否则，就要丢掉性命了呢。
content.en: Even if they come near me, I'll just light a fire, and they'll bugger off. Hope they've got the sense to recognise it ... or else it won't end well for 'em.

content.cn: 新消息
content.en: New Message

content.cn: 在驿站碰到洁尔佩塔，她急匆匆地走出去了，不知道要去做什么呢……给心上人写信吗？
content.en: Bumped into Gilberta in the mail depot. She was in a hurry. Wonder what's got her all fired up... Writing to some fella she fancies?

content.cn: 我今天就要从帝江号上搬走啦。
content.en: I'm moving out of Dijiang today.

content.cn: 但我还是会常常回来办事的，别太想我呀。
content.en: Don't worry tho, I'll swing by for work stuff. Don't go missing me too much, eh?

content.cn: 搬家，需要帮手吗？
content.en: Need a hand with the move?

content.cn: 唉，管理员……
content.en: Sigh, Endmin...

content.cn: 我都不知道你说这句话……
content.en: What u jst said...

content.cn: 到底是让我开心还是伤心。
content.en: Not sure if tht makes me wanna smile or cry...

content.cn: 但我觉得，你肯定是为了关心我吧。
content.en: But yeah... I reckon you mean well.

content.cn: 麻烦倒不麻烦，我已经整理好了。反正，帝江号的宿舍里，能放的东西也不多……
content.en: Thanks, mate. Everything's packed already. Didn't have much in that tiny room anyway.

content.cn: 带不走的，我都送给其他小朋友了。
content.en: Gave the stuff I couldn't take to the others.

content.cn: 见不到我，你会想我吗，管理员？
content.en: Gonna miss seeing me around, Endmin?

content.cn: 那你的烦恼……是什么？
content.en: Then what's bugging you?

content.cn: 烦恼……就算在外面居无定所，漂泊了十年，搬了好多次家……
content.en: Hmm... Honestly, even after ten years of bouncing around, never staying put...

content.cn: 但每次离开，都会有一点点难过呢。
content.en: Still gets me a bit every time I move.

content.cn: 原来你经常搬家啊。
content.en: So you move a lot.

content.cn: 倒不如说是我自己选的这种生活。
content.en: More like I chose this way of living.

content.cn: 谁能想到呢？我一个来自于庞大家族的人，竟然会选择漂泊。
content.en: Wild, eh? Someone from a proper big family ... choosing a wandering life.

content.cn: 想知道原因吗？
content.en: Care to knw y?

content.cn: 你总是说，等到下次再告诉我。
content.en: Do I have to wait until next time to hear everything again?

content.cn: 哦？这次就奖励你一下吧。
content.en: Nah. I'll cut ya a break this time.

content.cn: “离开”这个动作是有惯性的——只有零次和无数次。渐渐地，你就开始习惯了在路上的日子。
content.en: Leaving ... it's like a habit. Once u start, it sticks. You get used to life on the move.

content.cn: 但永远旅行的人，有一个要领……
content.en: But if u're gonna be forever travelling, there's one thing you gotta remember...

content.cn: 就是记得给自己找到一个家，哪怕是临时的，哪怕很少有机会能回去——
content.en: Find urself a home. Even if it's temp. Even if u're hardly ever there.

content.cn: 认真对待家的人，是不会迷失方向的哦。
content.en: Ppl who respect the idea of "home" won't ever lose their way.

content.cn: 管理员，你的家在哪里？
content.en: Endmin, where do you consider home?

content.cn: 也许就在……
content.en: Maybe it's...

content.cn: 嘘，先别告诉我，留到下一次吧。
content.en: Shhh, save it. Tell me nxt time.

content.cn: 没有想要说的话，就没有下一封信了，是不是？
content.en: Gotta save sth to tlk abt later, don't we?

content.cn: 搬走？去哪里？
content.en: Moving out? Where to?

content.cn: 呀！今天回复我的速度很快呢。
content.en: Oi, that was a quick reply!

content.cn: 管理员知道的吧，帝江号的宿舍区，可不是供你可爱的干员们长住的哦。
content.en: U know how it is. Dorms on Dijiang aren't meant for us operators to settle in foreva.

content.cn: 寸土寸金的地方，是留给那些重任在身的干员的。
content.en: Fancy spots like this r for the big players with bigger jobs.

content.cn: 况且，我们总要在地上跑来跑去，还是到地面的办事处比较好。
content.en: Besides, I'm always out and abt dirtside anyway. Makes sense to bunk at a surface office.

content.cn: 只是又要搬家了呢……好烦恼。
content.en: Ugh, but moving is painful indeed.

content.cn: 不高兴了吗？怎么不回我？
content.en: R u upset? How come u're not replying T_T

content.cn: 如果遇到了什么麻烦，可以向我们求助。
content.en: If you're in some kind of trouble ... you can always ask us for help.

content.cn: 像模像样的呢，管理员。
content.en: Aww, sounding all official now, r we?

content.cn: 明明心里很担心我才是。
content.en: Pretty sure u're just worried about me.

content.cn: 放心，我能应付。你去忙那些更厉害的事就好。
content.en: Don't worry, I can handle myself. U focus on the big stuff!

content.cn: 你呢，去忙什么了？
content.en: What about you? What have you been up to?

content.cn: 我……有时候会需要躲避一些人哦。
content.en: Me? Sometimes I gotta lay low from certain ppl.

content.cn: 像我这样的人，敌人和朋友都不少。
content.en: Someone like me's got no shortage of friends or enemies.

content.cn: 艾维文娜？
content.en: Avywenna?

content.cn: 你都有什么“光荣事迹”？
content.en: What kind of "glorious deeds" have you even done?

content.cn: 交换过去？还是说，睡前故事？不管怎样，都是好亲密的行为呢。
content.en: Oh, we swapping past stories now, eh? Or u wanna hear a bedtime tale? Either way ... tht's getting pretty cozy, Endmin.

content.cn: 在三十六层楼里两百个安保人员的眼皮底下，偷走了一份原本应该被销毁的文件……
content.en: How abt this: I once swiped a file that was supposed to be destroyed. Right under the noses of 200 security blokes across 36 floors.

content.cn: 从窗户跳出去之后毫发无损，最后引发了行业地震算不算呢？
content.en: Jumped out a window and walked away without a scratch. Caused a right mess in the industry... U like my story?

content.cn: 如果这只是一个俗套又日常的故事的话……
content.en: Or if tht's too cliché... I can share more.

content.cn: 三天之内，从耶尔什的最高峰，把一颗心脏完好无损地运送到合金萝卜城的最深处，救活了一个卡特斯矿工。
content.en: I once delivered a heart, in perfect condition, from the peak of Kjersch to the depths of Alloycarrot in 3 days. Saved a Cautus miner's life.

content.cn: 两个月后，他终结了艾什柏环岛地下拳庄冠军最长的连胜记录，让所有下注人狠狠地亏了一大笔钱……这样呢？
content.en: 2 months later, tht same miner ended the longest win streak in Asphalt Roundabout's underground fight ring. He made every bettor lose a fortune... U like this story better?

content.cn: 还是说……
content.en: Oh, I got one more for ya!

content.cn: 在玛尔斯波利斯那个全工团直播的授勋仪式开始前一秒——
content.en: Right before a live-broadcast medal ceremony in Morospolis...

content.cn: 把工团一周前失窃的旗帜塞到他们部长手中，让它免于被一群不明真相的萨卡兹佣兵扔进火山口里……
content.en: I slipped the stolen UWST flag back into their minister's hands ... right before some clueless Sarkaz mercs could chuck it into a volcano.

content.cn: 我现在知道你为什么要躲起来了。
content.en: Now I get why you're laying low.

content.cn: 就知道你会想我啦，管理员。
content.en: Knw u'd miss me, Endmin.

content.cn: 好啦，我听到他们的脚步声了。不能再用通信终端咯！
content.en: Alright, I hear footsteps. Gotta ditch the comms!

content.cn: 等我下次回到帝江号，再给你讲新故事。
content.en: Next time I'm back on Dijiang, I'll tell ya another story.

content.cn: 要一直这么可爱哦。
content.en: Stay cute, alright?

content.cn: 收到消息了吗？
content.en: Are you getting my message?

content.cn: 啊呀，管理员，不好意思。
content.en: Oops, hey Endmin. Sorry abt tht.

content.cn: 最近有一点忙呢。
content.en: Been a bit flat out lately.

content.cn: 抱歉啦，怠慢你了吗？
content.en: Hope I didn't make ya feel neglected :p

content.cn: 我没有忘记给你带小礼物哦。虽然，我知道那个地方你去过了。
content.en: Didn't forget ur souvenir tho. Even I knw u've already been there.

content.cn: 要给你准备惊喜可不容易，看在这个分上，原谅我吧。
content.en: Wasn't so easy to find u a surprise, y'know? Soooo, plz don't be mad for replying late, alright?

content.cn: 管理员，帮我出出主意吧。
content.en: Endminnnn, I need your advice.

content.cn: 我觉得两种都很好看啊，为什么只能选一种呢……
content.en: TBH, I like them both. Why can't they just release both!!!

content.cn: 也许是种营销手段？听说甚至有企业推出过商品二选一永久下架的方案……
content.en: Maybe it's some kind of marketing trick. I've even seen "pick one, the other gets taken off forever"...

content.cn: 真是可惜了这么好的设计……嗯，要不我来自己做一件吧！
content.en: That's such a waste of great designs... Perhaps I should just make one myself!

content.cn: 虽然完全复刻杂志上的例图有点困难……不过，我还有些新想法想尝试一下。
content.en: It's hard to perfectly recreate the design from the magazine... I don't think I can get it 100% right, but I've got some new ideas I wanna try anyway.

content.cn: 洁尔佩塔还会制作礼服？
content.en: Oh, I didn't know you could make gowns.

content.cn: 我只会一些简单的设计，礼服还是第一次尝试。
content.en: Yup yup. I'm only good with simple designs, so making a gown's a first for me.

content.cn: 所以有点担心能不能做好，如果搞砸了，管理员就忘记这件事吧！
content.en: If I end up messing it up... Let's pretend we never had this convo!

content.cn: 有什么是我能帮上忙的吗？
content.en: Anything I can help with?

content.cn: 红色的礼服和蓝色的礼服，你觉得哪一件更好看呢？
content.en: Got 2 gowns, red and blue. Which one do you like more >.<

content.cn: 准备工作还要很久呢。不过，我想收集管理员的一些意见！
content.en: I still need a bit of prep time, but I wanna hear your ideas first!

content.cn: 像一些点缀用的装饰是否合适，颜色要怎么搭配……我觉得管理员的看法很值得参考。
content.en: Do you think little decorative touches would make the gown prettier? And what colors should I pick? Ahhh, plz enlighten me!

content.cn: 等我把礼服做好，会给管理员也看看的！
content.en: Maybe I'll be creative and let my ideas run wild! Alright, I'll show you when it's done!

content.cn: 好，我很期待！
content.en: Great! I can't wait to see it!

content.cn: 洁尔佩塔的话，还是更适合红色。
content.en: I'd say the red one suits you more.

content.cn: 嘿嘿……
content.en: UwU

content.cn: 蓝色看起来更好。
content.en: I like the blue one.

content.cn: 多尝试一些风格倒也不错。
content.en: Hmm, trying out something new isn't a bad idea.

content.cn: 我记下管理员的选择了，不过这次不是替我选啦。
content.en: I'll mark your choice, heh. But it's not abt picking for me this time.

content.cn: 这是一个时尚品牌的杂志调研，选票最高的一方将会在下个季度推出商品版。
content.en: It's actually for a fashion magazine survey. Whichever design gets the most votes will be released next season.

content.cn: 我回来啦，管理员……早上遇到了一些令人为难的事……好在已经顺利解决了！
content.en: Endmin, guess who's back! Okay, so sth tricky happened this morning... But dw! I got everything solved ;)

content.cn: 结果变成……我需要替双方编一些借口，既不惹人生气，也可以掩盖真相。
content.en: So... I had to make up excuses for both sides that wouldn't upset anyone while keeping the truth hidden.

content.cn: 这确实是件难办的事……
content.en: That really does sound tricky...

content.cn: 我们三个人瞎忙活了好久，最终还是暴露了。两个人又气又笑，不过都原谅了对方。
content.en: Yeah! And guess what? We scrambled around for a loooong time but they both found out about the surprise. Then they jst laughed real hard and forgave each other.

content.cn: 他们都很为对方着想呢，结局好就是最好的！虽然耽搁了很久，但我觉得这些时间也没有浪费。
content.en: It's really nice that they tried so hard. Even though it took forever, the time wasn't wasted. You can tell they rlly care about each other. True love wins <3

content.cn: 洁尔佩塔总是心系他人，每次看你送信回来，就能知道是遇到了好事还是坏事。
content.en: You've got such a kind heart. Every time you come back from delivering letters, I can tell whether you ran into something good or bad.

content.cn: 因为……总有很多事情让人放不下心嘛。
content.en: That's cuz ... there are always so many things that make you worry.

content.cn: 如果收信人的心情是好的，我也会感觉很开心，如果收件人流露出悲伤的情绪，我也会觉得难过。
content.en: If they smile when they get the letter, I feel it too. But if they look sad, my mood sinks right along with theirs.

content.cn: 我真心希望每一个从我手中接到信件的人，都能获得幸福……
content.en: I jst wish every letter I deliver brings a little happiness...

content.cn: 伴手礼我没有忘记哦，等一下拿给管理员。
content.en: Oh, and I got you a little something. I'll give it to you in a sec.

content.cn: 好在结局是好的，洁尔佩塔回来时的表情就说明了一切。
content.en: A good ending is the best ending! I could tell nothing bad had happened from your expression.

content.cn: 是吗？嘿嘿……
content.en: Rlly? Hehe...

content.cn: 不过，也不是每一次都是好的结局……
content.en: But, well ... not every ending is happy...

content.cn: 但这就是信使的工作，很多时候，我都只能扮演一个旁观者。
content.en: A lot of the time, all I can do is stand by and watch. That's what being a Messenger is like.

content.cn: 话说回来……我真的会把心情都写在脸上吗？
content.en: Come to think of it ... do I rlly wear my feelings on my face?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_038">好像是的。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_038">Uh-huh.
Oh...

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 还有很多判断方法，比如洁尔佩塔多点了很多甜食，可能就是遇到了烦心事？
content.en: There are other ways to tell. For example, you get extra desserts when you're upset.

content.cn: 那个是……呜……碰到难受的事，就会让人想吃东西嘛……
content.en: Well... T_T Desserts are a great pick-me-up...

content.cn: 我以后要努力，多注意表情管理！
content.en: Gotta manage my expressions better from now on!

content.cn: 我觉得这并不是一种缺点，不需要为此做出改变。
content.en: It's not sth you have to fix. You are great the way you are.

content.cn: 以后遇到各种各样的事，也可以像今天这样，和我聊一聊？
content.en: Just be yourself. If anything comes up and you want to talk, come to me, just like today.

content.cn: 现在这样才是我们熟悉的洁尔佩塔。
