content.en: After all, we all value the Gilberta we know now.

content.cn: 以后遇到各种各样的事，也可以像今天这样，来和我聊一聊的。
content.en: Just be yourself. If anything comes up and you want to talk, come to me, just like today.

content.cn: 那……我可能会经常打扰管理员了。
content.en: Oh... I might end up bothering you a lot, Endmin ;)

content.cn: 这可是管理员自己说的，不要觉得我吵哦。
content.en: But hey, it's you who said it, so don't call me annoying if I talk too much.

content.cn: 发生什么事了，会让洁尔佩塔也左右为难？
content.en: What happened that even you found tricky?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_016">尽管来吧。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_016">I promise I won't.

content.cn: 其实是送信时遇到的事情。
content.en: So I was delivering letters...

content.cn: 我遇到了一对正在吵架的老人，他们拉着我不让走，非要让我评评理。
content.en: I ran into an elderly couple who were arguing. They wouldn't let me go unless I told him who was right.

content.cn: 他们都责备对方弄丢了结婚时的纪念品，你一句我一句，从早上吵到了下午！
content.en: They were blaming each other for losing their wedding keepsakes. They fought on and on, from morning to the afternoon!

content.cn: 直到他们吵不动了，我才有机会询问原委。
content.en: Then they got tired so I finally had the chance to ask what rlly happened.

content.cn: 原来，他们各自把纪念品卖掉了，偷偷准备了结婚五十周年的新礼物。
content.en: Turns out, they had each secretly sold their keepsakes to prepare new gifts for their 50th anniversary.

content.cn: 管理员，你看过蓝色的雨吗？
content.en: Endmin, have you ever seen blue rain?

content.cn: 那种时候，就会感觉时间像是静止了一样。
content.en: That's how I "pause" time.

content.cn: 只有远处的雨声会提醒你一切仍在照旧。
content.en: The only hint that the world keeps moving is the sound of rain far away.

content.cn: 为什么突然提到这个？
content.en: Why bring this up?

content.cn: 这个嘛……天气是信使的朋友，也是信使的敌人。旅途中总会遇到各种各样神奇但美丽的景象。
content.en: Well... weather's a Messenger's frenemy. On the road, you see all sorts of magical and pretty stuff.

content.cn: 不管我怎么努力，也无法停住全部的雨，那些景色稍纵即逝，只能在记忆里定格。
content.en: No matter how hard I try, I can't stop all the rain. Those scenes vanish in a flash and can only be captured in my memory.

content.cn: 但，至少我可以停住身边的雨，所以……我和管理员一起分享这些体验，当雨过天晴的时候，世界就会变成另外一幅样子。
content.en: Since I can pause the rain around me, I wanted to share that special scene with you ... even just through words. Have you seen the world after the rain? It's like stepping into a brand-new world.

content.cn: 我也想看看悬停的雨。
content.en: I'd love to see raindrops floating in the air.

content.cn: 嗯，我们可以在停滞的雨中漫步，看着雪片凝结的瞬间。
content.en: Sure. We can stroll through the paused rain ... or maybe just sit and watch snowflakes form.

content.cn: 看起来像是水晶。当蓝色水滴悬停在空中，就像梦境一样。
content.en: The raindrops are like tiny sparkling crystals! When they float in the air, it's like stepping into a dream.

content.cn: 管理员，只要和我一起，我们就可以去任何地方！
content.en: We can go wherever you want, Endmin!

content.cn: 我想通过传递信件，把那些容易丢掉的，容易遗忘的点点滴滴，统统刻印在脑海里。
content.en: Through delivering letters, I wanna keep all those tiny, easily forgotten moments in memory.

content.cn: 这也是我，仍想成为一名信使的理由！
content.en: Hehe, that's also the reason I wanted to be a Messenger!

content.cn: 我也是那些瞬间的一部分吗？
content.en: Am I a part of those moments too?

content.cn: 管理员的话……嘿嘿，稍微还有点不一样。
content.en: Hehe, yes and no. You're different.

content.cn: 我希望每一个瞬间里，都能有着管理员的身影。
content.en: I just want you to be in all of my moments.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_032">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_032">

content.cn: 不……我的意思是……我们可以去很多地方，嗯！可以一起去很多有意思的地方！
content.en: Nooo, I mean ... there are sooo many places we can go! So many fun things to do!

content.cn: 对，还有很多好玩的事呢，哈哈。一时间都不知道从哪儿说起才好呢。
content.en: That's right, there are way toooo many. I don't even know where to start. Haha!

content.cn: 总之，我们约好了！管理员，等我的消息哦！
content.en: Anyway, I take this as a promise! Wait for my msg, Endmin!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_002">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_002">

content.cn: 蓝色的雨？
content.en: Blue rain?

content.cn: 嗯，是一种罕见的现象，有时候会在暴雨和雷鸣之后看到。
content.en: Yeah, it's rare. Sometimes it appears after heavy rain and thunder.

content.cn: 不过，这些雨虽然好看，却会对农作物带来不好的影响……它们有时候来自植物的碎屑，有时候来自污染物……
content.en: But even though it looks beautiful, it can actually be bad for crops... Sometimes it comes from plant debris, sometimes from pollutants...

content.cn: 有时候也会因为风，将雨云吹到很远的地方。
content.en: And sometimes the wind blows the rain clouds far away.

content.cn: 悬停……是因为你的法术吗？
content.en: Float in the air... Did you do that with your Arts?

content.cn: 嗯，只要稍微控制一下周围的重力，就能让雨水停在空中。
content.en: Mmhmm. Just a little control over the gravity around me, and the raindrops can float in the air. Simple.

content.cn: 管理员，最近你要是有空的话……能邀请你参加这次的救援演练吗？
content.en: Endmin... If it's not too much trouble, could you participate in the drill?

content.cn: 总共分三个项目，分别是“当管理员突然晕倒了该怎么办”“如何救出被困在侵蚀雪暴里的管理员”“怎样在野外帮饥饿的管理员找到食物”。
content.en: We've broken it down into three key drills: "What to do when the Endministrator collapses", "rescue techniques for Endministrator trapped in a Blighted snowstorm", and "securing rations for a starving Endministrator".

content.cn: 其中第一个项目是必须完成的，后面两个可以任选一个完成——都算通过。
content.en: The first drill is mandatory. For the other two, you only need to complete one to pass.

content.cn: 到时候需要我做些什么？
content.en: And what do you need me to do by then?

content.cn: 这个……我想想该怎么说……
content.en: Ah... How do I put this...?

content.cn: 就是……需要你在对应的项目里扮演下“在外突然晕倒的病人”“困在侵蚀雪暴里的求救者”“在野外饿过头的旅者”什么的……
content.en: Basically ... we'll need you to play the part. Whether that's "unconscious patient on the field," "distressed survivor in a Blighted snowstorm," or "starving traveler who forgot their rations."

content.cn: 都很轻松的！全程只需要躺在那里就好啦！演示的部分交给我就好！
content.en: Don't worry, it'll be a breeze! You just focus on looking dramatically helpless. I'll do the demo!

content.cn: 为什么都是我扮演被救的人？
content.en: Why do I keep getting rescued?

content.cn: 感觉换成假人扮演也可以吧？好像不需要都让我来？
content.en: Why don't you just use a dummy? I don't have to play a role in every drill, do I?

content.cn: 这是因为……在终末地这里，大家最敬仰的就是管理员了嘛。我就想，要是管理员在的话，肯定能有很多人积极参与的……
content.en: Well... it's because everyone here at Endfield looks up to you, Endmin. I figured having you personally involved would ... uh, motivate more volunteers to sign up!

content.cn: 所以才……想了这个办法……
content.en: Which is ... why I came up with this plan...

content.cn: 抱歉，对不起，我应该一开始就跟你讲明这个原因的……不该因为担心你不答应就绕了这么一大圈……
content.en: Sorry, I ... I should've explained properly from the start. I just worried you'd say no if I asked outright, and then I ... ended up making it even more awkward.

content.cn: 现在和我说也不晚。不过，我能换个演的身份吗？
content.en: I mean, it's not too late. But ... can I play a different role?

content.cn: 没关系。不过除了被救的人，我还想演点别的……
content.en: All good. But I'd also like to try something else aside from the rescuee...

content.cn: 可以的！作为特邀嘉宾，你想演什么都没问题！
content.en: Oh of course! As our special guest, you're welcome to play anything you like!

content.cn: 等等，这么说……管理员你是答应参加这次演练了吗？
content.en: Wait, does that mean ... you're actually agreeing to participate in the drill?

content.cn: 嗯，到时候见。
content.en: Yep, see you then.

content.cn: 救援演练？是你之前想在帝江号推广的那个活动吗？
content.en: Is this the same rescue drill you proposed for the Dijiang?

content.cn: 是啊，我会好好准备的。
content.en: Yeah. I'll prepare myself.

content.cn: 太好了！我这就把最新的流程方案发给你！
content.en: Great! I'll send you the updated drill protocol right away!

content.cn: 等演练结束，我请管理员吃我最拿手的一道菜作为谢礼吧！
content.en: I'll treat you to my specialty dish after the drill!

content.cn: 文件[终末地应急救援演练流程方案_4.2.1]已接收
content.en: File [Endfield Emergency Rescue Drill Protocol v4.2.1] Accepted

content.cn: 对！前段时间我和佩丽卡监督提过……她也觉得很有意义。趁着最近还没接到救援队的新任务，我赶紧筹备起来了。
content.en: Yes! Supervisor Perlica approved it earlier, and with no urgent missions, I started the prep!

content.cn: 不过最早安排的项目好像难度有点大，来帮我做准备工作的几位干员都没能完成……
content.en: But the initial drill scenario I planned turned out to be too challenging. Even the operators who came to help with preparations couldn't complete it...

content.cn: 这次正式演练我就把专业的护理流程都省略了，只保留了一些紧急情况的处理手段。
content.en: Since the previous version was too demanding, I've simplified the official drill this time. I removed all the specialized medical protocols and kept only the essential emergency response procedures.

content.cn: 能具体介绍一下吗？
content.en: Can you tell me more?

content.cn: 当然可以！我把大概的方案说一下吧——
content.en: Of course! Let me walk you through the general plan —

content.cn: 管理员，我能问你几个关于口味的问题吗？
content.en: Endministrator, can I ask you a few questions about your food preferences?

content.cn: 甜一点的。
content.en: Sweet.

content.cn: 明白了！看来得多加一点糖……
content.en: I see! Bit more sugar then...

content.cn: 咸一点的。
content.en: Salty.

content.cn: 好的！看来最好换一种奶酪……
content.en: Okay! Different type of cheese then...

content.cn: 不咸不淡的。
content.en: Bit of both.

content.cn: 原来如此……必须注意最后的调味了……
content.en: Got it... Gotta nail that sweet-salty balance then.

content.cn: 然后是第二个问题——鳞腥味和馊米味，哪种味道闻起来你更能接受呢？
content.en: Next question! Which can you tolerate better: the smell of fin scales or spoiled rice?

content.cn: 鳞腥味吧。稍微能接受一点……
content.en: Fin scales... I guess?

content.cn: 了解了，看来软质奶酪都可以保留了……
content.en: Noted. So all soft cheeses stay on the menu...

content.cn: 馊米味。但也不能太浓……
content.en: Spoiled rice. But not too strong...

content.cn: 懂了，或许可以多用一点硬质奶酪……
content.en: Got it. Maybe lean harder on aged cheeses then...

content.cn: ……感觉都不能接受。
content.en: ...Neither.

content.cn: 这样吗……好吧，这下只能全用口味比较温和的鲜奶酪了……
content.en: Welp ... guess we're going all fresh mozzarella on this one.

content.cn: 好！都记下来了！管理员，谢谢你愿意告诉我这些！
content.en: Alrighty! Thank you for letting me know, Endministrator!

content.cn: 这是关于奶酪的口味调研吗？
content.en: Are you doing a survey about cheese flavors?

content.cn: 你要请我吃的就是奶酪？
content.en: Are you treating me to cheese?

content.cn: 不是啦！只是想根据管理员的口味，再调整下我的拿手好菜——奶酪火锅的改良配方，之前说好了要请你吃的嘛！
content.en: Wait, no! I'm just tweaking my specialty, cheese fondue! Gotta perfect the recipe for when I treat you, remember?

content.cn: 以前我在救援队也做过奶酪火锅，但很快发现大家好像都不是特别爱吃……明明我都是按照最标准的配方做的……
content.en: Back in the rescue team, I tried making fondue once ... but nobody really seemed to like it, even though I followed the recipe perfectly...

content.cn: 可以是可以，不过你是想请我吃饭吗？
content.en: Sure. Are you treating me?

content.cn: 对我来说，奶酪火锅简直是世界上最棒的家常菜了！我真的很想让大家都能体会到它的美味之处。
content.en: To me, cheese fondue is the ultimate comfort food! I just know everyone would love it too ... if only they gave it a proper chance.

content.cn: 所以才想要改良？即使不是原汁原味的？
content.en: That's why you want to modify the recipe? Even if it's no longer authentic?

content.cn: 嗯！当时有个队友和我说，塔卫二不同地方的人口味也不太一样，如果想让大家接受这样一道独特风味的菜，就最好做出让步与改变……
content.en: Yep! A teammate told me, "Talosians' tastes change by region. Want folks to love your funky fondue? Adapt or die." ... Maybe less "die," but you get the idea!

content.cn: 我那时才意识到，如果想要让大家接受奶酪火锅，可能要付出比“原汁原味地做出它”更多的努力。
content.en: That's when it hit me: Getting people to love fondue would take way more than just nailing the "authentic" version.

content.cn: 但你不会因为这样就放弃的，对吧？
content.en: But you're not going to give up just because of this, are you?

content.cn: 没错，总不能因为重要的事做起来很困难，就放弃去做嘛。
content.en: Exactly! Just because something's tough doesn't mean it's not worth doing.

content.cn: 我相信只要我坚持下去，为不同人改良出不同的口味，迟早能让更多人接受奶酪火锅的。
content.en: If I keep at it and whip up different variations of fondue, more folks will start loving it.

content.cn: 也……差不多吧……
content.en: You ... could say so.

content.cn: 听你这么说，我都有点期待了。
content.en: Well, I'm definitely looking forward to that now.

content.cn: 有些想快点吃到了。
content.en: I want a taste of it now.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，我已经想好该怎么做管理员会喜欢的改良版本了！肯定不会让你失望的！
content.en: Got your perfect version all planned out. I won't let you down!

content.cn: 到时候等我做好了，管理员只要来食堂就行啦！也可以叫上其他人来一起品尝哦！
content.en: Just swing by the canteen when it's ready. And bring everyone! The more, the melt-ier!

content.cn: 随时欢迎。但为什么突然会问这个？
content.en: Any time. But why are you asking?

content.cn: 这个……就是想了解下！
content.en: Well... I'm just curious!

content.cn: 本来有点不好意思的。不过想来想去，我还是决定吸取上次的教训，直接来问管理员本人啦。
content.en: Was kinda embarrassed to ask ... but figured I should learn from my mistakes. So, straight from the source this time!

content.cn: 那么我就开始问啦——管理员，你比较喜欢甜一点的奶酪，还是咸一点的奶酪？
content.en: Alright Endministrator. First question! Do you prefer your cheese sweet or salty?

content.cn: 管理员，上回你在吃奶酪火锅的时候不是说对北方的雪山很好奇吗？
content.en: Endmin, last fondue night you mentioned being curious about the northern snowpeaks, right?

content.cn: 你真的很喜欢雪山……还有奶酪火锅。
content.en: You seem to really love snowpeaks ... and fondue.

content.cn: 是啊，对我来说，它们都是我特别热爱的事物……因为它们带给我的美好，我才更真切地感受到救助生命的意义。
content.en: Exactly! They're what made me feel it. That saving lives isn't just a duty. It's … like sharing the warmth of fondue in a blizzard.

content.cn: 虽然之前在那座森林里，我也见到过泰拉的雪山，那些景色非常非常美丽，但总觉得少了些什么……
content.en: Those Terra peaks I saw in the forest? Gorgeous, sure ... but something always felt missing.

content.cn: 而当我真正踏上塔卫二的雪山，见识了属于这里的暴雪和极光，才总算明白我觉得少了的是什么……
content.en: Then I finally stood on Talos-II's peaks. Blizzards howling, auroras spanning across the sky... and that's when it clicked.

content.cn: 无论多么美丽、多么震撼人心的风景，都必须是亲身经历，亲眼去看，才能真正有所体会，有所触动。
content.en: No postcard or story can replace standing there ... wind stealing your breath, ice in your boots. That's when beauty means something.

content.cn: 那种感受是任何影像……都无法替代的。
content.en: Some feelings ... just can't be captured.

content.cn: 不过记录依然是有意义的，你拍的这些照片也会让人对雪山生出不一样的憧憬。
content.en: Even so, your photos still matter. They'll plant the same longing in others.

content.cn: 听你这么说，我也想去亲眼看看雪山上的风景了。
content.en: After hearing you describe it ... I need to see those peaks for myself.

content.cn: 这段时间趁着任务间隙，我拍了一些这边的照片，你有空可以看看哦！
content.en: I snapped some shots between missions. Thought you might wanna see the real deal!

content.cn: 那就太好啦！不过，如果只是想看关于雪山的景色，管理员还可以考虑去耶尔什。
content.en: Glad to hear that! But if it's just the views you're after ... maybe try Kjersch.

content.cn: 我听我的一位退役的前辈说过，那里的雪山同样很美丽！
content.en: One of our retired veterans told me Kjersch's peaks are just as stunning!

content.cn: 当然啦，不管管理员想去哪边的雪山，想看怎样的山上风景，都可以叫上我哦！
content.en: Any peak, any view, just say the word and I'm there!

content.cn: 向导或者护卫，哪个我都很擅长的！
content.en: Guide or guard, I'll flex either role!

content.cn: 文件[雪山风景照（2420张）]已接收
content.en: File [Snowspeaks (2420 images)] Accepted

content.cn: 竟然有这么多张？
content.en: You took 2420?!

content.cn: 好大的文件……
content.en: That's a huge file...

content.cn: 这个……其实本来是想筛选一下再发过来的，但我挑的时候觉得每张都好难割舍<image="sns_emoji_006">
content.en: Okay... I might have gone overboard. Tried to pick just a few, but how do you choose between 2420 perfect snowscapes?!<image="sns_emoji_006">

content.cn: 虽然有的拍得没多好，但也记录了各种雪山的不同面……下雪时的样子、晴朗时的样子、最高处的样子、最低处的样子……各有特色呢！
content.en: Sure, some shots are blurry. But they capture every mood of the mountains! Snow-choked cliffs, sunlit ridges, the summit's bite ... even the soggy foothills!

content.cn: 所以等我翻完了所有的照片，甚至觉得自己拍得有点少了……还是没能完全拍到北方雪山的全貌……
content.en: After going through them all ... I still feel like I didn't capture enough. Those snowpeaks have too many sides to ever fit in a photo.

content.cn: 管理员，您有运动的习惯吗？
content.en: Endmin, do you work out daily?

content.cn: 你们晨练队一般会做什么运动？
content.en: What exercises do you guys do in the morning?

content.cn: 我们会先跑十公里。
content.en: We usually start with a 10-kilometer run.

content.cn: 十公里？这听起来不算大事。
content.en: Okay, 10km doesn't sound so bad.

content.cn: 嗯，作为热身。
content.en: Right. That's just the warm-up.

content.cn: 然后到训练室做五十组变速跑……
content.en: Then we hit the Training Cabin for fifty sets of interval sprints...

content.cn: 还是热身吗？
content.en: That a warm-up too?

content.cn: 对呀，这才到哪儿！我还没说绳梯啊绕桶啊那些敏捷训练呢。
content.en: Of course! I haven't even mentioned the agility exercises like ladder drills and barrel drills.

content.cn: 然后就开始做力量训练了！
content.en: After all those, we dive straight into strength training!

content.cn: 要不要加入我们的晨练队？现在只有我和千语姐……有点拉不到人！
content.en: Would you like to join my morning training squad? Right now it's just me and Qianyu... Kinda hard to get more people...

content.cn: 我听着就已经感到有点累了。
content.en: Just hearing this makes me tired...

content.cn: 也许，到武术练习专项时，您就不会累了？那时候就要训练战斗技巧了！
content.en: Haha, maybe when we hit martial arts drills, you won't feel tired. That's when we train fighting skills!

content.cn: 站桩啊，步法啊，单式练习这些肯定是要先做上一会儿的。
content.en: Stances, footwork, blablabla. We do solo drills first.

content.cn: 组合练习的时候，我和千语姐会互相对练，因为只有我俩才能扶住对方的沙袋。
content.en: Then we move on to combo drills. Qianyu and I practice together because those sandbags won't last a second unless we hold them for each other, lol.

content.cn: 我们正在寻找不同力量级的人，这样才能让大家的训练类目丰富起来……
content.en: We're trying to get people of all strength levels so training stays interesting...

content.cn: 管理员？还在吗？
content.en: Endmin, you still there?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_013">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_013">

content.cn: 我在，只是在想……陈应该很高兴你来了。
content.en: Yes. I'm just thinking ... Chen's probably super happy you joined.

content.cn: 我和千语姐确实是相见恨晚！她说很久没有见到我这样，能跟上她体能的人了！
content.en: Qianyu and I totally click! She said it's been ages since she met someone who can keep up!

content.cn: 以前我一直以为是自己体质的原因呢，总是一身的劲儿，忙这忙那！
content.en: I used to think it was just me... I always run around and never feel tired.

content.cn: 知道千语姐也会这样以后，我才安下心来。
content.en: But now knowing Qianyu's the same makes me feel at ease.

content.cn: 在终末地，也找不出第三个这样的人了。
content.en: Prob hard to find a 3rd one like you two in Endfield...

content.cn: 我明白了！
content.en: ROGER THAT!

content.cn: 我会做到的！！！
content.en: I WILL NOT LET YOU DOWN!!!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_013">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_013">

content.cn: 是管理员对我的认可！！！！
content.en: THANK YOU FOR YOUR RECOGNITION!!!

content.cn: 管理员，我很荣幸您能把我和千语姐这么优秀的前辈相提并论！！
content.en: OMG I'm honored you'd even compare me to someone as excellent as Qianyu!!!

content.cn: 拉不到人？怎么会？
content.en: Hard to get more people? How come?

content.cn: 我我我太激动了，我先去跑个十公里平心静气一下！
content.en: Ahhhhhh I'm too excited ... gotta go do a 10km run to calm down!

content.cn: 等等……黎风？
content.en: Wait... Lifeng. You still there?

content.cn: [黎风]已离线
content.en: [Lifeng] is OFFLINE

content.cn: 对，感觉……或者说……大家对运动都有自己独特的看法。
content.en: Yes... Everyone's got their own unique idea of exercise.

content.cn: 比如，有一个干员在我找上门去的时候，就已经把自己倒挂在天花板上了。
content.en: For example, one operator was already hanging upside down from the ceiling before I even asked.

content.cn: 还有一个干员说她只喜欢看原子的运动……
content.en: Another one said she only likes watching atoms move...

content.cn: 好神奇啊！
content.en: Strangely interesting, huh?!

content.cn: 管理员！救急救急！
content.en: ENDMIN! HELP!

content.cn: 我的家……？
content.en: My ... home?

content.cn: 没关系的，管理员。
content.en: It's alright, Endmin!

content.cn: 在咱们这儿，没有家的人很多！
content.en: Lots of people here don't really have a home anyway!

content.cn: 我不是那个意思……
content.en: That's not what I meant...

content.cn: 等我从武陵回来，给您带礼物！
content.en: When I get back from Wuling, I'll bring you a gift!

content.cn: 谢谢你。
content.en: Thank you.

content.cn: 别客气啦！
content.en: Oh, don't be so polite!

content.cn: 帝江号上有礼品店吗？！
content.en: Is there a gift shop in Dijiang?

content.cn: 一般来说，当我们从很远的地方回来，都会带上个礼物。
content.en: Usually, when we come back from far away, we bring a little gift for friends and family.

content.cn: 我小时候，潘叔去外地出差，回来的时候都会送给我一个小惊喜。
content.en: When I was a kid, Uncle Pan would always bring me a little something when he returned from trips.

content.cn: 都有什么礼物？
content.en: What did he give you?

content.cn: 五花八门的，还挺多呢！我家里有一个他从耶尔什带回来的纪念品，雪花球，发出的声音像冰晶一样。
content.en: All sorts of things! At home I have a snow globe he brought back from Kjersch. It makes this crisp, ice-crystal sound when you shake it.

content.cn: 还有一个木雕，用椆木刻的，听说是他从“众生长地”一个叫“游人”的人那里买回来的……
content.en: And there's a wood carving, supposedly bought from some Songseeker in the Hannabit Circuit...

content.cn: “众生长地”是一个组织啦，弧光干员就是其中一名“游人”。
content.en: Hannabit Circuit is an organization. Operator Arclight is one of their Songseekers.

content.cn: 原来如此！潘叔说，他们出产了很多不可思议的精巧玩意。
content.en: Oh, I seeee! Uncle Pan said they make all sorts of incredible little gadgets.

content.cn: 管理员，您知道的人名地名这么多……
content.en: Endmin, you know so many names and places...

content.cn: 您在武陵还待了这么久。
content.en: And you stayed in Wuling for quite a long time...

content.cn: 我还没回来，就要开始考虑送您什么了……
content.en: Even though I haven't returned yet, I'm already brainstorming your gift...

content.cn: 一份心意就好。
content.en: It's the thought that counts.

content.cn: 大家都这么说！
content.en: Everyone says that!

content.cn: 但是收到礼物的时候，还是很开心的！
content.en: But I'm sure everyone loves getting a good gift.

content.cn: 龙泡泡您肯定不缺，大家都送了好多。武陵水，您喜欢喝吗？潘叔说走遍天下，还是武陵的水泡茶最甜。
content.en: Chubby Lung figurines...? I bet you already received plenty from others. Do you like Wuling water? Uncle Pan says he's traveled all over, but Wuling water makes the sweetest tea.

content.cn: 哦……对了！庄天师的群英卡要不要？
content.en: Oh, how about Tianshi Zhuang's Hero Card set?

content.cn: 庄天师的……群英卡？
content.en: Tianshi Zhuang's ... Hero Card set?

content.cn: 还有这种店铺？
content.en: I'm not sure?
Yup...

content.cn: 其实宏科院流行过一套……以大炎的知名人物为原型的卡组……
content.en: It used to be quite popular in HAS... It's a whole card set based on famous people from Great Yan...

content.cn: 基于《大炎群英录》那部连载小说设计的！
content.en: Every card was designed based on the serialized novel The Heroes of Great Yan!

content.cn: 老长了，一千多万字呢，我们看得停不下来！
content.en: It's insanely long, over 10 million characters! But it was so good and we couldn't stop reading!

content.cn: 我们一直在等庄天师出场，结果直到最近一期的连载也没有！
content.en: Everybody waited for Tianshi Zhuang to appear in the story, but even the latest chapter hasn't shown her yet!

content.cn: 所以我就，私下找了一个会画画的天师前辈……自己做了一张庄天师的卡，嘿嘿。大家已经打上了“青霆万钧”——我们自己做的扩展包！！
content.en: So, I secretly asked an artistic Tianshi to help me make my own Tianshi Zhuang card. Everyone stamped it with "Divine Thunder". It's our own expansion pack!!

content.cn: 而且没有流通哦，在武陵之外都找不到！最近还“发行”了自制的闪卡版……
content.en: It's not official, you can't find it outside Wuling! We even "released" a custom shiny version recently...

content.cn: 我偷偷说的，别告诉她啊！
content.en: Shh... Please don't tell Tianshi Zhuang!

content.cn: 给我一张！
content.en: Not unless you give me one.

content.cn: 没有吗……那完蛋了，我准备回武陵看看大家，紧急补课结果发现……
content.en: Oh nooo. I was gonna head back to Wuling to see everyone and maybe do some emergency shopping...

content.cn: 好嘞！！我去再给您收一张，等我！！！
content.en: Gotcha!! I'll grab you one, wait for me!!!

content.cn: 小说也给我一本。
content.en: And the novel too.

content.cn: 您对《大炎群英录》也感兴趣吗？没问题！
content.en: You want to read The Heroes of Great Yan too? No problem!

content.cn: 手头没什么合适的礼物。<image="sns_emoji_009">我得想想了！
content.en: And now I've got nothing to hand out. <image="sns_emoji_009">I need to figure something out!

content.cn: 回家见人是要带礼物的吗？
content.en: Is it a must to bring gifts when going back home?

content.cn: 啊？管理员您从来没有回过家吗？
content.en: Ha? Endmin, you've never gone home before?

content.cn: 管理员……
content.en: Endmin...

content.cn: 源石虫……
content.en: Originium Slug...

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 管理员，我没有恶意！！！
content.en: PLZ DON'T TAKE IT WRONG! IT'S NOT AN INSULT!!!

content.cn: 我很喜欢源石虫的！！
content.en: I LIKE ORIGINIUM SLUGS A LOOOOOOT!!!

content.cn: 当我觉得它们独自一个留在那么广阔的天地间时，就很心疼它们。
content.en: Seeing them alone in such a huge world makes me want to protect them. I feel sorry for them.

content.cn: 感觉它们不知道该去哪里，也不知道自己为什么要长出厚厚的源石壳。
content.en: They don't know where to go, and why they grew that thick shell.

content.cn: 所以，你是在……心疼我？
content.en: So ... you're feeling sorry for me?

content.cn: 跟管理员相处久了，总觉得您好像是被谁……
content.en: After spending time with you, it just seems like you were...

content.cn: 突然扔到这个世界上一样。
content.en: suddenly thrown into this world, all alone...

content.cn: 我来终末地也有一阵子了。
content.en: It's been some time since I joined Endfield...

content.cn: 我没有那么可怜啦。
content.en: I'm not that pitiful.

content.cn: 那就好！！希望是我想多了！
content.en: Good to hear!!! Maybe I was just imagining things!

content.cn: 我们是好朋友了，对吧！
content.en: Just to confirm, we're good friends, right?

content.cn: 当然。
content.en: Of course.

content.cn: 当然！！
content.en: Of course?!?! :D

content.cn: 但你是第一个这么描述我的人。
content.en: But you're the first one to describe me like that.

content.cn: 哇，很怪吗？！
content.en: HA?! DO YOU FIND IT WEIRD?!

content.cn: 其实我会在心里默默把大家想象成一些小动物。
content.en: Actually ... I secretly imagine everyone as little animals in my head.

content.cn: 比如……
content.en: For example...

content.cn: 佩丽卡监督在我心中像一只小壳兽。
content.en: Supervisor Perlica is like a little shellbeast.

content.cn: 千语姐就更像一只……小蟠兽！灵巧地跑来跑去，经常坐在奇怪的地方。
content.en: Qianyu is more like ... a little pantailbeast! Nimble, always running around, and often sitting in weird spots.

content.cn: 管理员，您就是源石虫了。
content.en: And you, Endmin, you're an Originium Slug.

content.cn: 我就不能是一种更酷的东西吗？
content.en: Can't I be something cooler?

content.cn: 源石虫还不够酷吗？！？！
content.en: WHAAAA?! C'MON, ORIGINIUM SLUGS ARE SUPER COOOL!!!!

content.cn: 您观察过出没在武陵的源石虫吗？有一些反射着神秘的光泽……
content.en: Have you seen those Originium Slugs in Wuling? Some of them have this mysterious glow...

content.cn: 很少见！跟您很像的！！
content.en: They're super rare! Just like you!!

content.cn: 是有一阵子了。
content.en: You're right. It's been some time.

content.cn: 嗯，很厉害！！
content.en: Oh, and they're amazing too!

content.cn: 那你像什么小动物？
content.en: So ... what animal would you be?

content.cn: 我？
content.en: Me?

content.cn: 呃……我没想过。我总觉得我应该像一种植物……
content.en: Uh... I've never thought about it. I guess I'd be a plant...

content.cn: 就是那种随着风滚来滚去的草。
content.en: Maybe that grass that rolls around in the wind.

content.cn: 植物才没有这么好动。
content.en: Plants don't move that much.

content.cn: 不对，管理员没懂我意思。
content.en: Ah, you misunderstood me!

content.cn: 其实有些小虫子很爱待在这种草里面，可以随着它们一起去一些遥远的地方。
content.en: Some bugs love to ride in that grass, traveling with it to faraway places.

content.cn: 嗯，我最开始有点儿害怕，总觉得您是那种……大人物！
content.en: Honestly, I was a little scared at first... I thought you were some distant big-shot...

content.cn: 就像……我在帝江号上看到的星图！行星的轨道环绕在星球上，提供坚实的臂膀，拥抱着它的伙伴！
content.en: Like ... the star map on Dijiang! The planets' orbits hold their friends in a safe embrace!

content.cn: 源石虫也会待在里面吗？
content.en: Do Originium Slugs hide in that grass too?

content.cn: 当然，源石虫也会！这种草叶能够为虫的足部提供充足的支撑，它们也很喜欢汲取叶片上的新鲜露水。
content.en: Of course they do! The grass gives their little feet solid support, and they enjoy drinking the fresh dew on the leaves.

content.cn: 那就好。
content.en: Good.

content.cn: 欸？什么那就好？
content.en: Huh?

content.cn: 总之，我下回带一只来给您瞧瞧，和大多数源石虫都不一样！
content.en: Anyway, next time I'll bring an Originium Slug for you! I promise it'll be totally one-of-a-kind!

content.cn: 大人物？
content.en: Distant big-shot?

content.cn: 对啊，虽然您现在给我的感觉，像一个……
content.en: Yeah. Though now ... you kinda feel like a...

content.cn: 像一个有点懵懂的……
content.en: Slightly clueless...

content.cn: 我知道。
content.en: I know.

content.cn: 没事的。
content.en: Nothing. Don't worry about it.

content.cn: 我看了你的战斗适应性测试报告，知道高温让训练室遭到了一些损坏。
content.en: I've read your combat adaptation test records and see that your abilities caused some damage to the cabin.

content.cn: 交给特种技术部门和总后勤办事处好了，他们会善后的。放心，这种事对终末地来说并不少见。
content.en: Don't worry about the Training Cabins, they get damaged all the time. The Specialist Tech Division and Chief Logistics Office will take care of it.

content.cn: 好。那我接着去烧训练泳池了。
content.en: Cool. Then I'm off to burn the swimming pool.

content.cn: 为什么要烧训练泳池？
content.en: Why burn the swimming pool?

content.cn: 一听就很危险！禁止水煮干员！
content.en: STOP! Do you plan to boil the operators in the pool?!

content.cn: 是武库那边的干员要求的。
content.en: An operator from the Arsenal asked me to do this.

content.cn: 她想要试试我的火焰在水里会怎么样。
content.en: She wanted to see what my flames could do in water.

content.cn: 刚来终末地，感觉如何？待得惯吗？
content.en: How do you like Endfield so far?

content.cn: 那也不能烧游泳池！
content.en: You can't set it on fire tho!

content.cn: 等等，我还没批准呢！
content.en: I never said okay to this!

content.cn: 是吗？她说管理员一定会兜着的，难得现在泳池没人，催我赶紧过去了。
content.en: Oh? I was told that the Endmin would surely cover for me. She's urging me to hurry over since the pool's empty now.

content.cn: 她还说，稍后会把报告送到的。
content.en: She also said she'll send the report over later.

content.cn: 喂喂！
content.en: WAIT!!! LAEVATAIN!

content.cn: 喂！
content.en: WAIT!

content.cn: 嗯？这是什么？
content.en: What's this app?

content.cn: 新消息
content.en: New Message

content.cn: 你觉得在音乐节上纵火合适吗？
content.en: Hey, you think it's alright to start a fire at a music festival?

content.cn: 这次又是要做什么？
content.en: Please don't get any ideas...

content.cn: 上次外勤行动后，一位干员联系我，说是对我的火焰印象深刻。
content.en: An operator got in touch with me after the last field operation. She was apparently impressed by my flames.

content.cn: 不止一个人跟我提到过这点……然后呢？
content.en: Okay... More than one person has mentioned that to me. Then?

content.cn: 她邀请我加入她的业余重金属乐队，在下一场黑曜石音乐节的表演中，用火焰点燃环绕舞台的海水。
content.en: She invited me to join her amateur heavy metal band and set the seawater around the stage on fire at the next Obsidian Festival.

content.cn: 觉得这个主意怎么样？
content.en: So, what do you think?

content.cn: 听上去酷毙了！我很期待！
content.en: LOVE IT! Looking forward to it!

content.cn: 挺出格的，不过我支持！
content.en: Wild, but you have my full support!

content.cn: 很好。那么到时候记得来支持。
content.en: Nice. Make sure you show up then.

content.cn: 对了，在终末地，我感觉待得很习惯。
content.en: By the way, I've gotten pretty comfortable here in Endfield.

content.cn: 欸……你为什么现在才回答这个问题？
content.en: I asked so long ago... Why telling me this now?

content.cn: 虽然有人告诉我可以把终末地当成自己的家，但我知道自己在很多情况下意味着麻烦。
content.en: Someone said I could treat Endfield as my home, but I knew I often bring trouble wherever I go.

content.cn: 是Baker，一个即时通信应用。每个干员都会自动绑定一个账号。
content.en: It's Baker, an Insta-Chat app. Each operator is automatically assigned an account.

content.cn: 我可不希望，作为一种麻烦被勉强“接纳”和“包容”。
content.en: I didn't want to be some burden that people merely accept or tolerate.

content.cn: 直到现在，我才确定，这里就是为我这样的人准备的地方。
content.en: This place really feels right for someone like me, which is why I'm only bringing it up now.

content.cn: 你随时可以用它来找我。
content.en: Shoot me a msg here whenever you need me.

content.cn: 好，我记住了。
content.en: Cool.

content.cn: 那么，烧了训练室怎么办？
content.en: So, I just burned down the Training Cabin. What do I do now?

content.cn: “冰淇淋决斗”大赛啊。你没看到海报？
content.en: Didn't you see the ice cream contest poster?

content.cn: 第一届，总后勤办事处在帝江号的餐厅办的。
content.en: First ever. Hosted by the Chief Logistics Office at the Dijiang canteen.

content.cn: 第一届？佩丽卡批准了这活动？只有我不知情吗？
content.en: First ever? Perlica approved this? Am I the only one left in the dark?

content.cn: 她还参加了开幕式呢。
content.en: She even showed up for the opening ceremony.

content.cn: 别担心，冠军是我的，毫无悬念。
content.en: Anyway. Pretty sure I came first.

content.cn: 奖品就是本月不限量冷饮券一张。
content.en: The grand prize is a month of unlimited cold drinks.

content.cn: 这不是重点！你到底怎么赢的？
content.en: That's beside the point. How exactly did you win?

content.cn: 很简单，从第一轮开始，每轮保持全胜就行了。
content.en: Easy. Win every round. That's all.

content.cn: 莱万汀，是你把食堂的冰柜“清空”了？
content.en: Did you empty the canteen freezer?

content.cn: 火辣树莓冰爆弹、九层橘络苦味球、山葵芥末暴击桶、蒜香焦糖五仁杯……
content.en: Flaming Raspberry Iceburst, Bitter Ninefold Citrus, Wasabi Inferno Swirl, Garlic-Caramel Nutpocalypse...

content.cn: 这都是什么口味……全是总后勤办事处研发的吗？
content.en: What in the world are those flavors... Don't tell me CLO cooked them up?

content.cn: 嗯。有几个对手真的是吃着吃着，最后就到医疗干员那儿去了。
content.en: Yes. A few challengers tapped out halfway. They were carried off to Medics.

content.cn: 但我都吃完了。还加了些小料。
content.en: I finished all of mine. With extra toppings.

content.cn: 这根本不是比赛，是极限挑战！
content.en: That's not a contest. That's borderline torture!

content.cn: 你真的没事吧？<image="sns_emoji_032">
content.en: Seriously... Are you really feeling alright?<image="sns_emoji_032">

content.cn: 你忘了我是谁吗？
content.en: I'm not weak, okay?

content.cn: 这点程度的冰凉，甚至都没能让我的体温下降一点。
content.en: That little chill didn't even faze me. Wasn't even enough to lower my body temperature in the slightest.

content.cn: 是我。
content.en: Sorry not sorry :P

content.cn: 等等！是火焰！你用自己的源石技艺抵消了冰淇淋的低温！
content.en: Wait, you used your Originium Arts to nullify the ice cream's cold?

content.cn: 这难道不算作弊吗？裁判没有提出异议？
content.en: Isn't that cheating? The judges didn't say anything?

content.cn: 这是我的本事，为什么会是作弊？
content.en: How is using my talent cheating?

content.cn: 你要是不服，可以亲自来跟我比赛一场。我可以让你先挑口味。
content.en: I dare you to challenge me. I'll even let you pick your flavor first.

content.cn: 还是算了……
content.en: I think I'll pass...

content.cn: 恐怕这比赛不会有第二届了。
content.en: Frankly, I doubt there will ever be a second round of this "contest" ... or torture, whatever you want to call it.

content.cn: 那我还是要申请尽快补充帝江号的冷饮库存，保障本月内的供应。
content.en: In that case, I request that Dijiang's cold drinks stock be replenished immediately, to guarantee supply this month at least.

content.cn: 好吧，毕竟奖品就是“不限量冷饮券”，冰淇淋的事……我来想想办法。
content.en: Will do, since the prize was unlimited cold drinks for a month. As for the ice cream you love so much... I'll figure something out.

content.cn: 谢了，管理员。以后只要有冰淇淋，我一定给你留一根！
content.en: Thanks, Endmin. I promise I'll save you a scoop whenever there's ice cream.

content.cn: 你真吃了这么多冰淇淋？不会不舒服吗？
content.en: You seriously ate that much ice cream? Hopefully it didn't upset your stomach.

content.cn: 不记得了，大概吃到嘴唇有点麻的时候就停下了。
content.en: Can't remember. I stopped when my lips went a little numb.

content.cn: 好在后来很快恢复了。
content.en: I bounced back pretty fast though. Lucky.

content.cn: 但是……你为什么要吃这么多？
content.en: Why eat so much then...?

content.cn: 文件[照片_420122]传输中
content.en: Sending [Photo_420122]

content.cn: [莱万汀]已上线
content.en: [Laevatain] is online

content.cn: 文件[照片_420924]传输中
content.en: Sending [Photo_420924]

content.cn: 信号不好。这是在缆车上，正前往雪山之巅。
content.en: Signal's weak. I'm on the cable car, heading up to the top of a snowy peak.

content.cn: 远处时不时传来雪崩的声音。
content.en: I can hear avalanches rolling every now and then.

content.cn: 如果这个时候跳下去，估计会被积雪淹没得无影无踪。
content.en: If I jumped now, I'd probably get buried in snow and vanish.

content.cn: 听起来是耶尔什……你怎么一下子跑那么远？
content.en: Sounds like you're in Kjersch... How did you get that far?

content.cn: 你在哪座山？怎么一下子跑那么远？
content.en: Which mountain are you on? How did you get that far?

content.cn: [莱万汀]已离线
content.en: [Laevatain] is offline

content.cn: 文件[照片_420924]传输失败
content.en: [Photo_420924] failed to send

content.cn: 这是南方的海岸边。附近有一座灯火通明的城市，在夜晚看得很清楚。
content.en: I'm down by the southern coast. There's a city nearby, bright and clear at night.

content.cn: [莱万汀]已上线
content.en: [Laevatain] is online

content.cn: 文件[照片_421214]传输中
content.en: Sending [Photo_421214]

content.cn: 没想到在被烟雾掩盖的山体中，还有这么一座杜林城市。
content.en: I didn't think I'd find a Durin city hidden in the smoke-covered mountain.

content.cn: 密布的熔炉、轨道、机床……像血管和心脏一样。
content.en: So many furnaces, rails, machines... It's like the city has its own veins and heart.

content.cn: 飞溅的火花，和我的火焰不相上下。
content.en: The sparks flying out are just as intense as my flames.

content.cn: 怎么是特里格拉夫？你是在给我发旅途记录吧？
content.en: Triglava? You're just sending me your trip notes, right?

content.cn: 你是怎么进到那里的？你是在给我发旅途记录吧？
content.en: How did you even get there? This is another one of your travel updates, isn't it?

content.cn: [莱万汀]已离线
content.en: [Laevatain] is offline

content.cn: 文件[照片_421214]传输失败
content.en: [Photo_421214] failed to send

content.cn: 不过相比之下，我更喜欢从海洋逼近的风暴。
content.en: But honestly, I find myself drawn more to storms rolling in from the ocean.

content.cn: 你是不是把我们的Baker会话……当成打卡纪念墙了？
content.en: Are our Baker conversations basically your travel log now?

content.cn: [莱万汀]已上线
content.en: [Laevatain] is online

content.cn: 有何不可？
content.en: I don't see any problem with it.

content.cn: 你还有什么印象深刻的地方，可以推荐我去？趁这次远行，可以多跑几个地方。
content.en: Any cool places you'd suggest I visit? I could swing by a few extra spots while I'm out.

content.cn: 我的记忆都还没恢复呢。
content.en: My memories aren't back yet.

content.cn: 对塔卫二，我比你还陌生。
content.en: I thought you knew more about Talos-II than me.

content.cn: 原来是这样。
content.en: Alright then.

content.cn: [莱万汀]已离线
content.en: [Laevatain] is offline

content.cn: 大浪翻涌，风暴咆哮，正好能让我平静下来。
content.en: Towering waves, roaring wind ... that's what soothes me.

content.cn: [莱万汀]已上线
content.en: [Laevatain] is online

content.cn: 管理员！你猜我在哪儿？
content.en: Endmin! Guess where I'm at!

content.cn: 你在哪里？
content.en: Where?

content.cn: 我正在帝江号食堂的冰柜前。你想要哪个口味的冰淇淋？
content.en: Right in front of the freezer in Dijiang's canteen. Which ice cream flavor do you want?

content.cn: 你不是在远行吗？为什么中断了？
content.en: Weren't you supposed to be traveling?

content.cn: 因为我想马上让你看看我在塔卫二各个地方见到的、听到的、搜集到的东西。
content.en: I wanted to show you everything I've seen and gathered across Talos-II. So, I got back early.

content.cn: 抓紧点，再不来，礼物就被其他人分光了。
content.en: Hurry, or others will take all the gifts!

content.cn: 你这是在哪儿？菈梵朵玛？
content.en: Where are you? La Fantoma?

content.cn: 小心危险，别太接近！
content.en: Careful! Don't get too close!

content.cn: [莱万汀]已离线
content.en: [Laevatain] is offline

content.cn: 文件[照片_420122]传输失败
content.en: [Photo_420122] failed to send

content.cn: 管理员管理员，突击测试时间！哆！
content.en: Endmin, Endmin! Pop quiz time! Do~!

content.cn: 我想自己组一架钢琴，放在帝江号上，先问问管理员意见。
content.en: Sooo. I wanna build my own piano for Dijiang! ...Kinda wanted to ask Endmin's opinion first.

content.cn: 很多干员都喜欢音乐。虽然大家的口味天差地别……我喜欢“新塔风”，埃特拉喜欢重金属……
content.en: Lots of operators love music, though our tastes are totally different... I'm into Neo-Talosian, Estella's all about heavy metal...

content.cn: 让大家有机会来点儿即兴音乐，丰富一下帝江号上的文娱活动啦。
content.en: We should totally set up some impromptu jam sessions on Dijiang! Spice up our off-duty hours with music!

content.cn: 伊冯你会弹钢琴吗？我都不知道。
content.en: Wow, Yvonne, I never knew you play the piano.

content.cn: 我以为你会更喜欢电子乐器之类，比较现代的乐器。
content.en: I thought you preferred electronic instruments that are more modern.

content.cn: 不要以貌取人，管理员！我可是超级天才，还参加过工团的音乐汇演呢！
content.en: Don't judge a book by its cover! I'm a total prodigy, even performed at the UWST concert series!

content.cn: 唔，之前是不是没有跟你聊过我的家庭？
content.en: Uh, have I ever told you about my family?

content.cn: 我爸妈说，我的名字来自高卢。他们年轻时正流行“泰拉复古浪潮”，这俩人很着迷，要把我培养成“高卢淑女”。
content.en: My parents named me after some old Gaulish trend. They were super into that whole "Retro Terra" phase when they were young. Wanted to raise me as some proper "Gaulish lady".

content.cn: 逼我去上文学课、音乐课、礼仪课……你能想象吗，什么年代了，居然还问我要不要束腰？！
content.en: They dragged me to literature classes, music classes, etiquette bootcamps... Can you believe they tried to put me in a corset?! Like, what century is this?!

content.cn: 先不说过气没过气的，难道我们家有什么贵族血统吗<image="sns_emoji_030">
content.en: Forget about being outdated. Are we even secretly nobility or something?<image="sns_emoji_030">

content.cn: 只有钢琴课还有点儿意思。不过后来我发现比起弹，我更喜欢拆开外壳，研究里面的击弦机。
content.en: Okay, fine. Piano lessons were kinda fun. But then I realized I liked taking apart the instrument's action mechanism way more than actually playing it!

content.cn: 原来你小时候这么不开心啊……
content.en: So, you really had such an unhappy childhood...

content.cn: 不愧是你的父母，也会赶流行啊……但的确不该把愿望强加给你。
content.en: Classic parent move, chasing trends... But they really shouldn't have pushed all that on you.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_012">我可从不忍耐讨厌的东西。跟他俩搏斗了好多年，争取到了纵火权，让小暴鸰把那些玩意儿都烧掉啦。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_012">Pfft. Nah, I fought those two for years! Won my arson privileges and let Tweety-Bomb torch all the junk!

content.cn: 咳咳，偏题了！终末地干员伊冯向您发起“帝江号钢琴安装流程”，请求批准！
content.en: Ahem, anyway. Endfield Operator Yvonne submitting formal request: "Dijiang Piano Installation Protocol" PLEASE APPROVE THIS!

content.cn: 空间倒是还够……好，批准。
content.en: I mean, we've got the space for it. Okay, approved.

content.cn: 是要接音符吗？哆来咪发？
content.en: Re-Mi-Fa comes afterwards, yes?

content.cn: 需要告知总后勤办事处，我帮你提交申请。
content.en: I'll notify the Chief Logistics Office and submit the request on your behalf.

content.cn: 好耶，管理员最棒了<image="sns_emoji_022">
content.en: HECK YES! Endmin, you're the best!<image="sns_emoji_022">

content.cn: 我记得管理员的音乐品味还挺好的，等钢琴装好，我来教管理员四手联弹吧！
content.en: Ooooh, I know Endmin's got good taste. Once the piano's installed, duet lessons are ON!

content.cn: 虽然两边我都能配合……不过，有别的用途，所以还是问问，管理员更习惯用哪边的手？
content.en: I can adapt to either side, buuut ... hypothetically, which hand do you favor? Asking for a totally unrelated reason.

content.cn: 惯用手吗？左手。
content.en: Dominant hand? Left.

content.cn: 惯用手吗？右手。
content.en: Dominant hand? Right.

content.cn: 原来如此，已录入资料库！
content.en: I see. Data logged!

content.cn: 您的答案已录入小嘀嗒，正在分析测试结果……
content.en: Your answer has been logged in Tink-a-Bella~ Analyzing test results now...

content.cn: 等等，什么资料库需要这个？
content.en: ...Logged into what database?

content.cn: 什么“别的用途”？我开始担心了。
content.en: What "unrelated reason"? I'm officially concerned.

content.cn: 别担心，这个情报是放进研究资料库的。等我给你个小惊喜<image="sns_emoji_021">
content.en: Relaaax~ It's going in the R&D archives! Just wait for your liiittle surprise <image="sns_emoji_021">

content.cn: 接得很完美，本次音感测试结果——一百分！
content.en: Nailed it! This round's pitch test results — PERFECT SCORE!

content.cn: 咦？这么突然，这是问题吗？
content.en: Huh? What's with the sudden ... question?

content.cn: 您的答案已录入小嘀嗒，正在分析测试结果……
content.en: Your answer has been logged in Tink-a-Bella~ Analyzing test results now...

content.cn: 正确答案是哆来咪发。管理员的音感测试结果——不合格！
content.en: The correct sequence was Do-Re-Mi-Fa! Endmin's pitch test results — FAILED!

content.cn: 嘿嘿，有没有吓一跳<image="sns_emoji_012">
content.en: Hehe~ Gotcha! Did I scare ya?<image="sns_emoji_012">

content.cn: 管理员，还记得我之前说要装钢琴的事吗？得搁置一下了<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: Hey Endmin... Remember that whole piano plan? Minor change of plans. Gotta shelve it for now <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 完美主义的幽灵又在作祟了？
content.en: ...And here comes the perfectionism poltergeist again, huh?

content.cn: 你真的很在乎自己设计的造物。
content.en: You truly care about the things you create, don't you?

content.cn: 我忍不了不好看、不完美的东西！而且小暴鸰是特殊的<image="sns_emoji_030">
content.en: Ugh, I refuse to tolerate ugly or half-baked works! And Tweety-Bomb's SPECIAL <image="sns_emoji_030">

content.cn: 它的原型就非常漂亮，是我童年的玩伴……一只脾气很暴躁的小羽兽。
content.en: Its prototype was ... beautiful. My childhood buddy, this feisty little fowlbeast that'd peck anyone who looked at it wrong.

content.cn: 它总是把我的房间搞得乱糟糟的，还跟我打架，打得房间飞满羽毛。
content.en: That menace trashed my room daily. We'd brawl so hard the air was nothing but feathers!

content.cn: 某天我意识到，它总是这么生气，是因为我把它关在了它不喜欢的地方。
content.en: Then it hit me. All that rage was cause I'd caged it somewhere it hated.

content.cn: 就像我们，总是被其他人、被规则和秩序推着去做不喜欢的事情，也不会开心的。
content.en: ...Just like us. Shoved into roles we never wanted. Rules, duty, all that junk. Nobody smiles like that.

content.cn: 所以我就打开窗户，把它放走了。再之后我就随自己心意，去学机械设计了<image="sns_emoji_011">
content.en: So I ... opened the cage and let it go. Then I went full screw-your-expectations, and dove into mechanic design instead.

content.cn: 唉，可我真的很喜欢很喜欢那只小羽兽……可能是因为寂寞，总是想它。
content.en: ...Sigh. Miss that stupid fowlbeast so damn much. Guess ... lonely kids cling to anything, huh?

content.cn: 小暴鸰、小暴鸰它<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: It's Tweety-Bomb... Tweety-Bomb <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 所以你就以它为原型设计了小暴鸰？用来替代？
content.en: So ... you modeled Tweety-Bomb after it? As a replacement?

content.cn: 所以你做了个小羽兽的替代品？
content.en: So you made a replacement for the fowlbeast?

content.cn: 咕！小暴鸰别听，是恶评！
content.en: GACK! Don't listen to that, Tweety-Bomb! Slander! Libel! Fake news!

content.cn: 好吧，没法否认……一开始的确是抱着替代品的想法去做的……
content.en: ...Okay fine. At the very beginning? Maybe I ... wanted a replacement.

content.cn: 但亲手把它雕琢出来后，我就明白啦，它无法替代小羽兽，也不需要去替代它。
content.en: But after carving every detail myself, I realized this fiery idiot's nothing like the original ... and that's perfect.

content.cn: 小暴鸰就是小暴鸰，我独一无二的伙伴<image="sns_emoji_022">
content.en: Tweety-Bomb is Tweety-Bomb, my one-of-a-kind partner-in-crime <image="sns_emoji_022">

content.cn: 后来，你还见过那只小羽兽吗？
content.en: Did you ever see that little fowlbeast again?

content.cn: 这就是最好玩儿的地方啦。过了一阵子，它又飞回来，在花园里住下来了。
content.en: That's the best part. The little menace came back. Set up shop in our garden like it owned the place!

content.cn: 妈妈说，也许它早就把我当成妈妈了，只是因为到了叛逆期，才跟我打架<image="sns_emoji_020">
content.en: Mom claimed it totally saw me as its mother. All that fighting was probably just avian teenage angst <image="sns_emoji_020">

content.cn: 虽然……小羽兽已经不在了，但看到小暴鸰，我就能回忆起跟它一起时，那份幸福的心情。
content.en: ...That fowlbeast's long gone now. But when I see Tweety-Bomb, I still get that exact stupid-happy feeling we had back then.

content.cn: 珍贵的瞬间、重要的存在，也许会在某一天突然离开我们，但我有思念它们的能力<image="sns_emoji_022">
content.en: Precious stuff, important people, they might vanish someday. But hey, I've got this world-class missing-them skill <image="sns_emoji_022">

content.cn: 所以，我也想让管理员你……
content.en: That's why I also want the Endmin to...

content.cn: 也想什么？
content.en: Also what?

content.cn: 让我什么？
content.en: Want me to do what?

content.cn: 嗯哼，先保密！
content.en: NOPE! Top. Secret.

content.cn: 好啦好啦，不磨叽了！我去给小暴鸰做涂装方案了<image="sns_emoji_036">
content.en: OK OK DROPPING IT! Time to deep-dive into Tweety-Bomb's aesthetic overhaul!

content.cn: 小暴鸰怎么了？出了什么事吗？
content.en: ...What's Tweety-Bomb done this time?

content.cn: 等等……把话说完！
content.en: WAIT. Finish that thought!

content.cn: 得不到答案，我今天要睡不着了！
content.en: How am I supposed to go to sleep tonight?!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_012">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_012">

content.cn: [伊冯]已离线
content.en: [Yvonne] is OFFLINE

content.cn: 难道……它……坏了……？
content.en: Don't tell me ... it's ... broken?

content.cn: 小暴鸰撞到天使身上，磕掉了一块油漆！现在我身上好像有源石虫在爬<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: Tweety-Bomb rammed an Aggelos and chipped its paint! Now I've got phantom Originium slug vibes crawling all over me <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 其他的事情全部往后推，我得先把它的漆补好！
content.en: EVERYTHING ELSE ON HOLD. Gotta emergency repaint this disaster NOW!

content.cn: 不对，要是留下痕迹就不好了，直接重做外壳，换个环境感知涂料……干脆设计套新的涂装方案吧！
content.en: Wait, scratch that! Gotta full-shell overhaul with enviro-sensing coating... Actually, let's redesign the WHOLE livery scheme!
...End ... min...

content.cn: 等等，你憋了半个小时的气吗……
content.en: ...You held your breath for thirty minutes?

content.cn: 我在你的办公桌上放了一台小无人机，你快试试好不好用啦！
content.en: The drone on your desktop! Try it and tell me if it's cool!!!

content.cn: 我还没来得及回办公室……
content.en: Didn't go to my office yet...

content.cn: 咦？！那我岂不是亲手破坏了这份惊喜感？！不管了，你快去试试！
content.en: NOOO I spoiled my own surprise?! Whatever. Go test it out now!

content.cn: 它跟小嘀嗒的功能差不多，我额外加了一些更方便你使用的功能，调整了惯用手……
content.en: Basically Tink-a-Bella 2.0, but with optimized grips for your dominant hand, and...

content.cn: 也设计了特别的涂装！毕竟是我的一片心意，不许说不喜欢<image="sns_emoji_012">
content.en: Custom livery included! And since it's a Yvonne Original, any dislike shall be CRIMINALIZED <image="sns_emoji_012">

content.cn: 你说的惊喜原来是这个！
content.en: So this was the big surprise you were talking about!

content.cn: 之前问我惯用手，原来是为了做这个……
content.en: So that's why you asked about my dominant hand...

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_030"><image="sns_emoji_030"><image="sns_emoji_030">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_030"><image="sns_emoji_030"><image="sns_emoji_030">

content.cn: 对了，钢琴也快搭好了。我准备谱一支曲子，我们一起弹，给小无人机做启动音乐。
content.en: Btw, piano's almost ready! Drafting an ignition track for the drone's grand debut!

content.cn: 怎么突然送我无人机？是之前事情的谢礼吗？
content.en: Is this a thank-you for earlier?

content.cn: 我很感谢你帮了我那么多，但这次不是啦<image="sns_emoji_017">
content.en: Nahhh~ Okay yes you're the best, but this isn't just to thank you <image="sns_emoji_017">

content.cn: 因为我们是最好最好的伙伴，所以——
content.en: Cause we're the bestest friends, so...

content.cn: 我想做一个东西，纪念我们经历的一切！
content.en: I wanna build something that screams "remember when?"!!!

content.cn: 就像我看到小暴鸰时会想起跟小羽兽一起时的心情……我希望管理员看到它，就会想起我，哼哼<image="sns_emoji_012">
content.en: Like how Tweety-Bomb equals fowlbeast nostalgia... Wanted Endmin to see it and go "ugh I miss Yvonne" or whatever... <image="sns_emoji_012">

content.cn: 塔卫二的一切都稍纵即逝，但我们可以用各种方式，记下这些脆弱又美好的瞬间！
content.en: Everything on Talos-II's here-gone-boom... So we engineer the fragile memories!

content.cn: 被你这么一说，突然有些伤感……
content.en: You're making it unexpectedly heavy...

content.cn: 心意我收下了，谢谢。
content.en: I'll cherish it. Thank you.

content.cn: 对了，那个小无人机的存储空间超级大，我准备把“伊冯的年度时刻”集锦录进去。
content.en: PLUS!! That drone's got TERABYTE storage. Gonna cram it with "Yvonne's moments of the year"!

content.cn: 不过就算是这样，也填不满。所以管理员还要带我去创造新的回忆，经历更多冒险哦。
content.en: But even that's not gonna take up much space. That's why you gotta take me on more adventures and generate more dumb memories with me, Endmin!

content.cn: 好啊，一言为定。
content.en: Okay. Pinky promise.

content.cn: 谁叫我们是最好最好的伙伴呢？
content.en: Well, we are besties after all.

content.cn: 先从小事做起，看音乐节，买漂亮的衣服，吃冰淇淋，看菈梵朵玛的日出……
content.en: Let's start off with the little things! Raves, sparkly outfits, ice cream at sunrise in La Fantoma...

content.cn: 冲出大气层，冲出塔卫二……
content.en: Past the stratosphere, past Talos-II...!

content.cn: 跨度是不是有点太大了！
content.en: Um?! That escalates too quick.

content.cn: 发生什么了<image="sns_emoji_038">
content.en: What happened <image="sns_emoji_038">

content.cn: 冲出塔卫二，已经不能算是小事了！
content.en: "Little things"?! You literally mentioned spaceflight!

content.cn: 嘿嘿，管理员，你可别想跑哦<image="sns_emoji_022">
content.en: No escape now, Endmin! You're stuck with me <image="sns_emoji_022">

content.cn: 在那之前……
content.en: And before we do that...

content.cn: 让我先把曲子谱好，这样每次机器启动时，管理员都会想起我啦。
content.en: Gotta compose this signature song first, then every start-up will remind you of me~!

content.cn: 发生什么了，伊冯大人<image="sns_emoji_006"><image="sns_emoji_006"><image="sns_emoji_006">
content.en: What now, Lady Yvonne <image="sns_emoji_006"><image="sns_emoji_006"><image="sns_emoji_006">

content.cn: 我会一直……憋气！直到你……
content.en: ...I'LL HOLD MY BREATH UNTIL...

content.cn: 直到你跟我说使用感想！我等了整整三十分钟了！
content.en: ...YOU TEST IT AND GIVE ME YOUR TAKE! THREE. ZERO. MINUTES. OF AGONY!!

content.cn: 咦？什么使用感想？
content.en: Wait, test what?

content.cn: 分享商品链接-[《拉玛战舰详解》。书籍简介：一艘来自远方的太空战舰坠入了塔罗斯的大气……]
content.en: Shared product link - ["Rama Battleship Comprehensive Analysis". Book description: A spacecraft from distant stars crashed through Talos' atmosphere...]

content.cn: 战舰？难道是拿来攻打帝江号的？
content.en: A battleship? Wait. You're not planning to take on Dijiang, are you?

content.cn: 战舰？我知道了，要拿去攻打宏科院！
content.en: A battleship? Ohhh, I see! You're gonna storm HAS!

content.cn: 那不能，您别拿我开涮。就是做个玩具，名字叫得响亮，没破坏力。
content.en: Aw, c'mon, don't mess with me like that. It's just a toy, all bark and no bite. Just made it for fun!

content.cn: 说到这里……管理员，您对这本书有兴趣吗？
content.en: Speaking of which... Endmin, you got any interest in this book yourself?

content.cn: 我对那个迷你战舰比较有兴趣，听上去挺好玩儿。
content.en: Honestly, that mini battleship sounds way more fun. What's the specs on that thing?

content.cn: 那咱们可算一拍即合了！
content.en: Now we're talkin'! Perfect match!

content.cn: 我还在宏科院时，在办公室偷偷做了一台迷你高速战舰……
content.en: Back when I was still at HAS, I secretly built a mini high-speed battleship right under their noses in my office...

content.cn: 用它攻打地下冷库时，不小心撞翻了报废实验样本的回收箱，搞得整栋楼都飘着一股鳞肉腐坏了的味儿。
content.en: Tried "attacking" the underground storage with it, ended up plowing straight into a bin of scrapped experiment samples. Whole building reeked of rotting fin for days.

content.cn: 抱歉抱歉，管理员，不小心把链接发您这儿来了。
content.en: Ah, sorry 'bout that, Endmin! Didn't mean to send that link your way.

content.cn: 等这艘新的迷你战舰做好了，我叫您来看啊。
content.en: Once I get this new mini-speedster shipworthy, you're definitely getting a front-row demo, Endmin.

content.cn: 我好好设计下外形，给它弄帅气点儿，到时候肯定能把大伙儿吓一跳。
content.en: Gonna polish the design real nice and make it look proper intimidating. Just you wait, the crew's gonna lose their minds when they see this thing!

content.cn: 看小说简介描述，挺有趣的。有一点点好奇……
content.en: The novel's blurb does seem interesting... I'll admit, I'm a little curious now.

content.cn: 那敢情好。我不折腾退款了，一会儿把书给您送过去。
content.en: Perfect! Forget the refund then. I'll drop the book off at your place later.

content.cn: 书赠有缘人，您要是觉得好看，回头给我讲讲里面的内容。
content.en: Consider it a gift for the right reader. If you like it, you'll have to tell me all about it later!

content.cn: 嗐，拉着您说了这么多，耽误您时间了。有机会请您吃个饭，咱们再慢慢聊。
content.en: Ah hell, didn't mean to chew your ear off like that. Next round's on me, we'll grab a proper meal and really talk it out.

content.cn: 我当真了，有机会是哪天？
content.en: I'm holding you to that. So when exactly is "next round"?

content.cn: 好啊，早就听说你做菜一绝。我等着。
content.en: Sure! Been hearing legends about your cooking. I'll bring the appetite.

content.cn: 哈哈，改日，改日。一定。
content.en: Hah! Soon, soon. Mark my words.

content.cn: 环塔商会的购物页做得花里胡哨，一会儿弹一个打折券，一会儿又是拉人凑单，基础功能却乱套了，居然把退款跟分享放一起！
content.en: Man, the TGCC shop page is all flash and no function! Pop-up coupons one second, group deals the next. But the basics? Total mess! Who in their right mind puts refund next to share?!

content.cn: 我买本《军地两用战舰维修》去……
content.en: Gonna grab a copy of "Dual-Purpose Battleship Maintenance"...

content.cn: 质量有问题吗？为什么要退款？
content.en: What's wrong with the book? Why refund?

content.cn: 这本书的内容不好看吗？
content.en: You don't like the book?

content.cn: 是买错了，怪我自己没仔细看。
content.en: My bad. Should've checked before hitting buy.

content.cn: 前几天我从联盟工团淘换了些钢材跟二手发动机，想组台“迷你高速战舰”玩玩。
content.en: Snagged some steel and a used engine from the UWST the other day. Figured I'd slap together a "mini high-speed battleship" for fun.

content.cn: 我以为这书是讲战舰的，买回来才发现是科幻小说。看了几页，我还纳闷啥时候有这么高科技的玩意儿了呢。
content.en: Thought this was a legit battleship manual, turns out it's sci-fi! Flipped through a few pages and was like, "Since when do we have tech this fancy?!"

content.cn: 管理员，您喜欢看电影吗？
content.en: Endmin, you like movies?

content.cn: 导演她也是怪人。为这一个镜头，还把我的毛从黑白染成红的了。
content.en: The director's a real character too. For that one damn shot, she had me dye my fur from black-and-white to fire-engine red.

content.cn: 你的经历比我知道的还丰富。
content.en: Your resume's wilder than I thought.

content.cn: 大潘师傅的工作履历，跨度比我想的还大。
content.en: Master Da Pan's career range just keeps expanding, huh?

content.cn: 离开宏山科学院后，我想散散心，长长见识。
content.en: After leaving HAS, I figured I'd wander a bit — see the world, learn a thing or two.

content.cn: 当年把存款都捐了……兜儿里没钱，就一边打工一边旅行。把塔卫二上的几个大城市转了个遍。
content.en: Back then, I donated my whole nest egg... Ended up drifting from job to job, just enough to keep moving. Saw every metropolis on Talos-II that way.

content.cn: 您要是有空，一定得去菈梵朵玛看看。那音乐节叫一个精彩。
content.en: If you ever get the chance, you gotta hit up La Fantoma. Their music festivals are absolute madness in the best way.

content.cn: 唉，其实……刚踏上旅行时，我心里特别焦虑。
content.en: Ah, hell... Truth is, when I first hit the road, I was chew'n my claws off with nerves.

content.cn: 我猜你害怕虚度光阴。
content.en: Guessing you were scared of ... wasting time?

content.cn: 之前我在塔卫二瞎逛时，机缘巧合，客串过几部电影。有一部要上映了，导演给我寄了张电影票。
content.en: Back when I was bumming around Talos-II, I somehow wound up as an extra in a few flicks. One of 'em's finally hitting the screens, and the director mailed me a ticket.

content.cn: 难道是担心脱离正轨，再也回不去了？
content.en: Were you scared that once you jumped the rails, you'd never slot back in?

content.cn: 不愧是管理员，一针见血。
content.en: Wow Endmin, always cutting right to the bone, aren't ya?

content.cn: 留在宏科院，我是先进科研工作者潘远。离开宏科院，名头贡献，全都烟消云散了。那我是谁？
content.en: At HAS, I was Vanguard Scientist Pan Yuan. But when I walked away, all those titles and credits turned to smoke. So who the hell am I then?

content.cn: 老师给我打电话时，虽然不明说，但我也能听出来她老人家拐弯抹角，怪我冲动。
content.en: Whenever my old mentor called, she never said it straight, but I could hear that disapproval twistin' through every word. Like I'd gone and kicked over the chessboard.

content.cn: 直到有一天爬到山上，看到天上的塔罗斯，映照着地上的塔罗斯城——我确定自己没浪费时间。
content.en: Then one day, I hauled myself up some mountain pass and saw Talos in the sky, lighting up Talos City below... That's when I knew. Not a damn second went wasted.

content.cn: 新蓝卡坞、塞梦珂……我走过一个又一个地方……
content.en: New Wrankwood, Simonch... I kept putting one foot after another. Going from place to place...

content.cn: 见众生，知道人生百态。见天地，认清自己的渺小……
content.en: I walked among the people, learned every shade of life. I stood before the vast sky and earth ... and finally saw my own smallness.

content.cn: 尝过各种各样的食物，才能取其精华，才有现在的“辣么大”火锅店嘛！
content.en: Had to taste every damn flavor under Talos, that's how you learn what really sings. Hell, that's the whole soul behind LA-ME-DA now!

content.cn: 说到食物，你好像忘记了一件事……
content.en: You know, with all the food talk... I think you're forgetting something?

content.cn: 听说口碑还不错。您要想看的话，我把票给您拿去。
content.en: Word is, it's not half bad. Want me to swing that ticket your way?

content.cn: 请您吃饭嘛，没忘没忘。我再琢磨琢磨菜单。
content.en: The meal promise? Wouldn't dare forget. Just gotta fine-tune the menu.

content.cn: 对了，您还要不要电影票？
content.en: Btw, you still want the ticket?

content.cn: 当然，我要去欣赏一下你的演技。
content.en: Absolutely. Wouldn't miss your silver-screen debut for the world.

content.cn: 当然，我已经摩拳擦掌、迫不及待了。
content.en: Of course. Already rolling up my sleeves for a proper cinematic roast.

content.cn: ……我怎么感觉，您回来肯定要笑话我呢？
content.en: ...Yeah, no way you're walkin' outta that theater without ribbin' me for life.

content.cn: 这么有意义的事情，不自己去看看吗？
content.en: Wouldn't you want to see it yourself? Seems like a pretty special moment.

content.cn: 看到自己在屏幕里，变成另一个人，过着另一种人生，观众再送上两声大笑，多别扭。
content.en: Watching yourself on screen, playin' at being someone else, then hearing strangers cackle at it? Nah, that's way too much skin-crawlin' for me.

content.cn: 黎风他们肯定有兴趣，不让他们去看吗？
content.en: What about Lifeng and the crew? Bet they'd kill to see this.

content.cn: 别别别，饶了我吧。那几个孩子能拿我打趣到明年！
content.en: Have some mercy! Those brats would never let me live it down 'til next winter at least.

content.cn: 而且我就是去当块背景板，都不一定能看得见我……那个角色叫“顺拐炒饭大王”，全片就一个镜头，站在反派后边儿颠勺。
content.en: Besides, I was basically set dressing. Doubt you'd even spot me. Played some guy called the Wok-Flipping King in one scene — just clanging a spatula behind the villain.

content.cn: 管理员，大潘师傅决定好菜单了，晚点来打牙祭啊。
content.en: Endmin, I finalized the menu. Swing by later for a proper feast. Da Pan's kitchen's open.

content.cn: 那就叫上小陈、佩丽卡监督，还有秦工程师一起，都来都来。
content.en: Perfect. Call in Chen, supervisor Perlica, even Engineer Qin! The more the merrier, especially with this spread.

content.cn: 你跟大家关系真好。
content.en: Crew sure is family.

content.cn: 食客越多，主厨越来劲儿。
content.en: More mouths to feed just fires me up.

content.cn: 冷盘热菜，摆上一桌，食客们聊点儿心事。我在一边听，还能帮年轻人解决些问题，多好。
content.en: Cold dishes, hot plates, whole table groaning under 'em. Folks sharing stories over bites, me listening in... Maybe even knock some sense into the young'uns. Damn perfect, if you ask me.

content.cn: 你自己的心事呢？你好像从不跟其他人说。
content.en: And what about your stories? Notice you never put 'em on the table.

content.cn: 你希望帮大家的忙，但自己却不依赖别人。
content.en: You're quick to fix others' plates ... but never let anyone set yours.

content.cn: 我啊？
content.en: Me?

content.cn: 其实……这顿饭一直拖着，也是我怕在饭桌上聊天，一个不小心就把身上的事儿都倒给您了。
content.en: Truth is... I kept puttin' this meal off 'cause once we start talking, I might just spill everything right there between the appetizers and main course.

content.cn: 担心我说出去，不信任我吗？
content.en: You're worried I'd talk? Or ... that I wouldn't get it?

content.cn: 我以为我们关系不错，是误解吗？
content.en: Thought we had that trust. Was I wrong?

content.cn: 哪儿能啊，咱俩关系第一铁！
content.en: No way, you're my ride-or-die, Endmin!

content.cn: 主要是跟宏科院之间那些陈芝麻烂谷子，没必要拿出来给别人添堵，都过去多少年了……
content.en: It's just … no point dredging up old grievances with HAS. What's done is done, right?

content.cn: 我怕您听了替我纠结。心里装事儿一多，就容易食欲不振。
content.en: I don't wanna plant all that mess in your head. Heavy stories kill appetites faster than spoiled meat.

content.cn: 但这段时间下来，也跟您说得七七八八了。
content.en: Though ... guess I've already spilled most of it to you anyway.

content.cn: 您身上有种天塌下来都能扛着的气质，这话可不是跟您客套啊！
content.en: Endmin, that sky could fall and you'd probably prop it up. And I don't hand out compliments just to be polite!

content.cn: 你也有这种气质，所以大家愿意依赖你。
content.en: Takes one to know one. That's why everyone leans on you when the ground shakes.

content.cn: 终于找到适合打牙祭的日子了？
content.en: Finally found the perfect day for a proper feast, huh?

content.cn: 嘿，夸我？我可当真了。
content.en: Whoa, better mean that! I will be insufferable about it for weeks.

content.cn: 我本领不大，只要是能帮上终末地的忙，就比什么都强。
content.en: My skill set's nothing fancy, but long as it keeps Endfield standing, that's victory enough for me

content.cn: 您也甭跟我客气。有什么难处，尽管找我大潘！
content.en: And quit with the formalities, Endmin. Hit a snag? Da Pan's your man.

content.cn: 如果有想倾诉的事，你可以放心地找我，我不会觉得麻烦。
content.en: Anytime you need to unload, I'm here. Won't ever be "trouble".

content.cn: 唉，就是这样，大伙儿才不自觉地依赖您。不过我也能理解。
content.en: Hah! That's exactly why everyone ends up leanin' on you. But ... yeah. Get it now.

content.cn: 咱们每个人都是独立的个体，但又需要跟别人凑在一起。
content.en: Funny thing. We're all solid standing alone ... but life tastes better when the tables are full.

content.cn: 如果能把自己的力量传递出去，心里头就喜滋滋的，对吧？
content.en: Nothing like that glow when your strength sparks something in others, right?

content.cn: 您也甭跟我客气。有什么难处，尽管找我大潘！
content.en: And quit with the formalities, Endmin. Hit a snag? Da Pan's your man.

content.cn: 管理员，我先做菜去。您可别迟到。
content.en: Alright Endmin, kitchen's calling. Don't you dare show up late.

content.cn: 打牙祭可不用挑日子。心情好得吃好的，心情不好更得吃好的，顿顿好。
content.en: Feast days ain't got no calendar. Good mood? Eat well. Bad mood? Eat better. Every meal's a celebration.

content.cn: 等等我，我去给你打下手。
content.en: Wait up, I'm coming in as your sous-chef.

content.cn: 好啊，早来早吃上。咱们开饭！
content.en: Damn right, early birds get first crack at the feast. Let's eat!

content.cn: 民以食为天，吃饭比天大。咱们宏山人，所有的生存智慧都在这锅里。
content.en: Food's the first law of heaven. Always comes before everything else. For us Hongshan folks, all our survival wisdom's right in this pot.

content.cn: 主要是招待您，得多准备一阵子，把压箱底的好菜都拿出来。
content.en: I held off until now mainly 'cause it's for you, Endmin. Gotta dig deep, haul out every last secret recipe I've been sittin' on.

content.cn: 糖醋鳞、红烧裂兽、盐焗羽兽、干炒兽肉河粉、兽肉蒸饺……
content.en: Sweet-sour fin, braised mangler, salt-baked fowl, wok-fried muck chow, steamed muck dumplings...

content.cn: 太多了吧，吃不完，根本吃不完。
content.en: Whoa there! That's enough to feed a small army.

content.cn: 管理员，打扰一下！
content.en: Hey Endmin, sorry to bother you!

content.cn: 我更看重在任务过程中展现出来的东西。
content.en: Well, I focus more on how everyone performed during the mission. Process matters.

content.cn: 原来管理员是过程主义者。
content.en: Oh, so you're a process-oriented person.

content.cn: 比起结果，这是一种把过程当作答案来对待的方式。选择怎样的方法、用怎样的手段、坚持怎样的节奏……本身就是意义所在。
content.en: I see why you think so. Instead of just focusing on the outcome, you see process itself as the answer. Your choices, your approach, your pace... Each carries true significance.

content.cn: 我更看重队员之间的默契与配合。
content.en: Well, I focus more on how well the team worked together during the mission.

content.cn: 我也这么觉得！好开心能和管理员达成一致。
content.en: Great minds think alike! I'm glad we're on the same page, Endmin.

content.cn: 人与人之间的信任和默契，最能看出一个团队的实力。能彼此托付、并肩作战的队伍，才能走更远的路。
content.en: Trust and teamwork really show how capable a team is. Only those who can count on each other and fight side by side can go far.

content.cn: 不过在我眼里，管理员既会为了目标坚定不移，也很注重过程中的表现，还对每个伙伴都关照入微。
content.en: But I've seen how you lead, you stick to your goals, pay attention to how things get done, and look out for every teammate.

content.cn: 从每个方向都能看到不同的管理员，很难区分出您更侧重哪一面。
content.en: Every perspective shows a different side of you, Endmin. It's hard to say which matters most to you.

content.cn: 与其说你是在讨论任务评价侧重点，倒不如说是在观察分析我？
content.en: So this isn't really about getting my advice, it's more like you're trying to observe and study me?

content.cn: 呀，管理员，被您发现了！
content.en: Oopsie, you caught me :P

content.cn: 我在整理总结Z7行动组的任务心得，想向您请教。
content.en: I'm working on Op Z7's mission reflections. Hoping to get your advice.

content.cn: 管理员别生气！我这么做是有原因的！
content.en: Please don't be mad! I have my reasons!

content.cn: 一开始，我只是想试试看能不能从行动记录中，归纳出对Z7有用的优化心得。
content.en: At first, I was looking at Z7's mission logs. I wanted to summarize optimization tips for the team.

content.cn: 后来我扩大了查阅范围，被管理员在终末地的行动中所扮演的角色吸引住了。
content.en: Then I expanded my search and looked into other materials... I was drawn to the role you played in the field.

content.cn: 就忍不住想要为管理员做一个人格画像，作为辅助理解用途的内部资料。请放心，不会外传的！
content.en: So I thought, why not make a little personality profile of you for my own reference? Don't worry, it'll stay between us!

content.cn: 做好了给我看看，我来补充些没写到的部分。
content.en: Show me when it's done. I'll add anything you missed.

content.cn: 要是认真的，那就继续观察吧，秋栗组长。
content.en: If you really think it'll help, then keep observing and studying, Captain Akekuri.

content.cn: 谢谢管理员！在完成之后，我会呈交给您第一个阅览。
content.en: Thanks, Endmin! You'll be the first to read it when I finish!

content.cn: 如果愿意的话，希望届时能署上您的名字！
content.en: And if it's okay, I'd love to put your name on it too!

content.cn: 嘿嘿，这是表示不反对吗？那我就发问啦！对于一次外勤任务的评价，管理员更看重什么呢？
content.en: Hehe, you're not saying no, so I'll just ask! When evaluating a field mission, what matters more to you?

content.cn: 任务目标完成度？过程中的表现？还是队员的默契与配合？
content.en: Objectives achieved, how everyone performed, or how well the team worked together?

content.cn: 那当然要看任务完成的结果了。
content.en: Well, I focus more on whether the mission objectives were achieved.

content.cn: 果然！我就猜您是结果导向型。
content.en: Ha, I knew you'd be results-oriented!

content.cn: 不论多么不可能的任务，只要有管理员在，最后都能奇迹般地完成。或许就是因为这个？
content.en: Somehow, even the hardest missions succeed when you're there. Maybe that's why results matter most to you.

content.cn: 管理员，现在方便聊一会儿吗？
content.en: Endmin, do you have a minute?

content.cn: 怪不得我常见到管理员用咖啡提神，不过有兴趣的话，可以试一些新口味。
content.en: No wonder I've seen you with coffee to keep awake sometimes. If you like, I can suggest some new flavors for you to try!

content.cn: 茶吧，尤其是带清香和回甘的。
content.en: I'll go for tea. Specially ones with a nice fragrance and a smooth finish.

content.cn: 咦？我还以为您是咖啡派的！没想到管理员更喜欢茶。
content.en: Eh? I thought you were a coffee fan!

content.cn: 相比之下我更喜欢冷饮！
content.en: I prefer cold drinks!

content.cn: 管理员……果然永远让人猜不透。
content.en: Endmin... You're always full of surprises.

content.cn: 总之，感觉对管理员的理解又多了一点点。
content.en: But I guess I understand you a tiny bit better now.

content.cn: 你怎么会忽然问这个问题？<image="sns_emoji_013">
content.en: Why ask this all of a sudden?<image="sns_emoji_013">

content.cn: 我想我猜到你要干什么了。<image="sns_emoji_017">
content.en: I think I know what you're up to.<image="sns_emoji_017">

content.cn: 哈哈，本来就没想要瞒着管理员，我就直接说吧。
content.en: Haha, I wasn't keeping it a secret, so I'll just say it.

content.cn: 如果正忙的话，我可以等您空闲时再来打扰。
content.en: I'll come back later if you're busy now.

content.cn: 我想邀请您参加一次我们的小组茶会。
content.en: I'd like to invite you to a small tea gathering with us.

content.cn: 这就是“秋栗的热饮时间”吗？
content.en: Oh, is this Akekuri's Cozy Drink Party?

content.cn: 啊！原来这都传到管理员的耳朵里了，真没想到。
content.en: Ah! How did you know?

content.cn: 没错，我是经常准备好茶点，和队友们一边享用，一边布置行动，讨论方案。
content.en: I usually prepare tea and snacks, and while the team enjoys them, we talk missions and plans.

content.cn: 但那不单纯是为了战术准备，而是……让所有人都放松下来，重新同步节奏。在热气升起来的时候，人也更容易开口。
content.en: But it's not just about planning ... it helps everyone relax and get back in rhythm. Tea makes people calm, so it's easier for them to speak up.

content.cn: 这可能是最别致的行动部署会吧，所以就传开了。
content.en: Maybe it's an efficient and elegant team meeting setup so people start talking about it.

content.cn: 听起来倒像是某种仪式。
content.en: I guess it does make things more special. Almost ceremonial, I'd say.

content.cn: 您说得对！仪式感，应该就是团队凝聚的一部分吧！如果有机会，管理员也可以来参加一次？
content.en: Yes! That little bit of ceremony is what helps the team bond. If you like, you could join us once!

content.cn: 哦？是想趁机邀请我成为Z7的“行动顾问”？
content.en: Oh? Are you trying to rope me in as Z7's "advisor"?

content.cn: 不不不，这次是“不聊工作的偷懒茶会”，虽然我是行动组的负责人，但我不想让Z7变成只有训练和行动的地方。
content.en: No no no, it's gonna be a fun-only tea break. Even though I'm the captain, I don't want my team doing nothing but work.

content.cn: 就是我准备饮料，卡契尔做点心，大家坐在一起，聊聊天气、口味、八卦，然后一起玩玩我们自制的桌游。
content.en: I'll prepare the drinks, Catcher will handle the snacks, and we'll all just sit, chat about weather, food, gossip ... maybe even play our own little board games.

content.cn: 要是我一来，大家都不敢偷懒了怎么办？
content.en: What if everyone stops goofing off the moment I show up?

content.cn: 恰恰相反！连管理员都会和我们一起“偷懒”，反而能让大家对终末地感到更加亲近。
content.en: Trust me, everyone would love to have you there! Having you around lets us all chill together, and it makes the team feel tighter.

content.cn: 那就恭敬不如从命了。
content.en: Then I suppose I'll come.

content.cn: 我正在享受任务间隙难得的平静。
content.en: I'm just taking a rare breather between missions.

content.cn: 太好了，到时候，就请管理员品鉴我准备的“秋栗特调”吧。
content.en: Yay! Can't wait for you to try my special "Akekuri Blend" ^_^

content.cn: 状态不大轻松，所以我决定短暂地偷一下懒。
content.en: Things haven't been easy, so I decided to steal a little break. I'm not slacking off though.

content.cn: 看来我“打扰”得正是时候。
content.en: Looks like I caught you at just the right time :P

content.cn: 管理员，如果在这种需要放松的时候，来一杯热饮，您会选择哪种？咖啡？茶？
content.en: Endmin, when you need to relax, what's your go-to warm drink? Coffee? Tea?

content.cn: 会喝咖啡，几种特定的口味。
content.en: I drink coffee sometimes. Specific flavors only.

content.cn: 嗯。佩丽卡监督已经给我批了假期，明天就动身。但我现在有点害怕。
content.en: Supervisor Perlica has already granted my leave. I'm setting out tomorrow, but I can't help feeling a little afraid.

content.cn: 你为什么害怕？
content.en: What are you afraid of?

content.cn: 曾经，妈妈对我的期许，是留在她身边，最后继承家业。
content.en: Back then, my mom hoped I would stay by her side and eventually take over the family business.

content.cn: 但我还是选择了终末地。我心中怀有对她的愧疚。
content.en: But I chose to join Endfield instead ... and I've always carried some guilt toward her for that.

content.cn: 我挺好奇，如果你留在环塔商会，会是什么样的人？
content.en: I'm actually curious... If you had stayed with the Talos-II General Chamber of Commerce, what kind of person would you be now?

content.cn: 应该还会像现在这样拼尽全力吧，只不过是穿着正装，在办公室里处理各种企业事务，或者披着礼服穿梭在社交场合里。
content.en: I think I'd still work as hard as I do now, only in a different setting ... wearing formal business attire in an office, or in an evening dress at social gatherings.

content.cn: 如果当初你改变了主意的话，过的就是这种人生了，或许也不是那么不能接受？
content.en: If you had made a different choice back then, that would be your life now. Perhaps it wouldn't have been such a bad one.

content.cn: 最近感觉你好像有点心神不宁，发生什么事了？
content.en: You seem a bit distracted lately. Did something happen?

content.cn: 说得也是，人生不是只有一条路径。
content.en: Perhaps. There's never only one path in life.

content.cn: 不过那样的话，我可能不会遇见终末地的大家，也不会和Z7行动组的伙伴们并肩作战，更不会认识您。
content.en: But if I had gone that way, I never would've met everyone in Endfield, fought with Op Z7, or had the chance to meet you.

content.cn: 对我来说，这就是决定性的差别。
content.en: And that's what makes all the difference for me.

content.cn: 所以，你选择了自己更想要的道路。而且你的能力也更适合这里。
content.en: It's great that you chose the path you truly wanted. Your abilities shine here.

content.cn: 谢谢管理员。我本来只是想和您聊聊心情，却好像变成一次人生复盘了。
content.en: Thank you, Endmin. I meant only to share my thoughts, but it feels like we've just reviewed my whole life.

content.cn: 偶尔这样想象一下人生的可能性，也挺好。
content.en: Sometimes it's nice to imagine the other paths life could've taken.

content.cn: 管理员，您有想过另一种人生吗？比如，如果不是终末地的管理员，现在会在做什么？
content.en: Have you ever thought about yours? If you weren't the Endmin, what would you be doing now?

content.cn: 果然逃不过管理员的眼睛。
content.en: I knew I couldn't keep anything from you.

content.cn: 我想我依然还是会做和在终末地时类似的事。哪怕换了形式，也改不了这点。
content.en: Honestly, I'd probably still be doing something similar. The setting might change, but the calling wouldn't.

content.cn: 嗯，理想的道路，是不会改变的。
content.en: Agree. When it's your true path, things don't change much.

content.cn: 而且您身上有那种能够聚集人心的特质。如果真有这么一天，我可能依然会是您的部下哦。
content.en: You have this gift for bringing people together. Even if you lived a completely different life, I think I'd still end up working with you.

content.cn: 谢谢管理员，我好多了。我会把刚刚我们聊的东西告诉妈妈。
content.en: Thank you very much, Endmin. I feel a lot better now. I'll share what we talked about with mom.

content.cn: 我想让她知道，我不是在逃避什么，也不是在任性，而是认认真真做出了选择。
content.en: I want her to know I'm not running from anything, and I'm not being selfish. This is a choice I made, the path I truly want.

content.cn: 也正因为如此，我更想把现在这段时间过得彻底——把自己所有的热情、努力都投进去，不留遗憾。
content.en: For that reason, I want to live my life to the fullest, pouring all my passion and effort into it, so I have no regrets.

content.cn: 我会回来向您报到的。
content.en: I'll report to you when I'm back.

content.cn: 前几天我刚收到一则消息，是关于妈妈的。
content.en: Couple of days ago, I got some news about my mom.

content.cn: 斯波女士？她怎么了？
content.en: What happened? Is she alright?

content.cn: 让管理员费心了。就是妈妈一个人操持商社的事情，劳累过度，病倒了。
content.en: Thank you for asking. She's been running the company on her own, and overworked herself until she fell ill.

content.cn: 你可以休个假，去陪陪她。
content.en: You should take some time off to be with her.

content.cn: 管理员，我听队长说，您在给Z7制订一套新的作战方案，希望我能协助？
content.en: Endmin, Captain mentioned you're drafting new combat protocols for Z7 and require my assistance?

content.cn: 如果队长的汇总报告已经写完了，那么可以去食堂找她，今天专门供应了东国口味的点心。至于埃特拉——
content.en: Captain should be in the mess hall if she's finished the after-action report. They're serving special Higashi pastries today. And Estella...

content.cn: 大概率在源石虫培育室。她最近对源石虫相关的食品很感兴趣，不止一回问过我，哪里能喝到源石虫酿的酒。
content.en: High probability she's in the Originium Slug cultivation chamber. She's been ... unusually interested in slug-based cuisine lately. Has asked me multiple times where to find slug-brewed liquor.

content.cn: 那现在萤石和安塔尔在哪儿？
content.en: What about Fluorite and Antal?

content.cn: 萤石恐怕在训练室。昨天她就预定了一整天，估计是想尽快克服上次行动的失误……虽然她嘴上总是说无所谓。
content.en: Probably the training room. Fluorite booked it for the whole day yesterday, probably pushing to correct that last op's mistake... Though she'd never admit it matters.

content.cn: 安塔尔应该去了公共资料室。他最近对某种源石机械的新型功能很好奇，借了好几本书，说等看完后想跟管理员交流。
content.en: Either the public archives or his dorm for Antal. He's been researching some new Originium tech functions and checked out several books. Said he wants to discuss them with you after reading.

content.cn: 你真的很了解他们啊……以后不用担心找不到人了。
content.en: You really do know them inside out... Won't have to worry about tracking anyone down anymore.

content.cn: 不愧是“活导航”，就靠你找他们了。
content.en: Living GPS indeed. I'm leaving the squad-tracking to you.

content.cn: 都是积累的经验罢了。Z7的大家都很……特别，我想和他们每个人都做好配合，自然需要花费更多的功夫了解他们。
content.en: Just accumulated experience. Everyone in Z7 is ... particular. To synchronize properly with each of them requires deeper observation.

content.cn: 所以我每回都会认真观察大家的作战方式，乃至平时的行踪，这样就能提前做好不少的准备，无论是作战时还是休整时。
content.en: So I keep an eye on their combat patterns and what they do off-duty. This way I'm pretty prepped for both the battlefield and downtime.

content.cn: 或许不需要频繁找他们过来了，有问题可以直接问你。
content.en: Maybe I don't need to call them in so often. Could just consult you directly.

content.cn: 或许可以邀请你当这次Z7小组作战方案的调整顾问。
content.en: Should invite you as a tactical consultant for Z7's protocol revisions.

content.cn: ……谢谢管理员的信任。
content.en: ...Your trust won't be misplaced, Endmin.

content.cn: 不过，我想很多问题我还做不到替Z7的其他人回答，比如实战方面的一些规划，管理员最好还是和他们本人确认。
content.en: Though I can't speak for the others on everything. Battle plans? Better check with them direct. Z7's all ... sort of particular.

content.cn: 放心，我有自己的考量。
content.en: Don't worry. I've got my own parameters in mind.

content.cn: 谢谢你的建议，我会多留意的。
content.en: Copy that. I'll factor in your input.

content.cn: 我明白了。那么管理员，之后有任何需要我协助的方面，都可以随时联系我。
content.en: Understood, Endmin. Just signal if you need backup. Any hour.

content.cn: 我会提前确认自己的时间安排，尽量不影响任务。
content.en: I'll clear my schedule first. Won't let it clash with ops.

content.cn: 嗯，我需要一个能快速找到Z7成员的人，便于调整方案……秋栗觉得你最合适。
content.en: Yeah. Need someone who can track down Z7 squad fast for tweaking the plans... Akekuri says you're most suited for this role.

content.cn: 嗯，我需要一个能快速找到Z7成员的人，便于调整方案……秋栗向我推荐了你。
content.en: Yeah. Need someone who can track down Z7 squad fast for tweaking the plans... Akekuri recommended you.

content.cn: 说你简直就是“活导航”。
content.en: Says you're basically a living GPS.

content.cn: ……队长她过奖了。我对队友们的了解只是比旁人多了一点而已。
content.en: ...Captain exaggerated. I simply observe our squad members more closely than most.

content.cn: 他们的行踪大多时候非常固定，没什么难判断的。
content.en: Their patrol patterns are mostly predictable. Not difficult to track.

content.cn: 那现在秋栗和埃特拉在哪儿？
content.en: Where's Akekuri and Estella right now?

content.cn: 管理员，我按您的最新一版方案，和其他人对练了一遍，这是录像——
content.en: Endmin, I ran the new protocols through live drills per your specs. Footage attached —

content.cn: 布朗宁医院？你要跑这么远去看病吗？
content.en: Browning Hospital? That's halfway across the land. Medical leave?

content.cn: 你生病了？先去医疗部门看看吧！
content.en: Are you sick? Maybe you should stop by the Medical Division first!

content.cn: 您误会了，管理员。
content.en: Not really, Endmin.

content.cn: 我只是想去看望我小时候的一位主治医生，他叫拉曼·哈伦特，这次医院搬迁后就要退休，去其他地方定居了。
content.en: I'm visiting Dr. Raman Harrent, my childhood physician. He's retiring and moving once the hospital relocates.

content.cn: 当初我的矿石病并发症非常严重，如果不是他坚持给我提供治疗方案，一直帮我调整身体状况，我或许根本来不了终末地……
content.en: Back then ... my Oripathy complications were pretty bad. Dr. Harrent kept tweaking my meds and pushing treatments. I probably wouldn't be here without him.

content.cn: 所以我想好好感谢他，也让他看看我现在的样子——我已不再是那个连下床都很困难的小男孩了。
content.en: I need to thank him properly. And I want to let him know that I'm no longer that kid who could barely move out of bed.

content.cn: 你能走到现在这一步……真的很不容易。
content.en: You've come a long way... Hell of a fight to get here.

content.cn: 能一步步坚持到现在……你已经非常厉害了。
content.en: To keep pushing forward all this time... You're exceptional, Catcher.

content.cn: 还好。现在回顾过去，我觉得自己只是比很多人更幸运一点罢了。
content.en: Luck played its part. I believe I had the right people at the right time.

content.cn: 文件[训练录像_001～004]已接收
content.en: File [Training_footage_001-004] Accepted

content.cn: 那时候获得了非常多的帮助，恢复期也比一般人短……顶多是复健的时候有些辛苦。
content.en: I had more support than most, so my recovery timeline was shorter than standard... Rehab was pretty rough, though.

content.cn: 但我的家人们给了我他们能给予的一切，如果没有他们的鼓励和支持，我想我也坚持不了那么久。
content.en: My family gave everything they had. Without that backing, I doubt I'd have lasted.

content.cn: 不管怎样，最后能克服病痛，成为一名合格的干员……都是你努力的结果，是属于你自己的功劳，别轻视它。
content.en: Regardless, surviving Oripathy and becoming a full operator... That's your fight. Your credit. Don't downplay it.

content.cn: ……谢谢您的认可，管理员。
content.en: ...Thank you for your recognition, Endmin.

content.cn: 在来到终末地后，我也遇到了不少如哈伦特医生那样，会为了他人的安危坚守到最后一刻的人……
content.en: Since arriving at Endfield, I met others like Surgeon Harrent. People who hold the line no matter what...

content.cn: 他们让我明白，有时候坚持做一件事不是为了结果，而是为了不留遗憾。
content.en: They taught me something: sometimes you dig in not for the win, but to make sure you have no regrets.

content.cn: 所以现在，我也想像他们一样，为那些需要帮助的人们贡献出一份自己的力量。
content.en: That's why I aim to stand where they stood and provide cover for those still advancing.

content.cn: 总之，假期后再见，管理员。我会带合金萝卜自由市的特产“瓶树水”回来的。
content.en: Anyway, I will see you post-leave, Endmin. I will bring some "Bottle Tree Sap" from Alloycarrot.

content.cn: 然后，下次的训练我可能无法到场……
content.en: One complication... I may miss the next training session...

content.cn: 它非常提神，很适合作为下下次训练时的饮品。
content.en: It's an optimal drink for post-training recovery cycles.

content.cn: 你是有别的安排吗？
content.en: You got priorities elsewhere?

content.cn: 是有什么特殊情况吗？
content.en: You got op-related conflict going on?

content.cn: 算是吧。我打算请一个长假，回合金萝卜自由市一趟……
content.en: I guess so. I'm requesting extended leave to the Free City of Alloycarrot...
