content.cn: 因为得赶在布朗宁医院搬迁前，所以比较着急。
content.en: It's urgent since Browning Hospital is relocating soon.

content.cn: 管理员，根据上次训练的情况，我写了一份《Z7作战方案个人调整建议》，希望可以帮到你。
content.en: Endmin, I've attached a Z7 Combat Protocols Adjustment Proposal (Individualized). Compiled from last drill data.

content.cn: 是我大哥，他给我寄的礼物……有些危险。
content.en: I got a gift from my eldest brother. The contents ... marginally volatile.

content.cn: 好像是商会新上市的一款炸弹无人机。我也是收到后才发现，原来这就是他通信里说的“惊喜”……
content.en: Turns out it's one of those new bomber drones from the TGCC. My brother said he was sending a "surprise", and I only found out what it was when it arrived.

content.cn: 本来可以先口头和队长报备，之后有空再填写表格的，但我之前好几次都因为赶着出任务，没能及时登记……
content.en: I could have just told Captain first and filed the form later ... but I kept missing deadlines during ops prep... My bad.

content.cn: 队长和我说，这次要是再不及时登记，我可能会上武库的黑名单。
content.en: Captain warned that if I fail again, I'll be blacklisted by the arsenal.

content.cn: 好几次？那些没来得及登记的物品，难道全是你家人给你的礼物？
content.en: There's been multiple times? Don't tell me all those unregistered items were ... family gifts.

content.cn: 对……全都是。
content.en: ...You're not wrong.

content.cn: 你家人到底给你准备了多少“惊喜”啊……
content.en: Just how many "surprises" is your family stockpiling for you?

content.cn: 可能……还挺多的。
content.en: Quite ... a bit, probably.

content.cn: 有一些是商会的新式武器，还有一些是塞什卡的巫术制品……
content.en: Some TGCC prototypes ... few Seš'qa witchcraft items...

content.cn: 文件[终末地干员个人携带危险物品报备表]已接收
content.en: File [Endfield Operator Personal Hazardous Materials Declaration Form] Accepted

content.cn: 最夸张的大概是上回二姐送给我的外骨骼，把当时负责的负责物流的后勤干员都给吓到了。
content.en: My second sister's "gift" last time was ... a custom exosuit. That thing even spooked the logistics operators on shift.

content.cn: 我后来也有写信给他们，让他们稍微注意一点礼物的……惊吓性。但他们好像都不觉得这些东西有多危险……
content.en: I sent letters asking them to dial back the "surprise factor", but they don't seem to think any of the gifts is dangerous...

content.cn: 虽然我猜是那场让我患上矿石病的意外让他们有了阴影，但这种过度的保护，很多时候也让我有些为难……
content.en: I guess that Oripathy incident messed them up. But their protection ... makes things complicated.

content.cn: 就好像在他们眼里，我一直都还没长大似的。
content.en: Guess to them I'm still that kid who couldn't sit up without help.

content.cn: 因为他们是你的家人。
content.en: That's family for you.

content.cn: 对于珍视的家人，他们会担忧自己给予的关怀是否足够。
content.en: When family cares, they'll always wonder if it's enough.

content.cn: 其实不只你的家人，很多在你身边的人也像他们那样在乎你，比如Z7的大家。
content.en: Not just them, Z7's always got your back too.

content.cn: 上回秋栗就因为担心你会勉强自己，调整了工作安排；安塔尔也不止一次询问过逗你笑的窍门……
content.en: Akekuri rearranged her whole schedule last time just to keep you from pushing too hard. And Antal's asked me twice now for "how to make Catcher laugh" tutorials...

content.cn: 他们都想用自己的方式给予你一份关心，我也不例外。
content.en: They've all got their ways of looking out for you. Myself included.

content.cn: 抱歉，发错文件了……稍等。
content.en: Apologies. That's the wrong file... Give me a second.

content.cn: 这么一说，我都想送你一份礼物了。比如特种技术部门最新配备的辅助装备组，怎么样？
content.en: Since we're at it, I might as well send you a gift too? How about the new Specialist Tech Division support kit?

content.cn: 管理员……你怎么也……
content.en: Endmin ... you too...

content.cn: 嗯？我怎么了？有什么不对吗？
content.en: Hm? What's wrong? Did I overstep?

content.cn: 没什么。就是……我找到正确的文件了，你记得看……
content.en: Nothing. Just ... found the right file. Please review when able...

content.cn: 我……我先去训练了……
content.en: I ... um ... gotta do drills now...

content.cn: 文件[Z7作战方案个人调整建议]已接收
content.en: File [Z7 Combat Protocols Adjustment Proposal (Individualized)] Accepted

content.cn: 这是什么？你带了危险物品过来？
content.en: What's this? You're transporting hazardous materials?

content.cn: 危险物品？卡契尔，你这是打算……？
content.en: Hazardous materials? Catcher, what exactly are you planning?

content.cn: 管理员不是,】dg/;ay【。
content.en: Endmofistar,; dg/;ay ]f.

content.cn: 对不起，刚刚不小心打翻了水壶。
content.en: Sorry, I knocked over the water bottle.

content.cn: 管理员，你听过那首《开拓区迷情》吗？
content.en: Endmin, ever heard "Frontier Obsession"?

content.cn: 它的作者据说是一个裂地者，这个风格现在被称为“裂地风”。
content.en: The artist's an LB. People call this "Breaker style".

content.cn: 你听这轰炸耳膜的刺激感，令人陶醉……
content.en: Listen to that ear-blasting melody. Kinda addictive...

content.cn: 我之前发给了秋栗他们，他们都说我在恶作剧。
content.en: I sent it to Akekuri and the gang ... they said I was just trolling them.

content.cn: 不知道该怎么评价……
content.en: I don't know what to say...

content.cn: 果然，这种风格的评价很两极分化。
content.en: It's okay. This style really splits opinions.

content.cn: 秋栗他们也觉得接受不了，我倒是蛮喜欢的。
content.en: Akekuri and the others didn't like it, but I kinda dig it.

content.cn: 毕竟很少有机会听到裂地者写的歌。
content.en: I mean, it's rare to hear a song from an LB.

content.cn: 裂地者的歌？铁痕电台真是来者不拒啊。
content.en: The artist's an LB? Metal Scar Radio really plays anything, huh.

content.cn: 毕竟铁痕电台的标准只有一个——“是否有趣”。
content.en: Well, their only standard is, "Is it interesting"?

content.cn: 这歌最近火得不得了。
content.en: This song's been blowing up everywhere.

content.cn: 不光裂地者的歌……以前还收录过寂语修会的魔性电子乐，还有众生长地的神秘打击乐。
content.en: They've played all kinds of stuff ... EDM from the Cabal of Tranquility, mysterious percussion from the Hannabit Circuit.

content.cn: 啊……那变幻莫测的奇妙旋律……
content.en: Ah... those unpredictable melodies... <3

content.cn: 对了，管理员有什么喜欢的音乐类型吗？
content.en: So, Endmin, what kind of music do you like?

content.cn: 我喜欢轻柔一点的音乐，适合工作时听。
content.en: I like light and softer music, good for listening while I work.

content.cn: 我喜欢足够刺激的音乐，这样才有趣。
content.en: I enjoy music that's exciting enough to keep things interesting.

content.cn: 我可不排斥任何一种音乐，全都喜欢。
content.en: Honestly, I'm open to any kind of music.

content.cn: 很有管理员风格的回答呢，嗯，我知道了。
content.en: Your answer really says a lot about you.

content.cn: 之后我也会经常给管理员推荐一些有意思的音乐的，敬请期待。
content.en: Alright. I'll recommend some cool tracks to you often, so stay tuned!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_002">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_002">

content.cn: 那是什么？新歌吗？发来听听。
content.en: Oh, is it a new track? Send me a link.

content.cn: 好直白的名字，是什么风格的？
content.en: That's a pretty blunt song name. What kind of music is it?

content.cn: 这首歌之前上过铁痕电台，话题度非常高。
content.en: It was on Metal Scar Radio before, got a lot of hype.

content.cn: 分享音频链接-[《开拓区迷情》，音频简介：由深渊释放出的迷离情绪……]
content.en: Here's the link. "Frontier Obsession" — full of mysterious, dizzying vibes from the Deep...

content.cn: 好有……特色的风格，嗯，很有特点……
content.en: Definitely ... a unique style...

content.cn: 管理员，我遇到一些问题……
content.en: Endmin... I've hit a snag...

content.cn: 能挥动那把重得要死的武器就已经是极限了……
content.en: Just swinging that heavy weapon is already my max...

content.cn: 但小道奇教官说我的武器都是已经做过轻量化处理的了……
content.en: And Lil' Dodge says it's already been lightened...

content.cn: 管理员，我是不是没救了？
content.en: Endmin, am I totally doomed?

content.cn: 之前的训练效果如何？有感受到什么变化吗？
content.en: Did the last training help at all?

content.cn: 嗯……身体酸疼了三天。
content.en: Well... I was sore for three days straight...

content.cn: 我差点以为自己要散架了……
content.en: I thought I died...

content.cn: 管理员，我是不是没救了？
content.en: Endmin, am I totally doomed?

content.cn: 让我看一下训练计划……等等，这已经是正常训练量的五分之一了吧？
content.en: Let me see your training plan. Whoa, this is only a fifth of the usual training load, right?

content.cn: 是吗……我还以为这是两倍的量……
content.en: Unbelievable... I thought it was double...

content.cn: 光是五分之一就已经让我精疲力竭了。
content.en: Even a fifth leaves me wiped out.

content.cn: 小道奇教官建议我适当提升一下体能水平，以便适配更先进的武器套装。
content.en: Lil' Dodge says I need to get stronger to use those fancy weapons properly.

content.cn: 管理员，我是不是没救了？
content.en: Endmin, am I totally doomed?

content.cn: 不过，任务应该不会受到什么影响，毕竟我的工作更多是情报收集……
content.en: I guess my missions won't be affected much, since I mostly do intel...

content.cn: 或者……有没有些其他训练方式？例如模拟器训练之类的？
content.en: But ... could I maybe try simulator training or something instead?

content.cn: 我可以找小道奇商量一下，试一下换成模拟器，再改良一下操作方式，让它更适配你的训练计划。
content.en: I can talk to Lil' Dodge, see if we can tweak the simulator to match your training plan.

content.cn: 真的吗？终于得救了……
content.en: Phew, that's good to hear...

content.cn: 管理员，你简直是我的救命恩人！
content.en: Endmin, you're my lifesaver!

content.cn: 我觉得传统的训练方式更好，不过，可以加入更多的兴趣训练。
content.en: The old-school way is better, but I can ask Lil' Dodge to add more fun exercises for you.

content.cn: 真的吗？终于得救了……
content.en: Phew, that's good to hear...

content.cn: 管理员，你简直是我的救命恩人！
content.en: Endmin, you're my lifesaver!

content.cn: 不至于，不至于。
content.en: It's nothing, really.

content.cn: 不，真的，我感觉自己又有了活下去的希望。总之，十分感激。
content.en: No, seriously! I feel like I've got a spark to keep going. Super thankful!

content.cn: 我觉得是个不错的建议。
content.en: I think he has a point.

content.cn: 你对此是什么看法？
content.en: How do you feel about that?

content.cn: 我……努力过了！但……对我来说难度太高了……
content.en: I've tried sooo hard! But ... my body says NOPE.

content.cn: 有没有什么不用训练也能增强体能的方式？
content.en: Isn't there a magic way to get fit without sweating?

content.cn: 你现在的体能情况如何？
content.en: How ... athletic are you now?

content.cn: 管理员，我听说你很关心我的伤势？
content.en: Endmin, I heard you were worried about my injuries?

content.cn: 你遇到过很多次这样的事吗？
content.en: Things like these happen often?

content.cn: 哈……那可是有够糟的。
content.en: Yes, when bad luck strikes...

content.cn: 回忆起来，我总是挂着各种各样的伤，有时候还会把同伴卷入其中。
content.en: Come to think of it, I'm always bruised ... and sometimes take others with me.

content.cn: 所以我选择了尽可能独自行动的工作。嗯……只要留好后手，大多数情况都能够应付。
content.en: That's why I stick to solo work. Backup plans help. Most of the time...

content.cn: 所以你身上才总是带着伤吗？
content.en: That's why you're always hurt?

content.cn: 碰到倒霉的时候就是这样的……
content.en: Yeah... When bad luck hits me...

content.cn: 托这些经历的福，我还学会了不少应急救治手段。
content.en: But thanks to all these experiences, I've learned quite a few emergency treatment skills.

content.cn: 萤石一开始还不相信，现在也会第一时间来找我了。
content.en: Even Fluorite didn't believe me at first, but now she comes to me right away.

content.cn: 一直这样“霉运缠身”很辛苦吧……
content.en: Being this unlucky all the time must be rough...

content.cn: 没事啦，不是什么大问题，只是运气不好。回来前碰到了火灾，点着了有毒的植物。
content.en: It's nothing serious. Just bad luck. I ran into a fire before coming back and got exposed to some toxic plants.

content.cn: 还好啦，没什么大不了的。
content.en: Eh, it's fine.

content.cn: 况且，在我看来，运气这东西总是守恒的。我只是多遇到了一些霉运，之后肯定会有好运在等着我。
content.en: I figure luck balances itself. Bad now, good later. Good luck will come eventually.

content.cn: 我遇到了Z7小队，加入了终末地，还认识了管理员，不是印证了这一点吗？
content.en: I met Z7, joined Endfield, and met you, isn't that proof?

content.cn: 你说得对，这对我们来说同样是幸运。
content.en: You're right. Meeting you is also our luck.

content.cn: 不过……这样的话，说明也会有不幸降临到你们身上吧……
content.en: But ... does that mean my misfortune might fall on you guys as well...?

content.cn: 所以，我们可以一起分担那些不幸。那对于一个人来说很难承受，但大家一起的话，一切问题都会顺利解决，不会再有那么多不幸。
content.en: Together, we can bear what's hard for one. That way, misfortune won't hit as hard anymore.

content.cn: 我们的目标，就是让那些不幸不再造成那么多伤害。接下来一切都会变得更好，不会再有那么多“霉运”缠身。
content.en: Our goal is to make sure misfortune doesn't cause so much harm. Things will get better, and bad luck won't weigh us down as much. Like you said, luck will come eventually.

content.cn: 这是情报工作中常常会发生的事，而且，运气不好这件事我已经习惯了。
content.en: Stuff like this happens all the time in intel work. Honestly, I'm used to it.

content.cn: 这样的话，幸运是不是也会相应变少了？
content.en: Uh ... does that mean there'll be less luck too?

content.cn: 这个……
content.en: Uh...

content.cn: 说笑的，不过……不怎么幸运也没关系。
content.en: Just kidding. It's okay if I'm not that lucky.

content.cn: 因为最大的幸运，我早就得到了。
content.en: Because I've already gotten the greatest luck long ago.

content.cn: “习惯了”是指？
content.en: Used to it?

content.cn: 我总是会遇到各种各样的突发情况，像是保险绳在出发前断掉，潜行窃听的时候被迫和一群牙兽待了很久……
content.en: Yeah ... like ropes snapping right before a mission, Tuskbeasts showing up while I'm gathering intel ... all sorts of chaos.

content.cn: 我已经习惯制定好备案，还有备案的备案，还有……嗯，总之会准备很多后手。
content.en: I always have backups, and backups for the backups...

content.cn: 这次也是，我准备了好几种野外应急药物，其中一种派上了用场。
content.en: This time, one of my emergency meds actually worked.

content.cn: 刚刚有个干员来传话，找我有事？
content.en: An operator just came by with a message. You wanted to talk?

content.cn: 和人说话那么累，如果还要照顾那些弯弯绕绕的小心思，那就太麻烦了。
content.en: Dealing with people is exhausting enough. Having to cater to all those convoluted little schemes is just too much trouble.

content.cn: 所以，我一般直接按照对面心里在想的来回答他们。
content.en: Sooooo I usually just answer people according to what's on their minds.

content.cn: 很不巧，需要我们小队出面的情况，交涉对象都不太习惯这种办法。
content.en: Unfortunately, the individuals we're forced to negotiate with in our team's operations rarely appreciate such ... directness.

content.cn: 很难想象会有人习惯这种“交涉”。如果你以前就经常这么做，我都要开始佩服你了。
content.en: Hard to believe anyone could get used to this kind of "negotiation"... If you've been pulling this off all along, mad respect for you.

content.cn: 其实这样反而有好处哦。
content.en: Well, my approach actually has its advantages.

content.cn: 我已经能想象对面恼羞成怒的样子了，难道以前没有出过事吗？
content.en: I can already picture them flying into a humiliated rage. You're telling me nothing's ever gone wrong before?

content.cn: 如果他们从一开始就没想过对人不利，就算我戳穿那层泡泡，最多只是挨几个白眼。
content.en: If they never intended any harm from the start, then the worst I'll get is a few dirty looks even if I pop that bubble.

content.cn: 但如果是另一种想法，以我们的身手，早些让他们把拳头亮出来，反而更安全。
content.en: But if their intentions were different ... then it's safer to make them show their fists early with our skills.

content.cn: 这套理论意外地自洽……不过秋栗在报告里对此还是很有意见，最好也多考虑考虑替你操心的队长。
content.en: Why does that make sense to me... BUT Akekuri clearly had strong opinions about this in the report. You should probably give more thought to your captain who worries about you.

content.cn: 放心，只要没错怪好人，她不会抱怨太久的。
content.en: Rest assured. So long as no innocent parties were harmed, she won't ramble too much.

content.cn: 我猜那群“当地人”到现在还没有过来投诉或者闹事，对吧？
content.en: I'm guessing those so-called locals haven't come to file a complaint or cause trouble yet, have they?

content.cn: 虽然报告里描述得很严重，但我们确实没有收到任何反馈。
content.en: Though the report made it sound severe, we haven't received any actual feedback.

content.cn: 所以，他们确实心里有鬼？
content.en: So they really did have something to hide?!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_027">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_027">

content.cn: 反正今天很闲，不如我去主动报案领笔赏钱吧。
content.en: Since we've got nothing better to do today, why don't I go file a report myself and claim the reward?

content.cn: 怎么样，一起来签个名？
content.en: What do you think? Care to sign your name with mine?

content.cn: 我刚看完秋栗提交的小队行动报告……你又差点和当地居民起冲突了？
content.en: I just finished reading Akekuri's team mission report... Did you almost get yourself into a conflict with the local residents again?

content.cn: 不必了，这件事就交给你处置吧。
content.en: I'm good. I'll leave this matter in your hands.

content.cn: 是没错。
content.en: Yup.

content.cn: 需要写点什么吗，我还剩几份检讨书可以一起给。
content.en: Need me to write up something? I still have a few copies of the reflection left. I can submit them together.

content.cn: 检讨书是留给会反省的人用的，但我觉得你并不会。
content.en: Reflections are for those capable of remorse, but I doubt you're one of them.

content.cn: 人力资源事务部的干员已经给我看了过往的行动报告。为什么每次都变成这样？
content.en: An operator from the HR Division has already shown me the past mission reports. Why does it always end up like this?

content.cn: 因为我们工作的特性吧。
content.en: 'Cuz of the nature of our work, I guess?

content.cn: [萤石]向你发送了一次提醒
content.en: [Fluorite] sent you a reminder

content.cn: 剩下几份就请你帮个忙，送给我的好队长和大蜥蜴他们几个吧。
content.en: As for the rest, do me a favor and deliver them to my dear Captain and the crew.

content.cn: 你给自己小队的人送礼物，为什么要从我这里绕一大圈？和他们闹矛盾了？
content.en: Why are you sending gifts to your own team through me? Did you have a falling out with them?

content.cn: 我像是那种人吗？
content.en: What?! Am I that kind of person?

content.cn: 其实我打算给他们送点东西，但他们一看见我背着手就会逃跑，只能麻烦你了。
content.en: Truth is, I meant to give them these gifts myself ... but they bolt the second they see me approaching with my hands behind my back. You're my only workaround.

content.cn: 我很理解他们，你掏出来的“惊喜”已经太多了。
content.en: Can't say I blame them. You've pulled one too many "surprises" already.

content.cn: 作为“受害者”之一，我只能说，你现在遇上的麻烦完全是咎由自取。
content.en: As one of the victims, all I can say is the trouble you're facing now is entirely self-inflicted.

content.cn: 不过，为什么突然想到送礼物？
content.en: But why the sudden urge to give gifts?

content.cn: 给你留了几个盒子，看到了吗？
content.en: I left a few boxes for you. See them?

content.cn: 后勤部门的干员来通知我，我才知道队长他们背着我为重建“异铁螺钉”捐了不少钱。
content.en: The logistics operator just informed me, turns out the Captain and the others donated a significant amount behind my back to rebuild the "Oriron Screw".

content.cn: 我对那个镇子其实没那么有归属感，但既然“老家”被人关照了，也算欠了次人情。
content.en: I mean, I never felt particularly attached to that town. But since someone's looking out for my "hometown", I suppose I owe them a favor.

content.cn: 礼尚往来是应该的。你给队员们送了些什么？
content.en: Returning the courtesy is only right. What did you get for the team?

content.cn: 尾部毛发护理液、大号备忘笔记本、超辛辣怪味糖豆。
content.en: Tail hair conditioner, large memo pads, and extra-spicy bizarre jelly beans.

content.cn: 还有一本《生活常识指南》是给大蜥蜴的。想猜猜其他几份都是送给谁的吗？
content.en: And a copy of "Common Guide to Daily Life" for Big Scaley Savra. Care to guess who the other gifts are for?

content.cn: 秋栗、卡契尔、埃特拉？
content.en: Akekuri, Catcher, Estella?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_027">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_027">

content.cn: 埃特拉、秋栗、卡契尔？
content.en: Estella, Akekuri, Catcher?

content.cn: 真可惜，差一点点呢。
content.en: Awww, so close!

content.cn: 埃特拉、卡契尔、秋栗？
content.en: Estella, Catcher, Akekuri?

content.cn: 专门倒着答有点太刻意啦，大英雄。
content.en: Playing the contrarian is a bit too deliberate, don't you think, hero?

content.cn: 看起来是些实用的小礼物。听你说完理由，我还以为礼物会选得更郑重一些。
content.en: Seems like practical little gifts. After hearing you out, I expected something more solemn.

content.cn: 那样才没意思吧，到时候大家还得费心怎么回礼。
content.en: Where's the fun in that? Then everyone would have to stress about how to return the favor.

content.cn: 一来二去真要变得不自在了，不如这些实用的东西让人安心呢。
content.en: Back-and-forth formalities would just make things awkward. Practical gifts like these put people at ease.

content.cn: 我觉得安塔尔不一定会这么想……
content.en: I'm not really sure about Antal...

content.cn: 话说回来，如果都是实用的东西，你给我的礼物是什么呢？
content.en: Speaking of which, if they're all practical items, what's the gift you got for me?

content.cn: 看到了，因为样子像是你会给的东西，我还没敢打开。
content.en: Yeah I saw them. Since they look like the kind of thing you'd give, I haven't dared to open them yet.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_004">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_004">

content.cn: 尽管猜猜看咯。
content.en: Guess.

content.cn: 果然是你给的东西，幸好我已经喊工程干员过来了。
content.en: Just as I thought, they're from you. Good thing I already called the engineering operators over.

content.cn: 别这么防备呀，不就是开过几次玩笑嘛。
content.en: Come on, don't be so wary. It's not like I've only played a few jokes on you.

content.cn: 那些胶水清理起来可麻烦了……
content.en: That glue was a nightmare to clean up...

content.cn: 这次真的是小礼物，有一份是给你的。
content.en: I promise they're actually gifts this time. One of them is for you.

content.cn: [萤石]向你发送了一次提醒
content.en: [Fluorite] sent you a reminder

content.cn: 总之，谢谢你的礼物……但你为什么会想到送我一朵花？
content.en: Anyway, thanks for the gift ... but why did you think to give me a flower?

content.cn: 突然觉得你应该喜欢。
content.en: I dunno. Felt like you'd appreciate it.

content.cn: 开拓区的人习惯叫它“探路花”，我后来才知道，这种野花也是从泰拉带过来的。
content.en: Folks in the frontier call it the "Pathfinder's Bloom". I only found out later that this wildflower was also brought over from Terra.

content.cn: 它只在有人的地方长，但这朵长在了侵蚀边上，离那些脏东西只有几厘米远。
content.en: It only grows where people have been. But this one sprouted right on the edge of the Blight, just centimeters from all that filth.

content.cn: 从泰拉来的花，开在了塔卫二的侵蚀边上……
content.en: A flower from Terra, blooming on the edge of Blight on Talos-II...

content.cn: 那个词叫什么来着。
content.en: What's the word for it again?

content.cn: 意境很好，对吧？
content.en: Quite "poetic", isn't it?

content.cn: 不管这些危险如何拒绝我们，文明环带也已经在塔卫二上站住了脚跟。
content.en: No matter how these dangers reject us, the Civilization Band has already taken root on Talos-II.

content.cn: 托人给你留了个盒子，看到了吗？
content.en: Had someone leave a box for you. Did you see it?

content.cn: 不管威胁靠得多近，生命都不会放弃继续生长，意境确实不错。
content.en: No matter how close the threat looms, life never gives up on growing. Quite poetic indeed.

content.cn: 虽然它的生命已经被我结束了。
content.en: Though I just killed it.

content.cn: 我一直都觉得，开拓区外面更远的那些地方，不一定属于我们。
content.en: I've always felt that the lands beyond the frontier, y'know, the ones farther out might not truly belong to us.

content.cn: 乱七八糟的破石头天使也好，自顾自冒出来的各种侵蚀也好，在我们来之前，它们也没有把这颗星球毁掉。
content.en: Whether it's those chaotic buggerloid or the self-spreading Blight ... neither managed to destroy this planet before we arrived.

content.cn: 这的确是事实，但我不希望大家这么想。
content.en: That is indeed the truth, but I don't want everyone to think that way.

content.cn: 这世界没有主人，而我们也不是这颗星球上多余的部分。
content.en: This world doesn't belong to anyone, and we are not superfluous on this planet.

content.cn: 太严肃啦，大英雄。
content.en: Too serious there, hero.

content.cn: 荒野里的那些危险一样不留情面，活下来的每一棵花草都是自己争取的生存空间。
content.en: The wilderness shows no mercy. Every blade of grass that survives had to claw for its place in this world.

content.cn: 我只是觉得，文明环带里面和开拓区也没什么区别，不如说它就是个巨大的开拓区。
content.en: I just think there's no real difference between the Civilization Band and the frontier. If anything, it's just one massive frontier.

content.cn: 要收拾的还多了群装模作样的伪君子，想过好日子，都得拼命。
content.en: Only now we've got a bunch of pretentious hypocrites to deal with on top of it all. If you want to live well, you have to fight for it.

content.cn: 确实，不管是面对自然，还是在其之上更加复杂的社会，生存空间都得靠自己争取。
content.en: True. Whether facing nature or the even more complex society built upon it, living space must be fought for.

content.cn: 所以，荒野里的一些规矩，在文明环带里也行得通。
content.en: So some rules of the wildlands still apply within the Civilization Band.

content.cn: 只有懂得自力更生的人才不会祸害一整片地方，值得一起抱团取暖。
content.en: Only those who know how to stand on their own won't ruin the land for everyone else. They're worth sticking together with.

content.cn: 至于那些寄生在我们当中的蛀虫，那些不剥削其他人就活不下去的强盗，我更愿意亲手淘汰他们。
content.en: As for the parasites among us ... those bandits who can't survive without exploiting others? I'd rather eliminate them myself.

content.cn: 说得不错。不过今天是怎么了，因为一朵花就说了这么多正经道理？
content.en: Well said. But what's gotten into you today? Getting all philosophical over a single flower?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_004">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_004">

content.cn: 我不会再上当了！上次你说得那么漂亮，结果给我的那份还是个惊吓盒子！
content.en: I won't fall for it again! Last time you made it sound so nice, but it still turned out to be a jack-in-the-box!

content.cn: 摘那朵花的时候，不小心顺手放倒了几个不长眼的蛀虫，任务计划里没他们。
content.en: Well... While picking that flower, I happened to take down a few clueless parasites who weren't on the mission roster.

content.cn: 善后工作就拜托啦，大英雄！
content.en: I'll leave the cleanup to you, thanks hero!

content.cn: 盒子里不是还藏了小礼物嘛，别生气呀。
content.en: Hey, don't be mad! There was still a gift hidden inside the box.

content.cn: 这次真的只是一朵普通的野花，在路边看到的。
content.en: I swear it's really just an ordinary wildflower I spotted by the roadside this time.

content.cn: 不过在口袋里放了挺久，说不定弄皱了一点。
content.en: Though it's been in my pocket for a while ... it might be a little crumpled.

content.cn: 管理员，最近有一件事让我非常困扰，经过思考后我决定还是应该来请教您。
content.en: Endmin, there's been something troubling me lately. After careful consideration, I've decided to seek your advice.

content.cn: “因为他们总是管太多”。并且给他解释了笑点，里面的“管”既是指裂地者身上的管子，也是指管闲事。
content.en: "Because they can't stop piping into others' business". I then explained the double meaning, how "piping" refers both to the Landbreakers' pipes and their meddling tendencies.

content.cn: ……我感觉你苦恼的方向可能错了。
content.en: ...I think you might be worried about the wrong thing here.

content.cn: 提高练习频率可能并不能提升你的冷笑话水平。
content.en: Increasing training frequency might not actually improve your deadpan comedy skills.

content.cn: 问题出在讲的时机与方式上……很少有人会在战斗中有心思听冷笑话，更何况是被解释了笑点的冷笑话。
content.en: Your issue lies in timing and delivery. Few people have the mental bandwidth for deadpan humor mid-combat ... let alone a joke with its punchline explained.

content.cn: 可是，我当时之所以选择那个时间点讲，是因为卡契尔的表情太紧张了。
content.en: But my timing was deliberate. Back then Catcher's stress levels had reached a new high.

content.cn: 他和我说过，心态放松的状态下更有利于作战。根据我的观察，卡契尔听完后嘴角大概有一毫米左右的变化。
content.en: He once told me a relaxed mental state improves combat efficacy. Based on my observations, the corner of his mouth exhibited approximately 1 millimeter of displacement post-joke.

content.cn: 他可能在作战过程中罹患了面部神经紊乱，俗称“嘴角抽搐”。
content.en: He might've developed transient facial neural dysregulation. Colloquially known as "twitchy mouth syndrome".

content.cn: 或许他是在锻炼嘴角肌肉，打算和裂地者“角”一死战。
content.en: Maybe he was conditioning his lips for close combat. Getting ready to "jaw" with the Landbreakers.

content.cn: 我发现我的冷笑话水平似乎出现了明显的下滑，这段时间逗笑的人数始终为零。
content.en: I've noticed a significant decline in my deadpan humor skills lately. My joke success rate has flatlined at zero for quite some time now.

content.cn: 你看，这就是一个鲜明的案例。
content.en: See, this is a textbook case study.

content.cn: 现在你应该明白了吧？挑选对的时机有多重要。
content.en: Now you see? Context determines comedic casualty rates.

content.cn: 管理员太厉害了！虽然您看不到也听不到，但我已经笑得停不下来了！
content.en: Endmin, your tactical analysis is peerless! Though currently unable to see or hear me, my laughter subroutine is now stuck in an irrepressible loop.

content.cn: 我已经完全懂了！真正的问题所在就是时机！我应该选择更刁钻的时机去讲冷笑话！
content.en: Eureka. The critical variable is timing. I must deploy jokes at maximally inconvenient intervals!

content.cn: 之前讲的情景都太过常见，卡契尔或许早猜到我会挑那个时候讲了吧。
content.en: I suspect that previous joke deployments suffered from predictable situational patterns. Catcher likely pre-calculated my humor intervals.

content.cn: 这个……也许……你不如去问问他本人的想法？
content.en: Have you considered ... directly asking Catcher for feedback?

content.cn: 说得很有道理！等下我就去找他。
content.en: You are absolutely correct. I'll go ask him in a bit.

content.cn: 因此，我在思考我的训练频率是否还有待提高，应该从一周五次提升到一天一次。
content.en: Therefore, I'm considering whether my training frequency needs adjustment. Perhaps increasing from five times a week to once daily.

content.cn: 管理员，非常感谢您的解答！我想有了您教的这个诀窍，我的冷笑话水平往后一定能显著提高！
content.en: Endmin, thank you for your clarification. With this strategic timing parameter unlocked, my comedic operational efficiency will definitely increase!

content.cn: 你最近一次讲冷笑话是在什么时候？当时讲的什么？
content.en: When was the last time you told a deadpan joke? And what was it?

content.cn: 讲冷笑话的时候没能逗笑听众？能举个具体的例子吗？
content.en: So your jokes didn't land with the audience? Can you give me an example?

content.cn: 请允许我思考一下。
content.en: Please allow me to process this inquiry.

content.cn: 应该是上次出任务的时候，当时我们遭遇了裂地者突袭。
content.en: Likely during the last mission, when we encountered a Landbreaker ambush.

content.cn: 我在卡契尔挡住敌人的时候，向他揭晓了一小时前“为什么碾骨氏族经常惹是生非？”的答案——
content.en: While Catcher was holding the line, I revealed the answer to my earlier riddle: Why do Bonekrushers always cause trouble?

content.cn: 不够格？但小道奇教官给我看过你的源石技艺测试成绩，早就达到参加的标准了。
content.en: Not qualified? Lil' Dodge showed me your Originium Arts scores, and you cleared the benchmark months ago.

content.cn: 管理员，源石技艺测试的成绩也只是数据罢了。我过去也很看重这些，但来到Z7后才发现，数据没那么重要。
content.en: Endmin, test scores are merely theoretical data. I once prioritized such metrics, but after joining Z7, I realized numbers matter less.

content.cn: 重要的还是实战时的应用……只是我在这方面还有很多欠缺。
content.en: Practical application in combat is what truly matters ... and my operational deficiencies in that field remain non-negligible.

content.cn: 能说说你觉得自己哪里欠缺吗？
content.en: Break it down for me. Where exactly do you think you're lacking?

content.cn: 举点具体的例子？
content.en: Give me a concrete example. Hypothetically.

content.cn: 比如，我到现在依然做不到在分解敌人武器的时候，提前规划好分解物的落点……
content.en: For example, I still cannot pre-calculate debris trajectories when disassembling enemy weapons mid-combat...

content.cn: 使用塑能转换系源石技艺的时候，也没法精准地把范围控制到一平米内……
content.en: My Hervorrufung Originium Arts area control remains imprecise. I consistently exceed the one-square-meter threshold...

content.cn: 和其他术师同事比，我的源石技艺威力实在太不可控了，这显然是个缺陷。
content.en: Compared to other casters, the power of my Arts is unacceptably unstable. A clear deficiency.

content.cn: 听说你拒绝了这次源石技艺比拼的邀请？
content.en: I heard you turned down the Originium Arts showdown invite. What's the deal?

content.cn: ……原来你觉得这些属于缺陷。
content.en: ...That's what you consider "lacking"?

content.cn: 好吧。既然你这么认为……
content.en: Sure... If you say so...

content.cn: 我觉得，你不参加这次比拼或许是正确的，否则其他参加的干员可能会受伤吧……
content.en: On second thought, maybe sitting this one out is the right call. Wouldn't want the other participants to get hurt...

content.cn: 受伤？管理员，这个您倒不需要担心。
content.en: Get hurt? Endmin, that variable is statistically negligible.

content.cn: 虽然我没打算参加，但有认真研究过比拼的规则。
content.en: While I've opted out, I conducted a full analysis of the showdown's rule framework.

content.cn: 规则上说：为了防止意外，所有参与者使用的施术单元都是特制的，期间施放的源石技艺是不具备任何威力的。
content.en: The rules state: All participants must use customized Arts Units, rendering Originium Arts harmless during the event.

content.cn: 我指的受伤，不是身体层面的，而是心灵层面的。
content.en: The injuries I'm referring to aren't physical. They're psychological.

content.cn: 啊？心灵层面……
content.en: Psychological?

content.cn: 管理员，我确实对笞心魔的源石技艺……或者说对整个萨卡兹巫术体系很好奇……可我从没正式学习过啊。
content.en: Endmin, I will admit, the Djall Arts ... no, the entire Sarkaz witchcraft system has intrigued me. But I've never received formal training.

content.cn: 你不打算参加这次的源石技艺比拼吗？
content.en: You're not joining the Originium Arts showdown this time?

content.cn: 没什么。你就当是个冷笑话吧……总之，关于你不参加比拼的事，我会再和小道奇教官解释的。
content.en: Never mind. Treat it as ... another failed deadpan joke. Anyway, I'll explain your non-participation to Lil' Dodge.

content.cn: 太好了！那就辛苦您了，管理员。
content.en: Greatly appreciated, Endmin!

content.cn: 不过，这个冷笑话的笑点究竟是……看来我需要花时间好好研究一下。
content.en: However, the precise comedic focal point of this joke remains unclear. Further analysis is required.

content.cn: 是的……管理员，您是来劝我参加的吗？昨天秋栗队长也来问了这件事。
content.en: Correct... Endmin, are you here to persuade me to participate? Captain Akekuri also inquired about this matter yesterday.

content.cn: 嗯，机会难得，小道奇教官特意委托我劝劝你，不过我会尊重你的想法。
content.en: True, it's a rare opportunity. Lil' Dodge specifically asked me to nudge you. But no pressure, your call.

content.cn: 管理员，谢谢您的理解！其实我是有充分的不参加理由的……
content.en: Your consideration is appreciated, Endmin. However, my non-participation is backed by ... substantial reasoning.

content.cn: 一来，我最近正在进行冷笑话的特训，需要花费很多时间与精力，无法兼顾源石技艺比拼的事。
content.en: First off, my current deadpan humor training regimen demands excessive temporal and cognitive resources. The showdown would compromise optimal joke-per-minute output.

content.cn: 二来，也是最关键的原因：我觉得以我的源石技艺水平，想参加这么重要的比赛，恐怕还不够格。
content.en: Secondary and critical. With my current Originium Arts proficiency, I may not be qualified to take part in a contest of this importance.

content.cn: 管理员，奶奶给我寄来了一些礼物，说希望我能带给管理员和Z7的队友，作为大家一直照顾我的谢礼。
content.en: Endmin, my grandmother mailed care packages requesting distribution to you and Z7 teammates as "gratitude for tolerating me".

content.cn: 据说，导演为了尽力还原乌萨斯军服的质感，做这套衣服时还专门邀请了工团的历史专家作为顾问。
content.en: Rumour has it the director invited historical experts from the UWST as consultants, just to perfect the Ursus military uniform texture in this costume.

content.cn: 原来还有这样的事……你很喜欢电影吗？一般的观众很少会了解这么多吧？
content.en: Is that so... Antal, are you a cinephile? Most viewers wouldn't dig this deep.

content.cn: 不，管理员，其实我对电影兴趣平平。只是以前在校的时候，奶奶很担心我不能和同学好好相处。
content.en: No, Endmin. Cinematic appreciation falls outside my standard interest parameters. However, during academic years, grandmother expressed concern regarding my peer-interaction metrics.

content.cn: 因为我和同龄人几乎没什么话题。而在新蓝卡坞，大家最爱聊的就是电影艺术的事，所以我专门做了很多功课。
content.en: With zero overlapping interests with peers, I identified New Wrankwood cinema as the optimal conversation vector. Thus, mandatory research was done.

content.cn: 不过，我那些同学就算收下了我送的礼物，也不会和我多说一句话。
content.en: However, gift reception rates did not correlate with verbal engagement increases. Even if they accepted my gifts, my classmates still wouldn't talk to me.

content.cn: 今天其实是我第一次用上这些“典故”。
content.en: Today was the first time I actually used any of those "studied references".

content.cn: 别太在意，你总会遇到更值得结交的朋友的。
content.en: Don't overthink it. You'll find your crowd eventually.

content.cn: 嗯，管理员，您说得没错。尽管我那时并没觉得有什么不对，只是觉得自己的沟通能力可能确实有所欠缺。
content.en: That is true, Endmin. While I never felt it was a problem at the time, I acknowledged a probable communication efficiency deficit on my part.

content.cn: 但我不是很清楚管理员的喜好，所以来问问。
content.en: Yet my data on your preference metrics remains incomplete. Hence this inquiry.

content.cn: 不过在遇到您和Z7的大家后，我逐渐开始相信“无需拿东西去换的友谊”是真实存在的……
content.en: Yet after encountering you and Z7... I began to tentatively accept the existence of unconditional social bonds.

content.cn: 奶奶也是看了我写的信，里面写了很多您的事，所以想要寄谢礼过来的。
content.en: Grandmother sent over this delivery only after reading my letter, which contained excessive Endmin-related annotations.

content.cn: 替我谢谢你的奶奶。我也想送一份回礼给你，有什么想要的东西吗？
content.en: Please thank your grandmother for me. That said, I'd like to reciprocate. Any specific requests from you?

content.cn: 有的！
content.en: Yes!

content.cn: 管理员，之后我能邀请您来听我最新的冷笑话集锦表演吗？
content.en: Endmin, may I formally invite you to attend my next deadpan humor showcase?

content.cn: 顺便帮我录个像就好，我答应奶奶要给她寄一份的。
content.en: Could you also record it for me. I promised grandmother I'd send her a copy.

content.cn: 好，交给我吧。
content.en: Sure. Leave that to me.

content.cn: 到时候安塔尔的表演，我一定会一个不漏地全录上的，毕竟“安全第一”。
content.en: I will make sure ANTAL's performance gets ANT-IRELY captured.

content.cn: 《宏山侠隐记》的纪念龙泡泡玩偶和《塞梦珂之梦》主角的同款戏服，您更喜欢哪个？
content.en: Between the "Hongshan Hermit Chronicles" limited-edition Chubby Lung plushie and "Simonch's Dream" protagonist's replica stage costume, which do you prefer?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_012"><image="sns_emoji_012"><image="sns_emoji_012">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_012"><image="sns_emoji_012"><image="sns_emoji_012">

content.cn: 管理员，莫非您就是讲冷笑话的天才？这个笑话太棒了！我要把它也加进我的集锦里！
content.en: Endmin ... are you the undisputed genius of deadpan humor? This joke's structural efficiency is flawless! Immediate inclusion in my compilation mandatory!

content.cn: 比较想要龙泡泡玩偶……感觉更有纪念意义一些。
content.en: I'm leaning toward the Chubby Lung plushie... Feels more meaningful as a keepsake.

content.cn: 选得不错啊，管理员。这款龙泡泡玩偶之前在新蓝卡坞就很受欢迎，是所谓的“明星产品”。
content.en: Optimal selection, Endmin. This Chubby Lung plushie was a "celebrity commodity" in New Wrankwood.

content.cn: 据说，使用的龙泡泡形象是专门向武陵城申请过的，所以限制了制作数量，现在买不到了。
content.en: The Chubby Lung likeness required exclusive licensing from Wuling City authorities, resulting in a hard-capped production run. Market availability now approximates zero.

content.cn: 更喜欢主角的戏服吧……可以摆起来展示。
content.en: The stage costume, maybe? Could display it in the office... Theater-core vibes.

content.cn: 真有眼光啊，管理员。这套戏服是主角在最后一战时穿的那身，连沾上的源石尘都有还原。
content.en: Excellent choice, Endmin. This replica precisely replicates the protagonist's final battle attire, down to the authentic Originium dust stains.

content.cn: 你的钓鳞技术真不错。
content.en: Great angling skills.

content.cn: 没想到你这么会钓鳞。
content.en: You're good at this.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，管理员，不要夸我什么“钓鳞技术强”，单纯只是运气好而已
content.en: Heh, don't go praising my angling skills, Endmin. It was just plain good luck, that's all.

content.cn: 真的凭运气就行吗？
content.en: Is it really all just luck?

content.cn: 当然了，钓鳞最重要的不是技巧，不是装备、饵料，甚至不是耐性
content.en: Of course. The most important thing about angling isn't skill, it's not the gear or the bait, and it's not even patience

content.cn: 而是说变就变的天气、环境和鳞的脾气
content.en: It's the weather that can change in a blink, the environment, and the mood of the fins

content.cn: 所以我每次钓鳞前都得抛个硬币再出门
content.en: That's why I always flip a coin before I head out to angle

content.cn: 运气不好的话，就不钓鳞了？
content.en: So you just don't go if your luck's bad?

content.cn: 不不不，钓当然还得去钓，只不过一旦钓不上来鳞，那就不用归咎于技术不行了
content.en: Nah, of course I still go. It's just that if I don't catch anything, I can't blame it on my skills being bad

content.cn: 反正是靠运气的事情嘛，空手而归，心里也不至于失落
content.en: Since it all comes down to luck anyway, coming back empty-handed doesn't really get me down

content.cn: 钓不上来的时候，也有乐趣吗？
content.en: Is there still fun in it when you don't catch anything?

content.cn: 管理员，你可说到点子上了 在我眼里，钓鳞的乐趣，在于“钓”本身
content.en: Endmin, now you're getting it. In my eyes, the joy of angling is in the "angling" itself

content.cn: 就像那一下抛竿的感觉 是不是一场空竿，谁知道？
content.en: It's like that feeling when you cast the line. Who knows if you'll get a bite or not?

content.cn: 但无论钓不钓得上来，线甩出去的瞬间，手臂、线轴、空气、海浪，全都听你指挥
content.en: But whether you hook one or not, the instant that line flies out, your arm, the reel, the air, the waves ... they all answer to you

content.cn: 像把全世界都扔出去，连同昨天的烂事和今天的坏心情
content.en: It's like throwing the whole world out there, along with yesterday's troubles and today's bad mood

content.cn: 然后就只用等着命运给你回信，咬钩也好，没动静也罢，都是回应
content.en: Then you just wait for fate to write you back. Could be a bite or nothing at all, it's all a response

content.cn: 当然，回应慢的时候，我就当在“酝酿”个大场面
content.en: Sure, when the response is slow, I just tell myself it's "cooking" up something big

content.cn: 怎么样，管理员，要不要来试试？
content.en: So, what do you say, Endmin? Wanna give it a try?

content.cn: 听上去还挺有哲理的，讲得我都想马上来试试了。
content.en: Sounds pretty philosophical. You're making me want to try it right now.

content.cn: 来吧，我教你！钓鳞可是有新手好运期的，别浪费了！
content.en: Come on, I'll teach you! Beginners have a lucky streak with angling, don't waste it!

content.cn: 好！那就从抛竿开始！
content.en: Alright! Let's start with casting the line!

content.cn: 我把备用钓竿带上了，你来了可以直接上手
content.en: I brought my spare rod. You can get started as soon as you get here

content.cn: 只需要记住一件事：确保身后没人，别甩竿甩到别人脑袋上就行
content.en: Just remember one thing: make sure nobody's behind you. Don't go swinging the rod into someone's head

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_011">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_011">

content.cn: 托管理员的福，今天钓上了好几条大鳞
content.en: Thanks to you, Endmin, I hooked a few big fins today

content.cn: 整个码头的人都被我的收获震惊了！
content.en: Everyone at the dock was totally shocked by my haul!

content.cn: 不恭喜一下我吗，管理员？
content.en: Aren't you gonna congratulate me, Endmin?

content.cn: 管理员，能不能推荐点书？那种适合带着去钓鳞的
content.en: Hey Endmin, got any book recommendations? Something good to bring along for angling

content.cn: 季风……这我熟 但都是硬面精装，垫着会硌，不大舒服
content.en: The Monsoon... I know that one well. But it's all hardcover, would be uncomfortable to lean on. Not great

content.cn: 《她往何处去》，听说不错。
content.en: "Where She Went?", heard great things about it.

content.cn: 文学奖新晋佳作……不过只有口袋本，连半边脸都盖不住
content.en: The new literary award winner ... but they only have the pocket edition. Wouldn't even cover half my face

content.cn: 这……你到底是在选枕头、钓具，还是选书？
content.en: Uh ... are you picking out a pillow, angling gear, or a book?

content.cn: 我说了呀，拿来钓鳞用的 我是个实用主义钓手，信奉多功能装备理论
content.en: Like I said, it's for angling. I'm a practical angler. I believe in multi-purpose gear

content.cn: 书还能用来钓鳞？
content.en: You can angle with books?

content.cn: 书，是钓鳞时的万能道具
content.en: Books are the universal tool for angling

content.cn: 你可别小看一本大小合适、重量适中、质地实在的书，在钓鳞时能起到的作用
content.en: Don't underestimate what a properly sized, decently weighted, solidly built book can do for you out there

content.cn: 还能有什么妙用吗？展开讲讲。
content.en: What else is there? Go on, tell me more.

content.cn: 比如垫着用 钓点要是地面湿滑，一本书能救屁股一命
content.en: Like using it as a seat cushion. If the spot's damp, a book can save your backside

content.cn: 太阳毒的时候可以拿本书来挡脸防晒，毛毛雨来了还能护住头
content.en: When the sun's brutal, you can use it to shield your face. A light drizzle comes, and it protects your head

content.cn: 困了，它是枕头；要是晒得睁不开眼，就再盖一本遮光
content.en: Tired? It's a pillow. If the sun's too bright to keep your eyes open, just put another one on top to block the light

content.cn: 要是手边没笔记本，页边的空白还能临时记鳞况、潮汐、风速和心情
content.en: If you don't have a notebook handy, you can use the margins to jot down fin activity, tide, wind speed, and your mood

content.cn: 原来书是拿来这么“用”的啊。
content.en: So that's how you "use" a book.

content.cn: 管理员你可别笑话我
content.en: Don't laugh at me, Endmin

content.cn: 你要在钓鳞时看书？
content.en: You're gonna read while you angle?

content.cn: 谁说只有书的内容才有价值呢
content.en: Who says only the content of a book has value?

content.cn: 那哪本书在钓鳞时比较有“价值”？
content.en: So which book is the most "valuable" for angling then?

content.cn: 我想想……《沙海愚夫》吧
content.en: Let me think ... "The Tides That Bind"

content.cn: 好像是本关于萨尔贡的书？为什么是这本？
content.en: Seems like it's about Sargon? Why that one?

content.cn: “生活会像烈日和沙暴一样，让人遍体鳞伤；可你要知道，正是这些伤口，终会变成最坚硬的甲胄，伴你前行”
content.en: "Life will scar you like desert sun and sandstorms. But remember, these wounds will harden into the strongest armor to walk beside you."

content.cn: 这句话是……？
content.en: This line...?

content.cn: 是我做的摘抄，这句挺有意思的吧
content.en: That's an excerpt I copied down. Quite thought-provoking, isn't it?

content.cn: 算是吧，有用
content.en: You could say that. It's useful

content.cn: 我就知道，书在你手上肯定会“物尽其用”。
content.en: I knew it. Any book in your hands would be put to its "fullest use".

content.cn: 那当然，我又没说自己不在乎书的内容
content.en: Naturally. I never said I didn't care about the content of the books at all.

content.cn: 有书相伴，就永远不会孤单 哪怕没钓上鳞，也能收获点别的什么
content.en: With books as companions, one is never truly alone. Even if no fins are caught, I will always receive something else

content.cn: 请报书名吧！我正在店里，可以现查
content.en: Hit me with those titles! I'm at the shop right now, so I can look them up

content.cn: 《硝烟与丝绒》，能读很久。
content.en: "Gunpowder and Velvet", a book you can savor for a long time.

content.cn: 乌萨斯经典巨著，不要不要，太厚了，伤颈椎
content.en: Let me see ... a classic Ursine doorstopper? Hard pass. Too heavy, bad for the neck.

content.cn: 有本很有趣的书，叫《季风吹拂下的笔记》。
content.en: "Notes Carried by the Monsoon", it's an interesting read.

content.cn: ……你现在在哪里？情况怎么样？穿护具了吗？要不要支援？
content.en: ...Where are you? How bad is it? You geared up? Need help?

content.cn: 阿列什！快回复！
content.en: Alesh?? Please respond?!

content.cn: 抱歉，管理员，我输了
content.en: Sorry Endmin, I ... lost

content.cn: 我在我们上次钓鳞的地方
content.en: I'm at the spot where we last went angling

content.cn: 以后再也没法约你来这里钓鳞了
content.en: I'm afraid we can't angle here anymore

content.cn: 阿列什！你怎么了？
content.en: Alesh!!! What happened??

content.cn: 挺住！我让菲奥娜马上定位你的位置。
content.en: Hang on there! I'm having Fiona locate your position immediately.

content.cn: 危机处理小组马上就来。
content.en: The crisis team is en route.

content.cn: 今天天气看起来不错，你去钓鳞了吗？
content.en: Nice weather today. Did you go angling?

content.cn: 不，管理员，不用这样，我人没事
content.en: Oh, it's all good Endmin. I'm fine

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_023">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_023">

content.cn: 怎么回事？你解释清楚！
content.en: Excuse me?? Explain!

content.cn: 我们用钓鳞来比胜负
content.en: We were just using angling to settle our rivalry

content.cn: 前三十分钟我领先，他钓上来一堆水草和垃圾，我还以为稳了
content.en: I was leading for the first thirty minutes. He only pulled up weeds and trash so I thought I had it in the bag

content.cn: 结果到最后，一条罕见的银色鳞上了他的钩
content.en: But in the end, a rare silver fin took his bait

content.cn: 所以你就这样输了。
content.en: So that's how you lost?

content.cn: 是的，这块场子现在归他了
content.en: I'm afraid so. This spot belongs to him now

content.cn: 糟糕
content.en: Dammit

content.cn: 除非下次赢回来
content.en: Unless I win it back next time

content.cn: 以前的仇就这样解决了？
content.en: So your old grudge was settled just like that?

content.cn: 也不能说解决吧，但当时我们对上眼，就都明白怎么回事了
content.en: Can't exactly call it settled. But when our eyes met, we both understood how things stood

content.cn: 今天正是钓鳞的时候，赶上鳞汛，水温合适，风向也对
content.en: It's a perfect day for angling anyway. The migration is on, water temperature is ideal, and the wind direction is favorable

content.cn: 没人提旧账，没人说狠话；他举起钓竿，我也举起钓竿，那就比吧
content.en: No one brought up old grudges, no one made threats. He raised his rod, and I raised mine ... so we competed

content.cn: ……不是说他是个嗜血的狠人么？怎么也成了“钓鳞佬”了？
content.en: ...Wasn't he supposed to be bloodthirsty and ruthless? How did he end up becoming an angler too?

content.cn: 听说他的帮派也输了，散了 然后在号子里蹲了两年
content.en: Apparently his gang lost too, and fell apart. Then he did a two-year stint behind bars

content.cn: 可能谁都需要一种方式来重新开始？当他再出来，就和我当初一样，也开始钓鳞了
content.en: Maybe everyone needs some way to start over. When he got out, just like I did back then, he took up angling too

content.cn: 在这里遇见仇家了
content.en: I ran into an enemy here

content.cn: 像你当初那样？
content.en: Just like you did back then?

content.cn: 嗯，帮派刚散那阵，我可不比他好到哪里去，成日把自己埋在酒瓶里
content.en: Yeah. Right after the gang fell apart, I wasn't any better. I buried myself in liquor bottles day after day

content.cn: 那一天喝得醉醺醺的，回到藏身处，被什么东西绊到了 抓起来一看，是落满灰尘的钓竿
content.en: That day, stumbling back to my hideout dead drunk, I tripped over something. Picked it up, and it was an angling rod coated in dust

content.cn: 忽然心一动，拎着它直奔码头，挥出钓竿的那一刻，我就觉得自己又能站起来了
content.en: Suddenly I felt a spark. I carried it straight to the docks... And the moment I cast the line, I knew I could stand tall again

content.cn: 想不到，你是这样走出来的。
content.en: Wow, never imagined that's how you found your way out.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，就像终末地对我的意义一样
content.en: Heh. Just like what Endfield means to me

content.cn: 终末地？和钓鳞有什么相似之处吗？
content.en: Endfield? What does it have in common with angling?

content.cn: 加入终末地的时候，就像新的一次抛竿
content.en: Joining Endfield felt like ... casting a new line

content.cn: 而且还钓上了最珍贵的东西
content.en: And this time, I managed to hook the most precious thing of all

content.cn: 新的伙伴，新的开始<image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: New friends, and a fresh start<image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 什么？仇家？！
content.en: Huh? What enemy?!

content.cn: 以前混帮派时的死对头 是我见过最嗜血的狠人 有仇必报
content.en: An old rival from my gang days. The most bloodthirsty ruthless person I've ever met. Never leaves a score unsettled

content.cn: 那会儿我们真刀真枪干过 互相给对方开过瓢 见过血
content.en: Back then we fought with real blades. We cracked each other's skulls open and saw real blood

content.cn: 杀气腾腾 冲着我来了 往日的孽债 逃不过了
content.en: Killing intent radiates toward me. The debts of the past cannot be escaped

content.cn: 前辈，要不要看看我最近发现的珍稀岩石样本？
content.en: Professor, would you like to check out some rare rocks I've recently discovered?

content.cn: 注意它表面闪闪发亮的结晶。我在开拓区的陨石坑找到它的时候，那一整片区域的地面，在阳光下就像铺满了碎钻。
content.en: See how the crystals sparkle across its surface? When I picked it up from the crater in the frontier, the whole place shimmered under the sun, as if the earth were blanketed in diamonds.

content.cn: 这是陨石撞击形成的？
content.en: So it came from a meteor impact?

content.cn: 对呀，一道“天外来客”的足迹。
content.en: That's right. Like footprints left behind by a traveler from beyond the sky.

content.cn: 希望有朝一日，我们能够飞向更远的星空，与更宽广的宇宙对话。
content.en: I've always hoped that someday, we'll reach further into the stars ... and finally have a conversation with the wider universe.

content.cn: 我也期待着探索宇宙深处的那一天。
content.en: I, too, look forward to the day we can explore its deepest reaches.

content.cn: 前辈，再看看这个吧。
content.en: Now, Professor, take a look at this one.

content.cn: 这块侵蚀冰碛岩，它既是天然的，又被“污染”了。
content.en: This is a piece of Blighted Tillite. It's natural, but also "scarred".

content.cn: 它采集自冰川沉积的古老砾石层，但表面有着曾遭侵蚀的痕迹。这是我目前所知的，最早遭受侵蚀影响的岩层记录。
content.en: It was taken from an ancient glacial deposit, but its surface bears clear traces of the Blight. As far as I know, it's the oldest evidence of Blight damage we've found in rock.

content.cn: 所以这块石头，就是侵蚀在塔卫二留下的古老伤痕。
content.en: It's proof of Talos-II's earliest wounds left by the Blight.

content.cn: 是的。每当我看着它，就会提醒自己，不只是要记录侵蚀的历史，也要努力终结它。
content.en: Exactly. Every time I look at it, I remind myself that not only must we record the history of Blight, we must also strive to bring it to an end.

content.cn: 能讲讲你最珍视的岩石样本么？是在塔卫二的哪里发现的？
content.en: Could you tell me about your most cherished specimen? Where did you find it on Talos-II?

content.cn: 我最珍视的那块岩石……其实并不来自塔卫二。
content.en: My most cherished one ... actually doesn't come from Talos-II.

content.cn: 不来自塔卫二？是什么？
content.en: Not from Talos-II? What is it then?

content.cn: 好呀，我对你搜集的那些石头一直挺感兴趣。
content.en: Of course. I've always found your rock collections fascinating.

content.cn: 是这块黑曜石。
content.en: It's this piece of obsidian.

content.cn: 黑曜石？
content.en: Obsidian?

content.cn: 前辈喜欢它的光泽吗？在塔卫二可不常见到哦。
content.en: Do you like how it shines? You don't often see something like this on Talos-II.

content.cn: 它来自汐斯塔火山附近。
content.en: I found it near a volcano in Siesta.

content.cn: 它之所以珍贵，是因为它代表了——泰拉。
content.en: It's precious because ... it represents Terra itself.

content.cn: 原来是这样，确实意义非凡。
content.en: I see. It truly carries great meaning.

content.cn: 那就珍藏好它吧。
content.en: You should keep it safe.

content.cn: 不只是石头，还是会说话的书本和珍宝！
content.en: They are more than just rocks. I see them as talking tomes and hidden treasures!

content.cn: 先给前辈看看这个吧。
content.en: Here, let me show you this one first.

content.cn: 这是什么？
content.en: What's this?

content.cn: 陨磺砾岩，由陨石撞击形成，里面包含有已熔融的矿物质。
content.en: Suevite. It's formed during an impact event. Inside, you can see melted minerals fused together.

content.cn: 孩子，孩子？
content.en: My child? My child?

content.cn: 啊前辈，对不起！我才是艾尔黛拉！
content.en: OMG, I'm so sorry! It's Ardelia now!

content.cn: 刚才我正在准备演讲稿，没想到多利先生把通信器拿过去了。
content.en: I was preparing my speech draft, and Mr. Dolly took my comm device.

content.cn: 演讲稿？你要去哪里做演讲？
content.en: Speech draft? Where are you going to deliver a speech?

content.cn: 我被邀请去菈梵朵玛，参加一场学术论坛。
content.en: Oh, I was invited to La Fantoma to take part in an academic forum.

content.cn: 主办方很慷慨地给我安排了发表演讲的机会，这可能会帮我们争取到地质灾害治理方面的更多资源支持。
content.en: The organizers generously offered me a slot to speak. Perhaps I could secure more resources for geological disaster relief.

content.cn: 所以我想说一些有分量的话题，但冥思苦想了好几天，还一直没有头绪。
content.en: So I wanted to talk about something meaningful, but I've been racking my brain for days with no idea what to say.

content.cn: 滴滴，在吗？
content.en: Hello, are you there?

content.cn: 虽然我不是地质学家，但或许可以帮你一起想！
content.en: I'm not a geologist, but maybe I can help you brainstorm!

content.cn: 你有话想对大地说吗？
content.en: What words would you offer to the Land?

content.cn: 咦？又是多利先生吗？
content.en: Huh? Is it Mr. Dolly again?

content.cn: 你想和大地做朋友吗？
content.en: Do you want to be friends with the Land?

content.cn: 你不想和大地做朋友吗？
content.en: Do you not want to be friends with the Land?

content.cn: 你真的不想和大地做朋友吗？
content.en: Are you sure you don't want to be friends with the Land?

content.cn: 想！
content.en: I do want to be friends with the Land!

content.cn: 好孩子，我就知道你会愿意和我们玩游戏的。
content.en: Good child, I knew you'd be willing to play a game with us.

content.cn: 那你的朋友怎么了？
content.en: So, tell me, what's wrong with your friend?

content.cn: 她受伤了。
content.en: She's hurt.

content.cn: 这是今年第七好的回答。那么，帮你的朋友治疗伤痛吧！
content.en: That's the seventh-best answer this year. Alrighty, let's help your friend recover!

content.cn: 她也在努力！等她好起来，你们一起玩耍！
content.en: She's trying hard too! When she gets better, you can play together!

content.cn: 她被污染了。
content.en: She's polluted.

content.cn: 艾尔黛拉？怎么了？你发错人了吗？
content.en: Ardelia? Did you send this to the wrong person?

content.cn: 这是今年第十二好的回答。那么，帮你的朋友洗刷污秽吧！
content.en: That's the twelfth-best answer this year. Alrighty, let's help your friend cleanse!

content.cn: 她也在努力！等她好起来，你们一起玩耍！
content.en: She's trying hard too! When she gets better, you can play together!

content.cn: 她生病了。
content.en: She's sick.

content.cn: 这是今年第三好的回答。那么，帮你的朋友治愈痼疾吧！
content.en: That's the third-best answer this year. Alrighty, let's heal your friend!

content.cn: 她也在努力！等她好起来，你们一起玩耍！
content.en: She's trying hard too! When she gets better, you can play together!

content.cn: 啊！前辈对不起，刚刚通信器又被多利先生抢走了。
content.en: OMG, I'm so sorry, Professor! Mr. Dolly took my comm device again!

content.cn: 没关系，我和多利先生聊得很开心，而且还挺有意思的。
content.en: It's okay. I had fun talking to Mr. Dolly.

content.cn: 很有意思？我看看。
content.en: You had fun? Hmm, let me check the chat history.

content.cn: 我明白了，多利先生是在拉前辈给我做参谋。
content.en: Oh, I get it. Mr. Dolly was trying to get ideas from you.

content.cn: 你愿不愿意玩一个游戏？
content.en: Would you like to play a game?

content.cn: 你有灵感了？
content.en: Did you get some inspiration?

content.cn: 是呀！我在最近几次考察中，看到塔卫二被严重侵蚀的地层，断裂、腐蚀、陷落……
content.en: Yes! On my recent surveys, I saw strata on Talos-II badly scarred by Blight — fractures, collapses, corrosions...

content.cn: 但同时也看到植物从碎石里钻出来，看到河水绕开污染重新汇流。它在努力自愈。
content.en: But at the same time, I saw plants pushing through the rubble, rivers skirting around polluted ground to rejoin their flow. The Land is fighting to heal herself.

content.cn: 也许我的演讲，不必只是科学报告。我想告诉所有人：塔卫二正在经历痛苦，也在顽强抗争。
content.en: Maybe my talk doesn't have to be just a scientific report. I want to tell everyone: Talos-II is suffering, but it's also fighting back, with incredible resilience.

content.cn: 我们不是要用力量“治理”大地，而是和她一起，理解她的秩序，协助她复原。
content.en: Our task isn't to impose control on the Land, but to stand with her, to understand her order, and help her recover.

content.cn: 谢谢您，前辈！
content.en: Thank you, Professor!

content.cn: 也谢谢多利先生提供的灵感！
content.en: Oh, we should thank Mr. Dolly too!

content.cn: 不用客气，孩子。
content.en: You're welcome, my child.

content.cn: 等等！你到底是谁？
content.en: Wait ... Who are you? Are you Ardelia?

content.cn: 你有话想对大地说吗？
content.en: Tell me. What words would you offer to the Land?

content.cn: 前辈，有空吗？
content.en: Got a moment, Professor?

content.cn: 别怕，这只是梦。
content.en: Don't worry, it's only a dream.

content.cn: 别怕，梦都是反着来的。
content.en: Don't worry, dreams often mean the opposite.

content.cn: 前辈说得对……至少现在还没有发生，我们还有时间。
content.en: You're right ... at least nothing has happened yet. We still have time.

content.cn: 你想做什么？
content.en: What's your plan?

content.cn: 计算清楚这种可能性是否存在。
content.en: I'm going to calculate whether this possibility even exists.

content.cn: 趁现在脑子最清醒，可以好好思考一下应对方案。
content.en: While my mind is still clear, I can think carefully about countermeasures.

content.cn: 好，我会保持在线陪你。
content.en: I'll stay online with you. Message me when you need me.

content.cn: 谢谢前辈，有你在，我安心多了。
content.en: Thank you, Professor. I feel better just knowing you're there for me.

content.cn: 前辈，你还在吗？
content.en: Professor, are you still there?

content.cn: 有结果了吗？
content.en: Yup. Got any results?

content.cn: 嗯，我套入最近四周的火山活动频率与地壳扰动数据，如果侵蚀沿着裂隙带持续扩散，引发大规模火山与地震灾害的概率是1.7%。
content.en: Yes. I input data from the last four weeks on volcanic activity and crustal disturbances. If Blight continues spreading along the Severing Fault Zone, the probability of large-scale volcanic and seismic disasters is 1.7%.

content.cn: 这看起来不算高，是不是能松一口气了？
content.en: That seems low. Maybe you can breathe a little easier now?

content.cn: 不，这个概率已经很可怕了。
content.en: No, this probability is actually quite terrifying.

content.cn: 天亮后可能得拜托铁誓军再派小队护送我往北走，重新勘察几个地裂深处的活动点。
content.en: When morning comes, I may have to ask the Oathkeepers to send another squad to escort me north. I must re-survey activity centers located deep in several fissures.

content.cn: 什么？你在铁誓军那里？
content.en: Wait, you're with the Oathkeepers?

content.cn: 我在，有什么事？
content.en: Yup. What is it?

content.cn: 是呀！我今年的主要研究计划，是前往北部冰原，考察超域活动最剧烈的表现和状况。
content.en: Yes! My main research plan this year is to head into the northern icefields, where Æther activity is at its most intense.

content.cn: 这里的天气很极端，但铁誓军的人似乎都很适应……他们看起来性格冷峻，有时还让人觉得难以接近，但都很可靠。
content.en: The weather here is pretty extreme, but the Oathkeepers seem accustomed to it... They may seem hard to approach, but they're actually very reliable.

content.cn: 有铁誓军帮忙那就太好了，他们是可靠的朋友。
content.en: It's a blessing to have them on your side. They're trustworthy allies.

content.cn: 嗯嗯！除了他们，一路上我还遇到了联盟工团的矿工、众生长地的游人，还有环塔商会的车队。
content.en: Mhm! Besides them, I've also met miners from the UWST, Songseekers from the Hannabit Circuit, and convoys from the TGCC.

content.cn: 他们一听说我是终末地的地质研究人员，都主动提出要协助。
content.en: When they heard I was a geological researcher from Endfield, they all offered to help.

content.cn: 侵蚀是我们共同的敌人，所有人都会一起努力对抗它。
content.en: The Blight is our common enemy. Everyone will fight it together.

content.cn: 对了，前辈，这次我收集了不少珍贵的样本，也做了一些初步分析，等回到帝江号，和你一起深入研讨。
content.en: That's right. By the way, I've collected many valuable samples this time and done some preliminary analyses. Once I'm back on Dijiang, I'd love to study them in depth with you.

content.cn: 我真的希望，这一切能尽快取得突破。因为塔卫二上侵蚀的规模，比我们想象的大得多。
content.en: I truly hope we can make a breakthrough soon. The scale of Blight on Talos-II is far greater than we imagined.

content.cn: 我刚做了一个噩梦……但身边没有能倾诉的人。
content.en: I just had a nightmare ... but there was no one around to talk to.

content.cn: 而且它不像火山。火山虽然令人畏惧，却也充满生命的力量。侵蚀没有，它只有枯萎和死亡的气息。
content.en: And unlike volcanoes, which may rage with fearsome power yet pulse with life, the Blight only breathes death.

content.cn: 所以我只能拼尽全力和它赛跑。
content.en: So I must race against it with all my strength.

content.cn: 我也是。只要你还在奔跑，我也不会停下来。
content.en: I will run with you. Wherever your path leads, my steps will follow.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_037">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_037">

content.cn: 没事的，跟我说说吧。
content.en: It's okay, I'm here for you.

content.cn: 我梦见在采样完，分析数据的时候，没注意一个重要参数。
content.en: I dreamt that while analyzing data after sampling, I overlooked a critical parameter.

content.cn: 结果，侵蚀沿着断层蔓延，从火山喷发开始，接着是整个塔卫二的地层断裂……最后，星球陷入崩解。
content.en: Then, the Blight spread along a fault line. First came volcanic eruptions, then fractures tearing through all of Talos-II's strata ... and finally, the planet fell apart...

content.cn: 你向[别礼]发送了一次提醒
content.en: You sent [Last Rite] a reminder

content.cn: 冷静一下，我只是想搞清楚状况。
content.en: Calm down, I just want to understand what happened.

content.cn: 放轻松，还有，你是不是想说“误会”？
content.en: Take it easy. Also, did you mean to say "misunderstanding"?

content.cn: 我错了！马上改正！
content.en: My bad! I'll do better!

content.cn: 推销武器似乎还在正常经营的范畴里，那位商人有什么出格的举动吗？
content.en: Selling weapons still seems like normal business. Did that merchant do anything out of line?

content.cn: 没有，但塞什卡的合同上是这么要求的——
content.en: No, but that's what the Seš'qa contract requires:

content.cn: 第283条：“遇到友商活动，必须以同等效果展示巫术时刻的品牌价值。”
content.en: Article 283: "When encountering a fellow merchant's event, one must showcase the brand value of the Witching Hour with an equally impressive display."

content.cn: 条件宽泛，界定模糊，这种条款完全不合理。
content.en: The conditions are too broad and the definitions are vague. This kind of clause is completely unreasonable.

content.cn: 总之，问题似乎出在你的那份合同上。你没必要勉强自己乱来。
content.en: Anyway, the problem seems to be with that contract of yours. You don't need to force yourself to do reckless things.

content.cn: 管理员？您找我有什么事吗？
content.en: Endmin? Anything I can help you with?

content.cn: 没事的，这都是工作范围里的事。
content.en: It's okay, this is all within the scope of my work.

content.cn: 巫术时刻给我的报酬很高，还帮了我很多忙，我得好好工作报答他们！
content.en: The Witching Hour pays me really well, and they've helped me out a lot. I have to work hard to repay them!

content.cn: 懂得感恩是好事，但如果明知有问题却不管不顾，可就要吃亏了。
content.en: It's good to be grateful, but if you know something's wrong and ignore it, you're just setting yourself up for trouble.

content.cn: 如果你真想为了他们好，就不该什么要求都答应。
content.en: If you really want what's best for them, you shouldn't agree to every single demand.

content.cn: 爸爸也说过这样的话……
content.en: Dad used to say things like that too...

content.cn: 我明白了，我会再好好想想的。
content.en: I understand, I'll think about it more carefully.

content.cn: 如果需要法律援助，随时都可以向人力资源事务部报告。
content.en: If you need legal assistance, you can always report it to the HR Division.

content.cn: 不过账单上的金额还不小，当时到底发生了什么需要你赔偿的事？
content.en: But the amount on that bill isn't small. What exactly happened that required you to pay compensation?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_009">……
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_009">...

content.cn: 放心，我会保密的。
content.en: Don't worry, I won't tell.

content.cn: 说吧，也许我可以出面让写合同的那几位替你买单。
content.en: Go ahead, maybe I can step in and get the ones who wrote the contract to cover the cost for you.

content.cn: 当时大叔说，他们家的盾文明环带第一结实，什么都挡得住。
content.en: Well, he said their shields were the toughest in the Band, that they could block anything.

content.cn: 我想，按照合同上说的，那就得证明巫术时刻的武器也是世界第一厉害。
content.en: I thought, according to the contract, I had to prove that the Witching Hour's weapons are the most powerful in the world too.

content.cn: 然后，我正好带着巫术时刻的武器……所以我就……演示了一下……
content.en: And then ... well, I happened to have a Witching Hour weapon on me ... so I ... gave a little demonstration...

content.cn: 好……好吧，我们一起去走赔偿流程吧。
content.en: O ... kay. Let's go through the compensation process together.

content.cn: 别礼，我们好像收到了一份环塔商会指定给你的账单，怎么回事？
content.en: Last Rite, we seem to have received an invoice from the TGCC addressed to you. What's this about?

content.cn: 请您听我解释！
content.en: Please, let me explain!

content.cn: 其实是一场污秽我在发呆看到有位商人大叔在推销武器所以就按照塞什卡的合同和他嚼舌了一下
content.en: Okay so it was actually just a misunderstandimf I was zoning out and I saw this merchant guy selling weapons so I just haggled with him a little like a Seš'qa contract says to

content.cn: 结果好像搞出问题来了我不是故意的请您原谅对不起对不起对不起对不起对不起对不起
content.en: But it looks like I messed things up I didn't mean to please forgive me I'm really really really really really sorry

content.cn: 你向[别礼]发送了一次提醒
content.en: You sent [Last Rite] a reminder

content.cn: 看来不是第一次了，别礼平时经常给家里寄钱吗？
content.en: Seems like this isn't the first time. Last Rite, do you often send money back home?

content.cn: 每个月都会寄喔，我在终末地没什么地方要花钱<image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: I send some every month. There's not really anywhere for me to spend money here at Endfield <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 爸爸妈妈会拿钱去治病和修理墓园，他们已经把篱笆重新换了一圈，也铺了新的石子路。
content.en: Mom and Dad use the money for medical treatment and to repair the cemetery. They've already replaced the entire fence and laid down a new gravel path.

content.cn: 不过，爸爸还是不肯把工作交给别人，一定要自己亲自动手。
content.en: But Dad still refuses to hand over the work to anyone else. He insists on doing everything himself.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_009">明明就是因为他腰痛，干活很辛苦，我才想出来打工赚点钱的……
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_009"> It's just ... because his back hurts and the work is so hard for him, that's why I wanted to find a job and earn some money...

content.cn: 至少你已经帮他分担了压力，他也不用担心治病的钱了，不是吗？
content.en: At least you're already helping share his burden. He doesn't have to worry about medical expenses anymore, right?

content.cn: 一般人可不会穿着巫术时刻的测试款作战服到终末地打工啊……
content.en: Most people wouldn't come all the way to Endfield to work a job while wearing a Witching Hour prototype combat suit...

content.cn: 是没错啦，现在这样已经很好了。
content.en: Yeah, you're right. The way things are now is already pretty good.

content.cn: 咦？管理员又找我吗？
content.en: Endmin? Looking for me again?

content.cn: 我还想再攒一笔钱，给镇子里运一些农机。
content.en: I also want to save up a bit more money to ship some farm machinery to our town.

content.cn: 有个干员哥哥跟我说过，联盟工团有很便宜的农机转让，但我家有点偏僻，运输成本很高<image="sns_emoji_028">
content.en: An operator told me the UWST sells farm equipment really cheap, but getting it shipped all the way out to my place would cost a fortune <image="sns_emoji_028">

content.cn: 如果能多开垦一点地，就能种更多粮食和用来卖钱的作物，没准还会有更多人搬进来，路也会慢慢修好。
content.en: If we could clear more land, we could grow more food and cash crops. Maybe then more people would move in, and the roads would slowly get fixed too.

content.cn: 到时候，去城里就不用赶好几天的路了！
content.en: When that happens, we won't have to travel for days just to get to the city!

content.cn: 看得很长远呢，能想到这些，已经很了不起了。
content.en: You're really thinking ahead. It's impressive that you're considering all this.

content.cn: 看来是有好好思考过，你为家乡操了不少心啊。
content.en: Looks like you've put a lot of thought into this. You really care about your hometown, don't you?

content.cn: 嘿嘿<image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: Hehe <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 在终末地可以学到好多东西呢，大家还一起帮我研究过具体要怎么做，在哪里花多少钱。
content.en: I've learned so much here at Endfield. People even helped me research exactly how to do it and how much everything would cost.

content.cn: 虽然到了人口学和物流管理理论那块的时候，我就已经跟不上了……
content.en: Though by the time we got to demography and logistics management theory, I was completely lost...

content.cn: 不过，这个计划有一个最大的问题，我到现在还不知道该怎么解决<image="sns_emoji_009">
content.en: There's just one big problem with this whole plan that I still can't figure out <image="sns_emoji_009">

content.cn: 最大的问题？是什么？
content.en: One big problem? What is it?

content.cn: 他们说，工团对内按制度分配，但对外的农机转让是要抢单和议价的……
content.en: They said the UWST distributes internally by their rules, but external equipment sales are all about bidding and haggling...

content.cn: 这个我真的不会<image="sns_emoji_008"><image="sns_emoji_008"><image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: I'm really not good at that <image="sns_emoji_008"><image="sns_emoji_008"><image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 到时候我陪你去一趟吧……
content.en: I'll go with you when the time comes...

content.cn: 这次是塞什卡的汇款单，数额也不小。
content.en: This time it's a remittance slip from Seš'qa, and it's not a small amount.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_038">应该是上次的“商务津贴”吧？
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_038">That should be the "business stipend" from last time, right?

content.cn: 弗莱明爷爷前几天刚和我说过，虽然要赔偿，但塞什卡的各位好像十分满意现场的宣传效果。
content.en: Grandpa Fleming just told me the other day, even though we had to pay compensation, it seems everyone at Seš'qa was really satisfied with the on-site promotional results.

content.cn: 商场如战场啊……
content.en: The business world is just like a battlefield...

content.cn: 我会把汇款单转交给人力资源事务部的，他们会帮我汇给家里。
content.en: I'll forward the remittance slip to Human Resources. They'll help me wire it back home.

content.cn: 你向[别礼]发送了一次提醒
content.en: You sent [Last Rite] a reminder

content.cn: 这次竟然一个字都没打错，有进步哦。
content.en: You didn't make a single typo this time, that's real progress.

content.cn: 啊
content.en: Oh

content.cn: 我想到了
content.en: I know

content.cn: 前几天我在宏科院一家监狱的志愿服务结束了，领导先生说过要送我什么东西。
content.en: A few days ago, I finished my volunteer service at that prison run by HAS. The warden mentioned he wanted to send me something.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_038">看来是面锦旗，难怪会先交给我。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_038"> Looks like it's an honorary banner. No wonder they sent it to me first.

content.cn: ……等等，去监狱参加志愿服务？
content.en: ...Wait, you volunteered at a prison?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">是的，那边收容了一些年轻的轻罪犯人，需要有同龄人协助进行感化教育。
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019"> Yeah, they house some young offenders who committed minor crimes. They needed people their own age to help with rehabilitation and education.

content.cn: 我听说之后就报名参加了，没有什么特别要做的，多和他们聊聊天就好。
content.en: I signed up when I heard they needed help. It wasn't complicated, mostly just spent time talking with them.

content.cn: 一开始还被笑话了好久……但我还是想办法坚持到最后了！
content.en: They made fun of me for a long time at first ... but I still found a way to stick it out till the end!

content.cn: 确实是很有意义的工作，但你应该不太擅长这块吧，为什么会这么努力？
content.en: That does sound like meaningful work, but it doesn't seem like your strong suit. Why did you push yourself so hard with it?

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_035">有点复杂……要怎么说呢……
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_035"> It's kinda complicated ... how should I put this...

content.cn: 可能，是因为我家墓园里的一位先生。
content.en: Perhaps ... it's because of a gentleman from our family cemetery.

content.cn: 不是要讲鬼故事啦！<image="sns_emoji_030">
content.en: It's not a ghost story, I promise! <image="sns_emoji_030">

content.cn: 那位先生是逃到墓园里来的裂地者，我们一家找到他的时候，他已经奄奄一息了。
content.en: That gentleman was a Landbreaker who fled to our cemetery. By the time my family found him, he was already on the verge of death.

content.cn: 他最后变得很难过，说着“我到底想要什么”，哭着咽了气……那种感觉让我很难受。
content.en: He was so heartbroken at the end. He kept crying, asking "What do I even want?" until he finally passed... It really stuck with me.

content.cn: 出来打工之后，我在塞什卡也给一些葬礼帮过忙，听到了更多人的遗愿。
content.en: After I started working, I helped out with some funerals through Seš'qa too. I heard a lot more people's final wishes.

content.cn: 我发现，那些一辈子都刀口舔血的人，为了活下来就精疲力竭的人，他们的葬礼也一样，空空的。
content.en: I realized, the funerals for people who spent their whole lives living on the edge, just struggling to survive ... they feel just as empty.

content.cn: 别礼，后勤干员说我收到了一个包裹，但上面写着要转交给你。
content.en: Last Rite, logistics said I got a package, but it's marked for you.

content.cn: 他们大都没有遗愿，不论是满足还是释怀，我都感觉不到……总觉得他们最后也没能得到平静。
content.en: Most of them didn't have any final wishes. I couldn't sense any satisfaction or peace... It always felt like they never found any calm in the end.

content.cn: 所以我想，如果能帮助那些还有机会的人重新找到目标，让他们好好生活，应该能让这种遗憾变少一些……
content.en: So I figured, if I can help people who still have time turn things around, help them live properly ... maybe that would mean fewer stories ending like that.

content.cn: 原来如此，确实是很了不起的想法。
content.en: I see. That's a really admirable way of thinking.

content.cn: 我明白了，不过这条路可不轻松，你得做好准备。
content.en: I understand, but that path isn't an easy one. You'll need to be prepared.

content.cn: 没问题的，我肯定能坚持下来<image="sns_emoji_022">
content.en: No problem, I'm sure I can stick with it <image="sns_emoji_022">

content.cn: 既然是这样，那就得好好鼓励一下你了。
content.en: Well, if that's the case, then I ought to give you some proper encouragement.

content.cn: 找个时间，我把那面锦旗送过去，帮你挂在宿舍门上吧！
content.en: I'll find some time to bring that banner over and hang it on your dorm door for you!

content.cn: ！！！！<image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">
content.en: !!!!!<image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032"><image="sns_emoji_032">

content.cn: 包裹里好像是面红色的旗子，你知道情况吗？
content.en: Looks like there's a red flag inside the package. Do you know what this is about?

content.cn: 我没有买旗子啊最近都没花钱而且为什么会送到您手里肯定是哪里搞错了我去检查一遍
content.en: I didn't buy any flag I haven't spent any money lately and why would it be sent to you? Something's definitely wrong I'll go check right away

content.cn: 总之非常抱歉打扰到您我不是故意的请您原谅对不起对不起对不起对不起对不起对不起
content.en: I'm so sorry for bothering you with this I didn't mean to please forgive me I'm really really really really really sorry

content.cn: 冷静一点，只是问问，没出什么乱子。
content.en: Take it easy, I was just asking. Nothing's gone wrong.

content.cn: 管理员，阅览终末地之前行动的作战记录后，我以铁誓军的标准整理了份总结报告。
content.en: Endmin, after reviewing the combat records from Endfield's previous operation, I've compiled a summary report based on the Order of Steel Oath's standards.

content.cn: 抱歉，我还在行动中，没来得及回办公室……
content.en: Apologies, I'm still in the middle of an operation and haven't had a chance to get back to the office yet...

content.cn: 辛苦了……但很抱歉，我现在还没来得及回办公室……
content.en: You've put in a lot of work ... but I'm sorry, I haven't made it back to the office just yet.

content.cn: 不，这是我的疏忽。终末地的部署比铁誓军灵活，行动的范围也更加广泛……这是我的盲点。
content.en: No, that was my oversight. Endfield's deployments are far more flexible than the Order of Steel Oath's, and your operational scope is much wider... This was a blind spot in my assessment.

content.cn: 我会同特种技术部门继续协商演练事宜，改进方案。
content.en: I will continue coordinating with the Specialist Tech Division regarding the exercise and the proposed improvements.

content.cn: 对了，管理员，关于北方，你还记得多少？
content.en: By the way, Endmin, how much do you still remember about the North?

content.cn: 我什么都不记得了……
content.en: I don't remember anything...

content.cn: 我明白了。
content.en: I see.

content.cn: 管理员，你的作战风格变化很大，但这一变化却为外勤行动带来了一些有利的效果。
content.en: Endmin, your combat style has changed significantly, but this shift has actually produced some beneficial outcomes for field operations.

content.cn: 需要关注的作战记录我已做好标注，对应战术的改进方案也单独制作了附录。
content.en: I've highlighted the combat records that require attention, and I've also prepared a separate appendix with proposed improvements for the corresponding tactics.

content.cn: 期待再次和你并肩作战的那天。
content.en: I look forward to the day we can fight side by side again.

content.cn: 我也期待着那天。
content.en: I also look forward to that day.

content.cn: 不知道管理员喜不喜欢吃点心？离开前线时，战士们塞给了我一些要塞里的甜点。
content.en: I wonder if you like pastries, Endmin? When I left the front lines, the soldiers insisted I take some sweets from the fort.

content.cn: 说是甜点，其实只是自制的糖果和谷物能量棒。他们让我一定要亲手带给终末地的朋友。
content.en: They call them sweets, but they're really just homemade candies and grain energy bars. They insisted I deliver them personally to our friends at Endfield.

content.cn: 委托值班干员在你回来后交给你了，工作繁重，务必注意休息。
content.en: I've asked the duty operator to pass them to you when you return. Your workload is heavy, so please be sure to get some rest.

content.cn: 劳逸结合才能为下一次行动做好准备。
content.en: A proper balance of work and rest is essential to prepare for the next operation.

content.cn: 好！谢谢你。
content.en: Sure! Thank you!

content.cn: 等等，总结报告？
content.en: Wait, a summary report?

content.cn: 终末地工业最近三十个标准日的外勤行动总结报告，登上帝江号后我便申请到了阅览行动记录的权限。
content.en: A summary report on Endfield Industries' field operations over the last thirty standard days. I applied for access to review the operation logs after boarding Dijiang.

content.cn: 得益于特种技术部门严格遵守归档标准，我才能在这几天选出极具参考价值的行动。
content.en: Thanks to the Specialist Tech Division's strict adherence to archiving standards, I was able to identify several highly valuable operations for reference over the past few days.

content.cn: 另外，在与特种技术部门协商后，我们计划在下周举行一次实战演练。
content.en: Additionally, after consulting with the Specialist Tech Division, we have scheduled a live combat drill for next week.

content.cn: 我做了初步方案，但管理员才是终末地的外勤行动专家，想听听你的专业意见。
content.en: I've drafted a preliminary plan, but you're the expert on Endfield's field operations, Endmin. I'd like to hear your professional opinion.

content.cn: 管理员，我已协助特种技术部门，对一些尚未归档的新批次行动进行了上传存档。
content.en: Endmin, I've assisted the Specialist Tech Division with uploading and archiving some of the newer, unarchived operation batches.

content.cn: 铁誓军经常会遇见新类型的天使吗？
content.en: Do the Oathkeepers frequently encounter new types of Aggeloi?

content.cn: 嗯，每次遇见这些天使，总是会造成大量牺牲。
content.en: Yes. Every time we encounter these Aggeloi, it always results in heavy casualties.

content.cn: 铁誓军的牺牲……
content.en: The Oathkeepers' sacrifices...

content.cn: 我参与的第一场战役，是随补给队北上跨过一座冰川时，与天使集群的一场遭遇战。
content.en: My first battle was an encounter with an Aggeloid host while crossing a glacier with a supply convoy heading north.

content.cn: 面对从未见过的天使形成模式，我们陷入了苦战。但这时，战斗引发了雪崩，顷刻间淹没了一切。
content.en: Faced with an unprecedented Aggeloi construct pattern, we were locked in a brutal fight. But then, the combat triggered an avalanche, burying everything in an instant.

content.cn: 作战结束后，我曾问过自己，雪花从空中落下，除了将尸骸掩埋，是否还有其他意义？
content.en: After the battle ended, I asked myself ... when snowflakes fall, is there any meaning to it beyond burying the remains?

content.cn: 关于这个问题，塞梦珂曾给过我一个答案。铁誓军的生活，又让我自己找到了答案。
content.en: Regarding that question, Simonch once gave me an answer. Life in the Order of Steel Oath later helped me find my own.

content.cn: 所以答案是什么？
content.en: So what's the answer?

content.cn: 另外，部分行动作战的优化建议、波动数据图表，我也均已上传。
content.en: Additionally, I have also uploaded optimization suggestions and fluctuation data charts for some of the operations.

content.cn: 所以……雪花为什么飘零？
content.en: So ... why do the snowflakes fall?

content.cn: 铁誓军的牺牲，为的是争取时间。只有这样，像管理员这样的人才来得及为塔卫二的人们开拓生存的道路。
content.en: The sacrifices of the Oathkeepers are made to buy time. Only then can people like you, Endmin, have the opportunity to forge a path of survival for the people of Talos-II.

content.cn: 这是我们的铁誓。
content.en: This is our oath.

content.cn: 管理员，我经历过的这些往事，如果你感兴趣的话，我可以讲给你听……也许对你有用。
content.en: Endmin, if you're interested in these past experiences of mine, I can share them with you ... perhaps they might be of some use.

content.cn: 好啊，我想听你多讲讲铁誓军。
content.en: Sure, I'd like to hear more about the Oathkeepers.

content.cn: 好啊，我很期待铁誓军的传奇。
content.en: Absolutely, I'm looking forward to hearing the legends of the Order of Steel Oath.

content.cn: 若你觉得有评估这批行动风险等级的必要，这些建议和图表可以作为参考。
content.en: If you feel it's necessary to assess the risk level of these operations, these suggestions and charts can serve as a reference.

content.cn: 终末地工业在行动总结上的建设较为完备，不足之处我会协助特种技术部门进行改善。
content.en: Endfield Industries' infrastructure for operational summaries is quite comprehensive. I will assist the Specialist Tech Division in improving any shortcomings.

content.cn: 辛苦了，行动后的总结确实重要。
content.en: You've worked hard. Post-operation summaries are indeed important.

content.cn: 你说得很对，战后总结是保证作战能在计划内进行的关键。
content.en: You are absolutely right. Post-operation summaries are crucial for ensuring operations proceed as planned.

content.cn: 在北方的战役中，我们经常会遇见很多没有被记录过的天使形成模式。
content.en: During the campaigns in the North, we often encountered many undocumented patterns of Aggeloi formation.

content.cn: 要是没有在战士们的前赴后继下总结出的情报，我们很难在之后的作战里应对这些新的威胁。
content.en: Without the intelligence gathered through the relentless efforts of our soldiers, it would have been difficult to counter these new threats in subsequent operations.

content.cn: 管理员，你现在有空吗？
content.en: Endmin, do you have a moment right now?

content.cn: 嗯，我喜欢听故事。
content.en: Sure, I love stories.

content.cn: 当我第一次乘上前往塞梦珂的车时，曾见过一场梦境。
content.en: When I first boarded my journey to Simonch, I ... had a dream.

content.cn: 梦里的我，站在一个插满刀剑的战场上。战场中央，一片废墟静静地立在那里。
content.en: In the dream, I stood on a battlefield littered with swords. At its center, a stretch of ruins stood silently.

content.cn: 内心突然涌现的悲伤促使着我离开那里，但我的身体却不由自主地走了进去。
content.en: A sudden surge of sorrow urged me to leave that place, but my body moved forward against my will.

content.cn: 然后怎样了？
content.en: What happened afterwards?

content.cn: 好奇怪的梦……然后怎样了？
content.en: That's strange ... and then?

content.cn: 在废墟的深处，我见到了记忆里的那栋建筑，一个只剩名字的地方。
content.en: Deep within the ruins, I saw that building from my memories, a place that now only exists in name.

content.cn: 阿撒兹勒。
content.en: Azazel.

content.cn: 看着那扇我好像推开过无数次的门，我试图伸出手，却始终无法触及。
content.en: Staring at that door I felt I had pushed open countless times. I reached out my hand, yet I could never quite reach it.

content.cn: 我在门口徘徊了许久，无法离开，也无法对它的存在做出回应。
content.en: I lingered at the doorway for a long time, unable to leave, yet also unable to respond to its presence.

content.cn: 就在这时，一阵吱呀声传来，诊所的门被缓缓拉开。
content.en: Right at that moment, a creaking sound echoed as the clinic door slowly swung open.

content.cn: 在那片废墟中，我见到了他，还有那个女孩……他的养女。我并不感到意外，正要穿过那扇门……
content.en: Amidst those ruins, I saw him, and that girl ... his adopted daughter. I wasn't surprised, and was just about to step through that door...

content.cn: 到站的播报将我唤醒，此行的目的地已在眼前。
content.en: The arrival announcement woke me, and my destination was now right before my eyes.

content.cn: 在这之后，你尝试过在梦里继续寻找那扇门吗？
content.en: Did you ever try to find that door again in your dreams after that?

content.cn: 这场梦就像是在旅途中遇见了许久未见的挚友，听他向我诉说着他的往事，直到终点。
content.en: That dream felt like meeting a long-lost close friend during a journey, listening as he shared his past with me, right until the very end.

content.cn: 在那之后，我便再也没有见过那一扇门。
content.en: And I never saw that door ever again.

content.cn: 有空，怎么了？
content.en: I do. Why?

content.cn: 难道说……是故事时间？
content.en: Could it be ... story time?

content.cn: 刚才我在整理以前做的笔记时，记起了一些往事。
content.en: Just now, while organizing some old notes of mine, I was reminded of a few things from the past.

content.cn: 不知道管理员是否有兴趣。
content.en: I wonder if you might be interested, Endmin.

content.cn: 好哇，是铁誓军的作战行动吗？
content.en: Sure, is it about the Oathkeepers' combat operations?

content.cn: 不，是一场梦。
content.en: No, it was a dream.

content.cn: 管理员，上次和您用Baker聊天，还是十年前。
content.en: Endmin, our last Baker chat was 10 years ago.

content.cn: 关于枢纽区基地，有什么想了解的，随时问我。
