content.en: If you got any questions about the Hub Base, I'm the one to ask! Anytime!

content.cn: 感觉工团的工人们都很好相处。
content.en: The UWST crew mates are quite easy to get along with.

content.cn: 那当然，我们来到四号谷地后，就和工团的工人们打成一片。
content.en: Of course. After arriving at Valley IV, many of us quickly became friends with the local UWST crew.

content.cn: 如果天气不错，我们会邀请他们参加一些友好的球类竞赛。
content.en: We'd even invite them to friendly matches when the sun is out.

content.cn: 偶尔还会举办像是锻造大赛这种比拼技术的竞赛——只用老式锻炉和打铁榔头，比比谁锻的武器更耐用。
content.en: Forge Fests and other technical competitions are also organized every now and then. Only traditional furnaces, hammers, and anvils are allowed. The smith who forges the toughest weapon wins.

content.cn: 至于比赛的奖品嘛，从实用工具到有趣的工艺品，应有尽有，都是大家一起选的，管理员您也选过一些。
content.en: Prizes range from useful tools to novel handicrafts. Everyone voted for it. You actually chose a few of them, Endmin.

content.cn: 还有一回，我闯进了掰手腕比赛的决赛，坐在我对面的是一名运输队的工人。
content.en: I remember accidentally entering the finals of an arm wrestling competition. My opponent is a crew mate from logistics.

content.cn: 最后是谁赢了？
content.en: Who ended up winning?

content.cn: 真是怀念啊！
content.en: Really miss those days!

content.cn: 最后结果如何？
content.en: What happened in the end?

content.cn: 最后嘛……我们用他奖品里的工具，帮他修好了他的卡车……
content.en: Well... We used the tools from his prize and helped him fix his truck...

content.cn: 咳咳，大家都志在建设开拓区，所以很聊得来。
content.en: Ahem. Everyone's trying to develop the frontier, so we have a lot of things in common to talk about.

content.cn: 这十年里，我们经常和工人们一起出去开山铺路，四号谷地每星期都变个样！
content.en: We spent the last 10 years paving roads and digging tunnels. Valley IV was getting a new look every week!

content.cn: 唉，要是这场袭击没有发生该多好……
content.en: Ugh. If only this attack never happened...

content.cn: 关于这里的事情，您还记得多少？
content.en: Wonder if you remember anything about this place.

content.cn: 不光是这里，我几乎想不起来任何事情。
content.en: Nothing, and not just about this place. I can't remember anything.

content.cn: [安德烈]输入中
content.en: [Andre] is typing...

content.cn: [安德烈]停止输入
content.en: [Andre] has stopped typing

content.cn: [安德烈]输入中
content.en: [Andre] is typing...

content.cn: 没事的！总会有想起来的那天！
content.en: Don't worry! Things will come flowing back to you!

content.cn: 之前在帝江号上，我记得你说过我沉睡了十年，塔卫二现在怎么样了？
content.en: You mentioned I slept for 10 years when I was aboard Dijiang. How is Talos-II now?

content.cn: 请不要这样想，我们等了十年，但不只是等了十年。
content.en: Don't think of it that way. It was a 10-year wait but it was also more than that.

content.cn: 无论是上一次唤醒你，还是更久远以前的战争，都是你为我们扛下了责任。
content.en: You took the brunt for us during the previous awakening, and also during that war that took place many years ago.

content.cn: 现在该轮到我们为你分担。
content.en: Now is our turn to share the burden.

content.cn: 你回来了，就是对我们最重要的事。
content.en: The fact that you're back means the most to us.

content.cn: 嗯，我们都该放松些，然后一起做好准备。
content.en: Indeed. We should take things slowly and prepare ourselves properly.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 抱歉，我也有点激动了。
content.en: Sorry if I seemed a little intense.

content.cn: 嗯，距离你最近一次陷入休眠，已经过去了十年。
content.en: Yeah. 10 years had already passed since your last hibernation.

content.cn: 这十年里，我们一直与各大组织机构协作，监控塔卫二上的各处危险区域，清剿残余的敌对力量。
content.en: For 10 years we've been constantly working with major organizations to monitor hazardous regions of Talos-II and trying to fight off the remaining hostiles.

content.cn: 当然，最重要的任务，还是遵循“零号委托”推进协议核心的研发工作，等待唤醒你的时机。
content.en: Of course, the key mission is to follow the Zeroth Directive. We must complete the PAC research work and wait for a suitable moment to wake you up.

content.cn: 怎么，管理员，为什么突然问这个？
content.en: What happened, Endmin? Why are you asking about this?

content.cn: 与安德烈见面后，他像是有很多话想和我说。
content.en: After our meeting, Andre seems interested in telling me all sorts of stuff.

content.cn: 但在帝江号上时，大家似乎过于平静了。
content.en: But everyone behaved a little too calmly aboard Dijiang.

content.cn: 终末地等待着唤醒我的时机，等了十年，我却失忆了。
content.en: Endfield waited 10 years for my awakening but I couldn't remember a thing.

content.cn: 管理员，还请你见谅。
content.en: You have my sincere apologies, Endmin.

content.cn: 之前听你们说，你也是“裂地者”？
content.en: Heard them mention that you were once an LB?

content.cn: 没错，我来自狼群氏族
content.en: I was. The Pack was my clan.

content.cn: 同为裂地者，碾骨氏族在狼群面前，只是牙尖嘴利的猎物
content.en: Though the Bonekrushers are also LBs, the Pack treats them as mere prey that sometimes bite back

content.cn: 只不过，四号谷地这一批，要比以往的还要嗜血好杀。
content.en: Unfortunately, the Valley IV krushers are more bloodthirsty and cruel.

content.cn: 那碾骨氏族之外的裂地者是什么样？
content.en: Besides the Bonekrushers, what are the other LBs like?

content.cn: 很难概括。但并不单纯是很多人认为的土匪路霸
content.en: It's hard to define them as a group. Not all of them are the common stereotypical raider or bandit.

content.cn: 或许，当我们有一个可靠的未来后，“裂地者”这三个字就只会出现在教科书上。
content.en: Once we secure a future for everyone, Landbreakers might become a textbook concept.

content.cn: 那么，在面对裂地者时，如何识别他们属于哪个氏族？
content.en: So, if I were to face LBs, how would I identify their clan?

content.cn: 不必识别
content.en: Unnecessary

content.cn: 不论对方来自哪一个裂地者氏族，态度友善就进行交涉，否则就准备战斗。
content.en: It doesn't matter which clan they're from. Talk to the friendly ones. If they're not friendly, then prepare to fight.

content.cn: 没关系。
content.en: It's alright.

content.cn: 你对每个人都是这样“欢迎”的？
content.en: Is this how you greet everyone?

content.cn: 当然不是
content.en: Of course not

content.cn: 传闻中的管理员就在眼前，没控制住习惯
content.en: I saw the legendary Endmin and my instincts took over.

content.cn: 有所冒犯，抱歉。
content.en: Again, sorry if I offended you.

content.cn: 你对裂地者有什么疑问都可以问我，我还算了解。
content.en: Feel free to ask me questions regarding the Landbreakers. I think I'm expert in LB affairs.

content.cn: 感觉你在和裂地者交手这件事上很有干劲。
content.en: You seem pretty eager about dealing with the Landbreakers.

content.cn: 起势！
content.en: HAIYAH! WATTISH!

content.cn: 之前你和碾骨氏族交过手吗？
content.en: Ever fought the Bonekrushers before?

content.cn: 和裂地者打过交道，单就碾骨的话……似乎不太多。
content.en: I dealt with LBs before, but for the Bonekrusher types... Not really.

content.cn: 小时候自以为修行到了家，偷溜出去，正巧碰到有人被裂地者攻击，便拔刀相助。
content.en: When I was a kid, I thought I got good with the blade and sneaked out for fun. I ran into someone getting robbed by the LBs and decided to help.

content.cn: 虽然不服师父那么说我，但真遇到危险才知道我当时实力确实不足。<image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: My Master told me I wasn't ready but I didn't know that till I started fighting truly dangerous people <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 好在有人路过，救下了我。
content.en: Thankfully someone was nearby and got me out of the mess.

content.cn: 不过像四号谷地这样残暴的裂地者，倒是第一次碰到。
content.en: But yeah, this is my first time meeting really evil LBs in Valley IV.

content.cn: 居然还有能救下陈少侠的人，那个人是谁？
content.en: Someone actually saved you? Find it hard to believe that Master Chen needs saving.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，很久没有和别人切磋武技了。
content.en: Heheh. I haven't had a proper fight for quite a while.

content.cn: 管理员你这话说的，我又不是天生就会武。<image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: Come on, Endmin. I wasn't born with all my fighting skills, you know <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 至于那个人嘛，管理员你会遇见的。<image="sns_emoji_017">
content.en: As for that person ... I believe you'll meet eventually. One day. <image="sns_emoji_017">

content.cn: 方才那些喽啰不太经打，倒是挺期待和他们中间的高手会会。
content.en: Those lousy raiders hardly put up a fight. I hope to spar with a proper LB elite or warrior.

content.cn: 天使很经打，不期待和天使交手吗？
content.en: The Aggeloi are pretty tough opponents. Don't you wanna fight them?

content.cn: 相较于天使，我还是更期待与裂地者交手。
content.en: Well, I actually prefer fighting LBs than the rocky-crawlies.

content.cn: 天使嘛，就是一群会走路的“木人桩”，虽然危险，但招式一成不变。
content.en: The Aggeloi are just crawly practice dummies. They might be dangerous, but their moves are always the same.

content.cn: 一直和“木人桩”过招，难免有点枯燥无味。
content.en: Fighting practice dummies gets really stale after a while.

content.cn: 招式之外，有了情绪和意志的碰撞，才是真正的战斗！
content.en: A real fight is more than just moves and counters. You gotta have a clash of emotions and willpower!

content.cn: 管理员，多加小心，谷地要塞的沦陷过于迅速了。
content.en: Careful, Endmin. The Valley Fort fell to the enemy far too quickly.

content.cn: 看来没有瞒住你。
content.en: Well, nothing escapes your eyes.

content.cn: 我得找他要个解释，明明是学界有名的前辈，怎么做事这么任性！
content.en: Ugh. That Big Owl owes me an explanation. A respectable SME of his field shouldn't be acting like a reckless kid!

content.cn: 消消气，消消气。
content.en: Wow. Simmer down.

content.cn: 倒不是生气，我只是有点过意不去……管理员，感谢你们愿意抽空帮他的忙。
content.en: I'm not angry. I'm just a little... Well. Really appreciate that you're taking the time to help him out, Endmin.

content.cn: 对了，去要塞救人的时候，千万小心。
content.en: Since you're going to save people at the Valley Fort, do be careful out there.

content.cn: 有危险及时撤回来，枢纽区基地是你们坚实的后盾。这里还有人等着你们回来。
content.en: If things get too dangerous, head back to the Hub Base at once. We got your back and want to see you safe and sound.

content.cn: 谢谢，我们会小心的。<image="sns_emoji_001">
content.en: Thank you. We'll be careful <image="sns_emoji_001">

content.cn: 佩丽卡监督和我分享了她的看法……如此有组织的行动，不像是我们所了解的碾骨氏族。
content.en: Supervisor Perlica shared her views with me... The Bonekrushers we knew shouldn't be able to carry out such an organized attack.

content.cn: 如果需要帮助，请务必联系我。
content.en: Give me a call if you need help.

content.cn: 好，没问题。
content.en: Okay, no problem.

content.cn: 放心，我们明白。
content.en: Don't worry. We understand.

content.cn: 对了，刚才在管理员你们动身前往谷地要塞后，我听说了一件事……
content.en: I just heard of something when you were about to head to the Valley Fort...

content.cn: 安德烈是不是让你们帮忙处理原型机的事情？
content.en: Did Andre ask you to deal with the Prototype?

content.cn: 所以，聂菲斯就是碾骨氏族的首领？
content.en: So, is Nefarith the chief of the Bonekrushers?

content.cn: 不过，最让我在意的，是在桥上时，她能操纵那些东西。
content.en: But what got me concerned is something else. It's how she manipulated those things on the bridge.

content.cn: 在S.O.W.关于碾骨氏族的情报里，也没有提过巢雕能影响碾骨氏族成员的作战能力。
content.en: SOW intel about the Bonekrushers never mentioned that denstacks could influence the combat capabilities of the krushers.

content.cn: 在桥上聂菲斯对我说了一些话，她好像很了解我。
content.en: Nefarith said something to me on the bridge. She seems to know me very well.

content.cn: 很了解你？
content.en: She knows you?

content.cn: 我明白了，管理员。我会告知S.O.W.……不，还有环带各方的安全机构，提醒他们针对聂菲斯建立个人情报档案。
content.en: Understood, Endmin. I'll inform SOW... No. I'll sync this finding with the security agencies of every Band Accordatories. I must remind them to establish a clue dossier about this Nefarith.

content.cn: 从目前的情况看来，确实如此。
content.en: From what we're seeing right now, it does seem so.

content.cn: 碾骨氏族的异样或许也与这位首领有关。
content.en: This chief might have a hand in the unexpected transformation of the Bonekrushers.

content.cn: 碾骨氏族的异样？
content.en: Unexpected transformation?

content.cn: 嗯。包括碾骨氏族在内，裂地者各个氏族都处于长期的内部斗争和氏族间的吞并冲突中，并没有精力组织起强大的军事力量。
content.en: Yes. Landbreaker clans, including the Bonekrushers, were constantly engaged in internal strife or inter-clan warfare. No LB clans have the resources to organize a sizable military force.

content.cn: 在有记录的碾骨氏族袭击事件中，他们下手的目标往往是商队或者小型定居点，最近这种袭击规模，还是第一次。
content.en: Caravans or smaller villages tend to be the target of Bonekrusher attacks we have on the record. An attack of this scale was unprecedented.

content.cn: 很少会有裂地者袭击谷地要塞这类区域，更没发生过占领的情况。
content.en: LB clans seldom attack sites like the Valley Fort. And none of the attacks ever succeeded in capturing the place.

content.cn: 即便是历史上的那位雅各布·迈森，也不大可能有率领如今的碾骨氏族攻击联盟工团的气魄。
content.en: Even if the historical LB leader Jakub Meissen were alive today, he probably couldn't rally the Bonekrushers and take on the UWST directly.

content.cn: 碾骨氏族的裂地者，好像都很讨厌狼群氏族？
content.en: The Bonekrushers seem to hate the Pack a lot.

content.cn: 有时他们还会因为内斗继续分裂，最终变成荒野上的散兵游勇
content.en: A few of the clans have continued to splinter due to internal warfare until they become little more than marauder bands in the wildlands.

content.cn: 至于沙海上的裂地者们，我并不清楚他们现在如何。
content.en: As for the LBs sailing the sea of sand, I don't know how they're doing right now.

content.cn: 狼群，碾骨，还有沙海上的氏族……加起来就是现在的裂地者？
content.en: So the modern Landbreakers would include ... the Pack, the Bonekrushers, and the clan sailing on the sea of sand?

content.cn: 基本上是这样，但……希望我们不会遇上第二个聂菲斯。
content.en: Essentially yes. But ... I hope we do not run into another Nefarith.

content.cn: 嗯。狼群将碾骨视为猎物，碾骨认为狼群是裂地者的叛徒
content.en: Indeed. The Pack treat the krushers as prey, and the krushers treat the Pack as traitors of the Landbreakers

content.cn: 至于是什么时候开始这种冲突，我也是听我祖父讲的
content.en: Got no idea when this clan warfare started since I heard it from my grandfather

content.cn: 裂地者集团覆灭后，碾骨自以为继承了雅各布·迈森的理想，但不过是一群疯狂残忍的破坏分子
content.en: When the Landbreakers splintered, the Bonekrushers think they inherited Jakub Meissen's ideals. In truth, they're just a group of mad and bloodthirsty pillagers.

content.cn: 狼群自然不会与他们同流合污，也是在那之后，狼群与碾骨冲突不断，厮杀至今。
content.en: The Pack refused to stoop to their levels. That was when the Pack and the krushers started fighting each other, a war that lasted till this day.

content.cn: 原来是这样。
content.en: Really?

content.cn: 大多数氏族在军阀的时代结束后就不可避免地迎来了覆灭的结局
content.en: Most clans could not escape annihilation after the age of warlords ended.

content.cn: 幸存下来的氏族，有的在沙海上扬帆，有的依附狼群或碾骨，但依附并不能帮小氏族逃脱被其他氏族吞并的命运
content.en: For the clans that survived, some are sailing along the sea of sand. Others either allied themselves with the Pack or Bonekrushers. But being an ally does not make a clan immune to annexation by the others.

content.cn: 集成工业系统真的很方便！<image="sns_emoji_024">
content.en: The AIC is so useful <image="sns_emoji_024">

content.cn: 管理员，正如你在“零号委托”中提及的那样。
content.en: It's just as you've mentioned in the Zeroth Directive, Endmin.

content.cn: 将原本庞大的生产管线浓缩到现在的规模，并且没有影响产出。
content.en: We miniaturized a massive production line to its current scale without compromising on total yield.

content.cn: 只要在现有协议源石网络覆盖范围内，便能小范围搭建比较完善的工业生产体系。
content.en: This lets us setup a rather self-contained industrial production system, as long as we are within range of the Protorig Network.

content.cn: 例如我们在谷地通道的据点，只是基本功能便能满足居民们的生活和安全需求。
content.en: For example, the basic function of our Valley Pass outpost is to satisfy living and safety requirements of the residents.

content.cn: 原来这些只是集成工业系统的基本功能？
content.en: Is that just the basic function of our AIC Factory?

content.cn: 嗯，塔卫二的人们仍在面对生存危机，需要敏捷且有效的工业系统。
content.en: Of course. The people of Talos-II are still facing the crisis of survival. We need an agile and effective industrial system.

content.cn: 另一方面，我们还需要面对北方的威胁。终末地不会满足于只让集成工业系统生产基本制成品。
content.en: Meanwhile, we also have to deal with the threat from the north. Endfield isn't going to just use the AIC Factory to make basic products.

content.cn: 协议核心投放技术与集成生产设备自动组装技术已经接近完成标准。
content.en: Technologies for deploying the PAC and the auto-assembly of AIC Factory facilities are approaching standardization.

content.cn: 我们在谷地要塞也建设起了集成工业系统，搬进暂居处的人们都很满意。<image="sns_emoji_005">
content.en: We've built the AIC Factory at the Valley Fort. Everyone moving into the camp seems pretty satisfied <image="sns_emoji_005">

content.cn: 给她担心得哟，三天两头就要我们去做血管造影，生怕我们感染矿石病。
content.en: She got super worried and ordered vascular imaging every 3 days for everyone. Gotta dodge the Oripathy, you know.

content.cn: 只是测试设备部署，都要冒着这么大的风险吗？
content.en: I thought it's just a deployment test. Sounds like super risky to me.

content.cn: 这只是小插曲，测试阶段的不确定性我们心知肚明，每个人都愿意冒点险。
content.en: It's just a minor slip up. Everyone knows that things can go wrong during testing, but all of us are willing to take the risk.

content.cn: 但是啊，等协议核心落到比四号谷地更偏远的地带，我们就能把文明环带的边界带到以前想都不敢想的地方去。
content.en: But once we can deploy the PAC in regions more remote than Valley IV, we can expand the boundaries of the Civilization Band! We'll be setting up shop at places that we hardly dared to imagine!

content.cn: 到那时，我们终末地工业能做的，就不仅是将塔卫二恢复到第一次天使战争前的样子。
content.en: When that day comes, Endfield will be doing more than just restoring Talos-II to pre-Aggeloi War conditions!

content.cn: 我们还能让塔卫二往前更进一步，直到完成您当初交给我们的任务。
content.en: We'll be elevating Talos-II to new and greater heights, till we finally complete the great mission you handed to us!

content.cn: 我的……任务？
content.en: My ... mission?

content.cn: 嗨呀，管理员……秦主管在喊我过去了。
content.en: Oh, come on, Endmin, I... Wait! Director Qin needs me right now.

content.cn: 那当然！换作十几年前，要先运输材料到各个区域组建厂房，再建立生产线。
content.en: Of course! If we go back a decade or so, we would have to move materials to various areas, build the factory buildings, and then set up the production machines.

content.cn: 真奇怪，刚忙完就喊我过去干嘛。管理员，你没和她说原型机的事儿吧？<image="sns_emoji_037">
content.en: Strange. I just handed in the work. Why does she want to talk to me? Endmin, you didn't tell her anything about the Prototype, right? <image="sns_emoji_037">

content.cn: [安德烈]已离线
content.en: [Andre] is offline

content.cn: 希望人没事。<image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: I hope you'll be alright. <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 哪怕省去抢险和运输的时间，在一切就绪的前提下凑出一条应急生产线，都不知道要等几个星期。
content.en: Even if we set aside the time spent on rescue operations and transportation AND assume everything's prepped to go, building a production line would take weeks.

content.cn: 得亏了集成工业系统实现敏捷生产，不仅省去了前面的环节，连生产新的设备都比原来只修复要快！<image="sns_emoji_024">
content.en: Thankfully the AIC Factory managed to achieve agile production. Conventional prep work is now a thing of the past. Building new facilities is even faster than repairing existing ones! <image="sns_emoji_024">

content.cn: 我第一次看到协议核心时，它不过就是这么点大一台的设备，谁能想到能像现在这样集成那么多条生产线！
content.en: When I first saw the PAC, I thought it was just a slightly bigger facility. I never expected it to be capable of automating and integrating so many production lines at once!

content.cn: 这么看来，集成工业系统确实很重要。<image="sns_emoji_005">
content.en: It would seem the AIC Factory will play an essential role <image="sns_emoji_005">

content.cn: 我记得有一次测试协议核心技术的投放部署时，地形导致设备自动组装没有到位。
content.en: I remember this time when we were testing the PAC deployment tech. The local topology prevented the successful completion of auto-assembly.

content.cn: 被碾碎的源石粉末飞得到处都是，正巧当时秦主管也在。
content.en: Crushed Originium Powder flew everywhere! Director Qin was there too.

content.cn: 抑制剂起效居然这么快？
content.en: The suppressants act fast.

content.cn: 拿联盟工团举例，正如索斯先生所说，会定期为工团成员及收容人员提供药物。
content.en: As an example, Mr. Soth mentioned that the UWST will regularly supply its crew mates and other personnel with medication.

content.cn: 文明环带在矿石病问题上早早达成了一致，《环带公约》从未放弃保障矿石病感染者权益的原则。
content.en: The Civilization Band has already reached a consensus regarding Oripathy many years ago. The Band Accord has never abandoned the principles of safeguarding the rights of Oripathy-positives.

content.cn: 尽管我们仍然无法避免阿吉的情况发生……但在这里，没有人会把感染者抛在身后。
content.en: Although we cannot prevent cases of infection like Ginny ... no one would simply abandon an Oripathy-positive to their fates in this world.

content.cn: 目前的抑制剂已经迭代多次，针对矿石病的研究从未停止。
content.en: We are still studying the nature of Oripathy, and the suppressants have undergone quite a few rounds of improvements.

content.cn: 虽然罗德岛提供的抑制剂能阻止活性源石释放的物质穿过体细胞膜，控制新的多重结构形成——
content.en: The Rhodes Island suppressant can prevent matter released by active Originium from crossing cell membranes, and minimize the formation of complex structures —

content.cn: 但令人遗憾的是，在塔卫二并未出现过“痊愈”的报告。
content.en: Unfortunately, we have yet to find a case of an Oripathy-positive being "cured" of their condition.

content.cn: 一旦感染矿石病，就必须长期依靠注射抑制剂缓解病症。
content.en: In any case, Oripathy-positives must rely on constant suppressant injections to alleviate their symptoms.

content.cn: 抑制剂是每个患者都能拿到的吗？
content.en: Can every patient access and acquire the suppressants?

content.cn: 我明白管理员你所担心的，目前抑制药物已经在环带诸城间普及。
content.en: I understand your concerns, Endmin. The suppressants can be easily acquired in various Band cities.

content.cn: 长期接触活性源石的工作人员也都会获得预防药物和源石防护装备。
content.en: People who are constantly exposed to active Originium during work are also given preventive medication and Originium protection gear.

content.cn: 经常在荒野上行动的人们，是不是更容易患上矿石病？
content.en: So Landbreakers often roam about the wildlands. Are they more exposed and susceptible to Oripathy?

content.cn: 我听说，以前，矿石病远比现在更加危险
content.en: I heard that Oripathy was far more dangerous in the past.

content.cn: 更何况，在环带的赏金猎人和佣兵当中，不少人把矿石病看作护身符
content.en: Also, many bounty hunters and mercs in the Band treat Oripathy as a safety ticket

content.cn: 他们说——只要身上长石头，侵蚀就会绕着走。
content.en: Stones in the blood keeps the Blight away. That's what they say.

content.cn: 什么，矿石病还有这作用？真的假的？<image="sns_emoji_038">
content.en: Really? Is that a special effect of Oripathy? You serious? <image="sns_emoji_038">

content.cn: 迷信罢了。
content.en: It's just superstition.

content.cn: 猎人也好，猎物也罢。只要还在文明环带的范围内，就不可能彻底避开源石
content.en: As long as you are within the influence of the Civilization Band, neither prey nor predator are immune to the effects of Originium.

content.cn: 我曾见过病重的狼，为了不拖累狼群，独自走进荒野再未归来
content.en: I have seen sick wolves who wandered off into the wildlands and never came back. These wolves did not wish to slow down their Pack.

content.cn: 也见过被碾骨掠夺的聚落，幸存的母亲抱着患病的孩子向狼群求助
content.en: I have also seen villages raided by Bonekrushers. A surviving mother begged the Pack to help cure her sick child.

content.cn: 虽然文明环带也会为小型定居点提供抑制剂，但荒野上总是有太多的意外。
content.en: The Band may supply suppressants to smaller villages and towns, but accidents happen often in the wildlands.

content.cn: 感染矿石病，一定很痛苦吧。
content.en: Being infected with Oripathy must be painful.

content.cn: 所以，很多人都患有矿石病……
content.en: So many people actually are sick with Oripathy...

content.cn: 对我来说，矿石病与其他疾病的区别……不大
content.en: IMO, Oripathy isn't that ... different from other diseases

content.cn: 还好阿吉的病情稳住了。
content.en: Ginny's getting better.

content.cn: 还是有人会害怕的吧，但我觉得不多！
content.en: Hmm. Some people are still pretty scared of Oripathy, but not a lot! Definitely not a lot!

content.cn: 毕竟有抑制剂嘛，大家也不怎么忌讳参与对感染者的临终关怀和遗体处置。
content.en: We got suppressants, you know. Most aren't afraid of giving palliative care to Ori-positives or giving them funeral services.

content.cn: 虽然矿石病现在还治不好，但还是希望阿吉能早日恢复健康！<image="sns_emoji_015">
content.en: I know there's no cure for Oripathy yet, but I really hope Ginny can get cured soon! <image="sns_emoji_015">

content.cn: 幸好佩丽卡随身带着抑制剂。一想到阿吉那个样子，心里就不是个滋味儿。<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: Lucky for us Perly always carry some suppressants around. Seeing baby Ginny suffer like that makes me feel really bad <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 之前在菈梵朵玛的时候，我认识了不少感染者。
content.en: I met plenty of Ori-positives when I was in La Fantoma.

content.cn: 除了随身携带抑制剂，他们和其他人一样，在海边的躺椅上晒太阳啦，在音乐节玩啦……
content.en: They're just like everyone else, you know. Sunbathing and having fun in music fests ... besides the fact they always have a few doses of suppressants around.

content.cn: 要是他们不告诉我他们是感染者的话，我都看不出来。
content.en: I couldn't even tell that they're Ori-positives if they never told me.

content.cn: 但还是有一家人，在得知他们是感染者后，瞳孔都放大了，一声不吭地躲一边去了。
content.en: But one particular family got this super-scared look on their faces and silently kept their distance when they heard there are Ori-positives around.

content.cn: 大家都很害怕和感染者接触吗？
content.en: Are people scared of coming in contact with the Oripathy-positives?

content.cn: 管理员，刚才米菈发来了她们师徒三人和拉蒙的合照。<image="sns_emoji_001">
content.en: Endmin! Mila just sent her group photo with Phyllis, Penny, and Ramon. <image="sns_emoji_001">

content.cn: 嘴上不饶人，却都心系着彼此。
content.en: They might talk like really mean girls, but deep down inside, they truly care about one another.

content.cn: 大概就是这种相处方式，让她们的感情更加牢固。
content.en: Perhaps that's how they strengthen their emotional bonds with each other.

content.cn: 米菈还和我说，她们临走前还打算维护一下采石场的那些设备。
content.en: Mila also told me she's gonna do a final round of repairs and maintenance for the quarry facilities.

content.cn: 再算上完成收尾工作，就当是对阿伯莉采石场的告别了。
content.en: That and the closing job would be her way of saying farewell to the Aburrey Quarry.

content.cn: 希望下次再会时，她们都已经找到了自己的未来。<image="sns_emoji_024">
content.en: Hope all of them find their own future when I meet them next time <image="sns_emoji_024">

content.cn: 她们三人解开了误会，真是太好了！
content.en: I'm so glad they got their things sorted out! YAY!

content.cn: 希望她们到了新的采石场后一切顺利。
content.en: I hope things work out for them at the new quarry as well.

content.cn: 真是太开心了！
content.en: YAY!

content.cn: 之前看着米菈伤心成那样，本来还挺难过的。
content.en: I felt pretty bad when I saw Mila sad and sniffing and all T_T

content.cn: 没想到，那架“老家伙”居然也会跟着工团成员们去新的采石场。
content.en: And I totally didn't expect that big old boy to be moved to the new quarry with the UWST crew mates.

content.cn: 佩妮女士真是的，也不说一声，害我们白难过一场。<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: And Madam Penny ... ugh. She didn't tell them nothing. We were almost gonna cry with them. <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 虽然佩妮女士和菲莉丝一见面就火药味儿十足的，但她们师徒三人关系也真好。
content.en: And I thought Penny and Phyllis would start fighting immediately. I'm surprised that the Madam actually gets along with her apprentices.

content.cn: 秦工程师，阿伯莉采石场未来会怎么样？
content.en: Director Qin, what's going to happen to the Quarry afterwards?

content.cn: 核对每一位采石场工人的现况？
content.en: Verified the statuses of every quarry crew mate?

content.cn: 提供心理疏导？
content.en: Counseling?

content.cn: 四号谷地如今的每一位工人，都是在阿伯莉的故事里长大的。采石场对这里的工人们有着特殊的意义。
content.en: Every crew mate in Valley IV grew up listening to the heroic tale of Aburrey. The Quarry carries a special meaning for the local workers.

content.cn: 封闭采石场必定会伤害到工人们的情感，但事关超域，我们没有选择。哪怕是工团，也只能尽力为工人们提供帮助。
content.en: Shutting down the quarry is definitely going to affect them emotionally. But dealing with the Æther leaves us no other options. Even the UWST has no choice but to help their crew mates as much as they could afford.

content.cn: 原来是这样。<image="sns_emoji_038">
content.en: I see. <image="sns_emoji_038">

content.cn: 根据工团的正式照会……四号谷地正在将那里的工人迁至其他地区。
content.en: According to official notification from the UWST ... their Valley IV management is going to move the Quarry crew mates to other regions.

content.cn: 等安置工作完成后，采石场就会被完全封闭，等待中央生产计划委员会的下一步命令。
content.en: Once the move is complete, the Quarry will be completely shut down and sealed till the next order from the Central Production Planning Committee.

content.cn: 工人们都很舍不得采石场。
content.en: The crew mates actually don't really want to leave.

content.cn: 采石场的工人们看上去都很难过。
content.en: The quarry crew mates look very sad about this.

content.cn: 正如您所见，不只是采石场的工人们，四号谷地的其他工人也都舍不得这座老采石场。我们也……感同身受。
content.en: You've noticed it as well. And it isn't just the Quarry crew mates. Other workers in Valley IV are quite attached to the old Quarry. We actually ... feel the same way.

content.cn: 收到指令后，工团核对了每一位采石场工人的现况，尽可能地提供了心理疏导。
content.en: After receiving the command, the UWST verified the statuses of various Quarry crew mates and gave as much counseling as they could.

content.cn: 塞梦珂也听取了工人们的意见，让那些凝聚着工人们情感的设备，随他们一同转移。
content.en: Simonch also read the workers' reviews and agreed to move machinery that bear sentimental value along with the crew.

content.cn: o v o
content.en: o v o

content.cn: = _ =的话……感觉它不想回答我的问题的时候就会出现。
content.en: = _ = means ... it doesn't really want to answer my question.

content.cn: 你问了它什么？
content.en: What did you ask?

content.cn: 我想知道它是男生还是女生……
content.en: I wanna know if Tata is a boy or a girl...

content.cn: ? _ ?感觉你也学会了！塔塔表情的精髓！
content.en: ? _ ? I think you got it! Tata's Emote Arts!

content.cn: 当它发出? _ ?的时候，说明它正在思考问题。它对塔卫二还是充满好奇的啊。
content.en: When it's thinking about something, it would show the ? _ ? emote. I think it's real curious about Talos-II.

content.cn: 不过，千万别质疑它的能力。它挺在意的。
content.en: But never doubt its abilities. Tata really cares.

content.cn: 它会生气吗？
content.en: What? Does that mean Tata knows how to get angry?

content.cn: 这是它标准的生气脸，我用Baker学得也不太像。
content.en: That's its standard angry emote. I tried copying it in Baker but it's not a perfect match.

content.cn: 希望伊冯能给它升级一个语音功能！想和它多聊聊！
content.en: Hopefully Yvonne will give it a speech feature upgrade! I'm so looking forward towards a Tata-chat.

content.cn: 怎么了吗？
content.en: Wassup?

content.cn: ……你在学塔塔？
content.en: ...You're trying to be Tata?

content.cn: 没错！管理员，我仔细观察了一番塔塔。
content.en: That's right, Endmin! I've been observing Tata real close, yk.

content.cn: 虽然不如伊冯，但我敢说我已经是半个塔塔专家了。
content.en: I might not be as good as Yvonne but I consider myself an honorary Tata expert now.

content.cn: o v o说明它心情不错，它大多数情况下都是台开心小车！
content.en: o v o means its feeling great. Tata's usually a happy little robo cart!

content.cn: 安德烈，塔塔对伊冯来说很重要？
content.en: Andre, does Tata mean a lot to Yvonne?

content.cn: 话说回来，管理员您知道TA-TA原型机的全名是什么吗？
content.en: Speaking of which, do you know what TA-TA stands for when spelled out in full?

content.cn: 不知道……
content.en: No...

content.cn: 是什么呢？
content.en: What is it?

content.cn: Trans-Æther Tranquilizer-Automata，全频超域抑稳自动机。
content.en: Trans-Æther Tranquilizer-Automata.

content.cn: 这也太长了吧。
content.en: That's way too long.

content.cn: 哈哈，您一定想不到，这个全名也是伊冯想出来的！
content.en: Hah! Well, Yvonne came up with this name. Bet you didn't see that coming!

content.cn: 那是当然，您别看伊冯表面上不说，她其实把TA-TA原型机当成自己的孩子一样。
content.en: Of course! Just look at Yvonne. Although she doesn't say it often, she actually treats the TA-TA Prototype as her own baby.

content.cn: 一开始交接给伊冯的时候，TA-TA原型机可不长这样。
content.en: The TA-TA Prototype looked nothing like this when it was first handed over to Yvonne.

content.cn: 原本在工团的设计下，它可是个有半个生产车间那么大的大家伙。
content.en: The original Prototype designed by the UWST easily takes up half of a standard production floor. It's that HUGE!

content.cn: 是伊冯让它变小的？
content.en: Yvonne made it smaller?

content.cn: 没错，伊冯熬了很多夜，进行了许多失败的试验，才将它变成如今大小。
content.en: That's right. She spent countless nights and endured tons of failures to miniaturize it.

content.cn: 它不但印证了我们对侵蚀的研究方向是正确的，也是终末地与工团的科研合作典范。
content.en: The Prototype proves that we took the right approach in our study of the Blight. It is also a case study of successful scientific partnership between Endfield and the UWST.

content.cn: 就连它的表情功能也是经过工业级的严格调试后才如此流畅的。
content.en: Even its emote feature was smoothened out by applying stringent industrial-grade testing.

content.cn: 伊冯，你也认识柯林斯兄妹吗？
content.en: Yvonne, do you know the Collinses as well?

content.cn: 毕竟是安全局的人嘛，不过，他们还是好人。
content.en: What do you expect? Typical Security Bureau people. But, yeh, they're good people.

content.cn: 有一次我没经过安全审核就直接开始实验了，结果设备过热，触发了安全警报。
content.en: There's this time when I started the test minus the safety reviews. And the machines overheated and triggered the safety alarms.

content.cn: 这样真的很危险！
content.en: That was really dangerous!

content.cn: 两兄妹马上就出现在我实验室里了！光速！
content.en: And the Collinses suddenly appeared in my lab! Light speed, yk!

content.cn: 我以为法比安会立刻对我破口大骂……
content.en: I thought Fabian would get really mad at me...

content.cn: 结果他们先检查了我有没有受伤，然后松了口气，说我没事就好。
content.en: But instead, they checked if I got injured, and breathed a sigh of relief when they found out I was alright.

content.cn: 虽然最后还是狠狠训了我一顿！
content.en: AND THEN! They got SUPER MAD at me!

content.cn: 噢？管理员遇见他们了？他们还好吗？
content.en: Oh? You met them already, Endmin? How are they doing?

content.cn: 他们现在很安全。
content.en: They're safe now.

content.cn: 那就好！虽然他们平时总是管这管那的……
content.en: That's great! But they're always trying to manage everything...

content.cn: 而且他们手上还卡着我好多实验场地申请！
content.en: I've submitted tons of test site usage applications and they didn't even bother approving it!

content.cn: 全都得经过他们的二次安全审核……不知道要等到什么时候了。
content.en: Kept telling me they need a secondary safety review... And it's taking them forever.

content.cn: 他们看上去确实很严格。
content.en: They look pretty strict and no-nonsense.

content.cn: 秦主管，你和柯林斯兄妹合作多吗？
content.en: Director Qin, do you work with the Collinses often?

content.cn: 那艾莱扎呢？
content.en: Then what about Aleeza?

content.cn: 艾莱扎的执行力很高，效率高得吓人。
content.en: Ah, the action heroine. Tremendous efficiency. Inhuman, even.

content.cn: 她帮助我们解决了多起四号谷地周边的裂地者和天使侵扰事件。
content.en: She helped us handle plenty of LB and Aggeloid incidents around Valley IV.

content.cn: 总的来说，柯林斯兄妹都是工团里值得信任的可靠帮手。
content.en: In any case, the Collinses are UWST people we can trust and depend on.

content.cn: 很多。他们是联盟工团安全局的成员。
content.en: Very often. They're UWST, after all.

content.cn: 看来你们已经见过了。感觉怎么样？
content.en: Seems like you've already met each other. How did it go?

content.cn: 他们都很负责。
content.en: They're pretty responsible.

content.cn: 他们人都挺好的。
content.en: They're actually pretty nice and friendly.

content.cn: 嗯，在我的印象里，法比安的工作从来不出差错，没有延期，也没有失误。
content.en: Good. From what I remember, Fabian never slipped at work. Zero delays, and zero issues.

content.cn: 在人手紧缺的情况下，他曾经一个人就完成了终末地发起的协助救援行动。
content.en: He managed to complete an Endfield SAR operation on his own. We were really short on people back then.

content.cn: 法比安，你和艾莱扎负责整个源石实验园区的安全？
content.en: Fabian, are you and Aleeza in charge of safety for the entire Originium Science Park?

content.cn: 通俗易懂的讲解，谢谢你，法比安。
content.en: That really cleared things up for me. Thank you, Fabian.

content.cn: 不客气，管理员，有问题随时问我。
content.en: Anytime, Endmin. I'm always ready to answer your questions.

content.cn: 是的，管理员。源石实验园区是工团在四号谷地的科研重地之一。
content.en: Yeah, Endmin. The Originium Science Park is one of the key UWST R&D site in Valley IV.

content.cn: 因此，安全局将我和艾莱扎部署在这里，由我们统筹安全工作。
content.en: Security Bureau assigned Aleeza and I to this place. We're in charge of everything security-related.

content.cn: 您有任何安全相关的问题，都可以向我咨询。
content.en: Feel free to talk to me if you got a security-related question.

content.cn: 安全局具体承担一些什么工作呢？
content.en: What exactly is the work of the Security Bureau?

content.cn: 我明白了，您对我们的工作内容感兴趣。
content.en: Ah, I knew it. You're interested in the nature of our work.

content.cn: 安全局是联盟工团的安全部门，除了负责对内安全，还承担了部分关键生产环节的安全监督工作。
content.en: The Security Bureau is the safety and defense arm of the UWST. In addition to internal security, SEC-B also monitors the safety of key production processes.

content.cn: 举例来说，我们既要抵御裂地者的袭击，也要阻止伊冯进行未申报的危险实验。
content.en: For example, we must defend against LB attacks AND prevent Yvonne from carrying out unregistered and dangerous experiments.

content.cn: 艾莱扎，我进入园区内部了。
content.en: Aleeza, I'm in the Science Park itself.

content.cn: 要不是我和我哥及时赶到，整座研究所差点就烧起来了！
content.en: Thankfully Fabian and I got to the place or she would have burned the entire RC down!

content.cn: 有点过于热闹了……
content.en: Yeah, that's a little too riotous to my liking.

content.cn: 还是要严格对伊冯进行安全教育。
content.en: I guess we need to give Yvonne proper education on test safety.

content.cn: 不过，她也确实给园区带来了不一样的活力。
content.en: Well, she injected quite a unique vibe to the Park.

content.cn: 有些工友私下和我反馈，他们很爱听伊冯的歌单。
content.en: I got crew mates secretly telling me that they really like Yvonne's play list.

content.cn: 她的无人机矩阵和奇怪装置也客观提高了园区的安全水平。
content.en: I try to be objective. Her drone array and gizmos did improve Park security.

content.cn: 是不是和印象里工团的风格不太一样？
content.en: And it doesn't really fit the typical UWST site, right?

content.cn: 这都要拜伊冯所赐……
content.en: You gotta thank Yvonne for that...

content.cn: 她来到园区与工团进行合作之后，园区里可变得热闹非凡了。
content.en: Ever since she arrived at the Park and began her work with the UWST, the Park turned into a real riot.

content.cn: 热闹的意思是……？
content.en: What do you mean by riot...?

content.cn: 公用广播频道经常串台到一些奇奇怪怪的音乐就算了。
content.en: The public broadcast channel started playing some crazy music.

content.cn: 有一次为了探索在无人机上搭载大型功率模型的可行性……
content.en: There was this time when she was exploring the feasibility of loading a large, power-intensive algorithmic model on a drone...

content.cn: 我还没有给她实验场所的批准，结果她迫不及待在研究所里开工了。
content.en: I didn't approve her test site application. Guess what. The Pink Vouivre ran the test INSIDE the RC.

content.cn: 不愧是管理员！你又拯救了大家！
content.en: Incredible, Endmin! You saved plenty of lives again!

content.cn: 应急救援路线让我能快速地运送伤患，争取到更多宝贵的时间。
content.en: I was only able to move the injured thanks to the Emergency SAR Route. Saved a lot of time. And lives.

content.cn: 工人们平时也经过专业的急救训练和救援演习，灾难发生后都在积极行动……
content.en: The crew mates also get plenty of professional training in first aid and SAR. Everyone's doing their part after the disaster...

content.cn: 越医生真厉害呢。
content.en: Wow. This Surgeon Yue sounds like he's built different.

content.cn: 嗯！不愧是宏科院的医生！
content.en: Indeed! He's from HAS. Heard that's where they built him like that.

content.cn: 啊！管理员！阿丽娅需要我去运送一批医疗物资，我先去忙啦！抱歉！
content.en: Oh! Endmin! Alia needs me to deliver a batch of med supplies. Sorz! gtg!

content.cn: 还想和管理员聊更多来着……
content.en: I rly wanted to keep chatting, Endmin...

content.cn: 洛茜有空的话，随时都可以来找我。
content.en: We can always continue this convo once you find the time, Rossi.

content.cn: 没事，以后有的是机会！
content.en: Don't worry. There is always another chance down the road.

content.cn: 管理员实在是太好啦！
content.en: You're so nice, Endmin!

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_019">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_019">

content.cn: 洛茜也有很大的功劳。
content.en: You did great as well, Rossi.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_006">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_006">

content.cn: 竟然被管理员夸赞了！我要继续努力才行！
content.en: Did the Endmin just approve?? Grazie! I gotta keep this up!

content.cn: 管理员放心，你去完成你的使命，我会帮越医生、阿丽娅照顾好矿脉源区的大家的！
content.en: Don't you worry, Endmin. Go and fulfill your duties. I'll help Surgeon Yue and Alia take care of everyone in the Origin Lodespring!

content.cn: 你辛苦了。
content.en: Much appreciated.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，我不辛苦！多亏了越医生的紧急时期特殊救援预案！
content.en: Hah! I'm always up for a challenge! You should thank Surgeon Yue for his special contingency SAR plan!

content.cn: 管理员，看来矿脉源区已经挺过了最艰难的时刻。
content.en: Endmin, the Origin Lodespring seems to have made it over the most difficult hurdle.

content.cn: 我复盘了一下受灾情况，没想到大家做到了理论上的最小损失。
content.en: I reviewed the entire scope of damages. Turns out everyone achieved the theoretical minimum in terms of casualties and losses.

content.cn: 锚点坠落路线预测结果出来后，通信组第一时间通知给高危区域的作业人员。
content.en: When they released the Ankhorfall trajectories and impact sites, the comms team immediately notified workers in high risk areas.

content.cn: 设施维护人员根据应急预案迅速反应，及时为高价值设备开启了避险模式。
content.en: Facility maintenance crew responded quickly according to their SOPs and activated the safety mode for our high-value assets.

content.cn: 再加上自愿参与救援的洛茜、阿丽娅，以及经验丰富的越医生……
content.en: People like Rossi and Alia volunteered to join the relief efforts. We also have experienced personnel like Surgeon Yue...

content.cn: 大家紧紧团结在一起，最终渡过了难关。
content.en: Everyone is united. Together, they all made it through the crisis in one piece.

content.cn: 没错，他们最终完成了一项壮举。
content.en: That's right. It was a monumental achievement for everyone involved.

content.cn: 多亏了大家的努力！
content.en: Gotta thank everyone who worked hard and made it possible!

content.cn: 工团的大家在关键时刻迸发出来的意志和勇气，让我深受鼓舞。
content.en: And I'm truly inspired by the dedication and courage of UWST crew mates during the most critical moment.

content.cn: 说实话，本来我心里有一个很坏的预想……
content.en: Truth be told, I was already picturing and planning for a terrible scenario...

content.cn: 有多坏……
content.en: How terrible...?

content.cn: 怎样的预想？
content.en: What? Scenario?

content.cn: 最坏的预想……毕竟这次灾难发生得太突然了。
content.en: The worst-case scenario... After all, nobody expected this disaster.

content.cn: 管理员，我接到了工团的照会，和您同步一下世代摇篮的最新情况。
content.en: Endmin, I've received a notice from the UWST. Just updating you on the latest situation at the Cradle of the Ages.

content.cn: 因为源石树苗的重新生长，工团需要对它进行调查和取样，而终末地也将继续参与其中。
content.en: Due to the Originium sapling's regrowth, the UWST needs to investigate and take samples, and Endfield will continue to be involved.

content.cn: 大家都期待它能有机会重新成长为过去的那副参天之躯。
content.en: Everyone wants to see the Oak growing back to its original size.

content.cn: 那真是一件大好事！
content.en: That's definitely super awesome!

content.cn: 希望如此！
content.en: I really hope so too!

content.cn: 具体情况怎么样？
content.en: I need more details.

content.cn: 多亏你们解决了那只巨大的天使。
content.en: Good thing you dealt with that giant Aggelos.

content.cn: 世代摇篮解除了封锁，但并未全面对公众开放。
content.en: The Cradle of the Ages has lifted its lockdown, though it hasn't fully reopened to the public yet.

content.cn: 经过工团方面决议，那里将成为一片特殊的保护区域。
content.en: The UWST decided to convert the place into a special protected zone.

content.cn: 保护区域是指？
content.en: What do you mean by "protected zone"?

content.cn: 成为保护区域的原因是？
content.en: The reason it became a protected zone is...?

content.cn: 辛苦你了，管理员。
content.en: We're counting on you, Endmin.

content.cn: 破坏终末地和工团的生产应该是她最直接的目的。
content.en: Disrupting the manufacturing capacities of Endfield and the UWST seems to be her most direct goals.

content.cn: 但是……从她至今的表现来看……
content.en: But ... from what I saw of her actions so far...

content.cn: 我感觉，她似乎有更大的阴谋。
content.en: I have a feeling that this is just part of her bigger scheme.

content.cn: 我们得抓紧行动了，管理员。
content.en: We must act quickly, Endmin.

content.cn: 那只巨型天使很强大。
content.en: That Aggelos is very strong.

content.cn: 那只“三位一体”，只是二十年前袭击矿脉源区的“星体”的一部分。
content.en: The Triaggelos we fought is actually just part of Astarron, the Aggeloid entity that attacked the Origin Lodespring 20 years ago.

content.cn: 幸亏这样，我们才得以击败它。
content.en: Thanks to that, we were able to defeat the entity and lay it to rest again.

content.cn: 而那三枚唤醒它的锚点，落下的位置如此准确……
content.en: Remember the 3 Ankhors that awakened it? I can't believe they landed with such precision...

content.cn: 很明显，三位一体的复苏就是聂菲斯一手策划的。
content.en: It's obvious that Nefarith masterminded the awakening of Triaggelos.

content.cn: 不知道她的真实目的是什么。
content.en: I wonder what her true objectives are.

content.cn: 你辛苦了，越医生。
content.en: Much appreciated, Surgeon Yue.

content.cn: 衷心希望他们早日康复。
content.en: I hope they get better soon.

content.cn: 我会向他们传达这份祝福的，管理员。
content.en: I'll pass on your well-wishes, Endministrator.

content.cn: 谢谢你，管理员。
content.en: Thank you, Endministrator.

content.cn: 灾难面前，我只是尽一份医生该尽的责任罢了。
content.en: I'm just doing my duty as a doctor in the face of this disaster.

content.cn: 伤患们的情况怎么样了？
content.en: How are they doing?

content.cn: 大部分伤势较轻的工人已经痊愈。
content.en: Most of the workers with minor injuries have already recovered.

content.cn: 目前我和阿丽娅正在全力救助那些伤势依旧严重的工人。
content.en: Right now, Alia and I are focusing all our efforts on helping the workers who are still critically injured.

content.cn: 其中有不少是袭击发生时不顾危险、挺身而出的英雄，我不会让他们有事的。
content.en: Many of them are heroes who risked their lives to help when the attack happened. I won't let anything happen to them.

content.cn: 如果没有他们，矿脉源区的情况估计会变得更糟。
content.en: Things would've gotten a lot worse in the Origin Lodespring without them.

content.cn: 管理员，谢谢你战胜了那个天使，拯救了大家。
content.en: Thank you for defeating that Aggelos, Endmin. All of us owe our lives to you.

content.cn: 每个人的路都不一样吧。
content.en: Everyone is free to choose the path they take.

content.cn: 你说得对……我也希望他们能过得更好。
content.en: You're right... And I hope things will get better for them.

content.cn: 不过还是有很多把矿脉源区当成家园的人，留了下来。我也一样。
content.en: But a lot of people are staying. They treat the Origin Lodespring as their home. I'm one of them.

content.cn: 我会好好努力，协助他们重建家园的！
content.en: I'll do all I can to help rebuild our home!

content.cn: 有空的话，常回来看看，管理员！
content.en: Come visit us when you can, Endmin!

content.cn: 虽然我没亲眼见过，但我知道，它是萦绕矿区前辈们的噩梦。
content.en: Though I've never seen the entity, it was a terrible nightmare that continued to affect our veterans from the mining area.

content.cn: 谢谢你。
content.en: Once again, thank you.

content.cn: 今后你们有什么计划？
content.en: Do you have any plans for the future?
Sigh...

content.cn: 许多人都打算离开了，他们想去别的地方看看。
content.en: A lot of people are leaving. They're looking for opportunities elsewhere.

content.cn: 有些人失去了亲人朋友，不想留在伤心之地。
content.en: Some lost their friends or family members. They don't want to stay at a place of sadness.

content.cn: 还有一些人，我能感觉到，即使没有这次的灾难，他们也早就想离开这片老矿区了。
content.en: And there are a few who already wanted to leave the old mines, even if the disaster never came. I could feel it.

content.cn: 管理员，菲奥娜告诉我，你们已经抵达供能高地了。
content.en: Endmin, Fiona informed me you've reached the Power Plateau.

content.cn: 结果还是有工人没当回事儿，在实验期间跑到了安全区域外。
content.en: But one of the workers didn't take it seriously and wandered outside the safe zone during the experiment.

content.cn: 直到第二天一早，大家才发现他不见了。只有室内的录像能看见他打开安全门就往外走……
content.en: Nobody noticed he was gone until the next morning. The security footage just shows him opening the door and walking out.

content.cn: 室外录像没能记录到他的下落。没有尸体，没有源石技艺，也没有侵蚀的痕迹，那名工人就这么人间蒸发了。
content.en: The outdoor cameras didn't capture what happened to him. No body, no signs of Originium Arts, no Blight marks. That worker just vanished into thin air.

content.cn: 明白了，我会小心的！
content.en: Okay. I understand. I'll be careful.

content.cn: 这下您应该理解我的心情了，更别说那儿现在还有裂隙！我再唠叨一遍，管理员，你们一定一定要小心啊！
content.en: Now you understand how I feel, especially with the rifts there now! Let me say it again, Endmin, you must take extra care!

content.cn: 在接近超域试验场的时候，一定要小心啊！
content.en: Be extra careful when you're near the Æther Test Site!

content.cn: 除了裂隙，还有什么注意事项吗？
content.en: Anything apart from the rift to watch out for?

content.cn: 供能高地的超域试验场作为工团进行超域研究的前沿场所，发生过不少我们还暂时无法解释的异常现象……
content.en: The Æther Test Site at the Power Plateau is the United Workers' front line for advanced research. Quite a few unexplained anomalies have occurred there...

content.cn: 你要讲恐怖故事吗？
content.en: Are you trying to tell a horror story?

content.cn: 不是故事，是安全事故。我给您挑一个说吧。
content.en: It's not a story, it's a safety incident. Let me tell you about one of them.

content.cn: 供能高地一直都有一条安全条例：在超域实验进行期间，任何人都必须待在安全区域里，而且最好不要离开。
content.en: The Power Plateau has a standing safety rule: everyone must stay within the secure zone during Ætherside experiments, and it's best not to leave at all.

content.cn: 超域裂隙被成功关闭了，感谢你们的付出，管理员。
content.en: The Æther rift has been sealed. And it was made possible thanks to your team, Endmin.

content.cn: 但，终末地还需要您来带领。
content.en: But we still need you to lead Endfield.

content.cn: 加油啊，管理员。
content.en: You've got this, Endministrator!

content.cn: 我会好好努力的。
content.en: I'll definitely do my best.

content.cn: <image="sns_emoji_014">
content.en: <image="sns_emoji_014">

content.cn: 但……危机仍未结束，裂隙关闭产生了很多连锁反应。
content.en: But ... the crisis isn't really over yet. The sealing of the rift triggered a chain of reactions.

content.cn: 失去这条稳定的裂隙，对工团的超域研究来说是不小的打击。
content.en: The loss of this rift also dealt a severe blow to Æther research projects of the UWST.

content.cn: 在关闭裂隙的过程中，激烈的超域活动也产生了大量未知的异常区域，亟待探索和处理。
content.en: The sealing of the rift also set off several Æther events and created plenty of anomalous regions. They should be investigated or dealt with accordingly.

content.cn: 不仅仅涉及四号谷地，就连文明环带各地也出现了异象。
content.en: This didn't just affect Valley IV. Anomalies have appeared throughout the Civilization Band.

content.cn: 看来还有得忙了。
content.en: It'll keep us busy.

content.cn: 看来事情还没有结束。
content.en: It seems that our problems haven't ended yet.

content.cn: 虽然……很希望您能好好休息。
content.en: Yeah... I know you really deserve some proper R&R.

content.cn: “烙铁指令”原来可以调动这么庞大的资源？
content.en: The "Utjug Order" commands such incredible amount of resources!

content.cn: 接下来，估计会硝烟四起了。
content.en: We should expect to see war soon enough.

content.cn: 请做好准备，管理员。
content.en: Be prepared, Endmin.

content.cn: 还不止于此，管理员，“烙铁指令”对我们行动的支援，只是个开始。
content.en: It can do more than that, Endmin. The "Utjug Order" is just the beginning. We'll have plenty of support for our operations.

content.cn: 指令发出后，任何接收到它的联盟工团驻地都会无条件向发信源输送军事资源。
content.en: Once the Order is given, any UWST site receiving the order must direct their military resources to the sender unconditionally.

content.cn: 在我的印象里，战略级的指令从未对裂地者氏族使用过。
content.en: From what I remember, this strategic command had not been issued against any Landbreaker clan.

content.cn: 看来这一次，碾骨是真的将工团惹怒了。
content.en: I guess the Bonekrushers really did piss off the UWST.

content.cn: 工团的战略火力，可不仅仅是炸毁巢雕这种程度。
content.en: Strategic firepower of the UWST can do more than just destroying the denstacks.

content.cn: 碾骨触碰了工团最珍视的财富——工人们的生命。
content.en: The Bonekrushers have transgressed by attacking the most valuable assets of the UWST — the livelihood of their workers.

content.cn: 工团必将让碾骨付出惨痛的代价，即使他们现在有聂菲斯的帮助。
content.en: The Bonekrushers may benefit from Nefarith's support, but the UWST will make the Landbreakers pay dearly for what they did.

content.cn: 谢谢你，管理员。让我活着看到了“烙铁指令”。
content.en: Thanks, Endmin. You kept me alive to witness the Utjug Order.

content.cn: 我感觉它的意义发生了变化。
content.en: Well, from what I see and felt, the Utjug Order seems to have taken on new meanings.

content.cn: 是的，如今的“烙铁”，代表着拯救与团结。
content.en: Yes. Utjug is now a symbol of relief and unity.

content.cn: 现在的工团，绝不允许兄弟姐妹们轻易牺牲了。
content.en: The modern UWST is doing its best to prevent the sacrifices of our fellow workers.

content.cn: 工人们牢牢和工团烙印在一起，这正是工团强大的原因。
content.en: The UWST is strong because the workers are always ready to rally to its call and banners.

content.cn: 没有工人，就没有工团。
content.en: You can't write UWST without workers, after all.

content.cn: 我也能对后辈们炫耀一番了，哈哈。
content.en: I can now brag about this to the junior crews.

content.cn: 你现在感觉怎么样？
content.en: How are you feeling right now?

content.cn: 说实话，心情复杂，热泪盈眶。
content.en: To be honest, I'm a mess of emotions. Almost cried, you know.

content.cn: 我本来已经做好了牺牲的打算，独自消化对死亡的恐惧……
content.en: I was totally ready to die for the UW. Conquered my fear of death, ready to become a corpse...

content.cn: 毕竟，在历史书里，“烙铁指令”代表着牺牲，代表着最高觉悟。
content.en: After all, the previous Utjug Order on the record was the byword for sacrifice and the highest calling towards our duties.

content.cn: “烙铁指令”的意义发生了变化？
content.en: Did they change the meaning of the Utjug Order?

content.cn: 管理员，我发现一件有意思的事。
content.en: Noticed something interesting, Endmin.

content.cn: 他们最后造了一个多功能机械臂，用来搬运沉重的物资或残骸。
content.en: This multi-function robot arm for lifting and carrying heavy supplies or scrap.

content.cn: 还一边唱着歌，一边给最后的成品来了个剪彩仪式！
content.en: They even hosted a ribbon-cutting ceremony for their "final build" and sang a song to go along with it.

content.cn: 看来乐观也是工团技术员们的武器之一。
content.en: It seems that the UWST techies have successfully weaponized optimism to their advantage.

content.cn: 说得好呀，管理员！
content.en: Wow. I couldn't find a nicer way to describe this, Endmin!

content.cn: 听起来真有趣，我也想看看了。
content.en: Sounds really interesting. Now I really want to see what the ceremony is like.

content.cn: 哎呀，我看得入神了，忘记录像了！
content.en: Oh... Welp, let's just say the ceremony was very engrossing and I ... forgot to record the entire thing...

content.cn: 什么有意思的事？
content.en: Something interesting?

content.cn: 工团的技术员们比我从资料里看到的更懂得变通。
content.en: UWST technicians turned out to be far more flexible than what I read in the data files.

content.cn: 碾骨氏族那帮家伙把源石发电站的很多机械都弄坏了。
content.en: Those Bonekrushers really broke a lot of machines in the Originium Power Plant.

content.cn: 我以为他们会按照工团手册上的流程，严格等待替换零件运来再修理。
content.en: I thought the techies would stick with SOPs in the UWST manuals, and wait for the replacement parts before they start fixing their stuff.

content.cn: 结果他们商量了一下，直接把修不好的机械都拆了，然后把能用的零件拼在一起。
content.en: But then, the techies did their meeting, and then proceeded to dismantle the units that are beyond saving for usable parts. They then slapped those parts together.

content.cn: 他们打算用这些零件造什么呢？
content.en: Okay. What did they slap together in the end?

content.cn: 管理员，听说源石发电站损失惨重，克劳还好吗？
content.en: Endmin! I heard the Originium Power Plant was severely damaged! Is Crowe alright?

content.cn: 只是可惜了，丹尼尔斯站长……
content.en: And it's a shame what happened to Site Monitor Daniels...

content.cn: 丹尼尔斯的牺牲不会白费。
content.en: Daniels did not sacrifice himself for nothing.

content.cn: 丹尼尔斯会被铭记的。
content.en: We will remember Daniels.

content.cn: 嗯……他是一个很典型的工团人，坚强、不屈。
content.en: Yes... The man was the perfect image of a UWST crew mate. Stubborn and indomitable.

content.cn: 工团就是靠这样的精神，挺过了这么多难关。
content.en: These qualities helped the UW survive countless disasters and challenges.

content.cn: 您没有辜负他的意志，管理员。
content.en: You did not let him down, Endmin.

content.cn: 他很安全。原来你们很熟？
content.en: He's very safe. So, the two of you know each other pretty well.

content.cn: 嗯，以前合作过，他也是原型机的初始设计者之一。
content.en: Yes. We worked together on a project. Crowe is amongst the first team of designers behind the Prototype.

content.cn: 你觉得他是个什么样的人？
content.en: What do you think of Crowe as a person?

content.cn: 哈哈，管理员，我知道您想问什么。
content.en: Hah. Endmin, I totally know why you're asking this question.

content.cn: 克劳和我是截然不同的技术员，有时我都觉得他严厉死板到近乎偏执。
content.en: As technicians, Crowe and I couldn't be more different. There are times when I feel that the old stubborn grouch has a pathological need for absolute compliance.

content.cn: 但也正因这样，他才能带领发电站的大家直到现在吧。
content.en: But that might be the only reason he managed to lead and keep the Power Plant crew together to this day.

content.cn: 管理员，信号遇到了严重的干扰，你们到了吗？我正在尝试联络武陵城寻求帮助。
content.en: Endmin, our signals were subject to severe interference. Have you arrived? We're trying to contact Wuling City for help.

content.cn: 太好了，终于联系上了。管理员，你们现在还好吗？
content.en: Finally! Endmin, how are you doing? Everything okay?

content.cn: 还好，我们已经离开清波寨了。
content.en: We're fine. We just left Qingbo Stockade.

content.cn: 清波寨？清波寨是什么地方……
content.en: Qingbo Stockade? Where is that?

content.cn: 哦，刚才更新了一下资料。这么看来，你们离武陵城已经不远了。
content.en: Ah, I've just updated the database. Looks like you're not far from Wuling City.

content.cn: 管理员，武陵的情况比最初设想的要复杂，你们多加小心。
content.en: Endmin, the situation in Wuling is more complicated than we initially anticipated. Please be careful.

content.cn: 实际着陆位置与计划偏差较大，你们现在情况如何？
content.en: The actual landing point is significantly off-plan. What is your status?

content.cn: 管理员，能收到吗？
content.en: Endmin? Getting my messages?

content.cn: 我刚才与武陵城取得了联络，向他们说明了你们的情况。
content.en: I've just made contact with Wuling City and briefed them on your situation.

content.cn: 管理员，刚才观测到侵蚀潮出现了异常活动，你们还好吗？
content.en: Endmin, anomalous activity has been detected in the Blight Tide. Are you doing all right?

content.cn: 管理员，恢复通信后，请尽快联系我。
content.en: Endmin, please contact me ASAP once comms are restored.

content.cn: 能收到，才走进武陵城的通信范围。
content.en: I got your messages. I just entered Wuling City's radio range.

content.cn: 这么多消息？
content.en: Wow, so many messages.

content.cn: 我还是有点担心，等会儿和汤汤一起到了武陵城，我们该怎么收尾。
content.en: I'm still a bit worried. Once we reach Wuling City with Tangtang, how are we supposed to wrap things up?

content.cn: 然后呢？
content.en: Then?

content.cn: 然后汤汤转身就跑，但一个脚滑摔泥里去了……最后被弭弗姐拎了回去。
content.en: Then Tangtang tried to bolt, but she slipped and landed face-first in the mud... So, Mi Fu dragged her back.

content.cn: 我也是那时候才知道清波寨和武陵城不对付。
content.en: And that's how I learned Qingbo Stockade and Wuling City didn't get along.

content.cn: 相信武陵城，他们会理解的。
content.en: Have faith in Wuling City. People there will understand.

content.cn: 只能走一步看一步了。
content.en: For now, we can only take it one step at a time.

content.cn: 唉，想起刚认识汤汤，也遇到过这种情况。
content.en: This takes me back. Reminds me of when I first met Tangtang.

content.cn: 我正在练剑，汤汤偏要说我是花架子，我实在气不过，就跟她练了几下。
content.en: I was practicing swordmancy, and she just had to say it was all for show. I got so annoyed that I had to spar with her.

content.cn: 打完之后，我拉她去城里吃好吃的，她不去，我开始还以为她只是和我客气客气。
content.en: After we finished, I tried to drag her into the city for some good food, but she refused. I thought she was just being polite.

content.cn: 我哪知道她是清波寨的大当家！还让巡逻路过的弭弗姐看见了我俩拉拉扯扯的样子。
content.en: Little did I know she was the chief of Qingbo Stockade! Even worse, Mi Fu was on patrol and caught us tugging and pulling at each other!

content.cn: 弭队长，你觉得庄天师是个怎样的人？
content.en: Captain Mi, what do you think of Tianshi Zhuang?

content.cn: 问这个干嘛
content.en: Why did you ask?

content.cn: 我记得你不是说过，她更喜欢“天师”这个身份？但我一直听你喊她“头儿”。
content.en: Didn't you say she prefers to be seen as a "Tianshi"? But you always call her "boss".

content.cn: 你说这个
content.en: Oh, that.

content.cn: 因为她对我来说，不是什么管代，也不是什么天师
content.en: Because to me, Viceroy or Tianshi...

content.cn: 她就是我永远的头儿
content.en: She'll always be my boss.

content.cn: 在她给我那串糖油粑粑后，我就认定她了
content.en: That settled it for me, right after she gave me that sweet Tangyou Baba.

content.cn: 头儿吗
content.en: Oh, Boss?

content.cn: 要我说，头儿就像是糖油粑粑
content.en: If you ask me, she's like Tangyou Baba.

content.cn: 在油锅里把自己变得金黄金黄的
content.en: She's been fried in oil until she's perfectly golden.

content.cn: 很有嚼劲儿，里面也很甜
content.en: Super chewy on the outside, but you'll find she's really soft and sweet inside.

content.cn: 这……好新奇的比喻。
content.en: That's ... a unique way to put it.

content.cn: 庄天师知道你把她看作糖油粑粑吗？
content.en: Does Tianshi Zhuang know you see her as Tangyou Baba?

content.cn: 我是不知道该怎么说，我又不像头儿那样有文化
content.en: You know I'm not as educated as the boss. I don't know how else to put it.

content.cn: 弭弗和汤汤之间是有什么恩怨吗？
content.en: Is there some kind of feud between Mi Fu and Tangtang?

content.cn: 啊，好像有点意料之中？
content.en: What even... But honestly, I'm not so surprised...

content.cn: 啊？那弭弗不得好好“招待”她？
content.en: What... Did Mi Fu "reward" her for that?

content.cn: 她跑得可快了！回头一看，弭弗姐头顶冒着火就冲了过来。
content.en: Oh, Tangtang was gone in a flash! I turned around and saw Mi Fu storming over. I could almost see steam coming out of her ears...

content.cn: 等我反应过来，那里就只有我和站在我面前的弭弗姐了……
content.en: Next thing I knew, it was just me, alone, with a very angry Mi Fu...

content.cn: 还好弭弗姐知道是汤汤在捣鬼<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: Thankfully, she knew it was Tangtang's doing...<image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 有一种你被汤汤卖了的感觉……
content.en: Sounds like Tangtang threw you under the bus...

content.cn: 这还没完呢！后来，我从被弭弗姐训的巡卫那里听说
content.en: And that's not even the end of it! I later found out from the watchguards getting the lecture from Mi Fu...

content.cn: 他们之所以被弭弗姐拉出来加练，就是因为他们早些时候被汤汤耍得团团转！
content.en: The only reason they were being drilled so hard was that Tangtang had made a complete fool of them earlier!

content.cn: 你说她们两个呀，我认识汤汤之后，就经常看见她们两个像现在这样你追我赶的。
content.en: Those two? Ever since I met Tangtang, their little back-and-forth has been going nonstop.

content.cn: 汤汤就是明知道会发生什么，还硬要把我拉去看热闹！<image="sns_emoji_008">
content.en: She knew exactly what was going to happen, and still dragged me there to see the show! <image="sns_emoji_008">

content.cn: 印象最深的，就是有一次，汤汤看见弭弗姐在那儿教训几个巡卫，专门跑过去捣乱。
content.en: The one that really stands out was when Tangtang spotted Mi Fu scolding some watchguards, and she just had to run over and stir up trouble.

content.cn: 还有这段往事？
content.en: Wait, this happened?

content.cn: 细说，怎么捣乱的？
content.en: How did she stir things up?

content.cn: 那天本来和以前一样，我在城外练剑的时候，汤汤跑了过来。
content.en: So, just like any other day, I was training outside the city when Tangtang came rushing up.

content.cn: 但不一样的是，她没和我斗嘴，反而是急冲冲地把我拽到了一块靠近武陵城的空地。
content.en: But instead of arguing with me, she just yanked me by the arm and pulled me toward a field near Wuling City.

content.cn: 过去看了才知道，弭弗姐正在那儿做示范，汤汤突然就扔了个水球过去。
content.en: When we got there, we saw Mi Fu giving a demonstration. Then, BAM! Tangtang launched a water balloon at her.

content.cn: 管理员，武陵地区面临的危险与其他地区有所不同，请多加小心。
content.en: Endmin, the threats here in Wuling are different. Please be extra cautious.

content.cn: 是的。这次侵蚀潮出乎了我们的预料，没有做好防护。多亏了管理员的协助。
content.en: That is correct. This Blight Tide exceeded our predictions, and we were unprepared. Thankfully, we had your assistance.

content.cn: 每次汛期，你都会和武陵城的巡卫们一起保护天师桩阵列吗？
content.en: Do you join the Wuling City watchguards in protecting the Tianshi Pillar Array every time?

content.cn: 嗯……天师桩阵列不能有任何闪失。
content.en: Yes... I must ensure nothing happens to the Tianshi Pillar Array.

content.cn: 这关系到整座武陵城的安危。
content.en: The safety of the entire Wuling City depends on it.

content.cn: 武陵的天使原来会随着侵蚀潮出现在各个地方吗？
content.en: So, do Aggeloi show up all over Wuling with the Blight Tide?

content.cn: 嗯……每当侵蚀潮汛期来临，整个武陵地区便会受到大量天使的威胁。
content.en: Yes... Whenever the Blight Tide season arrives, the entire Wuling gets swarmed by Aggeloi.

content.cn: 我们推测，之所以会出现这种现象，是因为武陵地区受侵蚀影响的水体深处应该存在一个，甚至多个锚点。
content.en: We theorize that this phenomenon occurs because there is likely one, or even multiple, Ankhors deep within the Blighted waters of the Wuling region.

content.cn: 但目前我们还不具备对武陵地区的侵蚀水体进行深层勘测的条件，更别提找到并摧毁侵蚀潮之下的锚点了。
content.en: But we lack the capability to scan that deep yet, much less find and destroy them.

content.cn: 每到汛期，我们能做的，便只有组织大量人力镇守天师桩阵列，以免天师桩受到损坏。
content.en: So every season, our only option is to commit everyone to defending the Tianshi Pillar Array.

content.cn: 就和我们第一次进武陵城时看到的一样？
content.en: Like what we saw when we first got here?

content.cn: 怎么样管理员，您有想起那只老驮兽的什么特征吗？
content.en: Endmin, do you remember anything particular about that Old Burdenbeast?

content.cn: 这些试验田，对武陵人一定有特殊的意义。
content.en: These test fields hold a special meaning for the people of Wuling.

content.cn: 是的，对我们而言，这些试验田里的作物，可不只是赖以生存的口粮。
content.en: Yes. To us, the crops in these fields aren't just food for survival.

content.cn: 还是在侵蚀危害里努力生存的希望与象征。
content.en: They're a symbol of hope. They thrive despite the encroaching Blight, just like us.

content.cn: 那位老天师，一直躬耕在试验田里，直到病痛让他再也下不了床……
content.en: That Old Tianshi kept tending the test fields himself, right up until his illness left him bedridden...

content.cn: 他是我们武陵的英雄。
content.en: He's our hero.

content.cn: 他的愿望一定会实现的。
content.en: His wish will surely come true.

content.cn: 试验田里的作物长得都很茂盛，老天师的心血，没有被辜负。
content.en: The crops in the test fields are thriving. All that hard work by the Old Tianshi will be remembered.

content.cn: 我刚才做的那个梦里，那头老驮兽带我找他耕过的田……
content.en: I just had a dream... That Old Burdenbeast led me to the field he once plowed...

content.cn: 老驮兽会在临终前跑去自己记忆最深刻的地方……
content.en: The Old Burdenbeast probably went to the place he remembered most before he passed...

content.cn: 我好像梦到了那位老天师，还有那片田……
content.en: I think I also saw the Old Tianshi, and that same field...

content.cn: 管理员，您的意思不会是……
content.en: Hmm? So you're saying...

content.cn: 我听彦宁姐说，老天师是带着微笑走完了最后一程。
content.en: I heard from Yan Ning that the Old Tianshi passed away with a smile on his face.

content.cn: 能在最后一刻，看到自己试验田里的作物茁壮成长，他一定走得很安心。
content.en: Seeing the crops in his test fields thriving ... he passed peacefully.

content.cn: 管理员，驮兽科学饲养会，感觉怎么样？
content.en: Endmin, how was the Burdenbeast Care Workshop?

content.cn: 原来如此……难怪那位老天师，心里始终牵挂着他的试验田……
content.en: I see... No wonder that Old Tianshi could never stop worrying about his test fields...

content.cn: 嗯……我想，炎国古话里的“尽瘁鞠躬”，说的大概就是这样的人吧。
content.en: Hmm... I suppose the ancient Yan saying "to devote oneself wholeheartedly until the very end" was meant to describe someone like him.

content.cn: 我在参加驮兽科学饲养会的时候，得知了一位农业天师突然离世……
content.en: When I attended the workshop, I learned that a Nongye Tianshi had suddenly passed away...

content.cn: 我也听说了。那位老天师操劳了一生，终于可以好好休息了……
content.en: I heard about that too. The Old Tianshi worked tirelessly his whole life and can finally rest...

content.cn: 我了解到了一位老天师的故事，武陵的农田……对塔卫二很重要吧。
content.en: I learned about the story of an Old Tianshi and Wuling's farms... I believe they are both quite important to Talos-II, right?

content.cn: 武陵的地理环境很独特，培育出适应侵蚀环境的作物，是这片地区所承担的使命。
content.en: With its unique geography, Wuling's core mission is to grow crops that can withstand the Blight.

content.cn: 文明环带能够实现粮食的自产自足，与武陵天师们的奉献紧密相关。
content.en: The self-sufficiency of the Civilization Band owes much to the dedication of Wuling's Tianshi.

content.cn: 即便已经能在更为舒适的环境下生活，他们也依旧来到了武陵。
content.en: Even with the option of living in comfort elsewhere, they still chose to come to Wuling.

content.cn: 天师们辛苦耕耘，也是在为可能的变故做好准备。
content.en: They work tirelessly, making preparations for whatever changes may come.

content.cn: 管理员，刚才忘问了，田阿姨和阿仔的比赛，你感觉如何
content.en: Endmin, I forgot to ask earlier, what did you think of the competition between Aunt Tian and Ah Zai?

content.cn: 都是面条、炒饭、饺子这种，味道一般，但量大管饱
content.en: Things like noodles, fried rice, dumplings. Nothing special about the taste, but they keep you full.

content.cn: 毕竟巡卫平常需要巡逻，当有人起纠纷的时候，没力气可拉不开
content.en: After all, watchguards need all that energy to break things up when disputes arise.

content.cn: 还有武陵城外，也要安排巡卫，免得有人，或者，有什么东西搞破坏
content.en: We also keep watch outside the city, in case anyone or anything wants to stir up trouble.

content.cn: 辛苦了。
content.en: You've worked hard.

content.cn: 应该的
content.en: I'm just doing my job.

content.cn: 还得靠巡卫。
content.en: We owe our safety to you.

content.cn: 分内事
content.en: Just part of my job.

content.cn: 怎么感觉像是在上班了
content.en: This is starting to feel way too much like work...

content.cn: 要是想吃什么好吃的，哪天有空，我带你去溜达溜达
content.en: Hey, if you ever want to grab a bite, just say the word when you're free. I know all the best spots.

content.cn: 田阿姨的烂肉面真的很好吃。
content.en: Aunt Tian's special braised meat noodles are absolutely delicious.

content.cn: 嗯，熟悉的味道，好吃
content.en: I agree. They're really good.

content.cn: 阿仔的故事有点让人感动。
content.en: Ah Zai's story is quite touching.

content.cn: 大家都是这么过来的，都不容易
content.en: We've all been there. It's never easy for anyone.

content.cn: 你平时还常吃什么？
content.en: What else do you usually eat?

content.cn: 我平时多是在巡卫食堂吃
content.en: I usually eat at the watchguard canteen.

content.cn: 没想到，你在武陵还有家火锅店。
content.en: Wow, I didn't know you owned a hotpot restaurant in Wuling.

content.cn: 烤乳兽、白切羽、大煮干丝、黄泥煨羽、油焖大鳞、回锅驮肉……光这些还没完呢。
content.en: We've got Roast Beast, Sliced Fowlbeast, Tofu Soup, Crispy Wings, Oil-Braised Fin, Twice-cooked Burdenbeast ... and the list goes on.

content.cn: 我也想吃。
content.en: Now I'm hungry.

content.cn: 听上去不错。
content.en: They all sound delicious.

content.cn: 来都来了，等后面您有空了可得来找我，我亲自下厨。保证让您尝到最地道的“潘式火锅”。
content.en: Now that you're here, you've got to look me up when you have time. I'll cook for you myself. Promise you'll get the real "Pan-Style Hotpot" experience.

content.cn: 上次看着您可又瘦了，可别委屈了自个儿。
content.en: You seemed even skinnier... Make sure you're taking good care of yourself.

content.cn: 等您忙完公务，可一定记得来啊。
content.en: Don't forget to drop by once you've wrapped up your work.

content.cn: 嚯，您来了怎么不进店里坐坐？
content.en: Looks who's here! Come in and take a seat!

content.cn: 退休后闲着无聊开了一家，承蒙武陵乡亲们关照，生意一直都红红火火的，在武陵城也算是小有点名气。
content.en: Started this place after I retired, just for fun. Business has been great, all thanks to the folks here. It's actually pretty famous in Wuling City now.

content.cn: 武陵城的居民们都喜欢吃火锅吗？
content.en: Do people in Wuling really enjoy hot pot that much?

content.cn: 毕竟武陵这地方湿气这么重，怎么能少得了火锅？
content.en: In a humid place like this? Hot pot is a must!

content.cn: 夜里往这儿一坐，三五好友围成一桌来上这么一锅，吃的就是个酣畅淋漓。
content.en: Imagine sitting here on a cool night with a few buddies around a bubbling pot! Man, it's the ultimate comfort.

content.cn: 等吃完后把满头的汗一擦，嗬，那感觉，别提多舒畅了。
content.en: Then you wipe off the sweat, and ah ... nothing feels better.

content.cn: 不过，可别以为武陵城就只有火锅。
content.en: But don't get the wrong idea, Wuling City isn't just about hot pot.

content.cn: 武陵城好热闹啊！
content.en: Wuling City is so lively!

content.cn: 有机会我们一起好好逛逛。
content.en: We can explore more when free.

content.cn: 嘿嘿，那就说好啦。等有机会我来作陪，带管理员好好逛逛！
content.en: Hehe, that's settled then! Next time you're free, I'll be your guide and give you the grand tour!

content.cn: 哦对了，还有选剑局。
content.en: Oh, and don't forget to visit HS.Swords.

content.cn: 以前我经常跑去选剑局帮晓雾姐试剑，那里的好东西可不少。
content.en: I used to hang out there all the time, helping Xiaowu test her new blades. They've got some really cool stuff in there.

content.cn: 每次试完剑，就跑去草地上吹吹风，唉，好怀念那时候的日子……
content.en: After testing, I'd always go chill on the grass, feeling the wind... Ah, those were the good old days.

content.cn: 是和驮兽一起在草地上打滚吗？
content.en: What, like wrestling with burdenbeasts in the meadow?

content.cn: 咳咳，管理员，你别拿我打趣了！
content.en: Ahem, stop teasing me, Endmin!

content.cn: 是去逗小驮兽，结果被大驮兽追着跑？
content.en: Did you get chased by a mama burdenbeast after you teased her baby?

content.cn: 嘿嘿，那当然！整个武陵地区就只有这里能被称作城市，学术氛围拉满的城市。
content.en: Hehe, you bet it is! It's the only real city in all of Wuling, totally packed with brains and culture.

content.cn: 哪儿有！
content.en: NOOOO!

content.cn: 还有街道上飘散的香味，来来往往的居民……加上了这些，就是真正的武陵城。
content.en: Oh, and there are the smells of food drifting down the streets, and people everywhere ... that's Wuling City for you.

content.cn: 想起以前，熟悉的店家总是会喊我去他们店里尝尝新品。
content.en: Back in the day, the local shopkeepers would always invite me to be the first to taste their new dishes.

content.cn: 我还找过厨师学怎么做菜！但在去羽兽窝里拿蛋的时候，被羽兽扑着翅膀啄了手……
content.en: I even talked a chef into teaching me! Though once, when I was snatching eggs from a fowlbeast nest, the thing flapped right at me and pecked my hand...

content.cn: 最后菜做得如何？
content.en: How did the dish turn out?

content.cn: 我寻思着，不做点特别的，怎么对得起“小陈特制”这四个字，就多放了点辣椒面。
content.en: Well, I wanted to make something extra special so it could live up to "Chen's Special", so I just ... added a whole lot more chili powder.

content.cn: 结果在炒菜时熏着了眼睛，给我辣得满地打滚哈哈哈。没想到，还能再回来。
content.en: But then the fumes from the wok stung my eyes so bad I was literally writhing on the floor, LOL! Can't believe I'm actually back here.

content.cn: 刚才逛得很开心！
content.en: That was fun!

content.cn: 十年前的那场灾难就像是警钟，时常在我脑海中响起，让我不要忘记武陵城所面临的危机。
content.en: The disaster ten years ago is like a warning bell that never stops ringing in my head, reminding me of the dangers Wuling still faces.

content.cn: 那句自问，一直督促着我不要放松警惕，直到你来了。
content.en: That constant reminder is what pushed me to stay sharp ... until you arrived.

content.cn: 现在我来了，就交给我吧！
content.en: Now that I'm back, I'm here to shoulder the burden. You can count on me to take it from here.

content.cn: 嗯，我来了，我们一起做好准备，保护这里的人。
content.en: Now that I'm back, we can protect this city and its people together.

content.cn: 嗯。
content.en: Of course.

content.cn: 要是情况没有这么紧急，我真想和你再好好地逛一逛。
content.en: I really wish things were calmer, so I could show you around properly.

content.cn: 谢谢你陪我逛了这么久！
content.en: Thanks for showing me around!

content.cn: 这场迟到了十年的参观，你能满意就好。
content.en: I'm glad you enjoyed it, even though this tour should have taken place ten years ago.

content.cn: 可惜我已经想不起十年前武陵的模样了……
content.en: I wish I could remember what Wuling was like 10 years ago...

content.cn: 不必强求，你能回来就好。
content.en: Do not push yourself. We are just glad you are back.

content.cn: 武陵城真的很美，你一定付出了许多。
content.en: Wuling City is truly pretty now. You must've worked incredibly hard.

content.cn: 很高兴看到武陵城的大家都能幸福地生活在这里。
content.en: I'm really happy to see everyone in Wuling living such a happy life.

content.cn: 那些龙泡泡真的很大！
content.en: These Chubby Lung are huge!

content.cn: 难道……设计者是庄管代！
content.en: Is it ... Viceroy Zhuang?

content.cn: 是的！看来管理员也注意到办公桌旁的龙泡泡了。
content.en: You're right! Looks like you noticed that Chubby Lung by her desk!

content.cn: 我还以为她只是很喜欢……
content.en: I thought she was a fan too...

content.cn: 岂止是喜欢。
content.en: She's a HUUUGEEEE fan!

content.cn: 龙泡泡？我没看到什么龙泡泡，我只看到了那个水杯。
content.en: Huh? I didn't see any Chubby Lung. All I noticed was her mug.

content.cn: 欸，原来管理员你没注意到桌边的龙泡泡吗？
content.en: What? You didn't see that Chubby Lung by her desk?

content.cn: 我听说，龙泡泡是庄管代还是见习天师时就设计好了，现在成了武陵城的代表之一。
content.en: Word is, Viceroy Zhuang came up with the Chubby Lung design back in her Tianshi Intern days. Now it's practically an icon of Wuling City.

content.cn: 原来是这样……
content.en: Oh, wow...

content.cn: 不知道什么时候才能带一个龙泡泡走……
content.en: Really wish I could take one with me...

content.cn: 嘿嘿，我支持佩丽卡说的，把采购纳入合作计划！躺在上面一定很舒服。
content.en: Hehe, I'm with Perlica on this. We should include Chubby Lung procurement in our cooperation plan! Imagine how comfy it would be to lounge on.

content.cn: 很想认识认识龙泡泡的设计者！
content.en: I'd love to meet the designer of Chubby Lung!

content.cn: 嗯嗯，其实管理员你已经认识了！
content.en: Well, actually, you've met its designer!

content.cn: 难道……设计者就是葛天师！
content.en: Is it ... Tianshi Ge?

content.cn: 是庄管代啦，刚才在办公室，管理员你不也看到了办公桌旁的龙泡泡了嘛。
content.en: It's actually Viceroy Zhuang! Weren't you just in her office? Did you not see that Chubby Lung next to her desk?

content.cn: 感觉在观测站工作的人们要承受好大的风险……
content.en: I think people working at the monitoring center face great risks...

content.cn: 所以观测站一定要恢复运行。
content.en: That is exactly why we have to get the monitoring center up and running again.

content.cn: 但我们刚清理完那里的天使，现在恢复运行的话，观测站会不会还很危险？
content.en: But we've only just cleared the Aggeloi from there. Wouldn't restarting operations now still pose a great danger to the monitoring center?

content.cn: 目前还有其他的观测方法吗？万一侵蚀潮又淹没了观测站，那里的工作人员岂不是很危险？
content.en: Are there other ways to conduct monitoring? If the Blight Tide submerges the monitoring center again, wouldn't the staff there be in grave danger?

content.cn: 我明白你所担心的。
content.en: I understand your concerns.

content.cn: 但是，管理员，从我们来到武陵的那天起，就已经做好了牺牲的准备。
content.en: But from the day we arrived in Wuling, we were prepared to make sacrifices.

content.cn: 管理员，我在武陵城曾遇到过一个孩子。
content.en: Endmin, let me tell you about a child I once met in Wuling City.

content.cn: 他说，庄管代看上去很年轻，听故事里讲的，还以为会是一个白发苍苍的老奶奶。
content.en: He said I looked young. From the stories he heard, he thought I'd be an old lady with gray hair.

content.cn: 然后我就和他说，要是等到我白发苍苍了，那我就已经退休了。
content.en: I told him that by the time my hair turns gray, I'd be long retired.

content.cn: 那孩子怎么说？
content.en: What did he say?

content.cn: 然后呢？
content.en: Then?

content.cn: 那孩子说，庄管代都退休了，那我们是不是早就不用担心侵蚀潮和天使了？
content.en: He asked whether my retirement meant that people were finally safe from the Blight Tide and the Aggeloi.

content.cn: 管理员，这是宏山科学院应尽的使命，也是你交给我们，未尽的期许。
content.en: Endmin, this is the duty of the Hongshan Academy of Sciences. It's the future you entrusted to us.

content.cn: 大当家，我有点好奇你是怎么说服寨民们的。
content.en: Chief, may I ask how you convinced the Stockaders?

content.cn: [汤汤]输入中
content.en: [Tangtang] is typing...

content.cn: 大当家说，不是让我说她不识字，只说找我代表大当家回复黑面煞的问题，这不是在损害大当家在黑面煞眼里的形象嘛。
content.en: For clarification, the Chief said it's not that she's illiterate. She just wants me to represent her and respond to Darkmask's questions. Still, I can't help but feel that even explaining this might make her look bad in Darkmask's eyes.

content.cn: [汤汤]输入中
content.en: [Tangtang] is typing...

content.cn: 我是大当家，我和寨民们在寨子里等着黑面煞的到来。
content.en: I am the Chief. My people and I are waiting in the Stockade for Darkmask's arrival.

content.cn: 好的，大当家。
content.en: As you command, Chief.

content.cn: 没问题，大当家。
content.en: On my way, Chief.

content.cn: 清波寨的寨民们并非蛮横无理之徒，在大当家的动之以情、晓之以理下，二当家便答应了这件事。
content.en: Our folks can be pretty reasonable. As the Chief, I just laid out the practical points and made an emotional appeal, and the first mate came around right away.

content.cn: 侵蚀潮与水花子不只袭扰着武陵城，清波寨也饱受其苦。大当家与二当家绝不能容忍寨民们再陷入先前饿肚子的困境。
content.en: The Blight Tide and those splatters aren't just plaguing Wuling City; Qingbo Stockade has suffered plenty from them too. The Chief and first mate would never put up with the Stockaders going hungry like before.

content.cn: 清波寨本无意与武陵城作对。等有了黑面煞的集成工业系统，便能为寨民们谋求一条出路。
content.en: We never meant to fight Wuling City. Once we get our hands on Darkmask's AIC, it'll give our people a way out.

content.cn: 你是谁？把终端还给大当家！
content.en: Who are you? Give the handyterm back to Chief Tangtang!

content.cn: 这……你还是大当家吗？
content.en: You don't sound like Tangtang.

content.cn: [汤汤]输入中
content.en: [Tangtang] is typing...

content.cn: 大当家说，我不是大当家，她不识字，找我帮她和黑面煞联系。
content.en: The Chief asked me to contact Darkmask on her behalf. She can't read.

content.cn: 彦宁天师生了好大的气……
content.en: Tianshi Yan Ning was seriously angry...

content.cn: 后来发生了什么？
content.en: What happened later?

content.cn: 那场灾难后，我们按照那张“地图”，在这片区域建起了武陵城。
content.en: After that disaster, we built Wuling City in this very area, based on that "map".

content.cn: 每次我提出设想，大家都会一起帮我出主意。
content.en: Every time I proposed an idea, everyone would brainstorm with me.

content.cn: 每次汛期，我从天师桩阵列回来，总是能在桌上看到毛巾与热茶。
content.en: Every Blight Tide season, when I returned from the Tianshi Pillar Array, I would always find a towel and hot tea waiting for me on the table.

content.cn: 但现在，武陵需要大家齐心协力，全身心投入，才能度过这场危机。
content.en: Yet now, navigating this crisis demands Wuling's total unity and unwavering dedication.

content.cn: 不能在其他的地方耗费他们太多的精力。
content.en: I cannot let a shred of their focus be spared elsewhere.

content.cn: 她的反应在预料之中。这么久的好友，她能明白我这么做的理由。
content.en: Her reaction was expected. As an old friend, she understands my reasons for doing this.

content.cn: 你们很早就认识了？
content.en: You two go way back?

content.cn: 原来你们的关系这么好！
content.en: You two seem really close!

content.cn: 我和彦宁是一起加入的武陵科考站。
content.en: Yan Ning and I joined the Wuling Science Station at the same time.

content.cn: 那时的我们，经常和科考站的天师们一起，构想未来的武陵城会是怎样的样貌。
content.en: Back then, we often worked with the other Tianshi at the station, dreaming up what the future Wuling City might look like.

content.cn: 有时还会在地图上圈圈画画，把我们想象中的武陵城画出来。
content.en: Sometimes we'd even draw on maps, sketching out the Wuling City of our imaginations.
